story:
Hi there! I am XShuai C3 Smart Robot Vacuum Cleaner, but you can simply call me Andy*, it’s way easier, right? If you are wondering whether you might need me around or not, let me give you 1 indisputable fact and 6 reasons that will add some clarity to your concerns:

LIFE FACT: vacuuming is boring, time-consuming, and doesn’t go along anymore with nowadays’ fast-paced society. Who wants to waste time cleaning underneath the furniture and around every corner of the house when you can be doing other exciting things instead?

6 REASONS WHY I’M RIGHT FOR YOU:

1. I have an integrated camera, speakers and microphone to video chat. Use the Huiba app -available for iOS and Android, and connect on real-time. You will be able to see what’s going on at home, check on your family and talk to them, or even keep an eye on your pet and see how he is doing! They will never feel lonely again!

2. I am super smart, so smart that I am already using Amazon’s Alexa Voice Control. You can call my name and ask me to get started or to turn off so I can go to sleep to get ready for the next time you need me.

3. Do you have pets? They will love me! Sure that they will doubt me at the beginning, and probably the cat will keep an eye on me for some time, but eventually they will trust me. And I am great at removing pet hair from the floor or carpets! 

4. I am ready 24/7. Call my name and I will be there. Or simply schedule my cleaning time so I can clean when you are not at home. Is there anything better than coming back to a clean home after a long day at work? It's the dream come true!

5. If I am cleaning while you are at home, do not worry, I’ll try to be super quiet. The noise level I produce is under 71 decibels (similar to some background music in a restaurant), you won’t even notice that I am there. I won't bother you while you watch your favourite TV shows, nor the kids will wake up because of me.

6. I have great smart features at a small price. Vacuum robots as myself aren't a $50 thing, I know. But what's great about me is that I have the latest technology for a fraction of the price of other bots out there. Isn't that fantastic?

Pretty interesting, huh? Learn more about all my features below and, if I am what you are looking for, back me up, spread the voice and let me do what I do best, vacuum cleaning!

Download and install the Huiba control App available for iOS and Android Smartphones and have full control of all my functions, make real-time calls, see what’s happening at home when you are out, and more.

Setup in 4 steps: enter mobile number / input password / finish registration / add the robot

Once you have installed the app, navigate the Remote Control XSmart interface and choose your preferred functions to activate. Here are some highlights of what you can do:

Schedule the cleaning: do you want me to clean while you are not at home? No problem. Use your Smartphone to schedule the day and time when I will start working by clicking the “Reservation Cleaning” function.

Talk with your beloved ones: I can receive calls. The built-in camera, microphone and speakers allow you to have a real-time conversation with the people that are home, or to check on your dog or cat. No need to click any buttons to accept the call, I will just do it for you. The angle of the camera can be adjusted 45 degrees up and down for a better view by simply sliding the screen with your finger on your Smartphone.

Manual commands: If you want to manually control the functions or movements with your phone, press the direction icons on your screen (back/forth - left/right) to move me around to your desired location. Choose the cleaning mode and method as well as the speed of movement. You can also take photos and save them on your phone using the Snapshot feature, and more.

Using nothing but the sound of your voice, wake me up or send me to sleep thanks to Alexa.

So who is she? Alexa is Amazon’s voice control system, which is able to respond to voice commands from the distance without the need to touch any buttons, by just saying her name followed by your command.

With Alexa, you only have to add the Huiba skill to your Amazon Echo via Alexa skills store and then, simply enable the skill and enjoy the comfort of speaking your wishes of a clean home. I will hear the command and will get started right away.   

* Future software updates will bring new voice command actions.

Sweeping and Mopping

I have 2 cleaning functions, sweeping (dry) and mopping (wet), which can be used individually or simultaneously, depending on your needs. The water tank for mopping has a capacity of 0.1L. Choose the sweeping function to get rid of dust, human and pet hair, debris and other particles and choose the mopping one to clean stains. Combine the 2 together for deep cleaning.

5 Smart cleaning modes

Auto/Spot/Edge/Z/Pure Suction modes. They all work under both sweeping & mopping

I know when to leave the room: unlike other vacuum robots, I only leave a room when the job is done. If you select the Auto Mode, I will find the wall first in order to locate myself and then, I will start cleaning in a methodical pattern. Choose the Z-Mode and I will use the methodical row movement to move across the floor starting from my current position, I make sure to sweep and suction dirt particles as well as human and pet hair, covering all the floor surface. The side spinning brushes help me to push all debris towards the underpart of the body and into the dust box.

I can get real personal with deep dirt: setup the Spot Mode for a deep clean performance in areas where there is a bigger concentration of dirt, cereals, crumbs or other particles. I will work on spiral movements within the limited area to pick up and clean those particles or stains.

Edges are no longer an issue: with the Edge Mode, I can navigate along the wall spinning the brushes and picking up all dirt that tends to remain by the wall and around the corners.

Dirt has no escape: you can switch to the Pure Suction Mode so the dirt would not be brushed away but sucked away. This mode saves battery because the main brush will not conduct any sweeping action. The route of this mode is the same as auto.

About the HEPA filter

The HEPA (High-Efficiency Particulate Air) filter is a type of mechanical air filter that traps fine dust mites, pollen particles, pet dander and other pollutants and harmful small particles that might cause allergies. A continuous use of the vacuum robot with the HEPA filter will keep the environment cleaner, diminishing allergy symptoms for allergy sufferers.

As I said before, I am super smart! I can find my way back to the charging base*. If I am in the middle of a cleaning period and that I am running out of battery, I will go back to the base to recharge the power and then, I will pick up right where I left off! No commands needed! And once the job is done, I will navigate as well back to the charging base.

*Manual charging mode is also available. Just connect the robot with the charging base manually, and make sure the light indicator is on.

Ground detector: if your home has stairs, do not worry, I can detect them using the front sensors to prevent falls and stop before it is too late. Instead, I will change the direction to keep cleaning elsewhere.

 

Anti wall collision: the frontal sensors can detect the walls so I will not bump into them, I will simply approach to the wall to clean as much as possible, then I will avoid hitting it and will change the direction to keep cleaning.

 

Climbing: objects such as cables on the floor or carpets won't stop me from finishing my tasks. I can climb over objects up to 8mm height, moreover, I also have the ability to climb up to 15 degrees slope angle.

Appearance

Overall dimensions: ⌀ 340 mm x 95 mm
Net weight: 3.2kg
Gross weight (with package): 5.0kg
Color: Blue & Grey
Material: ABS, PC

Battery

Type: Lithium battery
Capacity: 2600mAh
Input:14.4V

Cleaning and Performance

5 Modes: Auto, Spot, Edge, Z, Pure suction 
Cleaning methods: Mopping,  Sweeping
Filter: HEPA
Dust box capacity: 0.83L
Water tank capacity: 0.1L
Unit Average power: 28w
Airflow: 12000r/min
Noise: <71db
Climbing height: 15°
Over obstacle height: 8mm
Input Voltage: 100-240V
Machine current: 1.0A (working)
Sensor distance: 10 ± 2.5 cm
Drop height: 10 ± 2 cm
Remote distance: 3~5 m
Suction power (pa): 1000pa
Room coverage: 80%

Charge

Modes: Auto charge / Manual charge
Charge Time: 4~5hrs
Operation time (max): 120 min

App features

Huiba iOS & Android Control App
Schedule cleaning
Shows Real-Time activity
Answer video calls
Video & Audio Time: 4~6 hours

Accessories & Main Body

Haier XShuai is a brand owned by Haier group, which focuses on the innovation of high-end intelligent terminals and smart home solutions. The company is committed to let everyone enjoy high-quality intelligent devices at affordable prices. XShuai, presented by Haier Robot, worked for 2 years with 300 hardware development engineers and 50 software development engineers to design and produce high-performance service robots that will transform the vision of the vacuum bots field into a leading one. From the user's point of view, the core value of our robots is the ability to perform daily tasks effectively and efficiently. Whether sweeping, mopping, or other cleaning tasks, XShuai C3 offers the best performance solutions for the market. We are investing in the development of robotic interfaces to enable users to interact with our series of products in richer and more convenient ways.

*Can I change the name from Andy to any other name?

Yes, Andy is the predetermined name but you can modify it. To change the name, simply log in to the Huiba app and set a new name under the “contact” tab. This tab contains the information for all Xshuai robots that you have.

Can I choose other colors?

The XShuai HXS-C3 model is only available in the dual Blue & Silver colors

What types of floor does it work on?

It can work on tile, hardwood floor, carpets (less than 2.5cm thick) and other common home or office floor types.

Can it clean the porch/open balcony?

The C3 is indicated for an indoors usage. When used outdoors, it can suction small rocks and soil that could damage it.

Can it clean underneath the furniture?

It can go underneath any furniture as long as the gap between the bottom of the furniture and the floor is taller than C3 (~9.5cm)

What is the operating time after one single full-charge?

An estimate of 120 minutes: 90 minutes (cleaning) + 30 minutes (back recharging)

How quickly does the C3’s battery charge?

A single full charge takes around 4 to 6 hours

Will XShuai C3 work without using the Huiba App?

Yes, it can be used without the Huiba App, but this App allows you to use your iOS or Android smart device to help you have the best possible experience. By using Huiba, you can schedule your cleaning, make calls, access the video camera, take photos, select your preferred cleaning mode and more.

If I accidentally touch the battery lead plate of C3, would it be dangerous?

No, the lead plate of C3 outputs a direct current voltage of 24V, which is safe for a human at a point of contact.

What’s the C3 Vacuum Robot warranty?

XShuai C3 Smart Robot Vacuum Cleaner has a 13-month warranty upon the date of manufacturing.

My PayPal transaction doesn’t work, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any payment issues.

How much will it cost to ship the C3 Vacuum Robot to my country?

We offer free shipping to every country (see exceptions below). For countries in Africa, the shipping cost is 60USD.  
Exceptions - shipping is not yet confirmed for the following countries: Afghanistan, Burundi, Iraq, Libya, Mali, Niger, South Sudan, Syria, Yemen, Central African Republic, Democratic Republic of Congo, Eritrea, Iran, North Korea, Libya, Somalia, Sudan.

I have other questions not answered here. Who can help me?

We’re happy to respond to any further queries you might have about Andy, our Smart Robot Vacuum Cleaner. Visit our official website:  or email us at support@xshuairobot.com

You’ve seen how awesome I am! Now we need your help and support so the whole world can learn about me! Tell your friends, family and even your in-laws how their housecleaning will radically change by putting an Andy in their homes!

All help is welcomed here! Share on your Facebook wall, Twitter, tell your friends, your neighbors, your butcher…!  Help us spread the word, we need your support. Cheers!

story:
CAM USB Hidden Spy Camera / USB Charger

For a small price, you can get the peace of mind you want with the CAM USB Mini Hidden Surveillance Camera.

Doubling as a functioning USB charger, the CAM USB records HD 1920x1080p Video in .avi format. You can easily transfer and watch the video with a standard USB Cable. You can view the video from your phone, computer and tablet. 

  • CAM USB is a U.S. based technology developer of surveillance equipment.
  • The CAM USB is now available and ready to ship worldwide.
  • Compatible Plugs: Available in the following Plug Types: A/B and C/E/F

THREE OPTIONS ARE AVAILABLE FOR YOUR CAM USB:

OPTION 1: CAM USB built-in 16gb memory (3.5 hours of continuous HD video / audio on loop)

OPTION 2: CAM USB built-in 32gb memory (6-7 hours of continuous HD video / audio on loop)

OPTION 3: CAM USB / Motion-Detection Charger with removable 32gb memory (6-7 hours of continuous HD video / audio triggered by internal motion-detector)


Please share our campaign on Twitter and Facebook!

Thank you for your interest.

story:
Tidy Tools Club Campaign Summary

Our company is passionate about saving you time, money, and trips to crowded stores.  Help us become the #1 Home Cleaning Club in America.  Our growth provides new jobs for Americans here at home:

  • The Tidy Tools Corporate Team has 100+ years of combined sourcing, manufacturing, and retail experience 
  • Our campaign is so very important because our goal is to start manufacturing more and more products here at home while creating new jobs and having fun.  Your support can help us get there!!!!!!

Contributors are helping us launch, scale, and prove our business model has need and merit not only to Americans but that it can eventually be offered to other countries around the world as an on going solution.

We wish to thank everyone that gets on board and helps support our cleaning kit options as an alternative to wasting time and money at crowded Big Box Retail stores that over charge consumers for their products.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for $50,000 to build up inventory of our first cleaning kit products and launch our new marketing campaigns.
  • Our backers will receive up to a 1 year subscription to our club that can include up to 1 month of refills for free!!!!!!
  • We hope to reach our $50,000 goal and all of the funds will go to provide cleaning kits to our new members, to launch our additional product lines, and to reach new club members via innovative marketing campaigns.

What is the Tidy Tools Club Impact?

Our Club Members are the difference.  Each of you allows our company to grow and create new jobs for hard working Americans.  Each purchase helps us source additional products for our line that can be manufactured here in the US which also keeps American business strong, saves jobs, and creates opportunity.  Thank you for your business and we promise the following:

  • High Quality Reliable Merchandise manufactured across the globe
  • Efficient, Quick, and Effective Customer Service.  If you have a need or concern we respond within 24hrs.  We can be reached at Customer-Service@ftjgroup.com
  • Delivery of the most cost competitive priced home products in the retail & online market place.  We will do our best to save you the most money.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
  • Please let your friends, family, and business contacts know about our campaign!!!!  Spread the word via your social network on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Etsy, and more!!!!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!  This is another great resource to spread the word!!!
  • If you have media contacts - please share the story about our company and club offering - or have them contact us direct at customer-service@ftjgroup.com

Thanks to all of you - from all of us at Tidy Tools Club

story:
Asleep at the wheel: Drowse Buster is a device that keeps the user awake. Invented by a team of scientists at universities who realized that there are very few products that have yet to take advantage of the combination of TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine) and modern smart technology, the Drowse Buster effectively stimulates the acupoint on your earlobes to prevent you from falling asleep. This smart device can be used for situations such as nodding off while driving, studying at the library, attending meetings, and other situations where being awake and alert is important.  

Drowsy driving is something invisible, underestimated and very dangerous. According to CarInsurance.com, 68% of traffic accidents involved drowsy driving in US in 2013.

 

 How does Drowse Buster-E work?

 Recharge your battery with a micro-USB cable:

Overwhelming superiority to its Competitors:

Drowse Buster uses recyclable materials: Shell~ABS/PMMA, chips and micro-computer processor are all radiation-free.

The Drowse Buster is the first device ever that combines smart tech and TCM theory to keep the user awake. It’s not an alarm that tells you, “Hey you seem drowsy - be careful!” – it’s a non-intrusive device that can keep your head clear and aware.

The gadget is designed by a team of young men who chose 3 out of twenty proposals defined from the world’s major ethnical groups. This will be crucial for precise acupoint impulse responses on your earlobes. 

$33-  Early Bird: 1 Drowse Buster-E (Jet Black-200 limited).

$380 - Ten Color Drowse Buster-E gadgets (Any color may be picked).

$3650 - One Hundred Color Drowse Buster-E gadgets + Authorized Distributor and listed on our official website.

For more information about the gadget: www.drowsebuster.com

WHAT IS DROWSE BUSTER-E?

 Staying wide awake anywhere; indoors or outdoors. Wiping out fatigue more seamlessly than you ever thought possible.
Drowse Buster-E easily attached to your earlobes and provides a comfortable massaging-effect through combination of TCM theory (Traditional Chinese Medicine) and modern smart technology to prevent you from falling asleep. This smart device can be used for situations such as nodding off while driving, studying at the library, attending meetings, and other situations where being awake and alert is important.  

Drowse Buster-E is an affordable, distinguishing alternative to other anti-sleepiness devices. It is able to wipe out drowsiness and fatigue. To make things better, the tooling is complete and all we need is to place an initial order!  Drowse Buster-E will arrive to backers in January 2017.  Indiegogo backers can get one for only $33, depending on the pledge package.


What if you feel drowsy while studying?
       A student feeling drowsy while studying Clip these on your earlobes. Just like that! After using Drowse Buster-E, he feels wide awake! Asleep at the wheel: Drowse Buster is a device that keeps the user awake. This smart device can be used for situations such as nodding off while driving, studying at the library, attending meetings, and other situations where being awake and alert is important.  Drowsy driving is something invisible, underestimated and very dangerous. According to CarInsurance.com, 68% of traffic accidents involved drowsy driving in US in 2013.             This is where human being's eye acupuncture point is.   Clip these on your earlobes. Just like that!     How does Drowse Buster-E work?        Recharge your battery with a micro-USB cable: Overwhelming superiority to its Competitors:

Risks & Challenges

Over the past two years, we've worked extremely hard to prepare our product for Indiegogo and full-time manufacturing. The Drowse Buster you see in the video is a real, working prototype.
During the manufacturing stages, which include designing and creating the tooling to manufacture a product of this kind, it took us nearly 2 months of lead time to create the mold. In order to achieve the best results, we partner with tooling manufacturers closely and communicate frequently.
As the Drowse Buster gears up for production, minor adjustments were made to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product.  This allows us to incorporate our adjustments according to the feedback we received from testing. This will always be for the benefit of you - the consumer - and we will let you know exactly how and why any changes are made.
We will be working with certified manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in enormous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our Drowse Buster customer.
With your support, we can bring Drowse Buster onto ears worldwide. While we're close to entering packaging, your contribution will help fund:
- Large bulk Orders 
- Expanding color types


Frequently Asked Questions

Can you turn on and off the Drowse Buster-E device?
Yes! All three of the device we offer have switches to turn them on or off when ever you want; Simply Press the button for 2seconds to turn it off.

Is there a charger included?Yes! A micro-USB cable is included and comes together with your Drowse-Buster-E gadget. The micro-USB charger in the packaging will match with your device's colour. I accidentally ordered the wrong color/ put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my perk. What do I do?Please e-mail our customer service at Drowsebuster@gmail.com with your full name, address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order. 

Is shipping included in the perk amount?
Yes, world-wide shipping is included in your pledge.
How smart is Drowse Buster-E?Drowse Buster will automatically turn off when it is finished working. Drowse Buster is smart enough to pick up from where you left off. It will start the impulse volume mode that you chosen from your previous use.

When will you be shipping Drowse Buster-E?We expect the first units to start arriving at backers' homes near the end of November 2016. Orders will be fulfilled in roughly the sequence that they were purchased on Indiegogo.

Which age group is Drowse-Buster not suited to? Are there any restriction? 
Drowse Buster is the first smart device with CTM acupuncture and moxibustion ever comes to the market. It’s good for drowsy driver/student or one stays up late behind the desk but is not good for those suffer from narcolepsy,untreated sleep disorders, with short-term or chronic sleep deprivation or youngsters under the age of 16. 
User with pacemaker implantation is strongly advised to consult your doctor before using.

story:
Seas is a motion monitoring device to keep a designated area safe. The system will alert you when it senses movement that could mean an intrusion. Instantly receive notification, SMS or call alerts wherever you are.

No internet connection or wifi routers are required so the system is not limited to your household. It can be used in garages, remote cottages, cars, campervans, hotel rooms, while camping, any place with mobile network. Seas is smart, easy and affordable way to stay secure.

Seas is an impressive little device that combines all the smart features with affordability. This was achieved by reusing of a piece of technology that you already have. Almost everyone has an old outdated smartphone at home - Seas will give it a new use and purpose. Up to five Seas devices can be wirelessly connected to one smartphone which is acting as a system base station. 

 

  • No internet connection required
  • Easy installation - no wiring, no power cables
  • Controlled from your smartphone, base station or automatically
  • No monthly fees
  • Instantly receive notification, SMS or call alert to your phone or landline
  • Portable - can be used almost anywhere - cottages, garages, hotels, RVs ...
  • Smart system preventing false alarms
  • Ecological - reuse technology
  • Budget and Renter friendly

 

Seas is a user friendly, simple system that can keep your belongings safe and provide peace of mind.

 

You can define a wide range of Seas features to fit your needs.From controlling when Seas is armed to how it should respond to detected intrusion.

Seas can be armed and disarmed automatically in desired times, remotely from your smartphone or manually on base phone with security password. Seas can also sense presence of your mobile phone when you come close to the secured area and automatically turn off the security system.

 

In a case of an intrusion instantly receive notification, SMS or call alerts wherever you are. Seas empowers you to take action when something isn’t right.

 

You choose how to respond to an alert. Listen and talk through base phone, let out a siren to ward off the intruder, forward the alert to your friends, family or neighbors or call the police. You have the ability to decide.

 

Receive critical alerts virtually anywhere -  You don’t have to be connected to the internet to receive SMS or Call alerts. Seas can call your mobile phone, landline or directly to police.

 

Weather you put Seas into your home, office, garage or hotel room it will provide you with peace of mind. Seas will make it easy to keep your belongings safe.

 

We believe that everyone should have the ability to secure things they care about. Our mission was to come up with a security system that would be smart, universal, easy to install, intuitive to use and economical.

  • Simplicity

We have designed Seas to be as simple as possible. Just take it out of the box, insert batteries, install free app to your smartphone, take pictures of Seas devices in desired location and it is connected. Easily set and control all Seas features from your current smartphone using the free app. If you can use smartphone you can use Seas.

  • Flexibility

Seas doesn’t rely on internet connection or power input. It can be used almost anywhere. Unlike other smart security systems, it will keep working when internet or power is cut out.

  • Design

Seas was beautifully designed to suit any location. It is inconspicuous, not disturbing yet elegant, graceful and stylish. It can be placed on flat surfaces (bookshelves, countertops etc.) or attached to a wall.

  • Affordability

Seas combines smart features with maximal affordability. Seas is giving a new purpose to your unused phone by reusing its features: Wireless connectivity, Operating system, Touch screen, Microphone and speaker, Backup battery. The old phone needs to be equipped with a working sim card in order to use Seas system for sending SMS/call alerts.

 

 

 

              Martin: Product Manager and Designer

 

               Tomas: Mechanical & Electrical Engineer

 

               Peter: Software Engineer

 

Additionally we are collaborating with a group of engineers, designers and industry experts to create the best product possible.

 

We currently have working prototypes and an operating app.

We're now focused on:

  • Concluding and testing final product
  • Improving and developing mobile app

Next we are planning to:

  • Design packaging
  • Create supply chain
  • Start production
  • Begin distribution

 

We have been working on Seas for the past year and now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate manufacturing so we can make Seas available to you and everyone who have never before had a simple, smart and affordable security option. Together we can make our world safer. We hope you join us!  

Why should you support us?

  • You want a Smart Easy Affordable Security to have comfort of knowing your belongings are safe
  • You can be the first to get one.
  • You love the idea and think it’s awesome to support a security system attainable to everyone.

 

How many Seas devices can I connect to one phone?

You can have up to five Seas devices in one location connected to one base phone.

Can anyone set up Seas?
Yes, Seas was designed to make installation easy so everyone would be able to use it.

When can I get a Seas device delivered to my home?
Estimated shipping dates begin in Septembre 2017. Our goal is to have the shipment out earlier  but we might meet some challenges and we do not want to overpromise. We are working as hard as we can  to bring this to market, and as soon as it’s ready, it will be sent out to you!

Can I use multiple phones with one Seas system?
Yes. The app is free and Seas can be connected to multiple phones. For instance, if there are two people in a home, they both can arm and disarm the security system.

How is Seas powered? What happens if the power goes out?
Seas is battery powered device using standard AA batteries. They will last up to 6 months and batteries can be easily replaced. You can also use rechargeable batteries. However your old phone acting as system base station needs to be plugged in if used for a longer period. System will work for limited time even if power goes out as the phone has its own battery. Seas will send you notification when phone battery will run low so you can respond appropriately.

What if someone smashes my Seas?

If Seas breaks and cannot connect with base phone, the system will send an alert to your mobile phone to notify you of the break in connection.

Will Seas work with iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows?
We are planning Seas to support all platforms. However prior to launch, the app is being developed for Android and iOS.

Challenges?
There may be development, manufacturing and shipping delays outside of our control, but we promise transparent communication and will provide updates through the process.

story:
If this is you…we have the answer 

 

Today, people are busier than ever. But can you really get anything done if your desk looks like this? Like any great project, organization is the key to success. And organization begins right at your desk. Don’t waste time looking for that important note, searching for your phone or simply trying to find a pen. 

 

 

Let Ganvas get you organized once and for all. The customizable, modular Ganvas organizer can change the thing of the mess past and let you get to work on the important things. 

 

The Red Dot Award-winning Ganvas consists of different modules that can be customized to perfectly suit your unique needs and help you get organized. It’s based around a desktop pegboard that accepts different storage modules in any configuration that you desire. 

 

 

  • The Bottom Tray

Works great in a lower position along the bottom of the pegboard to be used as a phone holder, tablet tray, device shelf or to hold envelopes and other long items. 

 

 

  • Medium & Small Containers

No more searching for the scattered stationery tools you need daily. Keep them all safely stored within reach using one of the two provided cup style containers. The containers can be placed in any part of the pegboard to safely hold all the little things in your life. 

 

 

  •  The Hangers: 

Work best along the top or edge of the pegboard and keep your earbuds untangled and provide a place for your keys that keeps them always at hand. 

 

 

  • The Magnet:

Attracts your metal gadgets, clips, pins and more. A great place to quickly attach any metal object for quick access. 

 

 

  • All Metal Body

The modules and pegboard of Ganvas are made from a sleek yet durable aluminum alloy that is easy to clean and looks ultra-modern. Its triangle-shaped base ensures it will stand firmly even when fully loaded. 

 

 

The unique pegboard system allows each of the parts to be positioned anywhere you want upon the base. You can easily customize it for different needs, desks, or locations in your home or office. 

 

 

Messy desks, tables and work areas become a thing of the past. All of your essentials finally have a permanent place of their own. 

 

Ganvas helps you to keep your space neat and tidy. It eliminates clutter and simplifies your life. 

 

Ganvas is super user-friendly. It is a breeze to set it up. Connect the pegboard to the base, attach the storage baskets and hooks, and start enjoying a more organized life. 

 

Keep everything clean and in its place. Eliminates the time you spend digging through messy drawers and desks for your essentials.

story:
Switch the 4 layers position and create up to 10 different combination, each one with a specific mix of height, freshness and support.

MIO PILLOW is composed of 4 combinable layers made of different qualities of memory foam.   

 

 

 

Sleep plays a vital role in good health and well-being throughout your life. The benefits of a good night’s sleep are countless: it’s just as important as eating healthy and exercising. Being well rested allows us to perform at our maximum potential, both physically and mentally. And that's why a pillow choice is really important. 

Everyone is built differently. We all have different habits and body types, which means we all have different sleeping needs. Most pillows you find on Amazon will hardly fit your sleeping needs and that's why we created Mio Pillow: the first customizable bed pillow.

We sleep in these 3 positions and each requires a different height to correctly align your back. MIO PILLOW can be adapted to maintain a correct body position all night long. Keep 4 layers if you sleep on a side, remove 1 layer if you sleep on your back or use only 2 layers if you sleep on your stomach.

 

You have 2 toppers to use. The first topper is made of Thermofresh, a highly transpirant material that transmits moisture away and keeps your head fresh during a hot summer night. The second is made of Vesna, a low porosity foam that provides a warming action for  cold  winter nights .

-- GIF WINTER / SUMMER --

By switching the layers under your topper, you can choose between  a firmer pillow so that your neck has stronger support, or a softer pillow to gently sink into. 

-- GIF FIRM / SOFT --

The 3 side zipper is another truly innovative feature. Traditional bed pillows have just a 1 side that you can open, which makes very difficult and time consuming to change the inner shape. The 3 side zipper is an exclusive feature by MIO PILLOW which makes easy and quick to switch the combinable layers.

 

The bricks will always match perfectly thanks to our  modular design. Switching the combination of layers is easy and fast. The bricks won’t ever slip during the night with the foam’s high quality grip strength. 

 

 

 

Who said that your homey pillow cannot travel with you? Now it  can. The memory foam bricks are so resistant that they can be squeezed or compressed in your luggage. Reassemble everything once in your hotel room. 

 

 With its  excellent rebound rate, MIO PILLOW provides a real ergonomic support to your head.

The Italian memory foam guarantees  a sleep you’ve never experienced before with a pillow that provides both  softness and firmness at the same time.

 

MIO PILLOW is made with the best quality of memory foam available on the market and produced by a leading Italian manufacturer.

The material of the pillow is just as resistant as it is soft.  Gently squeeze it to test its qualities.

To create the combinable layers of MIO PILLOW we choose a certified odorless quality of dynamic memory foam.

During tests and focus groups, we found out that many customers complained about the bad odor of the pillow after unpackaging, claiming that this defect often prevents  the use of the pillow itself. When the pillow smells bad,  most often it is because of  the poor quality of memory foam used. Going premium is the solution!

 

The Italian memory foam guarantees an unexperienced softness and resistance at the same time*

*The 5-year MIO PILLOW warranty offers you full protection against the premature deterioration of the fabric quality of the four combinable memory foam layers. If the memory foam layers should get deteriorated in their consistency, supportive power, rebound rate and softness, Funded in Italy will integrally replace the defective layers returned by the backer. The warranty of MIO PILLOW lasts 5 years from the moment you receive your pillow.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Funded in Italy is a new boutique design studio launched in 2018 by BANALE, an Italian brand of travel accessories with 7 successful crowdfunding campaigns. The mission of Funded in Italy consists of developing forward thinking concepts for daily use objects.

We only partner with the best Italian manufacturers and raw material suppliers to deliver amazing concepts that combine technical excellence with fine design and high usability. Mio Pillow is the first project by Funded in Italy: we made the best of our deep knowledge of the pillows market and the link with the Italian supply chain of memory foam.

Funded in Italy is based in Milan, Italy, inside the BANALE headquarters. Come and meet us.

The first topper is made of Thermofresh, a highly transpirant material that transmits moisture away and keeps your head fresh during a hot summer night. The second is made of Vesna, a low porosity foam that provides a warming action for  cold  winter nights .-- GIF WINTER / SUMMER --By switching the layers under your topper, you can choose between  a firmer pillow so that your neck has stronger support, or a softer pillow to gently sink into. -- GIF FIRM / SOFT --The 3 side zipper is another truly innovative feature. Traditional bed pillows have just a 1 side that you can open, which makes very difficult and time consuming to change the inner shape. The 3 side zipper is an exclusive feature by MIO PILLOW which makes easy and quick to switch the combinable layers. The bricks will always match perfectly thanks to our  modular design. Switching the combination of layers is easy and fast. The bricks won’t ever slip during the night with the foam’s high quality grip strength.    Who said that your homey pillow cannot travel with you? Now it  can. The memory foam bricks are so resistant that they can be squeezed or compressed in your luggage. Reassemble everything once in your hotel room.   With its  excellent rebound rate, MIO PILLOW provides a real ergonomic support to your head.The Italian memory foam guarantees  a sleep you’ve never experienced before with a pillow that provides both  softness and firmness at the same time.


 
MIO PILLOW is made with the best quality of memory foam available on the market and produced by a leading Italian manufacturer.The material of the pillow is just as resistant as it is soft.  Gently squeeze it to test its qualities.To create the combinable layers of MIO PILLOW we choose a certified odorless quality of dynamic memory foam.During tests and focus groups, we found out that many customers complained about the bad odor of the pillow after unpackaging, claiming that this defect often prevents  the use of the pillow itself. When the pillow smells bad,  most often it is because of  the poor quality of memory foam used. Going premium is the solution! The Italian memory foam guarantees an unexperienced softness and resistance at the same time**The 5-year MIO PILLOW warranty offers you full protection against the premature deterioration of the fabric quality of the four combinable memory foam layers. If the memory foam layers should get deteriorated in their consistency, supportive power, rebound rate and softness, Funded in Italy will integrally replace the defective layers returned by the backer. The warranty of MIO PILLOW lasts 5 years from the moment you receive your pillow.        Funded in Italy is a new boutique design studio launched in 2018 by BANALE, an Italian brand of travel accessories with 7 successful crowdfunding campaigns. The mission of Funded in Italy consists of developing forward thinking concepts for daily use objects.We only partner with the best Italian manufacturers and raw material suppliers to deliver amazing concepts that combine technical excellence with fine design and high usability. Mio Pillow is the first project by Funded in Italy: we made the best of our deep knowledge of the pillows market and the link with the Italian supply chain of memory foam.Funded in Italy is based in Milan, Italy, inside the BANALE headquarters. Come and meet us.

story:
When you go out for a long time, who will take care of your plants?

Or even if you are at home, sometimes you forget to water the flowers?

Many times you have to let it wither, which is such a sad thing.

This time around, we present you Norshire Automatic Drip Irrigation Kit the world’s smallest and most portable Drip Irrigation Kit with uncompromised performance.

  • AUTOMATED DRIP IRRIGATION KIT: Combine pump and (30) day timer in 1 automatic drip watering system. Watering home&office potted plants quantitative & timing after simply set up the drip watering schedule and enjoy the freedom of having your plants automatically self-watered.Enjoy your plants thrive and growing healthy, with absolutely no effort! You can not only save your time and energy, but also enjoy healthy plants with full water and shiny leaves.
  • DIGITAL TIMER DISPLAY: Featuring an extra OLED screen with bright, easy-to-read text and dial. Programming, set-up, and scheduling is simple. Screen is backlit enabling to set the water timer schedule at night. In addition to showing the time, it can also show the indoor temperature.
  • TWO TYPES OF POWER: Running this system from 2 pcs of AA batteries or Type-c USB power. This is the only redundant power system on the market. If USB power fails the pump will continue to run on AA batteries (if batteries are installed).Excellent for urban patios and balconies where faucets are unavailable.
  • PROGRAM MEMORY:Once programmed, the settings are stored in internal memory automatically. Custom programming and settings will remain in memory even if power is removed. There will be no need to reprogram the water timer every time batteries are changed.       

                                                                                                                               

It can be used in many ways, and it is so simple:

We can fix it on the wall, using a magnet or a piece of 3M double-sided tape.

Our design team insists on the white appearance, because it can look the same color as the wall, beautiful and quiet, you don't seem to feel its existence.

It can work like a pump, and the source of water can be a cup, a bucket, or even a tank or a pond.

 

If it is a plant that does not need a lot of water, you can use a Coke plastic bottle or a mineral water bottle if you only need to water the plant for 5 seconds a week, such as the cactus. 
A bottle of water can satisfy the water supply of this plant for half a year.

It can connect up to 2.5L plastic cola bottles. Note that the mouth threads of cola plastic bottles are different from those of mineral water bottles.

You can use the accessories we provide to divide a pipe into multiple pipes, so that you can water many plants at the same time.

Layout example：

The following are some scenarios in the actual use of our products:

Type 1: Use the USB of TYPE-C to supply power directly. It can work on standby for a long time, and the data set by the user will be saved, even if the power is accidentally cut off and powered back on, it will still work on time.

Type 2: It has a built-in AA (1450) battery warehouse, you can use two 1.5V rechargeable batteries, use TYPE-C 's USB charging line to charge the battery, or you can use ordinary dry batteries that can be bought in the supermarket. 

This kind of battery can make this equipment work continuously for an hour. What? 
Two batteries can only work for an hour? 
It doesn't matter, because it only works for 10 seconds a day to meet the plant's daily water supply, so it can work for more than 180 days. 
The internal CPU uses the world's most advanced low-power chip, and its static working current is less than 1UA, which means that a pair of batteries can keep the device dormant for three years.

We use a specially designed water pump, which pumps water with a very low sound. 
It works for only a few seconds a day, and most of the time it is dormant when the screen is turned off, and it wakes up automatically only when it reaches the time set by the program. 
The machine has a built-in high-precision temperature sensor with an accuracy of 0.1 degrees Celsius, so you can keep it on all the time, and it will show the room temperature. 
In addition to real-time monitoring of the room temperature, the internal CPU can also detect the battery charge. When the battery is too low, it will sound an alarm through the loudspeaker. 
In addition, CPU can also detect whether there is water in the water pipe, after the water source has been drained, it will also sound an alarm, remind to add water, and turn off the pump.


  • NORSHIRE Automatic Drip Irrigation Kit *1
  • Type -c Power Cord *1
  • Pipe (Outer diameter 6mm and inner diameter 4mm) *10 meters
  • Barbed tee *2
  • Dripper *6
  • End closuer *3
  • Pure copper filter *1
  • 3M high strength double-sided adhesive *2   

  • Soil Humidity Tester(Only the professional version includes this) *1

We are a team of engineers/makers/innovators who strive to make a difference by designing car accessories with a minimalist philosophy. This time around, we present you Norshire Automatic Drip Irrigation Kit, the world’s smallest and most portable Drip Irrigation Kit ever.  We have created many popular products. You can see our products on our official website： www.norshire.com. Creativity makes life better, and we hope everyone can enjoy the high-quality life that technology brings to us. Healthy life, better life!   

You can contact us through this email address:support@norshire.com

story:
Short Summary

 Yellow House Canyon Brew Works is a Lubbock-local production brewery that desires to bring you, unique, creative, classic, and original craft beer flavors.  In order to bring this desire to fruition, they need your help! YHCBW need a fire hydrant so they can meet city code and start production on a larger scale. TheLBK.com saw this as an opportunity to start and sponsor an Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign  to help get Yellow House Canyon Brew Works going and thriving.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The installation of a fire hydrant will cost $40,000. That includes tapping the city main water line, installing 888 feet of pipe, basic road repair as well. 
  • You get AMAZING perks for giving, One of a kind beer glasses, Brew days with Brewmasters Bill and Tim where they teach you to brew, Name your own fermenter and more!
  • All the contributions will go toward helping fund the fire hydrant. 
  • Local craft beer in a community shows ownership, and artisanal drive. Yellow House Canyon Brew Works is knowledgeable and passionate about providing great beer for Lubbock!

Risks & Challenges

  • Even after the funding of the fire hydrant, YHCB is on the city's time table for the installation of this project. There easily could be hidden costs, pit falls and other unforeseen hoops to jump through to start production

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Buy YHCB Home Brew Equipment. YHCB is a huge advocate in the local home brew community, and the only local home brew equipment supplier. they have the knowledge and a vast array of product to help get you brewing your favorite beer. 
  • Buy local craft beer. Craft beer focuses on the craftsmanship of the brew from start to finish. It also supports cultural shift focusing on arts in the local community.
  • Visit TheLBK.com and support local business and events.
