story:
What is Quantum Smart Table?

Quantum is an elegant yet extraordinary smart table with a robust and beautiful design, that compliments both public spaces and in doors applications. It features a toughened scratch resistant glass that is able to withstand impacts and offers a water resistant surface. Quantum smart table uses a 42” LED Full HD display and a high end computer system that offers lighting fast performance. The astonishing 20 independent points touch technology offers a fast and accurate multi-user experience. Finally our state of the art smart table could not miss Ripple Suite, a multi-touch platform designed to enhance the multi-user experience allowing multiple users to interact at the same time!

What can I do with the Quantum Smart Table?

Quantum smart table ships with Microsoft Windows 8.1, offering a unique and fun experience for the user, as it supports every touch and multi-touch feature the operating system can handle. Quantum smart table further enhances the experience with a unique gesture engine, allowing user specific gestures supported by various applications. The prime characteristic that Quantum Smart Table offers is the astonishing 20 independent points touch technology, fully utilized by the amazing Ripple Suite multi-touch platform, allowing multiple users to interact with the table and with each other at the same time!

Quantum Smart Table Features:

Ergonomic, robust and beautiful design

With amazing design and smooth lines, Quantum Smart Table is a technological work of art, that compliments both public spaces and in doors applications; it just fits everywhere! The chemically treated toughened glass is designed to withstand impacts and offers a water resistant surface.

Full high definition LED display

Quantum Smart Table features a 42” LED Full HD display that offers reduced energy consumption, better contrast and brightness, greater color range as well as a more accurate image rendering. Enjoy the high definition quality in a multi-touch environment, designed for multi user interaction!

Adjustable leg height

The cleverly structured, ergonomic leg design allows users to adjust the table’s height according to their needs. This feature allows Quantum Smart Table to fit in nearly any environment!

Unique touch experience for Microsoft Windows 8.1

Live a brand new experience, exploring the incredible features that Microsoft Windows 8.1 offer with Quantum’s astonishing touch technology. Challenge your friends in various amazing games, explore the internet, find your destination, work on a 3D model, everything is possible with Quantum Smart Table!!

True multi user experience with Ripple Suite

Ripple Suite is a true multi-user environment that allows multiple users to interact with the table at the same time using various touch enabled applications independently or together! Compete with your friends in amazing multiplayer games, present your work to multiple viewers and allow them to interact with you on the fly, browse the internet, find your destination, create and show interactive educational presentations and many more; Quantum Smart Tables unlocks a complete new reality full of possibilities limited only by your imagination!!

Our innovation - Ripple Suite, a true multi-user interface!

Ripple is the heart of Quantum Smart Table, since it allows multiple users to interact at the same time. It allows any number of users, limited only but Quantum's size, to use the table, share and interact with each other together!

Ripple Suite is a multi-touch framework that consists of multiple touch enabled applications. The applications are separate entities, able to be removed, replaced or redesigned depending on the user’s needs. Users can create their own applications and load them in Ripple with only a few clicks! Ripple Suite can either function as a standalone application or follow the Client – Server pattern if the user requires it. Following the Client – Server pattern Ripple is able to load themes, widgets and applications from a server while running on multiple clients with the same configuration.

Ripple Suite can process limitless touch points depending on the computer’s configuration and hosts an incredibly powerful Gesture Engine that can be reconfigured depending on the user’s needs. Users can add or develop HTML 5, Flash, Javascript, ASP.net or PHP applications for Ripple; users can add multi-touch functionality to their applications using Ripple Injector with just a few clicks! The preloaded applications in Ripple Suite are mainly entertainment, social networking, POI and POS applications. This does not limit the user to create, find or order new applications from our team and use them in Ripple.

The Story so far...

We want to take some time and explain what we have been doing for the past three years, even before we created Verdech IKE. Quantum Smart Table is a project that has already been worked for several years.

When we consived the idea we started with a small wooden box with minimal features; the idea was to create a multi-touch table using existing and cheap technology. In other words it was a small project created as a proof of concept. The first prototype model consisted of a small TFT screen, lights and a few cameras; there was no computer system included or any other special features.

The next step was to improve the frame holder, add a computer system inside and include software which added some functionality to our project. The overall design now was better since we had a steel frame instead of wooden, improved lightning, infrared tracking and a better display. The result was promising and motivated us to push even further!

After many different attempts, trial and error, we strived for improvement; we decided to go public with our product. We launched market research in order to see what the people prefer and we reached our first Quantum Smart Table prototype. We completely changed the technology used so far and instead of infrared sensors and cameras we moved to projected capacitive technology, a true table form factor with a 42" LED HD screen and a powerful computer system embeded.

It was time to showcase our product to the people and receive feedback. Initial feedback was impressive. However people highlighted a small detail that did not catch our attention thus far. People needed new legs as the old ones did not fit the table. It was time to make the table a bit more adjustable; new legs, new design and the option to change the height was the next step!

At the moment we are finalizing our new design and getting ready for production. Here is a quick look of our ready for production commercial design.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support in order to raise the funds needed for the minimum requirement of parts as well as the cost for creating a mold and production line for our product. The funds received from this campaign will be used for the molding, production and packaging process.

We need at least € 100,000 in order to cover the cost of production for Quantum Smart Table. In case we don’t achieve the € 100,000 goal and you have purchased your own Quantum Smart Table then you will receive our current design as shown in the section above. If we meet our goal then the design of the table you will get is the one shown below.

Every penny will be used for research and development that is required to turn our prototype into a full-fledged consumer product. In return, you will get the most amazing smart table you have ever dreamed.

Who We are

Stavros Zmpounos - Co-founder, Technical Director
Stavros is a seasoned technician with years of experience in medical, computer and hardware engineering. He was born and lives in Thessaloniki. He co-founded Verdech where he build Quantum Smart table alongside his co-workers.
Grigorios Kapakoglou - Co-founder, Lead Programmer
Gregory is a seasoned developer with years of experience in software and web development. He has an MBA and a degree in Computer science and networking. He was born and lives in Thessaloniki. He co-founded Verdech.
Grigorios Sakkis - Co-founder, Marketing Director
Gregory was born in Corfu and now lives in Ioannina. He has an MBA at regional planning and has also degree in economics. He is an entrepreneur during the 6 last years and co-founder of Verdech.

Our dream...

Our dream is to bring people together and allow them to interact with a fun and intuitive way! We want to bring the smart table, in every home or business and make it an important part of your daily life. We want to join the digital and physical world and allow people to share and interact with each other without the need of any other device other than their hands using our natural user interface! This can happen and that is our goal! We are trying very hard to make our unique smart table affordable for everyone and to reduce the production cost as much as possible, for you, the consumer, because you deserve it! We are looking for support from people that share our dream, from you! An affordable smart table for everyone!

The Impact this campaign will have on us

We are a small and brand new company and without you, we cannot make it fast enough . Your support is important for us, as this campaign determines whether we can continue developing Quantum Smart Table fast enough. Without your contributions the manufacturing costs are high and we want to make the Quantum as affordable as possible ! Even a small amount can make the difference! With your help, we can bring Quantum Smart Table into the world and change the way people interact, communicate and entertain theirselves. Be part of our revolution!

Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. We have been working for more than three years on developing Quantum Smart Table and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and we have great partners on standby ready to begin. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that our products ship in time, but we will prioritize quality. Our software suite, Ripple, is functional, but there is still work to be done for building all the features that we want to implement for Quantum Smart Table. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected, but we have a lot of experience in this area and if necessary will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge. Rest assured we will notify everyone on what's going on so there will be no surprises. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will help us.

About Verdech

We are three young people from Greece and we have founded a new start-up company in Thessaloniki. Our company is called VERDECH IKE and our moto is “touch the future”. Our goal is to bring innovation to everyone’s daily life. We have developed a multi-touch smart table with unique capabilities! This smart table is called Quantum Smart Table and our team has designed most of the hardware as well as the software which is called Ripple Suite. We have already created a fully functional prototype and we have designed the second model that is presented in our product video. We want to create an affordable smart table for everyone.

FAQ's

On your videos there is a different logo presented other than the one you have here and on your web site, why?

We are really sorry about that, but we were preparing this campaign for quite some time now and the logo presented is our old logo; recently we changed our logo but it was not possible to recreate the footage.

On your live videos Quantum Smart Table seems different than the one on the 3D presentation, why?

Live footage presents one of our already created prototypes; in the 3D presentation the design you see is the final comsumer product that you will receive!

What are Quantum Smart Table's system specifications?

Quantum Smart Table features an Intel i5 3,6GHz processor, 8GB of ram and 128GB SSD hard drive.

What materials is Quantum Smart Table made of?

The materials used for Quantum Smart Table are aluminum main body with aluminum corners that hold the glass surface in place and steel legs for increased strength and stability.

How many people can use Quantum Smart Table at the same time?

Using Microsoft Windows 8.1, Quantum Smart Table can be used by up to two people at the same time. Using Ripple Suite Quantum have been tested and can be used by four people at the same time; surely more people can use the table at the same time using our multi-touch suite but the current table size is not very comforable for more than four people.

Can I import data to the table, and if yes how?

Yes you can import data to your smart table; there are several ways to do it infact! Quantum Smart Table has an ethernet connection, a Wi-Fi connection, bluetooth and also two external USB 3 ports!

Can I use Quantum Smart Table as an ordinary table?

Althought it is smart, it is still a table! Of course you can use it as a table; you can eat, drink and enjoy everything you want on it!!

Can I add more applications - programs to Quantum Smart Table?

You can add and convert to multi-touch any Windows store, Flash, HTML5 or JAVA web application you like to Quantum Smart Table! Also you can install any Windows supported program that you want and add touch functionality using Ripple's gesture engine to programs that support it!

What is the main power supply voltage that the system can operate?

The system was made to operate in 230v AC but it is quite simple to change the system to 110v AC !All the parts we are using are compatible for both 230vAC and 110vAc.

Can I connect headphones to my smart table?

Yes but for now the table supports only one headset. However in the future we have plans to implement functionality for each user to have his own headset with different audio stereo channels for up to 4 users at the same time!

Can I connect my mobile device to Quantum Smart Table?

Yes and the connection is very easy. You can connect it via either USB or wireless connection such as Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.

Can I clean the glass surface, and if yes with what?

Surely you can clean the glass surface with anything you would normally use to clean any glass surface!

Can I scratch the glass surface?

Quantum Smart Table uses a toughened scratch resistant glass surface; however it is not impossible for you to scratch it... We would advise you not to use sharp objects on Quantum's glass surface.

I just spilled my glass of hot coffee on the glass surface, now what?

Worry not my dear friend! Quantum is using a totally flat surface so that accidents like that have no impact for the hardware whatsoever! Simply grab a towel or anything else you would use to clean any other glass surface and clean it up!

How much does Quantum Smart Table weights?

The current Quantum Smart Table prototype weighs 60 kilograms. We estimate the consumer version to weight from 65 to 70 kilograms as well.

Is the Quantum Smart Table suitable for single person usage?

Yes it is!! Quantum Smart Table can be used effectively by one, two, three or four people at the same time!

Can I tilt the surface of the table?

Yes! You can use Quantum’s smart leg design in order to tilt the table up to 10 degrees.

Does the table only ship in the two colors shown above?

Verdech has decided on black and gray colors for Quantum Smart Table; we however accept any request for any kind of color that the client requires for orders of five or more tables.

Am I supposed to manually add shipping fees?

You can either manually add shipping when you select a shipping not included perk before checkout or you can select one of the perks we have created for you depending on your country! If you manually add shipping, please add € 250 for European countries, € 470 for US, Canada and Dubai, or contact us for any other country as it varies.

If I have more questions, where can I get additional answers?

If you have more questions please leave a comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page, or email us at info@verdech.eu and we will try to reply as soon as possible!

Do you offer a warranty?

Yes we offer a one year warranty for the electronic parts of Quantum Smart Table. Please contact us on info@verdech.eu for more information!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please send this link to all of your friends. We need your help in order to make our dream come true! Every help, no matter how small it is, can make the difference! If you believe in our dream we would appreciate your help! Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and let the world know about our awesome smart table!
story_txt:
What is Quantum Smart Table?

Quantum is an elegant yet extraordinary smart table with a robust and beautiful design, that compliments both public spaces and in doors applications. It features a toughened scratch resistant glass that is able to withstand impacts and offers a water resistant surface. Quantum smart table uses a 42” LED Full HD display and a high end computer system that offers lighting fast performance. The astonishing 20 independent points touch technology offers a fast and accurate multi-user experience. Finally our state of the art smart table could not miss Ripple Suite, a multi-touch platform designed to enhance the multi-user experience allowing multiple users to interact  at the same time! 



What can I do with the Quantum Smart Table?

Quantum smart table ships with Microsoft Windows 8.1, offering a unique and fun experience for the user, as it supports every touch and multi-touch feature the operating system can handle. Quantum smart table further enhances the experience with a unique gesture engine, allowing  user specific gestures supported by various applications. The prime characteristic that Quantum Smart Table offers is the astonishing 20 independent points touch technology, fully utilized by the amazing Ripple Suite multi-touch platform, allowing multiple users to interact with the table and with each other at the same time! 



Quantum Smart Table Features:

Ergonomic, robust and beautiful design

With amazing design and smooth lines, Quantum Smart Table is a technological work of art, that compliments both public spaces and in doors applications; it just fits everywhere! The chemically treated toughened glass is designed to withstand impacts and offers a water resistant surface.

Full high definition LED display

Quantum Smart Table features a 42” LED Full HD display that offers reduced energy consumption, better contrast and brightness, greater color range as well as a more accurate image rendering. Enjoy the high definition quality in a multi-touch environment, designed for multi user interaction!

Adjustable leg height

The cleverly structured, ergonomic leg design allows users to adjust the table’s height according to their needs. This feature allows Quantum Smart Table to fit in nearly any environment!

Unique touch experience for Microsoft Windows 8.1

Live a brand new experience, exploring the incredible features that Microsoft Windows 8.1 offer with Quantum’s astonishing touch technology. Challenge your friends in various amazing games, explore the internet, find your destination, work on a 3D model, everything is possible with Quantum Smart Table!!

True multi user experience with Ripple Suite

Ripple Suite is a true multi-user environment that allows multiple users to interact with the table at the same time using various touch enabled applications independently or together! Compete with your friends in amazing multiplayer games, present your work to multiple viewers and allow them to interact with you on the fly, browse the internet, find your destination, create and show interactive educational presentations and many more; Quantum Smart Tables unlocks a complete new reality full of possibilities limited only by your imagination!!





Our innovation - Ripple Suite, a true multi-user interface!

Ripple is the heart of Quantum Smart Table, since it allows multiple users to interact at the same time. It allows any number of users, limited only but Quantum's size, to use the table, share and interact with each other together!
Ripple Suite is a multi-touch framework that consists of multiple touch enabled applications. The applications are separate entities, able to be removed, replaced or redesigned depending on the user’s needs. Users can create their own applications and load them in Ripple with only a few clicks! Ripple Suite can either function as a standalone application or follow the Client – Server pattern if the user requires it. Following the Client – Server pattern Ripple is able to load themes, widgets and applications from a server while running on multiple clients with the same configuration.

Ripple Suite can process limitless touch points depending on the computer’s configuration and hosts an incredibly powerful Gesture Engine that can be reconfigured depending on the user’s needs. Users can add or develop HTML 5, Flash, Javascript, ASP.net or PHP applications for Ripple; users can add multi-touch functionality to their applications using Ripple Injector with just a few clicks! The preloaded applications in Ripple Suite are mainly entertainment, social networking, POI and POS applications. This does not limit the user to create, find or order new applications from our team and use them in Ripple.




 The Story so far...

We want to take some time and explain what we have been doing for the past three years, even before we created Verdech IKE. Quantum Smart Table is a project that has already been worked for several years.
When we consived the idea we started with a small wooden box with minimal features; the idea was to create a multi-touch table using existing and cheap technology. In other words it was a small project created as a proof of concept. The first prototype model consisted of a small TFT screen, lights and a few cameras; there was no computer system included or any other special features.








The next step was to improve the frame holder, add a computer system inside and include software which added some functionality to our project. The overall design now was better since we had a steel frame instead of wooden, improved lightning, infrared tracking and a better display. The result was promising and motivated us to push even further!








After many different attempts, trial and error, we strived for improvement; we decided to go public with our product. We launched market research in order to see what the people prefer and we reached our first Quantum Smart Table prototype. We completely changed the technology used so far and instead of infrared sensors and cameras we moved to projected capacitive technology,  a true table form factor with a 42" LED HD screen and a powerful computer system embeded.

It was time to showcase our product to the people and receive feedback. Initial feedback was impressive. However people highlighted a small detail that did not catch our attention thus far. People needed new legs as the old ones did not fit the table. It was time to make the table a bit more adjustable; new legs, new design and the option to change the height was the next step!

At the moment we are finalizing our new design and getting ready for production. Here is a quick look of our ready for production commercial design.












 What We Need & What You Get

We need your support in order to raise the funds needed for the minimum requirement of parts as well as the cost for creating a mold and production line for our product. The funds received from this campaign will be used for the molding, production and packaging process.
We need at least € 100,000 in order to cover the cost of production for Quantum Smart Table. In case we don’t achieve the € 100,000 goal and you have purchased your own Quantum Smart Table then you will receive our current design as shown in the section above. If we meet our goal then the design of the table you will get is the one shown below.

Every penny will be used for research and development that is required to turn our prototype into a full-fledged consumer product. In return, you will get the most amazing smart table you have ever dreamed.





Who We are




Stavros Zmpounos - Co-founder, Technical Director


Stavros is a seasoned technician with years of experience in medical, computer and hardware engineering. He was born and lives in Thessaloniki. He co-founded Verdech where he build Quantum Smart table alongside his co-workers. 







Grigorios Kapakoglou - Co-founder, Lead Programmer


Gregory is a seasoned developer with years of experience in software and web development. He has an MBA and a degree in Computer science and networking. He was born and lives in Thessaloniki. He co-founded Verdech.







Grigorios Sakkis - Co-founder, Marketing Director


Gregory was born in Corfu and now lives in Ioannina. He has an MBA at regional planning and has also degree in economics. He is an entrepreneur during the 6 last years and co-founder of Verdech. 





Our dream...
Our dream is to bring people together and allow them to interact with a fun and intuitive way! We want to bring the smart table, in every home or business and make it an important part of your daily life. We want to join the digital and physical world and allow people to share and interact with each other without the need of any other device other than their hands using our natural user interface! This can happen and that is our goal! We are trying very hard to make our unique smart table affordable for everyone and to reduce the production cost as much as possible, for you, the consumer, because you deserve it! We are looking for support from people that share our dream, from you! An affordable smart table for everyone!



 The Impact this campaign will have on us
We are a small and brand new company and without you, we cannot make it fast enough . Your support is important for us, as this campaign determines whether we can continue developing Quantum Smart Table fast enough. Without your contributions the manufacturing costs are high and we want to make the Quantum as affordable as possible ! Even a small amount can make the difference! With your help, we can bring Quantum Smart Table into the world and change the way people interact, communicate and entertain theirselves. Be part of our revolution!


 Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. We have been working for more than three years on developing Quantum Smart Table and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and we have great partners on standby ready to begin. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that our products ship in time, but we will prioritize quality. Our software suite, Ripple, is functional, but there is still work to be done for building all the features that we want to implement for Quantum Smart Table. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected, but we have a lot of experience in this area and if necessary will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge. Rest assured we will notify everyone on what's going on so there will be no surprises. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will help us.




About Verdech

We are three young people from Greece and we have founded a new start-up company in Thessaloniki. Our company is called VERDECH IKE and our moto is “touch the future”. Our goal is to bring innovation to everyone’s daily life. We have developed a multi-touch smart table with unique capabilities! This smart table is called Quantum Smart Table and our team has designed most of the hardware as well as the software which is called Ripple Suite. We have already created a fully functional prototype and we have designed the second model that is presented in our product video. We want to create an affordable smart table for everyone.




FAQ's

On your videos there is a different logo presented other than the one you have here and on your web site, why?
We are really sorry about that, but we were preparing this campaign for quite some time now and the logo presented is our old logo; recently we changed our logo but it was not possible to recreate the footage.
On your live videos Quantum Smart Table seems different than the one on the 3D presentation, why?
Live footage presents one of our already created prototypes; in the 3D presentation the design you see is the final comsumer product that you will receive!
What are Quantum Smart Table's system specifications?
Quantum Smart Table features an Intel i5 3,6GHz processor, 8GB of ram and 128GB SSD hard drive.
What materials is Quantum Smart Table made of?
The materials used for Quantum Smart Table are aluminum main body with aluminum corners that hold the glass surface in place and steel legs for increased strength and stability.
How many people can use Quantum Smart Table at the same time?
Using Microsoft Windows 8.1, Quantum Smart Table can be used by up to two people at the same time. Using Ripple Suite Quantum have been tested and can be used by four people at the same time; surely more people can use the table at the same time using our multi-touch suite but the current table size is not very comforable for more than four people.
Can I import data to the table, and if yes how?
Yes you can import data to your smart table; there are several ways to do it infact! Quantum Smart Table has an ethernet connection, a Wi-Fi connection, bluetooth and also two external USB 3 ports!
Can I use Quantum Smart Table as an ordinary table?
Althought it is smart, it is still a table! Of course you can use it as a table; you can eat, drink and enjoy everything you want on it!!
Can I add more applications - programs to Quantum Smart Table?
You can add and convert to multi-touch any Windows store, Flash, HTML5 or JAVA web application you like to Quantum Smart Table! Also you can install any Windows supported program that you want and add touch functionality using Ripple's gesture engine to programs that support it!
What is the main power supply voltage that the system can operate?
The system was made to operate in 230v AC but it is quite simple to change the system to 110v AC !All the parts we are using are compatible for both 230vAC and 110vAc.
Can I connect headphones to my smart table?
Yes but for now the table supports only one headset. However in the future we have plans to implement functionality for each user to have his own headset with different audio stereo channels for up to 4 users at the same time!
Can I connect my mobile device to Quantum Smart Table?
Yes and the connection is very easy. You can connect it via either USB or wireless connection such as Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.
Can I clean the glass surface, and if yes with what?
Surely you can clean the glass surface with anything you would normally use to clean any glass surface!
Can I scratch the glass surface?
Quantum Smart Table uses a toughened scratch resistant glass surface; however it is not impossible for you to scratch it... We would advise you not to use sharp objects on Quantum's glass surface.
I just spilled my glass of hot coffee on the glass surface, now what?
Worry not my dear friend! Quantum is using a totally flat surface so that accidents like that have no impact for the hardware whatsoever! Simply grab a towel or anything else you would use to clean any other glass surface and clean it up!
How much does Quantum Smart Table weights?
The current Quantum Smart Table prototype weighs 60 kilograms. We estimate the consumer version to weight from 65 to 70 kilograms as well.
Is the Quantum Smart Table suitable for single person usage?
Yes it is!! Quantum Smart Table can be used effectively by one, two, three or four people at the same time!
Can I tilt the surface of the table? 
Yes! You can use Quantum’s smart leg design in order to tilt the table up to 10 degrees.
Does the table only ship in the two colors shown above?
Verdech has decided on black and gray colors for Quantum Smart Table; we however accept any request for any kind of color that the client requires for orders of five or more tables.
Am I supposed to manually add shipping fees?
You can either manually add shipping when you select a shipping not included perk before checkout or you can select one of the perks we have created for you depending on your country! If you manually add shipping, please add € 250 for European countries, € 470 for US, Canada and Dubai, or contact us for any other country as it varies.
If I have more questions, where can I get additional answers?
If you have more questions please leave a comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page, or email us at info@verdech.eu and we will try to reply as soon as possible!
Do you offer a warranty?
Yes we offer a one year warranty for the electronic parts of Quantum Smart Table. Please contact us on info@verdech.eu for more information!




Other Ways You Can Help
Please send this link to all of your friends. We need your help in order to make our dream come true! Every help, no matter how small it is, can make the difference! If you believe in our dream we would appreciate your help! Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and let the world know about our awesome smart table!

story:
MEET THE ULTIMATE ELECTRONIC SPIN MOP AND POLISHER BY ELICTO AND UPDATE YOUR CLEANING ROUTINE, HASSLE FREE!

Designed to exceed the expectations of anyone who loves having a flawless floor, this innovative wireless mop will make the daily cleaning process easy as a breeze. How? Thanks to its smart design, this amazing dual spin mop and polisher with microfiber attachment cleans perfectly on any type of surface, whether its wood floors, laminated flooring, tiles, stone, or marble. While you clean, the mop spins, rounding up dirt, dust, and stains; polishing in one swipe!

Unlike regular mops that require you to use pressure and strain your hand, arms, and back, the Elicto slides super easily on the floor for a fast and easy cleaning routine.

No need to carry bulky buckets of water or use a dozen different products trying to get the great results you long for.

No more slipping hazard, no more waste! And the best part? You don’t have to spend money on cleaning products or on disposable wet mops that are burdening your pocket and of course the environment every month!

 

 

1.Wooden Floor 2.Clay & Ceramic Floors 3.Brick Floor

4.Flagstone & Bluestone Floors 5.Terrazo Floor 6.Soapstone Floor

 

REMOVABLE, REUSABLE & WASHABLE MICROFIBER    

No need to spend money on buying new mop replacement attachments. Simply pop this one in the washing machine and it will come out like new!

 

 

OUR FLOORS ARE DIRTY!     

BY ABC NEWS // In a recent study, researchers at the University of Arizona found nine different species of bacteria on people’s shoes. These types of bacteria can cause infections in our stomachs, eyes and lungs.

The study also found bacteria live longer on our shoes than in other places. As we walk, we constantly pick up new debris that feeds the growth of more bacteria.

The researchers tested to see if bacteria on shoes would transfer to the tile floors in a house. More than 90 percent of the time it did. Carpeting harbors bacteria even more.

 

"GMA’S" TEST RESULT     

“GMA’s” test results were “dirtier than a toilet seat,” said Jonathan Sexton, a research assistant at the University of Arizona’s College of Public Health. “Toilet seats generally have 1,000 bacteria or less, and these are in the millions so there’s a lot more bacteria here.”

Children under age 2 are the most vulnerable to the germs we track into the house, because they play on the floor and put their hands in their mouths an average of 80 times an hour.

“That means that your child can possibly be exposed to every single bacteria that you picked up on your shoe [...] all the bacteria from the park, the store, everywhere you went that day,” Sexton said.

 

NOT JUST FOR YOUR HOUSE    

We have had a lot of experience working in different types of retail environments, whether it’s working in a restaurant, bar, offices, retail stores, mall spaces and etc… It is never easy to clean your floors. It was such a hassle to fill the big buckets with water and use the wet mops to clean our floors. Not to mention washing the mop head every time you use it and straining the water out. This was back breaking work. It was also very MESSY. There was so much water residue left over from using wet mops that it was inevitable someone would slip and fall causing serious injury and yea.. a lawsuit. With the Elicto, you will never have to worry about cleaning your floors again!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

As with every startup companies, there are many risks and challenges we face everyday. The reason why we strive to overcome these challenges is because of the pure idea that we believe in this product.

We have gone through many challenges up until now, coming up with the design and engineering behind our Elicto ES-330, but its safe to say that all of those challenges were solved rather quickly. We have a complete understanding of what our objective are, and what our company goals are, and we are proud to know that our friends overseas are completely on board with our planning.

We believe that being transparent and honest with our factories and business affiliates is the key to the success we have had until this point. Sure, there might be risks and challenges we might face in the future, but rest assured, we will be ready to tackle them head on!

With that in mind, you can see from the timeline and milestones that we have acquired everything we need to go forward. We just need that extra push from you to begin our production. The more we make the more we can save in the future.

Thank you very much for reading until this far. If you haven't done so already, please support us by making a pledge. You wont be disappointed.

 

We have tried to launch our campaign on a different crowdfunding platform, but our campaign was suspended due to the notion that our product was not an original invention which is completely false.  We have the patent to prove that this in fact is our own original product.  We are working with our legal team to find and prosecute those companies who are copying our designs.

story:
The Background 

Welcome and thanks for viewing the Havenize campaign!  Havenize is an online platform used to assist those who wish to sell their home via the “for sale by owner” (FSBO) method which is independent of a realtor.  Havenize turns an intimidating and daunting process into an easy one by demystifying the home buying process to allow customers to list, market, bid, research, manage, negotiate, build legal forms and collaborate in one central online location.  The problem is those who have little knowledge completing a real estate transaction and reaching a larger audience can find it very stressful and complex.  Havenize is a fresh and exciting way to sell your home.

Jack Deardorff is the founder of Havenize and is currently a Senior Consultant for a Cincinnati-based IT and Management Consulting Company which is a B Corp that strives to make a positive impact on society and the environment (more here if you’re curious: http://www.bcorporation.net/).  He has a complete understanding of the software development life cycle and how to take an idea to a reality.  He is experienced in how to mesh multiple roles (software engineers, SCRUM Masters, QA’s, BA’s, User Experience designers, Creative people, etc.) to align everyone on the product vision in order to deliver a superior end result.  He has started this campaign to help raise funds to help to continue to get Havenize, a Cincinnati based start-up, off the ground.

Havenize has built an early-version tablet-based prototype (see our gallery for more photos) and is in the process of fully building that out, has received some initial investment, and developed a meaningful brand identity.  Havenize is currently in incubator status at HCDC, Inc., (formerly Hamilton County Development Co. Inc.) located in Cincinnati, Ohio.

Today, Havenize is proud to announce the next step in the journey—our Indiegogo campaign is live! In 50 days, the hope is to reach - and exceed - our goal of raising $10, 000. 

Thank you for your time and interest!

The Campaign

Uber, LegalZoom, TurboTax, and AirBnB have made things like cabbing, routine legal tasks, taxes, or travelling easier and more affordable without having to pay premiums to cab drivers, lawyers, accountants, and hotels – we’re doing the same thing for real estate.  Doing traditional tasks, regardless of complexity, is becoming more mainstream and acceptable.  These businesses have saved people a lot of money which is very helpful in a time when it seems costs for everything continues to increase.  That saved money can go to things like vacations, retirement, home improvements, college tuition or anything else you can think to do! We’re simply providing an alternative option to people who choose to sell or buy a home on their own.  The intent of the campaign is to raise funds in order to continue to take Havenize to the next step in our quest to build an amazing product.

Why We Need Your Help

Your contributions to the Havenize Indiegogo Campaign will be used in the following ways:

·  Funding the Development of Havenize.  If our campaign goal is met, it will help further product development by allowing us to hire which will continue us down the road of making Havenize a reality.

  • Paying server, bandwidth, software, and hardware costs. Right now the costs are pretty low but they will increase as Havenize becomes a more technologically robust product.  Other day-to-day costs means paying for software and hardware tools for the team to use in building and managing the product.
  • Office Space, legal and financial requirements, and other expenses.  The campaign will also allow us the opportunity to rent office space, incorporate, and generally meet other basic needs from a legal and financial perspective.  “Other expenses” are funds reserved for items like logo development, promotional and advertising, branding consultation, and any other unforeseen expense. 

Risks & Challenges

Our platform will be very easy to use, will have a lot of tools, and will be very fast.  It is a complex task to make a long process and confusing process a clear and quick one.  It will be a lot of work but we’re passionate and excited to be working on something!  Will there be issues and concerns along the way? Yes is the only real answer. Our supporters will continuously be informed on the progress we're making towards delivering their order. If an issue cannot be resolved and poses a potential delay to our timing, then we will be transparent and timely in our communication to the people who are making our growth a reality.

The key for Havenize is giving our future customers a product they can trust so they do not sit awake at night worrying if anything is missed.  Havenize will have you covered. 

The people who support Havenize on Indiegogo are our most important asset. We will do whatever it takes to keep them in our good graces. Thanks! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a contribution but would still like to help us out the best thing you can do is help us spread the word:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

·  Use our hashtag (#Havenize)

  • Share our Facebook page!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share our YouTube Video
  • Email your friends!

Getting the word out about campaigns to a larger audience is so dependent on striking a cord with you and having you share our campaign.  Thank you so much for your interest and support!

of the campaign is to raise funds in order to continue to take Havenize to the
next step in our quest to build an amazing product. 
Why We Need Your Help
Your contributions to the Havenize Indiegogo
Campaign will be used in the following ways:
· 
Funding the Development of Havenize.  If our campaign
goal is met, it will help further product development by allowing us to hire
which will continue us down the road of making Havenize a reality.


Paying
     server, bandwidth, software, and hardware costs. Right now the costs are pretty low but they will
     increase as Havenize becomes a more technologically robust product.  Other day-to-day costs means paying for software
     and hardware tools for the team to use in building and managing the product.


Office
     Space, legal and financial requirements, and other expenses.  The campaign
     will also allow us the opportunity to rent office space, incorporate, and
     generally meet other basic needs from a legal and financial
     perspective.  “Other expenses” are
     funds reserved for items like logo development, promotional and
     advertising, branding consultation, and any other unforeseen expense.  


Risks
& Challenges
Our platform will be very easy to
use, will have a lot of tools, and will be very fast.  It is a complex task to make a long process and
confusing process a clear and quick one. 
It will be a lot of work but we’re passionate and excited to be working
on something!  Will there be issues and
concerns along the way? Yes is the only real answer. Our supporters will
continuously be informed on the progress we're making towards delivering their
order. If an issue cannot be resolved and poses a potential delay to our
timing, then we will be transparent and timely in our communication to the
people who are making our growth a reality.
The key for Havenize is giving our future
customers a product they can trust so they do not sit awake at night worrying if
anything is missed.  Havenize will have
you covered.  
The people who support Havenize on
Indiegogo are our most important asset. We will do whatever it takes to keep
them in our good graces. Thanks! 
Other
Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to make a
contribution but would still like to help us out the best thing you can do is
help us spread the word:
Get the word out and make some noise about our
     campaign!
· 
Use our hashtag (#Havenize) 

Share our Facebook page!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!
Share our YouTube Video
Email your friends!

Getting the word out about campaigns
to a larger audience is so dependent on striking a cord with you and having you
share our campaign.  Thank you so much
for your interest and support!

story:
Self-Cleaning Juicer! No need of washing or cleaning any part of Juicer, not a single thing, after making fresh Juice! 

Self-Cleaning Juicer! No need of assembling or disassembling any part of Juicer to make a healthy fresh Juice.

Self-Cleaning Juicer is also 4 in 1 multi-use appliance and is capable of making fresh Juice, fresh squeezed lemonade, fresh squeezed orange Juice, core and slice apple, and slice potatoes for french fries.

The pulp has its own health benefits and can be used in a variety of ways. Pulp can  be frozen easily for future use.

Through water feeder you may squeeze little amount of water to jet wash inside of juicer thoroughly using centrifugal force of blade rotating at high speed plus strong wind generate by blower and water will also hydrate pulp for more Juice!

You may squeeze vitamin water through water feeder to easily fulfill daily need of vitamins with fresh Juice.

Occasionally you may squeeze vodka or tequila through water feeder to kill all invisible bacteria and have fresh bloody mary or fresh peach margaritas, occasionally!

Risks and challenges

Challenge is to find right electric motor for both juicer and blower. 
To lower noise of 2 electric motors. 
Ideal will be find brush-less electric motors for juicer and blower. 
But I'll setter for electric motor for juicer and brush-less electric motor for blower.

story:
Generous VPN believes that if you trust people to pay a fair price, they will.


10% of profits go to charities voted on by Generous VPN members.


What Generous VPN does for you

  Prevent governments and companies from spying on you

  Protect you from hackers trying to sniff out your personal data

  Unblock websites your country/company/ISP blocks

   Setting it up takes under 5 minutes

   We keep no logs of activity. At all.


Everyone deserves secure internet

In a world where governments spy on their citizens and hackers can steal passwords simply by having a coffee in a public wifi zone, everyone needs to have access to secure internet technology.

Casual internet users shouldn't have to pay the same price as heavy duty users. Likewise regular internet users shouldn't have to be intimidated by tech speak and complicated systems and buttons (which we geeks love).

Generous VPN is entirely transparent about the technologies used, but keeps it simple on the surface. Likewise we show trust in users to pay a fair price for their usage.


It's easy to use and works on all devices

Generous VPN has been tested on Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, Android and iOS. Here is an example of how easy it is to connect on a Mac:


Easy instructions will be available for all systems.


Why back this campaign now?

Good question, after all the project will be 'pay what you want' when it gets funded. There are three main reasons:

 The perks in the campaign are unique & not available outside the campaign

 You get extra features for being generous (see below)

  It's cheaper than the $67.32/year industry average pricing

Besides that you are helping create a service that will allow anyone in the world access to affordable encrypted internet access.


After the campaign: the 'humble bundle' model

The Humble Bundle project is well established in the gaming world, Generous VPN will use a similar model. Basically you can pay what you want, but get rewarded for generosity.

  1. Paying below average gets you the full service
  2. Paying above average gets you extra features

All campaign backers who purchase a Generous VPN connection receive 1 year of Generous VPN service with all regular features, plus the extra features. These include:


How is this different from other VPNs?

There are other VPNs available on the market. The companies are often non transparent and in countries where governments spy on their citizens regularly. Generous VPN trusts users to pay a fair price, and does not track any activity. In short:

  Generous VPN is stationed in the first country to have net neutrality laws

  Generous VPN trusts users, there is no tracking of activity

  Campaign backers get amazing deal, and afterwards users determine price

The idea of Generous VPN is a transparent project. Nothing is logged, the country is neutral, and users determine what they pay. Help make it happen!


Who is behind this project

The most important things you need to know:

 I'm out in the open and am easily traceable, see my linkedin & blog

  I have done VPN projects before, both commercially and non-profit

  This project operates as a registered Dutch company (KVK ID #62709755)


My name is Mentor Palokaj. I'm a Dutch national living in Amsterdam. I have many and varied passions, one of which is making complex technology more accessible.

 When I was visiting China after highschool (doing kung fu, story for another time) I ran into a a big problem, at least for me. I couldn't access Facebook! Finding a free VPN connection was a pain, and I didn't want to pay $20 a month just to access Facebook. Since then I've done multiple projects that try to make VPN technology more available to the world.

What drives me in the Generous VPN project is a belief that everyone should have access to this technology. In the future I want to create more 'Pay what you want' projects, so make more technologies available to the world. This is my trial run to see if it works the way I believe it will :)


My professional history

I've done multiple VPN projects in the past, including BlueVPN (which I sold) and Ninjamask Security (which still operates). My educational background is in Biology, Anthropology of science and Gaming. On a professional level however I'm a programmer, freelancer and educator.

You can check out my track record on Linkedin.


Risks & Challenges

There are a number of challenges in this project:

  • DMCA takedown requests on the VPN servers. These happen since some people abuse the VPN servers to serve copyrighted content. We've however dealt with this many times before and have a number of backup server locations.
  • Abusive VPN users who use massive amount of data. In a worst case scenario this might temporarily disable a VPN server. We're tackling this by implementing a number of failsafes and backup servers.
  • Information requests from governments. As a registered company we can't refuse to comply. We however counter this by not logging any activity, so we have nothing to turn over. In addition this is a Dutch company, meaning we respond to Dutch requests only (so not the US or other countries)


Opportunities and Future Perspectives

Next to the challenges there are  a number of favorable factors:
  • The infrastructure can scale to accommodate new users very quickly. Due to years of server experience we can set up and expand infrastructure very quickly.
  • The project is very lean, being run by one person who is experienced in VPN and web development technologies.
  • If the 'pay what you want' model works, the intention is to start more projects based on this model.


How the funds will be used

Deciding on a funding goal for this campaign was hard. Basically it is 100% feasible to start this project with only $1000. My initial fear was that people would perceive this relatively low number as amateuristic.

The many people who gave feedback on this campaign suggested I simply outline how the funds will be used to explain.

The basic infrastructure of this service is modular. That is to say I can set up a 'block' of servers that can handle about 100 users. If there are suddenly 200 users I can simply create a second block, and so on and so on (pretty much infinitely).

The funding goal of this campaign has very little to do with the funds needed to make this project happen. Due to my experience I have very little costs other than time investment. The goal of this campaign is more to:

  • Find out if enough people are interested in this service
  • Find people who share my passion that everyone should have secure internet
  • Offer friends & family a relatively cheap way to secure themselves

The funds themselves will mostly be used to buy the servers needed to make the service run. A small amount will be used for secondary resources like the checkout system for non-campaign backers after the service.


Other ways you can help

If you can't support this project financially you can still help make it a reality! The world needs this, and your help is very much appreciated.

Please take a couple of minutes to share this campaign on social media. Talk about if with co-workers and email it to friends & family who might be interested.

You can have a significant impact!

story:
Benvenuti partners

 

                                      Constance BREMENT - Marketing Communication Director :

...   -------------------------------   .

 

 

 

 

Are You A True Wine Connoisseur? 
 
Because only if you are, you can truly appreciate these marb-ellous, elegant, and sophisticated wine chillers that Benvenuti has designed exclusively for you!
 
Named after four Ancient Roman deities, Neptune, Pluto, Uranus, and Saturn, our deluxe chillers are made from the finest types of marble available; Nero Merquina, Emparador, Portoro, and Grigio Carnico. With their minimalistic, classy, and utterly stylish design they are more than a luxurious accessory; they are small pieces of art!

 

Maybe you're not a wine expert today, but with a Benvenuti chiller by your side, you could very well become one.

 
Give us the chance to satisfy every avid wine lover out there, and receive first the premium packages we offer to our donors!

 

 

 

   Benvenuti Collection

 

 


 

 

Neptune wine chiller is one of the most prestige  from our classic series. Built from Portoro, the chiller is ideal for counter applications. The chiller is versatile and adds to vibrant and brilliant glow to your bottle, showcasing your wine with style. The lavish design is suitable to accommodate every bottle size in your collection. Its marvellous built structure not only ensures perfect storage condition for your wine bottle but also their stylish decor intensifies look of the room where it is place.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pluto wine chiller built from Nero Merquina is an ideal solution to recreate the natural wine climate while ensuring consistent temperature with relative humidity levels. With its glossy and brilliant colours, the chiller offers beauty with elegance whilst creating an energy-efficient wine cabinet. The fantastic range of colours enhances wine showcase on display shelf. The chiller is a great piece of affluence that protect your wine from external influences, providing dark and constant temperature to your drink.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Uranus wine chiller built from Emparador Dark marble offers a unique premium touch to your wine bottle. The professional quality and stylish design is sure to light up and beautify your wine container with graces. Smart spacing provided to accommodate the bottle ensure easy access and proper protection to bottles and labels. This amazing chiller is perfect for all special occasions or anytime when you_ feel like sipping your favourite drink. All you need is to load the ice cubes and keep your wine at perfect condition.

 

 

 

 

Saturn wine chiller built by Grigio Carnico marble that act as a utilitarian, single zone standing cabinet and is born for all sizes keeping your wine at a cool temperature with an outstanding performance. Made by a quiet energy-efficient design, it ensures an out of the box wine storage experience. The chiller contain a wow factor that keep your wine at a steady temperature while making  a style statement. Exploring these wine chiller let you experience high quality performance with brilliance that provides ideal condition for storing wine.

 

It is incredibly simple to use. All you have to do is add six or seven ice cubes into your Benvenuti chiller, pour one to two and a half deciliters of water (half to one and a half cup) and set your bottle of wine into the chiller. Your wine will be perfectly chilled, at an optimal temperature.

 

 

Matte box edition

Premium box edition

Corkscrew

Benvenuti comes as a set in which you will find an elegant cotton serviette, a solid aluminum corkscrew, and a storage box for safekeeping. You just have to choose which box is a better fit with your ambiance. Box is made of high quality medium-density fiberboard, made by a special process and fusion technology, to withstand all load stone vessels, and it also ensures safe storage. Coloring and varnishing was done in several phases, assuring quality workmanship and perfect aesthetics to fit in all your surroundings.

 

 

 

No matter the place, no matter the time, Benvenuti suits your needs and means welcome for your guests. Make any space special, create beautiful memory of any moment.

 

 

With its simple elegance and value of services provided, Benvenuti chiller brings people together through the pleasant company as it is only possible with a glass of perfectly chilled drinks.

Allow yourself hedonism, give your guests something unique.

 

 

 

Benvenuti chiller enriches your kitchen inimitable style, lifting the ambiance to a new level of elegance.

Unobtrusive, but with prestigious appearance, so useful that you will forget what it was like to live without it, Benvenuti chiller fits perfectly in any kitchen, regardless of size and layout.

 

 

Once You set Benvenuti in your kitchen, soon it will become an indispensable part of it, and one of Your favorite corners in home.

 

 

No meal is complete without an accompanying drink. Benvenuti is the perfect addition to any kitchen, a defining detail that will make your dining experience a gastronomical voyage. Benvenuti's elegant design is a natural fit to your kitchen or dining room. The experience of dining at a world-class restaurant right in your own home.

 

We did not forget the important details. This chiller is solidly built, but its weight will not damage the surface you place it on. How? Very simple: at the bottom of each chiller and boxes for storing, are installed small bands that eliminate any slippage or instability.

 

 


If you own a boat and want to take Benvenuti with you, no problem. Because of these rubbers, you can be sure that the waves and rougher weather will not affect the stability of the chiller Benvenuti, which remains firmly where you put it, no matter of external conditions.

 

 

 

Nautica and elegance goes hand in hand. That is why Benvenuti chiller is designed to meet the demands of the sailors and sailing. Resistant to extreme weather conditions, safe and stable, prestigious appearance.

 

 

Sea, the high seas, the wind in the sails, moments to relax and enjoy everything. Benvenuti is with you, as a faithful companion on the journey, no matter how far you sail. Soak up the beauty of the horizon with a glass of chilled wine in your hand, let the Benvenuti take You on a haunting journey.

 

 

The process of constructing each Benvenuti chiller begins in the quarry, it demands the knowledge and impeccable skills of top experts. By combining traditional, proven methods with modern day technology and innovation.

First off, large blocks of marble are carefully selected at the quarry. They need to be picked out, chiseled and taken out to the manufacture, making sure no damage is done to the precious marble. It requires skilled hands and an eye for a detail. This process implies a level of knowledge that cannot be easily learned, as it is passed down through generations.

Once prepared for manufacturing, each block of marble is then put through specialized machine that turns marble block around its axis, and than make eight levels of polishing. The box packaging of Benvenuti is also the result of layered treatment, with six coats of paint. From the lathe to the finished product, Benvenuti is built from the real experts.


True experts? Yes, real masters for each part of our manufacturing process, each one specialized in a particular segment, and it is indeed a lot of hard work. We really respect that, because without their incredible efforts and skills, we could not make Benvenuti chillers.

 


 

 

Welcome to the extensive project, the vision of a beautiful life that I want to be available to everyone.
Let's go step by step, from ideas and sketches, through prototype to final development, production and dissemination of reach on a global scale. I want you to join me on this journey.

Expectations are high, and it is necessary to have some dose of courage, but it costs nothing. It takes will and determination to implement the project to the end, and that we guarantee.

Our team goal is to find partners around the world, on every continent. The quality we do not compromise, so Benvenuti chiller is produced in ideal conditions, combining modern technology and traditional methods of making, and our Benvenuti brand will be developed and produced in Italy, based in Milano.

 

 

Thank you to everyone who helped this campaign in any way, even if only for moral support. Every contribution is appreciated, and not forgotten.

 

 

 

Learn more:

Offical Benvenuti web page

Facebook fan page

They need to be picked out, chiseled and taken out to the manufacture, making sure no damage is done to the precious marble. It requires skilled hands and an eye for a detail. This process implies a level of knowledge that cannot be easily learned, as it is passed down through generations.Once prepared for manufacturing, each block of marble is then put through specialized machine that turns marble block around its axis, and than make eight levels of polishing. The box packaging of Benvenuti is also the result of layered treatment, with six coats of paint. From the lathe to the finished product, Benvenuti is built from the real experts.True experts? Yes, real masters for each part of our manufacturing process, each one specialized in a particular segment, and it is indeed a lot of hard work. We really respect that, because without their incredible efforts and skills, we could not make Benvenuti chillers.   Welcome to the extensive project, the vision of a beautiful life that I want to be available to everyone.Let's go step by step, from ideas and sketches, through prototype to final development, production and dissemination of reach on a global scale. I want you to join me on this journey.Expectations are high, and it is necessary to have some dose of courage, but it costs nothing. It takes will and determination to implement the project to the end, and that we guarantee.Our team goal is to find partners around the world, on every continent. The quality we do not compromise, so Benvenuti chiller is produced in ideal conditions, combining modern technology and traditional methods of making, and our Benvenuti brand will be developed and produced in Italy, based in Milano.  Thank you to everyone who helped this campaign in any way, even if only for moral support. Every contribution is appreciated, and not forgotten.   Learn more:Offical Benvenuti web pageFacebook fan page

story:
Introducing: The BrewBell

 

The BrewBell is the world's first miniature, cast bronze kettlebell bottle opener, perfect for those who like to work hard and play hard.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I've partnered with the expert artisans at Mystic Valley Foundry in Somerville, and already produced a limited run of 10 parts, but now I want to take my project to the next level and get a full production run manufactured so that I can start selling online and to local shops. My goal is to have my first 100+ parts finished in time for the holidays.

I'm excited to offer two gorgeous finish options; raw bronze, and classic powder coated black.


If I don't reach the entire goal, I'll still be able to order however many BrewBells are ordered (even if I only have one backer!), but a larger orders are required to keep the cost low, and will enable me to start selling the BrewBell in an online storefront and in local retail stores around Boston. 

The BrewBell Story

 

I'm an industrial designer, and bringing products from an idea to a reality is my passion, I've  worked on medical devices, consumer electronics, home goods and these days, electric vehicles. And I know a thing or two about metal working; I apprenticed as a blacksmith for two years at a living history museum, learning 17th century English methods and techniques. 



I'm also passionate about fitness and functional movement training, and I've loved the simplicity and raw functionality of the kettlebell ever since I first started training with them over a decade ago. 

When I was studying design at Mass Art, I didn't have time to take many classes outside the department, but I convinced some folks in the foundry department to let me participate in a bronze pour, as long as I showed up and put in the extra work. I wanted to learn about the process, and when trying to decide what I should cast, One day, working out in my basement, I was inspired by the iconic form of the kettlebell; the handle looked similar to the "church key" style of bottle opener, and so I made a mold and cast my first prototypes in wax, then in bronze.

The result was a huge success; functional, pleasing to use, and a great conversation piece! I got so much interest from friends and family that I made a new mold and had a small sample run cast in bronze at a local foundry in Somerville Massachusetts. The BrewBell was born.

The Impact

The BrewBell is proudly manufactured in my own neighborhood, by a foundry that was established in 1936, and I'm excited to be working with one of the businesses that makes Somerville an amazing place for artists, makers, and creatives of all kinds. 

While I haven't run a crowd-funding campaign before, I'm no stranger to designing, producing, selling and shipping handmade goods. From 2013 to 2015 I ran a successful Etsy shop called Durable Goods Manufacturing Co. making hand-made minimalist wallets and other leather goods. I've also had extensive experience working with manufacturers to get products made in my professional life as an Industrial Designer. 

Risks & Challenges

Since I already have a manufacturer, tooling, and parts in hand, All I have to do is raise the funds and press "Go", so there's not much risk of following through on production and delivery.

The biggest challenge will be completing production and shipping in time for the holidays. Depending on how funding goes, if it looks like production might take longer than initially forecasted, I am prepared to place the first order as soon as the goal is reached to make sure that the first 100 customers get their product in time. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute monetarily, no worries! Help spread the word! Share this campaign on social media, mention it to the meatheads at your local gym, etc.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Introduction

My name is Steve Redden and I'm the Founder and Chief Technology Officer for Fire Sentinels. I have a background in telecommunications in the Royal Air Force and have been designing and building innovative web-based software projects for the last 17 years.

Inspiration

Touched by the Grenfell Tower tragedy in 2017, we spoke to the Borough Commander of Surrey Fire & Rescue about what the issues and challenges when when Fire and Rescue attend a tower block fire.

The key ones being:-

    1. Relying on the fire to be called in, sometimes with inaccurate location reporting.
    2. Not knowing the extent of the fire until on site.
    3. Not knowing who who is in or out of the building.
    4. Not knowing how quickly the fire is spreading, especially if internally.
    5. Inability to communicate with residents still in the building unless they phone the emergency operator.

What are Fire Sentinels

With the issues above in mind, I developed Fire Sentinels. The system is comprised of state of the art heat and smoke sensors driven by microprocessors that can accurately assess whether or not there is a fire, a cloud-based central management system and the Fire Sentinels mobile app.

In the event a fire, the Fire Sentinels sensors will alert the central management system, which then messages Fire & Rescue services with the exact location of the fire and a real-time feed of temperature and smoke density.

This is important as most Fire & Rescue services in the UK will not attend automated alarms, as 98% of them turn out to be false alarms.
 

Residents will also be notified via the mobile app, on their smartphones, that a fire has been reported and Fire & Rescue have been notified.

In the event of a tower block fire, both residents and Fire & Rescue can view a real-time 3D heat-map of the building to be able to assess speed and spread of the fire.

Fire evacuation instructions can be issued to residents via the app. If asked to evacuate, residents can indicate if their property is empty or if they can't evacuate and they need help.

This feedback from residents is summarised in a Property Status Report for Fire & Rescue to determine who is still in the building and where they are. Enabling them to focus rescue efforts where they are needed rather than the systematic method of going from property to property currently employed.

Although inspired by a tower block fire, Fire Sentinels are designed to protect both residential blocks and individual homes and we believe will save lives and reduce fire damage to property.

The technology and hardware we will be using is already tried and tested in the field, monitoring temperatures in vineyards 24/7/365. The central management system was designed and built by us and has also been up and running for two years.

Fire Sentinels will retail at around £150 and includes a 2 year subscription to the management system and mobile app. After which, there is an annual subscription of circa £20 per year to maintain the management system and app.

Perks

£100 - 1 Fire Sentinel sensor plus free lifetime subscription
£200 - 2 Fire Sentinel sensors plus free lifetime subscription
£300 - 3 Fire Sentinel sensors plus free lifetime subscription

In the event that we don't reach the full funding total, what we do raise will go towards the hardware development and certification first. This will give us a UK fire certified product, so that we can fulfil an expression of interest from a London Borough Council, who want 10,000 Fire Sentinel sensors over 5 years.

The Impact

There are currently over 300 tower blocks across the UK with Grenfell-style cladding on them. Some residents associations have hired Fire Wardens to patrol their buildings 24/7, however one person can only be in one place at any one time.

Fire Sentinels will be everywhere, all of the time.

Because Fire Sentinels provide real-time information about a fire, this enables residents and Fire & Rescue services to make quicker, more informed decisions about staying put or evacuating a building, which will ultimately save lives.

Risks & Challenges

Fire Sentinels sensors need to be able to communicate with the central management system and although designed to use InternetofThings networking (LoRaWAN), this may not be available everywhere, so we will need to support WiFi connectivity, as well as LoRaWAN.

Timeline

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think Fire Sentinels can help protect your friends or family, then please spread the word and forward this campaign on to them or use the sharing tools on Indiegogo.
