story:
Binit

Imagine your trash can as your food waste disposer!

Managing kitchen waste is a daily chore that takes so much of our time in doing something so mundane.  On top of it, sink shredders are highly unreliable when it comes to efficiency and safety. The shredded waste is uneven, the blades can get damaged frequently, and the needs physical presence until the process is over .

Binit is an upfront, simple solution to all food waste management in the kitchen. It’s a shredder with a brain. It’s a bin that can not only collect waste, but also grind it, process it, and drain it in one touch.   This is a utility that can revolutionize the way we handle waste at homes.

Bin It, Forget It

Dump all the kitchen waste into Binit and let the smart bin deal with it in the most economical and eco-friendly way.

 

How it works 

A grinder crushes the waste using water. The waste is drained away into the drain line and, within two minutes, the day’s waste is done and forgotten without messing up the kitchen or clogging the pipes.

Binit cleans itself like a germophobic cat after every operating cycle. This leaves the bin fresh and clean for the next use.

Bin It, Leave It

Ease of use

Use the Binit App to schedule the grinding cycle from anywhere in the world. Just slide the lid and dump the waste inside. Also, Binit won’t start until it’s closed. It’s child-proof and elder-safe.

The Binit App also monitors process cycles, operation patterns, power consumption, to optimize itself over time. Users will get maintenance alerts and monitor the device health on their phones.

The promise of safety 

It protects itself from spoons, cups, and other metallic objects. It automatically switches off upon detection and alerts the user. This makes Binit safer and more reliable than sink grinders.

Every individual Binit is tested and personally supervised. We aim to increase the lifespan of smart waste management utilities so that they are bought and forgot for years rather than months of the push-to-open cans. Leave the hygiene quotient of the kitchen to Binit; it’s safer with a smart bin than one that’s not.

 

Binit Design

 

Functional prototype 

We built the stocky looking prototype in winter of 2015.

One of the main challenges we encountered was building an ecosystem that can intelligently process waste without human intervention. If it used too much water, it’s counter-intuitive to our premise and if it uses too less, well, lot of bent shredder blades. It took us over three months  to come up a working system than can not only use water efficiently, but also clean itself after a cycle.

Over a period of two years, we made subtle improvements in the model and build the second wave of prototypes. We added layers of safety for the user and making it as simple to use as turning the knob on a microwave. Actually, we managed to make it even more easier to use. After this, we concept-designed various models and finalized on what we on this page: a minimalistic cylindrical shape that takes minimum space for the work it does, and has a sliding wind turbine mold as its lid. An inspiration and shout-out to the rapid pace of engineering around us.

Bin It, Believe It

A solution towards an earth friendly waste management.

Binit digitizes waste. Data on how much waste, amount of water used, amount of power used, etc., is available to the user. Thus, the overall behavior towards waste management can be improved when every house treats its own waste.

Refuse landfills, reduce pollution, reuse water, and recycle garbage. Will we ever need the high cost landfills and million dollar incinerators that are more harmful than the waste themselves?

Champion climate change 

The story

The team

Dealing with garbage has always been a critical issue in households, organizations, and government services. We look towards traditional waste management systems, and it always falls short of satisfactory results. We started working on Binit with the simple idea of changing the way we treat kitchen waste. The core of our vision was to find a solution that is simple, smart, and convenient to use without being intrusive and interruptive of a user’s space.

We realized that segregation is the most significant problem in waste management. Even though we have several solutions to segregate waste, in the end, it’s all going to go to landfills and result in the same by-products that are damaging our environment.  Waste can be segregated using multiple techniques and ideologies. We had to find a firm ground that uses the best of all available methods and discard the flaws. After a lot of research and brainstorming for months, we had an executable solution in Binit. 

Binit’s product philosophy was to address food waste disposal to be easily practiced by the masses. To find a solution that blends the traditional birthright of throwing garbage in a bin while adding a modern touch of convenience of treating it in the same bin. Add to this the freedom of controlling it with a smart phone, and a strong algorithm backing IoT and on-the-fly processing, we would have a smart bin that is advanced, easy to use, proactive, and borderline traditional. This was our dream product.

Right from the conceptual stage to the functional prototype, it has been a journey of creating a revolutionary product that transforms the way we look at garbage. As engineers, it was important that we tested Binit for nicks and flaws in the most abusive test conditions. We have spent nearly two years developing and testing the prototype. As the Binit prototype evolved, we overcame most of the above issues and made a product that is not only future ready, but also, earth friendly. The dream for perfection and creation of a complete product has driven us to push the idea into a working model for the community, and that’s how we got here. Binit is a device of patient innovation that is literally automating and digitizing waste management at homes.

FAQ

How does Binit work?

 

 

After waste is dumped into Binit and closing the lid, the waste processing starts. Binit has a specially designed shredder, which turns on and begins shredding the waste. Then, the inlet water valve opens and water flows into Binit. The food waste particles are shredded to the right size. After processing, the drain line valve opens and only the slurry flows out into the drain line. The shredder is designed to control the size of the shredded waste. This ensures smooth flow through the drain pipes without using high volumes of water or clogging the pipe. 

 

Are there similar products like Binit in the market?

 

Though there are different waste management technologies in industries and large organizations, we believe we are the first to reveal a product in which the food waste is instantly processed. Also, Binit is designed for minimum user interaction – so, user has to just dump the waste in Binit and the rest is taken care off by the system.

Typically, the products are highly sophisticated, has a learning curve for the user, and very expensive. We made a device that is simpler, easier, and cheaper for the user. Binit makes the best use of waste management resources in houses, hospitals, schools and delivers a solution that is more efficient and earth friendly. This is a game changer in waste management in the years to come, when we’ll need to tackle waste generation at source and rely on smart devices to manage the problem. Binit is that smart device – today.

How easy is it to use Binit?

 

You just have to dump the waste in Binit, close the lid, and press the ‘Start’ button. That’s it. The rest is managed by Binit. And, after every instance of shredding the waste, Binit does a quick self-clean and it’s back to looking new and sparkling clean and ready for the next batch of waste.

 

What types of waste can Binit process?

 

Binit can process 100% of a family’s vegan food waste and soft bones.  Hard bones cannot be processed in the current version of Binit. We are working on our next design that can process hard bones as well.

How is Binit different from the traditional food waste disposers?

 

Binit is a Smart Waste Disposer that is a conceptual and paradigmatic redesign of traditional food waste disposers.  

Traditional food waste disposers are largely of two types.

1. Composters: These take at least 21 days to process the waste; needs lot of space; smells awful; and there is directly user interaction afterwards to remove, relocate, and manage the waste. Composters are not feasible in fast urban lifestyles.  

2. Rapid dehydrators: This is the latest technology in waste management where it heats the waste and dehydrates it within a day or two. The output of this is black char that is not usable, and because of the foul-smell left behind after processing, the device needs to be cleaned every day and it consumes lot of power. It is also large and heavy.

 

Binit takes the best from these solutions and makes it available to every user. First, we minimized the power needed for waste disposal in a house. Generally, waste management utilities consume a ton of energy to fulfil their task. Binit uses 20kwh/year (kilowatt hour per year). Second, we worked on a system that did the job as soon as possible. Waste is the last thing that requires your time in a kitchen. Moving a trash can, cleaning it monthly, replacing it when it gets broken, scheduling and coordinating the removal with the city’s garbage management service, and other little waste interaction processes tend to add up and take our time. We cut through all that with our solution. Third, universal savings: Binit saves time, money, energy, resources of external waste management systems. This indirectly benefits the environment and the Green Revolution movement. Considering the weight processed by each household, by using Binit you are directly participating in fighting the harm done to the planet.  

 

What is the size of Binit?

Binit is designed to seamlessly fit in any space in your kitchen. It can be integrated with your kitchen sink or placed under any counter with a water supply.

Dimensions of Binit: 10” D X 33.75” H

W = 10 inches in diameter. 

L = 33.75 inches in height.

 

What is the weight of the unit?

 

Binit weighs around 26.45 pounds (approx. 12 KG).

 

How much energy does Binit consume in a year?

 

Binit is a highly energy efficient device. Since it runs only for a couple of minutes every day, the energy consumption approximately around 20kwh/year. Which is ten times lesser than power consumed by an LCD TV or dishwasher, and half the energy typically consumed by a coffee machine. It amounts to a cost of $2 - $2.5 in a year.

 

How long does Binit take to process once it’s full?

 

Depending upon the type of waste, the processing cycle may vary from 45 seconds to 120 seconds. Binit’s self-cleaning cycle would take another 30 seconds.

 

Once a cycle is started, can it be paused to add additional food waste?

 

No. Like a washing machine, that needs to thoroughly complete its course, Binit’s processing cycle needs to complete once it starts.  But a cycle hardly takes two minutes to finish, so you can add the next batch as soon as it stops.

 

What are the safety measures in Binit?

A lot of care was taken to make Binit completely safe and child-proof. The device only starts if the lid is closed. This is Binit’s biggest safety triumph over sink shredders. It is as safe as a bubble in a bathroom.

 

How is Binit installed in my house?

Buy it, connect it, plug it, use it. That’s the installation.  When you receive Binit, connect a water source to it – like the pipe running from the kitchen sink. Then connect Binit’s pipe to the drain pipe and you are set. Binit comes with a six-feet power cord that enables you to place it anywhere in the kitchen. Waste water from dish washer or water purifier can also be used as a water source for Binit. Thus, the water usage in the house can be optimized alongside the waste management system, getting us closer to that mythical figure of Zero Wastage in the future.

 

Is there any additive added before or during the cycle.?

 

 

 

Not at all. Binit is autonomous, chemical-free product that does not require any additive to boost its performance. Various waste processing systems come with fragrances and chemicals whose long-term effects on its users are unknown. This risk is automatically prevented in Binit, which is no more and no less than what you see.

 

 

Is there any stink or lingering smell after using Binit?

 

There are no smells or malodourous by-products generated by Binit’s processing. It is a completely odorless waste management system.

 

 

Is Binit noisy?

 

Binit is quieter than a washing machine. It is designed such that there are no audible noises outside the device.

How much of water is consumed during or after the cycle.?

 

Binit is designed to use optimized water consumption. Depending on the type of waste inside it, the Binit algorithm assigns the amount of water to be used in a processing cycle. Even if the bin is full, the water is allocated only by requirement, not by brute force washing or arbitrarily using large amounts to shred the waste.

Also, waste water from dishwashers or water purifiers can be used as a source for Binit. 

 

I am interested to know more. How can I receive updates about the campaign or be a part of this project?

 

If you’ve contributed, you're already a part of the Binit family. This is our first crowdfunding campaign, so we are still learning how to market and manage our product on the site. E-mail us any doubts, questions, queries about Binit, and we’ll get back to you within 24-hours.  If you want to know the progress of the project, hit the Follow button in the upper left corner of your screen, and you’ll receive notifications on Binit’s development through the campaign.

 

So, are you selling this thing?

 

That’s the idea. We are seeking crowdfunding to propel Binit from its prototype stage to full-blown manufacturing stage. An idea like Binit is a seed in technological evolution of our society, and we want to reach as many people as possible to be a part of this change. We’ll begin selling to our Indiegogo backers by the end of the year and begin shipping worldwide by Feb-2018.

It’s child-proof and elder-safe.The Binit App also monitors process cycles, operation patterns, power consumption, to optimize itself over time. Users will get maintenance alerts and monitor the device health on their phones.The promise of safety It protects itself from spoons, cups, and other metallic objects. It automatically switches off upon detection and alerts the user. This makes Binit safer and more reliable than sink grinders.Every individual Binit is tested and personally supervised. We aim to increase the lifespan of smart waste management utilities so that they are bought and forgot for years rather than months of the push-to-open cans. Leave the hygiene quotient of the kitchen to Binit; it’s safer with a smart bin than one that’s not. Binit Design Functional prototype We built the stocky looking prototype in winter of 2015.One of the main challenges we encountered was building an ecosystem that can intelligently process waste without human intervention. If it used too much water, it’s counter-intuitive to our premise and if it uses too less, well, lot of bent shredder blades. It took us over three months  to come up a working system than can not only use water efficiently, but also clean itself after a cycle.Over a period of two years, we made subtle improvements in the model and build the second wave of prototypes. We added layers of safety for the user and making it as simple to use as turning the knob on a microwave. Actually, we managed to make it even more easier to use. After this, we concept-designed various models and finalized on what we on this page: a minimalistic cylindrical shape that takes minimum space for the work it does, and has a sliding wind turbine mold as its lid. An inspiration and shout-out to the rapid pace of engineering around us.Bin It, Believe ItA solution towards an earth friendly waste management.Binit digitizes waste. Data on how much waste, amount of water used, amount of power used, etc., is available to the user. Thus, the overall behavior towards waste management can be improved when every house treats its own waste.Refuse landfills, reduce pollution, reuse water, and recycle garbage. Will we ever need the high cost landfills and million dollar incinerators that are more harmful than the waste themselves?Champion climate change The storyThe teamDealing with garbage has always been a critical issue in households, organizations, and government services. We look towards traditional waste management systems, and it always falls short of satisfactory results. We started working on Binit with the simple idea of changing the way we treat kitchen waste. The core of our vision was to find a solution that is simple, smart, and convenient to use without being intrusive and interruptive of a user’s space.We realized that segregation is the most significant problem in waste management. Even though we have several solutions to segregate waste, in the end, it’s all going to go to landfills and result in the same by-products that are damaging our environment.  Waste can be segregated using multiple techniques and ideologies. We had to find a firm ground that uses the best of all available methods and discard the flaws. After a lot of research and brainstorming for months, we had an executable solution in Binit. Binit’s product philosophy was to address food waste disposal to be easily practiced by the masses. To find a solution that blends the traditional birthright of throwing garbage in a bin while adding a modern touch of convenience of treating it in the same bin. Add to this the freedom of controlling it with a smart phone, and a strong algorithm backing IoT and on-the-fly processing, we would have a smart bin that is advanced, easy to use, proactive, and borderline traditional. This was our dream product.
Right from the conceptual stage to the functional prototype, it has been a journey of creating a revolutionary product that transforms the way we look at garbage. As engineers, it was important that we tested Binit for nicks and flaws in the most abusive test conditions. We have spent nearly two years developing and testing the prototype. As the Binit prototype evolved, we overcame most of the above issues and made a product that is not only future ready, but also, earth friendly. The dream for perfection and creation of a complete product has driven us to push the idea into a working model for the community, and that’s how we got here. Binit is a device of patient innovation that is literally automating and digitizing waste management at homes.
FAQ



How does Binit work?
 
 


After waste is dumped into Binit and closing the lid, the waste processing starts. Binit has a specially designed shredder, which turns on and begins shredding the waste. Then, the inlet water valve opens and water flows into Binit. The food waste particles are shredded to the right size. After processing, the drain line valve opens and only the slurry flows out into the drain line. The shredder is designed to control the size of the shredded waste. This ensures smooth flow through the drain pipes without using high volumes of water or clogging the pipe. 
 




Are there similar products like Binit in the market?
 


Though there are different waste management technologies in industries and large organizations, we believe we are the first to reveal a product in which the food waste is instantly processed. Also, Binit is designed for minimum user interaction – so, user has to just dump the waste in Binit and the rest is taken care off by the system.
Typically, the products are highly sophisticated, has a learning curve for the user, and very expensive. We made a device that is simpler, easier, and cheaper for the user. Binit makes the best use of waste management resources in houses, hospitals, schools and delivers a solution that is more efficient and earth friendly. This is a game changer in waste management in the years to come, when we’ll need to tackle waste generation at source and rely on smart devices to manage the problem. Binit is that smart device – today.




How easy is it to use Binit?
 


You just have to dump the waste in Binit, close the lid, and press the ‘Start’ button. That’s it. The rest is managed by Binit. And, after every instance of shredding the waste, Binit does a quick self-clean and it’s back to looking new and sparkling clean and ready for the next batch of waste.
 




What types of waste can Binit process?
 

Binit can process 100% of a family’s vegan food waste and soft bones.  Hard bones cannot be processed in the current version of Binit. We are working on our next design that can process hard bones as well.



How is Binit different from the traditional food waste disposers?
 


Binit is a Smart Waste Disposer that is a conceptual and paradigmatic redesign of traditional food waste disposers.  
Traditional food waste disposers are largely of two types.
1. Composters: These take at least 21 days to process the waste; needs lot of space; smells awful; and there is directly user interaction afterwards to remove, relocate, and manage the waste. Composters are not feasible in fast urban lifestyles.  
2. Rapid dehydrators: This is the latest technology in waste management where it heats the waste and dehydrates it within a day or two. The output of this is black char that is not usable, and because of the foul-smell left behind after processing, the device needs to be cleaned every day and it consumes lot of power. It is also large and heavy.
 
Binit takes the best from these solutions and makes it available to every user. First, we minimized the power needed for waste disposal in a house. Generally, waste management utilities consume a ton of energy to fulfil their task. Binit uses 20kwh/year (kilowatt hour per year). Second, we worked on a system that did the job as soon as possible. Waste is the last thing that requires your time in a kitchen. Moving a trash can, cleaning it monthly, replacing it when it gets broken, scheduling and coordinating the removal with the city’s garbage management service, and other little waste interaction processes tend to add up and take our time. We cut through all that with our solution. Third, universal savings: Binit saves time, money, energy, resources of external waste management systems. This indirectly benefits the environment and the Green Revolution movement. Considering the weight processed by each household, by using Binit you are directly participating in fighting the harm done to the planet.  
 



What is the size of Binit?

Binit is designed to seamlessly fit in any space in your kitchen. It can be integrated with your kitchen sink or placed under any counter with a water supply.
Dimensions of Binit: 10” D X 33.75” H
W = 10 inches in diameter. 
L = 33.75 inches in height.
 




What is the weight of the unit?
 


Binit weighs around 26.45 pounds (approx. 12 KG).
 




How much energy does Binit consume in a year?
 


Binit is a highly energy efficient device. Since it runs only for a couple of minutes every day, the energy consumption approximately around 20kwh/year. Which is ten times lesser than power consumed by an LCD TV or dishwasher, and half the energy typically consumed by a coffee machine. It amounts to a cost of $2 - $2.5 in a year.
 




How long does Binit take to process once it’s full?
 


Depending upon the type of waste, the processing cycle may vary from 45 seconds to 120 seconds. Binit’s self-cleaning cycle would take another 30 seconds.
 




Once a cycle is started, can it be paused to add additional food waste?
 


No. Like a washing machine, that needs to thoroughly complete its course, Binit’s processing cycle needs to complete once it starts.  But a cycle hardly takes two minutes to finish, so you can add the next batch as soon as it stops.
 



What are the safety measures in Binit?

A lot of care was taken to make Binit completely safe and child-proof. The device only starts if the lid is closed. This is Binit’s biggest safety triumph over sink shredders. It is as safe as a bubble in a bathroom.
 



How is Binit installed in my house?

Buy it, connect it, plug it, use it. That’s the installation.  When you receive Binit, connect a water source to it – like the pipe running from the kitchen sink. Then connect Binit’s pipe to the drain pipe and you are set. Binit comes with a six-feet power cord that enables you to place it anywhere in the kitchen. Waste water from dish washer or water purifier can also be used as a water source for Binit. Thus, the water usage in the house can be optimized alongside the waste management system, getting us closer to that mythical figure of Zero Wastage in the future.
 




Is there any additive added before or during the cycle.?
 
 
 


Not at all. Binit is autonomous, chemical-free product that does not require any additive to boost its performance. Various waste processing systems come with fragrances and chemicals whose long-term effects on its users are unknown. This risk is automatically prevented in Binit, which is no more and no less than what you see.
 




 
Is there any stink or lingering smell after using Binit?
 


There are no smells or malodourous by-products generated by Binit’s processing. It is a completely odorless waste management system.
 




 
Is Binit noisy?
 

Binit is quieter than a washing machine. It is designed such that there are no audible noises outside the device.



How much of water is consumed during or after the cycle.?
 


Binit is designed to use optimized water consumption. Depending on the type of waste inside it, the Binit algorithm assigns the amount of water to be used in a processing cycle. Even if the bin is full, the water is allocated only by requirement, not by brute force washing or arbitrarily using large amounts to shred the waste.
Also, waste water from dishwashers or water purifiers can be used as a source for Binit. 
 




I am interested to know more. How can I receive updates about the campaign or be a part of this project?
 


If you’ve contributed, you're already a part of the Binit family. This is our first crowdfunding campaign, so we are still learning how to market and manage our product on the site. E-mail us any doubts, questions, queries about Binit, and we’ll get back to you within 24-hours.  If you want to know the progress of the project, hit the Follow button in the upper left corner of your screen, and you’ll receive notifications on Binit’s development through the campaign.
 




So, are you selling this thing?
 

That’s the idea. We are seeking crowdfunding to propel Binit from its prototype stage to full-blown manufacturing stage. An idea like Binit is a seed in technological evolution of our society, and we want to reach as many people as possible to be a part of this change. We’ll begin selling to our Indiegogo backers by the end of the year and begin shipping worldwide by Feb-2018.

story:
Short Summary

  • About me the project creator: I was born and raised in Cameroon, a graduate in Mechanical Engineering, 5+ years working in the oil&gas industry in the Houston Texas area, quit my Job to pursue a career as an entrepreneur with objective to help bring change to the continent.
  • At Globgreen we only focus on emerging markets, primarily adopting and modifying existing tech-concept to fit the needs of the people in the real estate market and secondarily re-investing in building modern homes and offices with objective to improve living comfort while creating thousands of jobs in each country we plan on operating across Africa.
  • By backing this project you will help bridge the gab between searching a home or offices space thus saving time, money and energy for the people in the need and this same backing will help provide modern infrastructure in the continent.  

PLEASE SELECT YOUR REWARD AND HELP BE A PART OF THIS PROJECT'S SUCCESS. :)

Reason for fund raising

With the initial budget of $32,000.00 total savings from my last job, we've built the first four sites, secured a data base, rented and furnished a Cameroon base office, launched cameroonrent.com three months ago, recruited and trained our first group of 12 employees and currently still recruiting.

Checkout cameroonrent.com. With a current success of a 100+ properties published by property owners and about 300+ daily site visitors in just five weeks of operation, our motivated to do more has tremendously increased seeing the changes we bring. But...

Looking at the work load ahead with all the bills, employee's salaries and operation expenses. We will definitely be running out of budget in a few months from now if we don't anticipate raising business funds.  

    Risks & Challenges

    Company's risk & challenges. Also known as our success factors are categorized into the three factors below. 

    • Reliability, site performance and continues improvement ( Out Tech, developers and web designers).
    • Marketing. Continues advertisement (social media ads, T.V, radio, road and streets banners etc).
    • Hiring the best commercial personnel to help find property owners, visit them, talk of what we offer and assist in adding their property on the site. Currently 12+ field employee in Cameroon and need more.

    Your backing will help us achieve these factors and keep it continues in a blink of an eye.

    The Impact

    CURRENT REAL ESTATE MARKET ANALYSIS ACROSS THE CONTINENT.

    As explained in the video presentation, we have three options when it comes to finding, selling or renting a property. 

    1. Put a tag on the property

    2. Tell your friends and family 

    3. Hire an agent or agency.

    You will either have to walk the entire neighborhood searching for a tag on property, ask your friends and family if they've seen a tag on property, know someone that could help you find a property or you could use a real estate agent/agency and pay a fee just to visit a property that may not be of interest to you thus (Time, Money and Energy loss), adding to visiting fee, in most case you'll have to pay 100% of your monthly rent to the agent/agency if they finds a property you like. These methods usually take 1 to 3 months on average if you are lucky to find a property you like. Some individuals end up never finding a place, from my personal experience growing up in Cameroon that was me, I gave up after 6 months of continues searching for a student apartment. 

    WHY ''PUBLIC'' REAL ESTATE MARKETPLACE?

    All similar real estate marketplace or businesses across the continent are managed by the business owners. All properties added to the site are claimed by the site and assigned to agents who in turn charges a fee per visit or a percentage of the rent or sale price. With this model, property-seekers can only visit these properties via the responsible agent and on the other hand property owners can only get in contact with renter or buyer via the responsible agent. 

    To conclude, the market is run by a third party individual from price negotiation, deciding on who buys or rents what property and thus cashing on both sides of the market.

    With a PUBLIC market place, renter and landlords negotiate their pricing directly with no third party involved, properties are uploaded with direct contact details by property owners, not agents and within 24 hours maximum, properties get reviewed by our site administrator for legitimacy then published. Our public real estate market does not get involve in the pricing of any kind. It is just a platform where both parties meet.

    To help Secure property owner details user will need to have a premium account on the site after login so we know who does what and when. This premium account is free but can be subjected to change depending on the need to keep the site running.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please get the word out, talk about us to your friends and family or share us on facebook, twitter or instergram.
    • Please use Indiegogo share tools!

    Launching soon

    Backing Rewards shirts

    Please view our backings for our detail rewards 

    Since we are not a product base below are the rewards we could offer in terms of product.

    Thanks you for supporting us.

    Special Thanks to the Team that help build this sites. Especially employees at New Media, ASiteontheWeb and my everyday contributors #teamfamilly.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out, talk about us to your friends and family or share us on facebook, twitter or instergram.
Please use Indiegogo share tools!

Launching soon

Backing Rewards shirts
Please view our backings for our detail rewards

story:
GAS OFF

always be #propared

GAS OFF is currently the ONLY patented automated propane shut-off device on the market.

 

 

 

EASY TO USE

GAS OFF is simple to use and a breeze to install with no tools required at all. 

 

SAFE

GAS OFF makes grilling safer with no worries of forgetting to shut off the gas. 

Sit back, and enjoy your next cook-out with peace of mind.

 

AFFORDABLE

We plan to price GAS OFF fairly so all grill-lovers can enjoy this grill necessity as much as we do!

 

SAVES MONEY

GAS OFF saves money by saving the gas in your propane tank when you forget to turn it off.

So, the next time you turn your grill on, your propane tank will be filled, as well as your wallet.

 

ECO-FRIENDLY

GAS OFF is good for the environment by preventing unwanted gas byproducts from going into the atmosphere when you accidentally leave your propane tank on.

 

 

TRANSFERS EASILY

GAS OFF simply goes from tank to tank in mere seconds with just your bare hands. 

 

WHAT WE NEED

We need capital to add some final cosmetic touches, create the production molds and engage with the needed manufacturers to bring this product across the finish line. After final testing, GAS OFF will be shipped to backers and eventually be released in retail chains. 

 

WHY CONTRIBUTE

GAS OFF began as a conversation between two brothers who were convinced there had to be a better way to shut off the gas after cooking because all of us have forgotten to shut it off from time to time. 

They wanted to make it simple to use and a breeze to install with no tools required at all. It simply goes from tank to tank in mere seconds with just your bare hands. This can also be used as a cooking timer or if you just want to burn off the last meal you cooked on the grill. 

After 5 years of extensive engineering and design work we are proud to bring you a product that does not require the use of electrical motors and is safe and easy to operate. 

Now this is where you come in.

Once funded, our team will be hard at work to ensure that your GAS OFF device is completed and shipped.

 

CURRENT CHALLENGE

There have definitely been a few hoops that we have had to jump through along the way but we haven't given up on our idea.

We need funds to keep our team working hard, staying inspired and putting our working prototype into production and then into the hands of our biggest fans!

 

WANT THIS AWESOME DEVICE

BUT CAN'T CONTRIBUTE?

Spread the word for us by sharing this campaign on social media with friends + family.

 

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL

          

 

THANKS FOR HEARING US OUT!

story:
Too hot? Or not enough? Now, get your VSITOO S3 Pro to keep your drink at your favorite temperature always. 
VSITOO S3-pro adopted a double-layer vacuum stainless steel and a built-in high-capacity lithium battery, which keeps your drink at your favorite temperature for up to 2 to 8 hours on the go—— or all day on the charging coaster.
Its unique design not only prevents your ice cream from melting, but also heats up your hot drink and always keeps it at your favorite temperature.
We believe that this Smart Mug inspired by the love and inspiration for coffee will surely bring you different surprises. Now, join us and learn about VSITOO S3 Pro together!

 

VSITOO allows you to control the temperature with APP or Touch button

The touch button is configured with vibration motor feedback. You can set your temperature between (30℃-65℃ /86° F - 150° F)  by clicking the touch button. 
You can also switch to the "OFF" to turn off the heating function, VSITOO will keep your cold drink cool for a longer time than general mug.

You can set your favorite temperature with just one swipe on the APP. You can also name your mug, switch the temperature unit(℃/℉) and language（English/Japanese/Chinese) .

 

 

2 to 8 hours on a single charge

If you need to keep your coffee at perfect temperature at a meeting room or in any place without an outlet, VSITOO will help you.

Any drink that is hot, like coffee, can stay at your favorite temperature for up to 8 hours.

If you need to heat your drink from room temperature to your setting temperature, VSITOO will keep your drink at your favorite temperature at least 2 hours on a single charge.

 

Work all day on the redesigned charging coaster

If you need to take a sip of your drink from time to time during busy hours, VSITOO can keep your drink at the perfect temperature all day. Work will also become easier for you.


Enjoy Your Drink Now

VSITOO S3 Pro keeps your drink at your favorite temperature for up to 2 hours on a single charge—or all day on the charging coaster.

It will retain the temperature of your chosen beverage for a prolonged period of time when you choose VSITOO.

The double-walled stainless steel design and the high-capacity battery ensures beverage can stay either hot or cold for a longer time.

story:
Meet Our Most Sophisticated Electronic Spin Mop and Polisher, The Elicto ES-430!  

The Ultimate Electronic Spin Mop and Polisher! Are you tired of wasting precious time, money and effort doing the housework manually? Wouldn’t you just love it if there was an easier, more efficient way to keep your house immaculate clean, without tiring your back and putting pressure on your wrists? We are happy to introduce you to the next generation of electronic spin mop and polishers – the ES-430! Jam-packed with innovative features and an awesome style, this diligently designed electronic spin mop and polisher is here to revolutionize your daily life!

Remove Every Last Speck of Dust!

Equipped with an edge-tech, rotating dual spin mop that will easily remove even the tiniest speck of dust, leaving your floors sparkling clean, this electronic mop is the device of the future!

Cordless Convenience

Tired of struggling with long, tangling cords and trying to find an available outlet every time you move to a different room? Not anymore. The smart, cord-free design makes it easy to move your electronic mop around your home or office, hassle-free!

Spray At the Push of a Button!

Designed with busy individuals in mind, the ES-430 features a handy water tank that can easily be filled with the cleaning liquid of your choice (water, detergent or waxing oil). The convenient, one button design, allows you to effortlessly produce water spray action for better cleaning results.

LED Lighting

Want to make sure you have efficiently cleaned every last speck of dust? Now you can, thanks to the smart LED lighting feature that will quickly reveal even the finest dust!

360 Degrees Ball Joint

The specially designed, 360 degrees rotating ball joint allows you to easily reach even the most difficult spots, such as under the couch and bed or in corners, making sure your spaces are left sparkling clean every time! 

60dB Low Noise Function

The ES-430 allows you to enjoy all your daily activities, like watching TV, taking on the phone or reading stories to your kids, without causing any disturbing, loud noise.

Washable Microfiber Mop Heads

Money saving and convenient, the removable microfiber mop heads, save you from the hassle of buying new replacement attachments. All you need to do, is remove the mop heads in one swift motion, toss them in your washer and you’re ready to go! The thick, microfiber pads boast a patented, dual function design for all your cleaning needs:

  • Pink Mop Head: Specially designed to clean, scrub, mop and pick up dirt and hair, this pad can be used for just about any situation.
  • Green Mop Head: Equipped with short hair that are ideal for polishing any surface, this mop head will take cleaning and mopping to a whole new level!

Rechargeable Battery

Charge your electronic mop and polisher for a minimum of 2 hours and let it run continuously for 40 minutes with peace of mind. The powerful, rechargeable battery will make sure, nothing stands between you and a perfectly clean house!  

 

 

Specifications

Size: W 18" x D 5" x H 52"

Weight: 3.7 kg

Noise: 60 dB

Charging Time: 2 hrs

Operating Time: 40 mins.

Support, Invest and Enjoy Unique Rewards!

We are fully ready to make this project real and bring the ES-430 to the marketplace. But in order to succeed, we humbly ask for your help. With an estimated, funding goal of $5,000, we are in need of your precious support. Support by placing your order today or help spread the word, so that we can make this awesome product available to everyone. 

In the meanwhile, check the amazing rewards that we have for you. 

We have put together some unique offers for very early birds. You won’t see prices like this on it for years to come, so make sure you are the first to get the ES-430 and make a pledge today!

Special Offers

The ES-430 normally sells for $200 (retail price). By ordering today you get to save up to 40%!

  • Ultra Super Early Bird: Get 1 ES-430 + 3 Sets of Mop Pads for only $149!
  • Super Early Bird: Get 1 ES-430 + 3 Sets of Mop Pads only $159!
  • Early Bird: Get 1 ES-430 + 3 Sets of Mop Pads only $169!
  • Indiegogo Special: Get 1 ES-430 + 3 Sets of Mop Pads only $179!
  • Multipack Discount: Get 2 ES-430 + 6 Sets of Mop Pads only $298!
  • Triple Pack Discount: Get 3 ES-430 + 9 Sets of Mop Pads only $447!

The Major Risks Have Already Been Tackled – ES-430 Is Ready to Hit the Marketplace

Manufacturing an innovative, superior quality product is easier said than done. Although it all began, like all wonderful and creative ideas, over casual chat, designing the ES-430 was a huge challenge, as we had to come up with a functional prototype that would be truly groundbreaking, yet highly practical and suitable for everyone to use at home or office environments.

It all began in March 2016 and after going through the steps of market research, project confirmation, designing, and making all the necessary improvements, the ES-430 has successfully passed through the quality test, so we are now perfectly ready to launch! In other words, the major risks involved in this project have already been tackled. Yet, this is where we need your support.

Elicto is a prestigious home goods manufacturer located in New Jersey.  We are the leading innovators when it comes to the revolutionizing electronic spin mop and polisher.  Thanks to our backers we were able to bring to market our first model the ES-200 and ES-330.   We need your help once again.  Our new and upgraded model the ES-430 is finally finished with the production phase.  We need your contributions to start our production order for May delivery.  Every dollar helps!  Thank you for your support! 

 

Why Is it a Good Idea to Support This Project?

By ordering your very own ES-430 today you get to help families around the world to:

  • Establish a completely hassle-free floor cleaning routine 
  • Save money on expensive household detergents and cleaning tools
  • Have more free time to spend with their families
  • By supporting creative entrepreneurs, who are determined to make a difference in the world, you will have the chance to become an irreplaceable part of a larger project. 

And Remember: There are more ways you can help. Use your social media tools and spread the word – your help is deeply appreciated.

Back This Project Now and Help Us Make People’s Lives Easier!

story:
Welcome to Catitions!

Catitions are artistic privacy screens that are beautiful and functional.

The Catitions idea was born many years ago, based on experiences with our own cats.
We wanted a stylish screen suitable for cats that solves all the problems cat parents encounter, such as messy kitty areas: toys, food areas and exposed litter box areas. Having friends over was always a challenge. 

Eventually, we decided to create our own cat privacy screens. In addition, we wanted to create a long-lasting furniture piece that blends well with most decor and is attractive enough on its own. Impromptu visits from friends are now welcome, and we often receive compliments.


We started by creating mini-prototypes and experimented with different types of woods

We spent months prototyping and testing the Catitions. We wanted sustainable materials, and wood has always been a favorite, although a bit more temperamental.
We took extra time in creating the Catitions, paying attention to details, and making them both functional and artistic, and stylish enough for the discerning cat parents. 

 Our goal is to continue to create beautiful and functional furniture for pets. With your help and contributions, we can get started on this journey.


THE PROBLEMS
Without Catitions:

  • Messy food, litter box and cat toy areas
  • Not enough time to clean kitty areas  
  • Embarrassing impromptu visits 

THE SOLUTIONS
Catitions Benefits and Features:

  • they conceal messy kitty areas beautifully (toys,  litter box, food)
  • light-weight and stable 
  • urine resistant 
  • water resistant
  • non-toxic, eco-friendly finishes and sealer
  • long-lasting 
  • foldable for easy storage (z-fold)


Catitions are light-weight, portable and foldable

  • no assembly required, save time and energy
    Just unwrap and place in your favorite spot. 
  • multi-functional 
    They can be used to cover other areas of the house and in bathrooms, or even in front of windows. 
  • a great alternative to cat enclosures for hygienic reasons
  • ​they complement most interiors
  •  beautiful engraved details


Close-up view of engraved detail

Where can you place your Catitions?

Catitions can be placed just about anywhere inside the home:

  • living room 
  • dining room
  • kitchen
  • bedroom
  • bathroom

Measurements
Size: 23.5 in high x 50 inches wide (3 panels, each approx. 16.5 inches wide) 
Weight: approx. 3 lbs  


What We Need & What You Get

We are aiming for $10,000. This will help us start production of Catitions and other beautiful, functional pet furniture.

REWARDS SUMMARY

How we plan to spend this money

The bulk of the money will be spent on materials, labor, packaging and distribution. 
We are a brand new start-up. and we are currently able to manufacture smaller quantities ourselves locally. We rent space and equipment in local shops.  This money will give us the initial funding to jump-start our business.

What if we don't meet our goal?

We have created this product from from concept to completion, working several months on prototyping and testing.  The prototype is finished, and the product is ready for manufacturing. We rent equipment locally and create this product ourselves, minimizing the risks of manufacturing, such as using a 3rd party manufacturer outside  the US, which could complicate matters. We have the ability to deliver smaller quantities with little risk.

What we will do if we exceed our goal

If we exceed our goal, we will rent extra tools and equipment and hire extra helping hands, as needed, to make sure we deliver on time.  We would like to eventually purchase our own heavy equipment. 

We are prepared to deliver regardless of the outcome.

SHIPPING

Free US shipping for all items! 
Reduced international shipping fees.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute, you can still help us. 
Please share the Indiegogo link with all your feline-loving friends on social media and spread the word through the Indiegogo social media tools.

Here is the link to the campaign: https://igg.me/at/catitions

Thank you, we appreciate it your help and support!

Risks and challenges

If something unexpected will occur, we have given enough buffer time to account for such uncertainties.  However, if anything happens that we have no control over, we will do everything possible to make sure that we correct the situation and we will keep you informed at all times.

Our goal is to deliver the highest quality products  and to deliver on time. 

Thumbs Pets has crafted each Catition with love, right here, in the USA. 

Thank you for your support, whether you're a backer or just interested in our campaign, we sincerely appreciate your support! Please help us out by passing the word along! 

Here are some of the other rewards:
 

Catition coasters

Artistic Postcards

Example of a kitten portrait:
 

 

Credits
YouTube free movie clip- green screen cat

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8cnrLKLDY0

YouTube Kittens- white background

Juan Jose Davila

https://www.videvo.net/video/kittens-against-white-background-/4775/

-------------------

We have everything we need to make this project happen. All we need is your support. 
Please help us bring this project to life!

Thumbs Pets

story:
My name is Greg and I believe that entrepreneurship has the power to solve small and big problems—from a dirty toilet, to plastic pollution in the oceans.  I created the FlushBrush(TM) to be both a USA-made, convenient & durable toilet cleaning tool with mass market potential and a contributor to cleaning up the oceans. 

Mass-Market Potential

  • Multi-Million Dollar Market
  • Household and Business Use
  • Patent Pending in the United States
  • Distributed through Independently Owned Hardware Stores

The Features and Benefits of the Flush Brush (TM)

  • Modern storage case offers a decorative look and easy access
  • Brush head contours toilet bowl, cleans under the rim
  • Easy cleaning agent refill  creates an All-in-One tool
  • Features a biodegradable disposable Brush Head

By contributing to this product kick-off, you will be helping create a product that benefits almost every household and business by becoming more effective at maintaining and cleaning their toilets, and this product will also help to continue the trend to create products that are better for the earth and more environmentally friendly.

What We Need & What You Get

Operational and Financial Needs:

2000 units /  $25,900

Prototype(S)$12,000

Research &Development $3,200

Molds  $38,000

Marketing$8,000

Crowdfunding Fees & Expenses$12,000

Taxes - on contributions received-40%

 Initial project cost = $99,100

2000 x $24.95  = Revenue $49,000

Total Needed for Prototype and Initial Production Run: $99,100

The Flush Brush (TM) is supporting the https://www.theoceancleanup.com/

Note: If the entire goal amount is not raised, initial mold price may be reduced by using aluminum molds, and the quantity of the initial run will be reduced to 1000 units for the initial sales campaign.

Distribution Network

There are over 35,000 independently owned hardware stores in the United States.

Denver True Value

The Flush Brush (TM) first Product Pilot Program is at the Denver True Value Store in Denver Colorado. We currently also have a list of additional stores who want to pilot The Flush Brush (TM) as well. If you are hardware or retail outlet and would like to set up pilot accounts go to http://www.flushbrush.biz

The Impact

  • This project is valuable because it continues the process of changing out products that are harmful to the environment.
  • This project is valuable because it supports the initiative to clean-up plastics in our oceans.

  • The impact of changing out current products with more sustainable Eco-friendly technology, in conjunction with the Clean Up the Ocean Project contributes to the wellness of the world.
  • This project will also impact the local economy by providing jobs and increased interest in products that are Eco-friendly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

All businesses have Risk and Challenges to overcome.

  • The design may need to  be modified. The original prototype works, but several additional prototypes need to be built to properly test the functionality and durability of the product.
  • The Brush head can be made out of biodegradable material; however several options are available and no one supplier has been specifically identified  and this still needs to be worked out in further detail. There are options to have  materials and component (Brush Head) produced outside of the country.
  • This product is Patent Pending and Trademarked in  the United States,  62/291,404 filed on February 4, 2016

Totals requested dollar amount to hit the  goal  of $99,100 may include additional fees, licenses and administration cost, which may be added on to the total expenses for the FlushBrush (TM).

The Ocean Cleanup foundation has a Dutch tax-deductible status (ANBI). Donations to The Ocean Cleanup made through the Netherland America Foundation are also tax-deductible for US citizens. The NAF is qualified as a 501(c)3 not-for-profit organization by the U.S. government. If you would like to make a donation to The Ocean Cleanup through The NAF, please visit their donation page. Please consider reading The Ocean Clean-up Project Donation Terms & Conditions before making a donation.

See http://flushbrush.biz/risk-and-disclaimers/  for additional risk and disclaimers

Other Ways You Can Help

       

Thank you for taking the time to look at this Campaign and thank you for your contribution.

If you find yourself not in the position to contribute to this project monetarily, we ask that you send out our link to your social network so that we may make as many people aware of the challenge we have in cleaning up our oceans and to begin producing low-impact, Eco-friendly products for consumers.

 

  • Oh yes, please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

See http://flushbrush.biz/risk-and-disclaimers/  for additional risk and disclaimers

Other Ways You Can Help
         

Thank you for taking the time to look at this Campaign and thank you for your contribution.
If you find yourself not in the position to contribute to this project monetarily, we ask that you send out our link to your social network so that we may make as many people aware of the challenge we have in cleaning up our oceans and to begin producing low-impact, Eco-friendly products for consumers.

 

Oh yes, please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Anhydrous Mat

NO MORE Filthy, Moldy and Disgusting Bath Rugs EVER AGAIN!

 

Do you hate your filthy, moldy, smelly and disgusting bath mat at home? It’s dry and clean at the beginning until it's used for a couple days, then it gets unsanitary, rancid and moist regardless of the amount of uses during the day/night.  

Give it a few more days and the worse will come. The damp bath mat will begin to grow mold, which is one of the causes of indoor pollution for humans (It’s easier for bathroom mats to harbor bacteria and other germs since it is constantly moist.). These health effects include inflammations, allergies, and/or infections. 

Doctors recommend washing your bathroom mats every 3-4 days. However, who actually does that?! Do you really want to put your moldy bath mat into the washing machine with your clothes?

 

Introducing the Anhydrous Mat

A Natural Anti-bacterial Water Absorbing Bath Mat

 

The Anhydrous Mat is 100% natural and Eco-friendly made from plant fibers and natural minerals found in soil. The innovative combination of fibers and soils not only absorbs moisture and drys quickly, it also prevents it from growing harmful bacteria and molds.

 

 

Feature:

The Anhydrous Mat only takes 10-15 minutes to fully dry compared to a regular bath mat, which takes at least 6 hours to dry.

Normally, 100mL can fully wet a bath rug, but The Anhydrous Mat can absorb 100ml of water and still feels dry after 12 minutes.

There is not enough time for wet bath mats to completely dry in between uses. They harbor bacteria, grow mold and create disgusting odors. Materials used on The Anhydrous Mat accelerate the drying process and enhance water absorption. Bacteria and odors won't be able to grow on The Anhydrous Mat.

The Anhydrous Mat is made of natural minerals and plant fibers without any chemical colorants. We only offer our backers products that our own families would use on a daily basis.

The Anhydrous Mat minimizes the risks of slipping and falling that you and your family may encounter with a typical non-absorbing cotton bath mat. The Anhydrous Mat will prevent future arguments with family members for getting the floor wet after showering.

The Anhydrous Mat is easy to clean. Simply rinse it with water. Please do not use any soap, bleach or put it in a washing machine. Leave it to dry under a shaded place after rinsing.

I grew up in a huge city and landed a job at an international trading company after graduation, which required me to travel a lot. I remember the first week when I stayed in Ginza, Japan. I was really impressed; not only by how the Japanese treated their jobs with respect and great passion but also their enthusiasm for work. Also same as their Japanese products, they not only try to make a great product but they take pride and passion in creating the best products on the market. Improving is one of the most important concepts in their society.  

We all know there are numerous of small annoying problems that we will have to deal with in our daily life and I hope our product can simplify, improve your life quality and make your day better!

After spending months working with chemists to find the right proportion of fibers and soil, and manufacturer who is willing to work with our high standard, we are excited to announce that we are ready to launch. We need your help to raise $5,000 in order to fund the first production run of our innovative Anhydrous Mat.

 

Size:

We are releasing two different sizes:

Regular Size (27" L x 15" W x 0.3" H), it's a perfect fit for most compact bathrooms.

Jumbo Size (29" L x 17" W x 0.3" H), it's better for a big family (A larger surface area helps absorb water faster).

 

Timeline:

 

 

The above timeline is released thoroughly after considering all kind of risks, challenges and possibilities.

 

Why the Anhydrous Mat? 

 

What Bacteria Can Be Found in Bathrooms

http://healthcommkey.org/bacteria-found-in-bathrooms/

Fall Injuries in Adults Associated with Rugs and Carpets

https://www.researchgate.net/publication/230622794_Slipping_and_tripping_fall_injuries_in_adults_associated_with_rugs_and_carpets

How does Mold Affect the Human Body

http://enhs.umn.edu/current/5103/molds/absorption.html

How does Bacteria Get Us Sick

https://medlineplus.gov/bacterialinfections.html

 

Question?

Please don't hesitate and feel free to post a comment or leave us a message. We will get back to you with an answer as soon as possible.

 

Feedback?

We would like you to be part of the creative process. You are more than welcome to give us any kind of comments, feedback or ideas. In fact, we would send out a survey by the end of the processing in order to get some comments and feedback for improvement. 

 

Risks and Challenges

It was extremely hard to look for a factory that was willing to work with us on this product, because our company had a lot of requirements regarding the use of all natural and degradable materials. Most factories rejected us due to the low profit margin.

Luckily, one of my family friend helped us to build up a connection and found an experienced mill to produce the Anhydrous Mat.

The only challenge that we have left is the capital for the first round of production and quality control. With your help, we will be able to produce the first round of production and create a better and useful product for your daily living. Also, a few of our team members will be flying to the factory and staying there until the shipment gets on the flight in order to ensure the quality.

Thank you for supporting once again!
story_txt: The Anhydrous MatNO MORE Filthy, Moldy and Disgusting Bath Rugs EVER AGAIN! Do you hate your filthy, moldy, smelly and disgusting bath mat at home? It’s dry and clean at the beginning until it's used for a couple days, then it gets unsanitary, rancid and moist regardless of the amount of uses during the day/night.  Give it a few more days and the worse will come. The damp bath mat will begin to grow mold, which is one of the causes of indoor pollution for humans (It’s easier for bathroom mats to harbor bacteria and other germs since it is constantly moist.). These health effects include inflammations, allergies, and/or infections. Doctors recommend washing your bathroom mats every 3-4 days. However, who actually does that?! story:
MOODY Useless Box is a box that has its own “mood”, whenever you try to switch it on, it turns itself off, of course, in different mood. Cautious, impatient, cheerful, you will never know what’s next because it is moody.

In other words, the box responds you with different moves, every time in different speed, different frequency, and different range.
So what’s a MOODY Useless Box for? Er, basically, it's just for fun. Even a terminator would be amused by this little box. But, the real point is, to deal with your fragment time. When loading a game, waiting for dinner or taking a rest from your paperwork, anytime you pull the trigger – Tadah! Congrats, you killed your time!

Put it on your own desk, your kitchen table, or even stick it on the wall, anywhere you like, and it is always moody.

While designing this project, we met some real difficulties. The hardest part is programming the box. We had to match the range, frequency and speed, make sure they are in the right way.

We built 8 versions of prototype, so that we can develop its structure and program into optimization. Also, we solved the power supply problem by using a main switch, that you need not to replace the batteries often.

We also did some work to find the balance between a perfect size and rational use of interior space which make the product ever compact.  

Dimensions: 5.5 x 3.8 x 2.3 Inches  

Weight: 12.5 Ounces

The core of our MOODY Useless Box is a pre-programmed high-speed chip. It responds to your movements.

Adjusted gear set helps to save energy, running for longer.

The outer parts of the box are carved with laser, which makes the box shining&solid.

With your support, we could build this product in its best way: the best components, most efficient factory, and finally, bring the project to life.

Sounds cool, huh? Don't get excited too early, cause we have more surprises. Here is just a small part of the all the moves, different mood, different moves, discover more yourself!

Are you tired with picking the right B-day gift for someone? Are you trying to find some interesting&safe gadgets for your kids? You are lucky! The MOODY Useless Box is definitely perfect for you. It meets all your requirements. Besides, it's not expensive at all.

We have made a schedule for this project. But we need your support to achieve it. The design is almost done. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and shipping for this project, you can help us to bring it to a better level! Moody uselessbox would be a perfect Christmas gift!

Thank you for your attention!

We would love to hear from you! No matter you have a suggested improvement, or some questions about this project. We want you to talk to us. Please reach us with the Emails below:

Backers : indiegogoproject@uselessbox.com

Business Enquiries : business@uselessbox.com

Press Enquiries : press@uselessbox.com

Risks and challenges

Products often face many challenges, we have to take many X factors into consideration, we must stick to the timeline, arrange for the shipment and good customer service. Like all new products, designing and manufacturing will always have risk. We've spent months designing and taking experiments, and have tried over 10 programs.

If we find opportunities to do any improvement, we will update it with improved design solutions. We will let you know if any improvements and alterations are made on the first time. These improvements will be verified in the last testing before ship and then make our final tweaks. Final tweaks will then be made before the full production.

We will also be in the factory to supervising the whole production as well as quality assurance. Before shipping, we will also test every single product to make sure that the products functioning right. We also have a complete shipping plan, so that we are completely committed to ensure the Moody Useless Box will arrive on time.

Please join us, take one second to share it with your friends, only with your support, we can bring this to the world. Thank you very much!

story:
When was the last time you changed your pillow? 

We change linens pretty regularly, and even mattresses every so often, but everyone tends to leave pillows out of the conversation. It may not be something you think about, but changing your pillow is actually a bigger deal than it seems. 

 
 

Pillows get GROSS

Keeping a pillow too long can have a number of devastating effects on your sleep cycle, and worn out pillows can trap harmful bacteria and even dust mites where you rest your head (yuck!)

Studies in sleep science have found that the benefits of a good night’s sleep can do wonders for your physical and mental health, and that your quality of sleep affects all aspects of your daily life.

When You Sleep Better, You Live Better

That’s why The Pillow Club exists. Because you can’t have an awesome day without a seriously great night’s sleep. 

We want to empower you to dream big by helping you sleep well, and we believe that all starts with your pillow.

 

Benefits Of Sleeping Well

When's the last time you woke up feeling truly ready to take on the day?

The importance of a good night’s sleep cannot be overstated. Studies show that your sleep health can affect every aspect of your daily life, and not just on a physical level. 

The quality and cleanliness of where you’re resting your head can affect your mood, memory, critical thinking, motivation, and even metabolism.

 

 

Not changing your pillow is risking your health!

Ignoring what you’re sleeping on each night can have severe, even unsanitary consequences... Each time you use your pillow, it becomes more and more infested with all sorts of bacteria and germs. 

Studies have shown that after even one week, the average pillow can have more bacteria than a toilet seat.

Over time, little critters can start to congregate in the filth and grow on the surface you put your face on each night... We know, we think it's gross too!

 

When it comes to living your best life each day, each night should be equally fantastic. 

But what about finding the right pillow? When you buy a soft, comfy pillow you give up head and neck support. On the other hand, when you buy a solid foam pillow you get support but lose the comfort. 

Sleep science research and engineering have allowed us to make incredible strides over the past two years, leading to the development of the perfect blend of comfort and support. 

Our patent-pending CORE Pillow was designed with your bedtime health, wellness, and comfort in mind so that you can feel fresh and rested every morning.

Keeping You Cool - Our pillow covers are blended with ultra-soft TENCEL™ fabric and Phase Change Material (PCM) to keep you always sleeping on the cool side.

Formed For You - Whether you're a side, back or stomach sleeper, we've got you covered. The soft, breathable foam in our pillows provides conformability and relieves pressure while you rest, however you rest.

Our Core Support - The foundation of a long sleep starts with our Core. It's soft on the outside, and firm on the inside. It's the PERFECT pillow!

 

Don't take it from us...

Domenic B.

"This pillow is truly amazing! It helped with my neck and back discomfort and I no longer toss and turn at night. I won't go back to a regular pillow again."

Cathy G.

"I've tried every pillow on the market, but never had such a good nights sleep like I now have with my Core Pillow! Best night sleep ever!!"

Rafael R.

"Obsessed with my pillow! I'm the type of sleeper whose pillow ends up on the floor every morning but this definitely isn't the case with my Core Pillow. It has the perfect firmness and softness. I love waking up with this pillow every morning!"

 

DON'T SLEEP LIKE ROGER!

At The Pillow Club we strive to help people follow their dreams each day, and it all starts with a great night's sleep. Wake up with determination and go to bed with satisfaction. Thank you for helping us follow our dreams and we hope to help you follow yours. 

Back us now and be one of the first to receive our Core Pillow. If you choose to back us but don't want a pillow than we will donate 5% of your backing to St. Jude hospital. 

Thank you for your support!

-TPC Family

story:
PENNA RED Special Edition

 

 

Have you ever seen a slim and glittering mobile phone or tablet paired with a keyboard that fits the desk perfectly? Probably not. We’ve been waiting for a beautiful keyboard, and when we couldn’t wait anymore, we started this project to make what we wanted.

A More beautiful design than even mobile phone itself, a design that embraces retro styling, the feeling of a mechanical keyboard, keycaps to dramatically reduce typos, multi-pairing for many devices, and even availability of macro for setting keys at your will. We, ELRETRON INC, are finally introducing PENNA, our dream come true that took three years in the making. 

Experience the NEWTRO with PENNA, which utilizes typewriter design to create a retro feeling, while adopting the most up-to-date technology.  

 

 

  The Video related original Penna  Keyboard Series 

 

Multi pairing support up to 5 units

iOS Change Switch-Windowns8,10(Andorid) / iOS(Mac)

※For Windows operating system, you need OS 8 or later.

Germany Cherry Switch

Cherry Switch MX BLUE Mechanical Switch

Cherry Switch MX RED Mechanical Switch

 

FACEBOOK : https://www.facebook.com/elretron/ 

INSTAGRAM : https://www.instagram.com/elretron/

HOMEPAGE : https://www.elretron.com/

YOUTUBE : Elretron studio

 

Risks and challenges

Risks and challenges
Warranty : Keyboard switch is manufactured by Cherry GmBH, a German company renown for its world’s best technology to which strict safety regulations are applied accordingly. Certified technical staff in Elretron is able to process all procedures to ensure safety and quality assurance.

Manufacturing design: Our products, are already validated by a precedented prototype, have been redesigned after additional modifications. Engineers and mechanical experts at Elretron ceaselessly strive to make the perfect product with processes which we will continue to discuss with our backers even after the funding.

Production :To make the highest quality PENNA Keyboard, we place the foremost priority into making it perfect, while having no interests in short-term profit. All manufacturing facilities are located in South Korea to maintain the highest quality in the production line.

We have conducted numerous simulations with our factories to solve, so that all of the technical problems that could possibly arise from the manufacturing process are under control, and we prepared specification requirements and facilities ready for immediate production after the funding. We will provide continuous communication to our backers and deliver the complete product by the promised timeline.

Shipping : PENNA is manufactured and assembled in Korea to ensure first-rate workmanship, and may be subject to duties when shipping to an international address.

story:
Alpha™ Pillow is a carbon infused memory foam pillow, with air cell breathability, ultra soft bamboo, pure silver fibers, and ice silk technology for instant coolness.

 

The Cooling Ice Silk technology helps wick away moisture and body heat to help you feel cooler so that you can fall asleep faster. Providing instant coolness and ultimate comfort.  

Silver has been used by NASA, US Special Forces, and Olympic athletes to create germ free textiles. Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon absorb toxins, prevents mould growth and purifies air by absorbing harmful gasses.

Air Cells increase comfort and breathability that is linked to sweating and snoring during sleeping. The combination of the textiles wick moisture away twice as fast as cotton, reducing the humidity in your bed by up to 50%. 

 

The problem with traditional pillows is that they require porous materials to create a soft comfortable feel. In as little as 7 days, millions of colony forming units of bacteria can grow inside this permeable space where mold and other pathogens can thrive. This leads to allergies, skin irritation and many illnesses. 

 

Alpha's bamboo charcoal infused memory foam allows the pillow to mould into the shape of your head and neck, supporting the sensitive pressure areas to help you relax and help with insomnia. 

 

Impinged nerves can trigger migraines, ensuring that your spine is alined correctly in its natural position it will minimize nerve irritation. It will also help to relieve muscle tension around the neck area. 

 

Alpha allows your spine to be alined and it elevates your upper body, unblocking the airways and opening nasal passages so you can breathe easier. Alpha's Dimensions: 60 x 40 x 12 cm.

 

Silver binds to essential cell components like DNA to neutralize their harmful effect. The process of minimizing the bacteria helps with eliminating odor, prevents allergies such as skin irritations, pimples, asthma, runny nose, sneezing and more. It has taken years of development for silver fabrics to arrive at this level of quality.  

 

The benefits of silver used by NASA, U.S. Special Forces as well as Athletes, providing effective antimicrobial properties, which means it naturally destroys odor-causing pathogens.

 

To add any of our Alpha™ Collection products,  please click on your “Manage your pledge” button (on top side when you open the project page), than click “Change your pledge” and simply add to the total cost. For multiple quantities please multiply the product's cost. 

You will be able to select your preferred size or weight in the survey after the campaign ends. 

*Additional International Shipping will apply during the survey for all add-ons. 

 

 

Ivana T. Lowchareonkul is a Product Designer. She has a passion for simple interfaces. She is the ultimate problem solver and loves to create innovative products.

Science is something that she greatly enjoys. "It challenges ideas that we think are ‘right’! There is always something new and interesting to discover and the journey to get there can be really, really exciting.” said Ivana.

 

Ivana has played critical leadership roles in 15 successfully funded and fulfilled Kickstarter projects that have raised over $3,000,000 to over 17,000 backers. Her keen eye for innovation has given her multiple opportunities to create successful products. Her experience in manufacturing has been perfected and she is very excited to bring Alpha Sheets to volume production. 

 

 

Our past projects:
story_txt:
Alpha™ Pillow is a carbon infused memory foam pillow, with air cell breathability, ultra soft bamboo, pure silver fibers, and ice silk technology for instant coolness.  
The Cooling Ice Silk technology helps wick away moisture and body heat to help you feel cooler so that you can fall asleep faster. Providing instant coolness and ultimate comfort.   
Silver has been used by NASA, US Special Forces, and Olympic athletes to create germ free textiles. Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon absorb toxins, prevents mould growth and purifies air by absorbing harmful gasses. 
Air Cells increase comfort and breathability that is linked to sweating and snoring during sleeping. The combination of the textiles wick moisture away twice as fast as cotton, reducing the humidity in your bed by up to 50%.  
 
 The problem with traditional pillows is that they require porous materials to create a soft comfortable feel. In as little as 7 days, millions of colony forming units of bacteria can grow inside this permeable space where mold and other pathogens can thrive. This leads to allergies, skin irritation and many illnesses.  Alpha's bamboo charcoal infused memory foam allows the pillow to mould into the shape of your head and neck, supporting the sensitive pressure areas to help you relax and help with insomnia.  
 Impinged nerves can trigger migraines, ensuring that your spine is alined correctly in its natural position it will minimize nerve irritation. It will also help to relieve muscle tension around the neck area.  
 Alpha allows your spine to be alined and it elevates your upper body, unblocking the airways and opening nasal passages so you can breathe easier. Alpha's Dimensions: 60 x 40 x 12 cm. 
 
 Silver binds to essential cell components like DNA to neutralize their harmful effect. The process of minimizing the bacteria helps with eliminating odor, prevents allergies such as skin irritations, pimples, asthma, runny nose, sneezing and more. story:
COMPACT HANGER® raises your clothes higher and creates new space underneath

 

You can use this extra space for boxes, accessories, shoes, T-shirts

 

Your bedroom will be more organized

and you will have space for all the clothes scattered around

 

SAVE TIME. LESS STRESS

Easy to Use

 

 

 

 

We are engineers and we love functional products that solve a problem, but we also love beautiful design. We want to insert Italian design into everyone's homes.

 

 

The hanger has 3 holes both in front and behind. This way you can remove the hook and put it back in the opposite direction 

 

*Due to Covid-19, some shipping routes may be closed or more expensive. Shipping prices may vary slightly.

 

 

Thank you!
