story:
I would like to introduce this new product!

Pick Up Stix®


My name is Darrell Willim, I live in Winnipeg Manitoba, Canada. Approximately 4 yrs ago while installing a toilet hurt my back! I started to think about a better way to do this task. I started with drawings and went to  the local hardware store picked up parts and started to make a prototype.

                                             

                                             

                                            

From this point came up with the current design  and ran down to get the patent process started. I  named the universal tool for lifting toilets Pick Up Stix® and have a registered trademark in the United States as well as Canada. I have product selling in a few wholesalers across Canada:

  • EMCO Corporation
  •  WOLSELEY (in central Canada)
  •  BA Robinson 

  • A few flooring supply companies

My funds are low and have sold mostly by word of mouth. I cannot afford advertising, or trade shows and now I'm faced with a large patent estimate to patent several countries of interest. If I could pay for the patents and was able to afford trade shows, this invention would have an opportunity to grow within 5 different industries around the world:

  • Plumbing and Drainage
  • Flooring and Tiling
  • Construction and DIY's
  • Property Management companies/hotels/office buildings
  • Industrial use by sanitary ceramic manufacturers
With your help I can try to get it in the hands of people who could use it to reduce injuries, product breakage and reduce bio-hazard contact.


The funding requested, will pay for patents in several countries. These funds are urgently required  to have my patent agent draft up and create a solid foundation for my patent to exist. (Cost approx: $35,000 Canadian)

I will have to add another $15,000 (approximately) over next 1-1 1/2 years to patent other countries of interest. A successful campaign will help with patents.

Word of mouth is the best way to advance product awareness. I once heard a vendor say they have been to 28 trade shows last year, I was able to attend one-- it was a success! Except not enough. More funding would help me get to more trade shows. cost $3000- $5000 each. I have missed many opportunities due to low funds.

I still need find a suitable work space and hire a sales team to target wholesalers and retailers in the different industries. Sales will also help with setting up meetings with the decision makers and make the necessary adjustments to meet their requirements ie: insurance, information sharing software, office help and my list goes on. The contributions will only go directly into the development of Pick Up Stix® patent process, and enable me to focus on the many other tasks at hand. 

                          

So if you like the invention as much as I do, you can help with your contribution! I know not everyone can donate funds to this cause. Your help getting the word out to purchase and support through social media would greatly help towards a successful future for Pick Up Stix®. A small idea to help make a task a little easier and reduce injuries associated with toilet installations.

story:
l am Indra from Indonesia, Now l am working as a teacher in primary school in Banten province, Indonesia. Part of my Job l am olso active doing social work(Volunteering) special for education. l was doing volunteer in Lambur Village, Jambi(Indonesia), Bangkok(Thailand) Jiangxi(China) Klodzko(Poland) since 2011 - now l am still this lovely job.

This time l work as volunteer for small kids in Batang Village, Banten Province, Indonesia.

Batang Village is a small remote village in the Province of Banten in Indonesia.

Farming is their means of livelihood where farmers earn an average of 3$ a day.

The community has about 30 students who cramp themselves in a small make shift school made of bamboo poles and teachers are all volunteers.

The money from this Campaigns will use for build education center ( buy the woods, nail and all equipments ).The dream just small and ordinary Learning Center. 

This Campaigns is really means for me because the kids show up their spirit to study even they are have limited equipments and tools.
They are always believe of mirecle.

In this regard, I would like to invite you my friends to extend any help you can show them be it monetary or support. Should you like to visit us for a brief encounter to teach them, we would gladly welcome you.

story:
Short Summary

At Olive Mae Clothing we are a tight knit team led by owner and designer Lacy Gutierrez. Located in Plano, Texas, Olive Mae Clothing was launched in April of 2014. Lacy being a busy working mom with three small children of her own, began with the vision of creating a little girl's dress line that would offer other mom’s an affordable option for traditionally sweet and innocent dress designs made with quality, fun fabrics that could withstand the test of time (and many washings, thank goodness!), at reasonable prices. Lacy knew firsthand how challenging it could be to find quality children’s clothing without spending a fortune! Thus Olive Mae was born.

Olive Mae is asking for a button sewing machine in order to create more beautiful and durable clothing for little girls. We do everything by hand, but imagine sewing three buttons on one dress at a time. As you can imagine, it takes a while! A button machine means we can increase our productivity and continue expanding our business. By donating you are helping us fulfill our dream!

What We Need & What You Get

The funding is going to a top of the line button sewing machine. We want it to be durable and long lasting like our clothes! 

Our perks are extra perky with items like a custom made formal dress for your daughter to a personalized monogram shirt. 

Goals

Olive Mae Clothing started only a year ago! We are a small, but growing company hoping to expand our business. We know that by purchasing a button machine we can increase our productivity and create more jobs!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please visit us on Facebook, or even better share our campaign with others!  

Reviews

https://www.facebook.com/OliveMaeClothing?sk=re...

story:
About the Founder

Founder: Alireza Mrbeig
I'm a mechanical engineer student at CUBoulder. As a sixteen years old in Iran, I logged onto Yahoo Messages's mechanical engineering chat room hoping to find a community of intellectuals with whom I could share my questions and develop my passion. I was disappointed to find discussions that were irrelevant to the subject because users were anonymous. As I studied in Iran, Japan, Portland, and CUBoulder, where I am currently a junior, I refined my vision. I created a platform where like-minded individuals, using their college .edu, can gather online to discuss, problem-solve, debate, and collaborate.
About the President: Geoffrey Janke
I am a recent graduate of Portland State University with a degree in Public Health and a Minor in Civic Leadership. It is my passion to create connections and Simor is the perfect blend of tech. and community. Members of the Simor community find community members with common interests and common goals. Simor supports the student community by facilitating intellectual connections. 

The Concept

Imagine a fusion between Facebook and Wikipedia. For every topic that you search, you can interact with other online users specific to that room. You can discuss, debate and share thoughts with like-minded people. What an interactive and fun twist on Wikipedia this could be!

It’s not a social network but an intellectual network. Not for following celebrities but following professors and researchers. Not for sharing your coffee but for sharing your brilliance.

Stop imagining, we have launched it.

Simor's Future

We are Launching simor.org on August 1st and this money will help Simor to further develop its platform expand to 50 universities across the united states. Join us to bring intellectual connection into existence.
What We Need & What You Get
Simor platform allows the users to cruise an intellectual network over different topics and find people who are interested in the same topics to share thoughts and to follow interesting people.

You can help us to launch the first intellectual networking website in which you won't see a picture of your friends' Starbucks coffee and the latest pop-culture trends. You find the intelligence of people.

The Simor prototype has worked in 5 universities across the United States. During a few weeks, we received hundreds of users who enjoyed using Simor. In order to expand to more colleges and reach Simor’s full potential, we need financial support . We are ready to open Simor to more colleges and universities nation wide. In the future, worldwide.

We have one risk on our path. Simor needs to expand it's network otherwise we won't achieve our goal. We have worked hard to come up with the best strategies for overcoming many obstacles and now it is Simor's time to go viral!

Learn more. Be more. Simor.

Simor Team

story:
Story

What happened so far.

At the beginning of this year we asked you to help us build a wooden geodesic dome (see http://igg.me/at/dome/). With your support and contributions we reached our funding goal (diameter: 5 meter). But, we did not reach the stretch goal for the huge wooden dome with a diameter of 10 meters. However, we were so overwhelmed by your feedback, that we put some money on top of the raised funds and built the huge dome anyway.

We will bring this dome to a lot of nice hacker, maker and cultural events over the next years. It started with Easterhegg15 in Brunswick during Easter. During June and July this year you could see the dome at the art exhibition "Die Neue Sinnlichkeit" in the former prison in Magdeburg. Since a few days the dome is at CCCamp2015 and directly after this camp, the dome will join the POC21 innovation camp in France.
For each event we will upload (and already have) some pictures to Flickr.

If you have any ideas for future events, where you would like to see the dome, please contact us at woodendome@posteo.de.

What's next?

The dome is huge and awesome, but there are still some things missing: e.g. a wooden floor and an interior tent. For the CCCamp it is crucial to have a floor and an appropriate foundation, as there are some rails on the ground and the ground is mostly dirt and grass. An interior tent would be nice to have, as it protects hackers and makers from rain, wind and sun. And it might also be used as a projection area for awesome light installations, e.g. star light projection.

For these upgrades we need your support. First of all, the wooden floor is most important and we need to build it anyway. Therefore we have chosen "flexible funding", since every Euro counts. We will need approximately 2000,- € for the material needed for floor and foundation. Every additional Euro will be put into the interior tent. For the tent we will need an additional amount of approx. 2000,- €.

UPDATE: We found a nice place at the CCCamp, where a floor is not that needed: no rails, no mud, just flat and dry meadow. Additionally, we saw these nice honey comb plates, that are much more suitable for our needs; light weight, easy transportation and storage, easy to install, sustainable, and no need for foundation. The price range for these honey comb plates is almost the same as for the previous intended panel flooring. Therefore, we decided to put the funds into these honey comb plates, and of course into the interior tent.

What You Get (Perks)

The Mate Addict

Drop by at the CCCamp and get a jar (approx. 220ml) of our delicious and self made Mate jam with apple.

Limited Supporter T-Shirt

Chose between "Type A" (straight cut) or "Type B" (fitted cut) and chose your size, e.g. XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL, 3XL. Send us an email at woodendome@posteo.de.

Be famous

We will mill your name or text of choice (e.g. love message, ...) in one of the struts. The size is of course limited to the height and length of the struts, which is 3 cm x 60 cm.

Key to your dome

Get a set of two key ring pendants, with the following texts: "Dome sweet dome" and "My dome is my castle". The texts are on both sides of the keyring pendant.

The colours might vary from these in the picture. If you wish for a special colour combination, just add 5,- and write us an email.

We will bring the key ring pendants to CCCamp and POC21. If you will not join these camps, please add 3,- € for shipping and provide us with your shipping address. Just send an email at woodendome@posteo.de

Geodesic Earrings

Get a pair of 3D printed geodesic earrings (2V). These earrings have a diameter of approximately 1.7 cm. Chose between different materials and colours. All earrings will come with fish hooks.

Colourful

These awesome and colourful geodesic earrings are 3D printed and made of strong and flexible plastic. The following colours are available: black, purple, red, pink, blue, yellow, green, orange. Please chose a colour and write us an email at woodendome@posteo.de.

Steel

3D printed geodesic earrings made of steel. Please chose between stainless steel (left) or bronze steel (right).

Metal

If you like it more classy, then have a look at these 3D printed geodesic earrings made of raw brass (left) and raw bronze (right).

Doctor of Procrastination

Over the last years I have worked as a researcher at the Max Planck Institute in Magdeburg and also tried to write my PhD thesis. However, writing my thesis did not go very fast, since I tend to procrastinate with geodesic structures and working with wood. The wooden dome is kind of a climax of this procrastination, but I finished the structure before Easter this year. During the last month I was therefore able to focus on my thesis ... and I also finished it. \o/

If you want to know what keeps me from building more and better domes, then you can get a personally signed paper version of my dissertation.

Geodesic lamp shade

Pimp your living room with this geodesic lamp shade. Chose between two sizes: 4V with approx. 55 cm in diameter or 2V with approx. 27 cm in diameter. In the pictures below you can see the 4V version. The lamp shade is made from laser cut aluminium.

Rent or buy the Dome

You want this dome for your own party or festival? Why not rent the dome?

You want your very own dome? We will build an identical dome just for you for less than 25.000 €. You need the dome in another size or material? Just ask us and write an email at woodendome@posteo.de.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign and tell your friends, your dog and your grandma.

We are also happy to accept Bitcoins. Please use this wallet: 15VwFKBvQS42914oo5K3TQ7W7sMMfH9wqF and just write us an email at woodendome@posteo.de with the perk you have chosen.

Get a pair of 3D printed geodesic earrings (2V). These earrings have a diameter of approximately 1.7 cm. Chose between different materials and colours. All earrings will come with fish hooks.

Colourful

These awesome and colourful geodesic earrings are 3D printed and made of strong and flexible plastic. The following colours are available: black, purple, red, pink, blue, yellow, green, orange. Please chose a colour and write us an email at woodendome@posteo.de.


Steel

3D printed geodesic earrings made of steel. Please chose between stainless steel (left) or bronze steel (right).



Metal

If you like it more classy, then have a look at these 3D printed geodesic earrings made of raw brass (left) and raw bronze (right).


Doctor of Procrastination

Over the last years I have worked as a researcher at the Max Planck Institute in Magdeburg and also tried to write my PhD thesis. However, writing my thesis did not go very fast, since I tend to procrastinate with geodesic structures and working with wood. The wooden dome is kind of a climax of this procrastination, but I finished the structure before Easter this year. During the last month I was therefore able to focus on my thesis ... and I also finished it. \o/ 



If you want to know what keeps me from building more and better domes, then you can get a personally signed paper version of my dissertation.

Geodesic lamp shade

Pimp your living room with this geodesic lamp shade. Chose between two sizes: 4V with approx. 55 cm in diameter or 2V with approx. 27 cm in diameter. In the pictures below you can see the 4V version. The lamp shade is made from laser cut aluminium.






Rent or buy the Dome

You want this dome for your own party or festival? Why not rent the dome?


You want your very own dome? We will build an identical dome just for you for less than 25.000 €. You need the dome in another size or material? Just ask us and write an email at woodendome@posteo.de.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign and tell your friends, your dog and your grandma.

We are also happy to accept Bitcoins. Please use this wallet: 15VwFKBvQS42914oo5K3TQ7W7sMMfH9wqF and just write us an email at woodendome@posteo.de with the perk you have chosen.

story:
Technology is a big part of life today; it has literally taken over every aspect of modern life. We have developed Vimana using our expertise in networking and machine learning to help you limit screen time and protect you online at home and on the go.

 

Vimana helps: 

  • Create a healthy balance of screen time and digital media use 
  • Better understand your online interests and browsing with the Vimana Intelligent Internet Monitoring
  • Be aware of potential negative online behaviors
  • Secures and protects your family online from cyber threats

 Read more below about our campaign and how we are addressing screen time addiction and an unsafe internet. 

   

 VIMANA HOME DEVICE

Vimana Home is smart device that helps families limit their screen time at home without the need to install software on every device in the house.

 

THE VIMANA SMART DEVICE SPEC

                       

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Vimana Home works at the network level to limit access to sites and content at the router level. You never have to deal with complicated software installs or updates! 

   

      

 

    THE VIMANA MOBILE APP

     

    In the Vimana App, you can set up a profile for each person in your home. 

    In each profile you can manage the settings to help them with the quantity and quality of their internet use. 

    The Vimana Intuitive Rating System identifies the content rating of all websites  

    Similar to the rating system used with movies and video games, websites are also content rated. 

    With Vimana, you can set an age-appropriate content rating of websites that your children can access on the internet so they don't accidentally stumble across inappropriate websites.

    You can set a different content rating level for each child in their profile you create in the Vimana Dashboard Parent app. 

     

    Vimana can filter the internet by keywords & category of websites  

    Identify keywords and categories that you would like to restrict your child from accessing on the internet and their devices.

    If your child attempts to access a website or download an app with one of these keywords (either accidentally or intentionally), you will receive a mobile notification.

     

    Apply digital curfews for internet-free times 

    You can set custom bedtimes for each child so they aren’t up all night messaging and surfing the internet.

    YOU HAVE CONTROL ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

    IN THE VIMANA DASHBOARD PARENT APP 

     

     

    SCHOOL MODE

    Restrict access to educational-rated sites and apps while kids are at school.                

         

        

            

     

    PAUSE THE INTERNET

    Pause the Internet for meal times, family time and bedtime.

    ​

     

    VIMANA INTELLIGENT MONITORING

    UNDERSTAND YOUR KIDS' ONLINE INTERESTS

    Vimana doesn't  just help you control screen time and the websites and apps they use, Vimana's artificial intelligences monitors what categories and types on interests your children interact with online. 

    HOW THE INTELLIGENT MONITORING WORKS

    Vimana’s advanced intelligence learning system monitors the type of internet content your kids view and automatically categorizes the content to help you better understand what your kids are interested in online - like football, gaming and music.

    With more use, the system learns more and becomes more intelligent, being able to give you more details in your parent Dashboard app.

    Vimana recognizes more than 80 categories of online interests. 

     

    VIMANA ALSO MONITORS EMOTIONAL SENTIMENT

    Vimana's patented emotional sentiment analysis technology monitors the emotional context of your kids' online activities, including:  online messaging, comments, types of videos and general text content. 

    Vimana alerts you when your kids' internet activity becomes concerning.  This could be the first indication of cyberbullying or other negative online interactions.

                                

    You can sign up to receive alerts if Vimana detects your kids’ online activity entering the negative rating zone.

    This can be an opportunity for you to start a conversation with your kid, to help them manage the problem and prevent it from escalating.

    • Nurture your kids’ interests.
    • Know what your kids are doing online even when they are not at home.
    • Be more aware of potential negative online activity.

     

    VIMANA DIGITAL SECURITY

    ALWAYS BE SECURED & PROTECTED ONLINE

     

    The Vimana Secure Shield secures your home network & monitors your Internet traffic securely without slowing down your Internet.

    • The 1st line of defense against cyber threats
    • The Vimana Threat Database updates automatically every 2 minutes
    • Automatically protects against attempted intrusions such as malware or phishing
    • Includes ad-blocking technology
    • Works everywhere you go

       

    VIMANA APP SUPPORTED PLATFORMS

         

    Plugin available for Mac and PC computers

     

    SCREEN ADDICTION

    Parents, technologists, researchers, and doctors all agree that we are addicted to technology. Tech companies are hesitant to a make change because their balance sheets depend on selling more devices and hooking more users.  

     

    Todays Screen Time

     

    SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN TODAY!

    We need your support today to help us finish building the technology to bring to life all of these incredible features, and to help your family be safe & protected online.

    Your contributions will help us to complete the programming and app development, as well as go into production with the Vimana Smart Home Device. 

     

    HOW ARE WE DIFFERENT?

    1. Vimana won't slow down your entire network 
    2. Vimana gamifies screen time, get notifications when screen time limits approach
    3. Vimana is compatible with all routers that have one Ethernet port
    4. Vimana tells you your online interests, so you can encourage healthy usage
    5. Vimana Anywhere works on both computers and mobile devices

    Detailed feature comparison: 

    TIMELINE

     

           

     

    VIMANA’S ADVANTAGE

    You don’t have to stay abreast of the latest Internet trends, all you have to do is set the boundaries around the kind and duration of screen time and leave the rest to Vimana so you can go back to focusing on being a parent in the real world!

     

    PROTOTYPE & DESIGN

    We have spent the last two years developing the best possible solution to protect your family online. We are currently at the prototype stage: we have developed the prototype app to control our prototype hardware. We have a "looks like" model ready to go, and have FDM models to prep for manufacturing.  

                                                          

     

     

    RISKS

    We have been developing Vimana for over two years to ensure that when we are ready to introduce Vimana to you we know we will have the best solution available. We are constantly updating our programs with the latest trends and developments in the industry and focus much of our efforts in our programming.

     

    We also are experienced hardware designers and have managed many products through manufacturing to delivery. The only risk we have with hardware is potential product delays or unforeseen shipping and customs delivery delays. We have prepared all of the right certifications ahead to mitigate any of these potential risks.

    THE VIMANA TEAM

     

     

    FAQ

    What devices need a Vimana Anywhere Subscription?

         ✅      Mobile Phones (Vimana Anywhere app)

         ✅      Tablets (Vimana Anywhere app)

         ✅      Laptops (download plug-in)

         ❌       Desktops (Vimana Smart Home Device automatically monitors)

     

    What does Vimana mean?

    Vimana is a Sanskrit term that refers to an intergalactic spaceship that helped ancient civilizations travel between galaxies. We see Vimana as the steward for developing healthy digital habits for our future generations. 

     

     

     

    DETAILED SETUP

          

     

    SHARE VIMANA WITH FAMILY & FRIENDS!

     

             

     

    CAMPAIGN PARTNERS

story:
ILUMEE Ultra Short-Throw LED Projector has the world’s shortest throw rate, giving you 4K ultra high definition image up to mind-blowing 150" huge display. Get a 100” screen from only 4.3 inches away!  

ILUMEE 4K Ultra Short Throw Projector has the ultimate wide-angle lens, letting you place it just 4.3 inches from the wall and filling a screen as large as 100”.

Projecting a movie or giving a presentation, no one will ever need to stand in the beam of projected light and create shadows on the image.

It is extremely easy to install and saves the cost and hassle of a ceiling mount.

ILUMEE projector takes the lead in the industry by boosting the shortest throw rate of 0.2:1, while the standard among competitors ranges from 1.5~1.9:1. It can fill a stunning 70 ~ 150 from a distance of only 1.2” ~ 15”. It can project a screen size up to max. 150 inches.

Brightness or of white light has been overstated in projectors because it alone cannot deliver bright, lifelike colors. CLO is equally important since a comparably low CLO can render the images dull and lifeless with the details hard to see.

ILUMEE brings the vivid, true colors you see everyday to life by ensuring that the color, brightness matches the white light brightness in Lumens.

With a brighter image, you can easily see the well-lit rooms without the need to spend loads on a projector with really high

8.3 million pixels deliver awe-inspiring image quality with crisply defined details and incredible clarity.

ILUMEE can give you up to 20-years-worth of entertainment thanks to a bulb life of more than 30,000 hours.

With the help of High Dynamic Range Imaging Technology, ILUMEE gives you ​improved contrast ratio, brightness, and color depth with rich details in highlights and shadows.

 

, gamma correction, color calibration, and enhanced color gamut coverage, dozens of cutting-edge color processing technologies have been applied in ILUMEE to emit a picture that’s bright, detailed, and color accurate.

 

ILUMEE creates Hi-Fi stereo audio which is as good as 5.1 Surround Sound System, giving you an immersive experience when you enjoy films, games and sporting events.

Better than the blue light exposure from traditional LCD screen which could hurt your eyes, you receive soft, natural and healthy reflected light from ILUMEE which won’t strain your eyes even when binge-watching.

 

ILUMEE is universally compatible with flash drive, hard drive, DVD player, video recorder game station, etc.

In addition to the remote control, ILUMEE can also be manipulated through a built-in touch comes handy in cases when you couldn’t find the remote or it doesn’t work properly.  

ILUMEE features the Android TV operating system to stream services like Netflix,  Hulu or your favorite sites.

 

managed by Yoton Technology, which with subsidiary manufacturing and R&D facilities. Our team aims to create projectors which are different from the current products in the market. To achieve this goal, we assembled a group of experts in the projection field, bringing out different projectors as the major supplier for a lot of brands and we are the exclusive supplier of Polaroid. And this time, we want to launch our own product as a brand which is named 

 

 

A SPECIAL THANKS TO

Risk&Challenge

We at are certain to deliver an amazing product. been in development for over a year as well as garnered the talent of several individuals to craft an accessible and user-friendly performance instrument. Our team has worked very hard on ensuring our supporters that they will receive our project in May 2020. Backers will be notified as soon as delays occur in our development or production. We will work our hardest to reach our milestones and fulfillment in a timely matter. We encourage any backers to reach out to us if they have questions about our development.

story:
Who we are:

We are a dedicated team of designers and business people who have over 35 years of manufacturing and product development internationally.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise enough funds to produce a minimum production run at our manufacturer in China. We also need your feedback and input on evolving the idea and getting it out to the world. We believe there are so many different applications for this product like safety, security and convenience. If you can help and support us then we can offer you one of our first lamps or two!

The Impact

In the future we believe every home and every lamp in it will have this technology.  This will ensure nobody is EVER left in the dark AGAIN.  

Environmentally friendly, reduces strain on the power grid and on your energy bill. Uses 12.5% of the power of a traditional lamp.

Includes lamp base and shade, re-chargeable battery, LED bulb (20 year life), USB and wall connector (specific to your country).

Just plug in and use.

Risks & Challenge

We have already manufactured a small production run and have been testing for 12 months without any failure. The challenge now is to hit the minimum production run of 100 lamps to make it financially viable and to get this design/idea out to as many people as possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think this is a great idea, then please share with a friend:)

The Lamp Tech

  • Power – 5W Max. on High.
  • Equals 25 Watts on Low,  45 Watts High setting, 350 Lumens
  • Source – AC adapter with USB plug
  • Battery – Lithium Battery, 3.7v/3600ma

BURN TIME

  • Low setting = 8 hrs.
  • High setting = 5 hrs.

RECHARGE TIME

  • 6 to 7 hrs.

Lamp Dimensions 

Cylinder  -  Height 10"- Base 5" wide

Candle Stick  -  Height 16" - Base 5" wide - Shade 7" wide and 8" high

Lamp Base and shade are polished steel, nice weight

Time Line

November 2015 - Original Idea is conceived

January 2016 - Team assembled and prototype designed

March 2016 - Prototype created and Chinese production sourced

April 2016 -February 2017- Prototype tested, tweaked and re-tested

February 2017 - Product has been running flawless for the past 12 months

June 2017 - Launching Indiegogo Campaign

October -November 2017- Shipping of Perks

story:
Life's too short for eh meals, or uh oh moments!

Those moments when you've just taken your eyes off the stove to get the doorbell and the milk has boiled over. Or spent hours trying to scrape the burnt muck off the bottom of the pan. All that is a thing of the past. One little knob takes you from 'Uh oh!' to 'Oh Wow!'
Turn the Klove Knob to a perfectly cooked dish. Every. Single. Time.

The voice enabled companion Klove app helps with each step of preparing your meal. The Klove knob monitors heat settings in real time and the app alerts you when needed. Klove keeps you connected, healthy and in control.

Here are some big features we're excited about:

So - Is it a glorified cooking timer? No...

No, Klove Knob isn't a glorified cooking timer. It adds a lot of value to consumers compared either App based timer or Alexa Timer:

  • App timer or Alexa do not have cognitive knowledge as how long it takes for the food to cook. The user has to know the time required or refer a cookbook everytime they cook.
  • App timer or Alexa won't know possible ways to cook the same food, so can't offer options for setting the cooking time. For example, App timer or Alexa won't know that eggs can be hard boiled or soft boiled, or Pasta can be cooked in the pressure cooker or open pan. Hence won't offer user options to set different cooking times.
  • Clear alert and notification: If you have multiple burners cooking at the same time, you won't know which one is ready when the timer goes off.
  • Smart Geo-fencing: If you leave home while you are cooking, because you have a lot on your mind, you will get alerted.
  • App timer or Alexa won't learn the actual cooking time on your cooktop. Hence it cannot personalize the cooking time for you.
  • App timer or Alexa timer cannot set the time automatically as per your recipe. 

 

Here's what's behind all that smart.

 
 
Geofencing feature: Klove app reminds you to switch off the stove when you step out.
 
Trigger App from Knob: Automatically open Klove App when stove knob is turned on. This enables hands free operations rights from the beginning. Just say what you want to cook and Klove app will guide you through the recipe with voice instructions and timer control.

 

Klove Knob and App - Smart Timer
E.g: Klove knows that Pasta can be boiled in an open pot or pressure cooker. Klove then sets the appropriate cooking timer based on that detail of how you cook.

Klove Knob was created out of the passion to bring joy back into the kitchen. There is one thing we're obsessed with: giving smart people smart technology. Our smart kitchen products make cooking easy and joyful. We make great technology simple.

We are a bunch of creative engineers and entrepreneurs leading a smart kitchen revolution. We've cooked up a storm in our labs and in test kitchens to bring you the best, smartest technology. Now we can't wait to get it into your kitchen so you can start experimenting with it.

Sample Production in China

Frequently Asked Questions

We are constantly adding more Klove Knob FAQs to our website here, please check that for the latest information / questions on Klove Knob.

What is a Klove Knob?

Klove knob is the first product from the Klove platform. The world’s first voice-assisted cognitive timer stove knob. Klove knob can be retrofitted to gas and electric stoves. Amazon Echo (Alexa) and Google Home are integrated for better user experience.

What extra equipment will I need to install a Klove Knob?

You need spindle inserts. These come with the Klove knob so that the Knob can be fitted into any stove.

Can I install the Klove Knob myself?

Yes, it's easy to do. Retrofitting steps with illustrations are provided in the Quick Start Guide. The Klove App also has instructions and video about retrofitting the Klove knob.

What changes will I have to make to my stovetop?

You have to make no changes to your stovetop.

How can I see if my order has been confirmed?

If you look under the ‘My Contributions’ tab located under your Indiegogo account then you will see if your order has been accepted and processed.

Do Klove Knobs work with all stovetops?

The Klove Knob can be retrofitted on any stove by simply replacing the existing knob on the stove. 

Different spindle adapters are provided along with the Klove Knob so that it can be fitted on any stove irrespective of the Knob's spindle size.

Are the Klove Knobs BPA free?
Yes. Klove Knobs are made of PC-ABS 5050. The manufacturers have assured us that it's BPA-free and also the toughest plastic used in commercial applications.

Why Order Your Klove Now?
By backing us now you'll get to own one of the very first Klove Knobs off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

What are your Shipping Costs?
Currently our Indiegogo shipping rates are as follows -
We offer free shipping within the United States.
For the rest of the world: USD 8 for Packs of 1 and 2 and for more than 2 units USD 15.

We've tried to keep shipping fees as low as possible for our backers in other countries.  Please note that we cannot control or eliminate any additional government duties, customs, and taxes relating to shipping to your country.  As such, you will be responsible for all duties, customs, and taxes applicable to your country.

What happens if I gave the wrong delivery address?

Once the Klove Knob has been shipped, we cannot change the delivery address. In the event of an order being delivered to an incorrect address, or cannot be delivered at all, we will inform you by email. The courier will hold the package for 5 days, and you may contact our delivery partner to arrange for another delivery. If we do not hear from you within 5 days, the package will be returned to us and you will be responsible for return shipping fee, which will be deducted from your refund of your product’s retail price.

What should I do if have found the Klove Knobs damaged during shipping or wrong items?

All packages are in perfect condition and sealed at the warehouse before they are shipped to you. Please check the packaging box and see if there are any signs of damage, or if the package has been opened during transit. If the box is damaged or items missing when you open the package, please contact our customer care and we will help you troubleshoot the issue.

Is it necessary for me to provide identification when I receive the Klove Knob?

No, it is not necessary. Our partners will deliver the package according to the shipping address. Please make sure your address information is correct.

Do I need to pay import tax/ and or duty for the Klove Knob?

For standard shipping, import duties, taxes and other customs charges will be calculated and collected by the courier upon delivery.

How will the Klove Knob be shipped?

We are partnering with ShipWire, who will provide a fulfillment warehouse and last mile delivery to our end consumers. ShipWire has warehouses located in all the major countries and guaranteed delivery all over the world. We will be shipping the final product from our warehouse in China to ShipWire fulfillment warehouse in US, UK, Australia, Hong Kong.

Can you expedite the shipping for individual backers?

We currently cannot do it but our primary priority is to commence shipping immediately after our funding round ends. During the duration of our funding we will be putting final tweaks in our manufacturing, assembly and quality assurance process and when the final products are ready they will be shipped to our fulfillment warehouse.

Where We Ship?

We are able to ship worldwide.*

Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

*We can not ship to these countries: Andorra, Belarus, New Caledonia, Comoros, Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The Congo, Côte d'Ivoire, Curaçao, Egypt, Faroe Islands, Fiji, French, Polynesia, Greenland, Guernsey, Isle Of Man, Jersey, Kosovo, Lebanon, Liberia, Mozambique, Myanmar, Palestinian Territory, Occupied, Papua New Guinea, Reunion, Russia, Sao Tome And Principe, South Korea, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria , Tunisia , Turkey, Ukraine, Yemen,  Zimbabwe, Aland Islands, Bouvet Island, Burundi, Central African Republic, Cuba, Eritrea, French Guiana, French Southern Territories, Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Heard Island and Mcdonald Islands, Holy See (Vatican City State), Iran, Islamic Republic Of Iraq, Democratic People's Republic Of Korea, Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, Saint Helena, San Marino, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands, Tajikistan, Western Sahara.

When We Start Shipping

We plan to ship the product in December 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 
 *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Acknowledgements: Icons from Flaticon & FreePik
story_txt:
Life's too short for eh meals, or uh oh moments!
Those moments when you've just taken your eyes off the stove to get the doorbell and the milk has boiled over. Or spent hours trying to scrape the burnt muck off the bottom of the pan. All that is a thing of the past. One little knob takes you from 'Uh oh!' to 'Oh Wow!'Turn the Klove Knob to a perfectly cooked dish. Every. Single. Time.



The voice enabled companion Klove app helps with each step of preparing your meal. The Klove knob monitors heat settings in real time and the app alerts you when needed. Klove keeps you connected, healthy and in control.
Here are some big features we're excited about:

So - Is it a glorified cooking timer? No...
No, Klove Knob isn't a glorified cooking timer. It adds a lot of value to consumers compared either App based timer or Alexa Timer:

App timer or Alexa do not have cognitive knowledge as how long it takes for the food to cook. The user has to know the time required or refer a cookbook everytime they cook.
App timer or Alexa won't know possible ways to cook the same food, so can't offer options for setting the cooking time. For example, App timer or Alexa won't know that eggs can be hard boiled or soft boiled, or Pasta can be cooked in the pressure cooker or open pan. Hence won't offer user options to set different cooking times.

Clear alert and notification: If you have multiple burners cooking at the same time, you won't know which one is ready when the timer goes off.

Smart Geo-fencing: If you leave home while you are cooking, because you have a lot on your mind, you will get alerted.
App timer or Alexa won't learn the actual cooking time on your cooktop. Hence it cannot personalize the cooking time for you.
App timer or Alexa timer cannot set the time automatically as per your recipe. 



 


Here's what's behind all that smart.


 

 


Geofencing feature: Klove app reminds you to switch off the stove when you step out.

 


Trigger App from Knob: Automatically open Klove App when stove knob is turned on. This enables hands free operations rights from the beginning. Just say what you want to cook and Klove app will guide you through the recipe with voice instructions and timer control.


 


Klove Knob and App - Smart TimerE.g: Klove knows that Pasta can be boiled in an open pot or pressure cooker. Klove then sets the appropriate cooking timer based on that detail of how you cook.



Klove Knob was created out of the passion to bring joy back into the kitchen. There is one thing we're obsessed with: giving smart people smart technology. Our smart kitchen products make cooking easy and joyful. We make great technology simple.

We are a bunch of creative engineers and entrepreneurs leading a smart kitchen revolution. We've cooked up a storm in our labs and in test kitchens to bring you the best, smartest technology. Now we can't wait to get it into your kitchen so you can start experimenting with it.


Sample Production in China

story:
Purpus was founded in 2015 by Terry Corbett to raise funding for Research, Education and Awareness for Autism, a condition that his young daughter, Riley was diagnosed with and 3.5 million Americans. As an active father, that participates in every aspect of the household—including laundry—it didn’t take long for Terry to realize that a toxic-free detergent was hard to find and that he wasn’t the only one spending $60 per month on many cleaning supplies loaded with dangerous ingredients that he didn’t want around his daughter or his community.

The solution was Very Simple

Simple math: 100 million loads of laundry are done every day in America. If five cents were donated for each load, then almost $5 million per day could be donated to Autism, a condition that affects 1 in 68 children ages 2-17 globally. Now, that's a staggering amount of money, right? And just think, it doesn't require you do anything differently. All your humbly asked to do, is to buy from a brand that's dedicated to helping our kids.

So, Terry rolled up his sleeves and got to work...

He then retained the services of one the worlds leaders in design of Naturally/Green formulated products to develop his detergent using eco-friendly techniques in every aspect of production and packaging.

Made with plant-derived cleaning agents, Purpus is the green formula that really cleans. Our formulas are overwhelmingly effective for removing dirt yet gentle on people, pets, and the planet. Purpus products are also derived from natural resources. We never test on animals and are a socially responsible company that cares about this earth long after we are gone.

People just love our Detergent and here's what they're Saying

 

 

Why you should avoid the Toxic Detergents your presently Using

Conventional laundry products often contain toxic chemicals that can harm you and the environment. While they may make your clothes smell as fresh as a spring morning, conventional laundry-care products contain chemicals with negative health effects ranging from skin and throat irritation to carcinogenicity.

In fact, the laundry room may be one of the more toxic areas in your home. Researchers have found that dryer vents can emit more than 25 volatile organic compounds (VOCs) when scented laundry detergent and dryer sheets are used, including seven VOCs classified as hazardous air pollutants. This is particularly concerning when dryers don’t vent outside or are blocked, causing indoor air pollution.

How we Formulated Purpus to protect your Child and You

We formulate our products using the principle, "Would I use this on my child?" If any ingredient has a questionable risk of causing harm to our loved ones or to the environment, we simply don't use it.

The Best Green Cleaner money can buy! Purpus products, are formulated with the best plant-based ingredients available, they are highly effective but yet designed to be gentle.

Green chemistry is more than leading edge. Purpus is designed to help make you, your child and the planet a safer and better place.

 

Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) is a general term for a group of complex disorders of brain development. These disorders are characterized, in varying degrees, by difficulties in social interaction, verbal and nonverbal communication, and repetitive behaviors. About 1 percent of the world population has autism spectrum disorder. Prevalence in the United States is estimated at 1 in 68 births. More than 3.5 million Americans live with Autism Spectrum Disorder. Autism is the fastest-growing developmental disability. We at Purpus intend to change this.

So we decided fund Autism on 3 Fronts

Oct: Start IndieGogo campaign

Nov: IndieGogo campaign is completed and PURPUS Production begins 

Nov-Dec: PURPUS Production is completed 

December: PURPUS ships to our bi-coastal Amazon fulfillment houses 

January: All IndieGogo rewards delivered just in time for the New Year!

We’re a team of designers, engineers, and operational experts. We at Purpus understands what goes into making this product and our factory does this everyday for some of the most reputable brands in the world. Over the past 2 years our Team has invested a tremendous amount of research in Purpus Green/Plant-based formulations.

From there, we set out to take this science and make a product that could help everyone. After much trial and error, we’ve arrived at a product that people love.

Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver the most Safe, Effective and Sustainable detergent on the market.

 

This is about Hope, Love, Faith and Acceptance. It's about dealing head on with the feeling of Fear, Feeling Overwhelmed, Inadequacy and the Uncertainty all of us have about the future of our Children, our Brothers, our Sisters, our Nieces and Nephews who have been diagnosed with Autism, "ASD."

This about the Love a Mother has for her Child and the love a Father has for his Baby Girl or Baby Boy.

This is about the concern a sibling has for his or her brother or sister who can't quite take care of themselves. Who just needs someone to hold their hand or understand when they're having a Melt Down.

This is also about the concerned Grand Parent who has lived a long and fruitful life whom wishes only the very best for their grandbaby and who just wants to leave this world a better place for them.

But this ultimately is about making the world an easier place for those On the Spectrum and hopefully leaving you feeling Emboldened and Empowered when we know that what we can do together makes a considerable difference.

Because as my wife and I do this for our daughter Riley, we also do this for your Child as well. My hope with PURPUS is to help support Awareness, Education, Research for all Kids and Adults diagnosed with Autism, "ASD."

We Are All One and We Will defeat this Together one bottle at a time.

 I HAVE PURPUS. I hope you do too...

story:
It is said that "necessity is the mother of invention", I believe this wholeheartedly as it was a need that resulted in me inventing the Crisping Wand. While preparing a favourite pasta meal for my daughters, I came up with the idea when I was struggling with a large, stoneware pan that was loaded with pasta, sauce and cheese, under the oven broiling element. The pan was extremely heavy and my back was quite stiff. I became agitated during the final stage of preparation and I asked myself, "why isn't there an appliance I can use like a wand to wave over the cheese and melt it right here on the stove top"?. It was at that point where I stopped in my tracks and quickly went through the appliance sections of local department stores in my mind. I quickly realized, there is nothing on the market that is hand held and performs the same function as the broiling element. For next two months, I kept my idea very quiet, telling only a select few while I researched the world for anything similar to my idea, I then contacted a patent/licensing company to ask for their opinion on my idea. When their response was positive, I embarked on obtaining a patent and the pursuit to bring this idea to fruition.

Your support of my product is greatly appreciated.

story:
Why Soundots?

Soundots Ai-2 is a compact speaker capable of playing high-quality sound in true stereo with a clarity and a bass response like you’ve never heard before. That’s all well and good, but the true power of Soundots lies in its capability of stacking with others of its kind.

If that sounds confusing, think of it like this: you have three Soundots. You can use your three Soundots as three separate Bluetooth speakers. You can also stack those three Soundots together, vertically, horizontally, or both, and they will instantly start playing together. Suddenly you have a soundbar for your TV and a beefy sound system for your party next Saturday.

But how is this possible?, you ask with a confounded look upon your face.

It’s all done with the help of... c o m p u t e r s.

Yep, there’s a built-in artificial intelligence. We made it in-house in Sweden. We then named it aiFi and started rocking. Because that’s exactly what aiFi does. It makes sure that no matter how you stack your Soundots, the sound system optimizes the audio for you.

So, this is basically a game changer?

Yes. If you ask us, we truly think that this is the future for speakers and sound systems.

Woah! 360! Get that VR headset out and let's watch this thing! 

Alright, but just so I get it... Soundots is a portable speaker that stacks with other Soundots?

Yup!

So... How does it compare to other speakers?

Well, that depends! Luckily, we’ve done tests. Many, many tests. One lone Soundots can hold its own against any speaker of the same size. We recommend checking out some of our reviews which you can find below.

The real magic happens when you stack them together, and that’s the fun and much more interesting part. And, just so you know what we’re talking about here, the stacking capability is virtually endless. You could in theory stack 65 000 Soundots together and they would still work and perform, but you would probably have to get a bigger back yard...

Three Soundots is comparable to any trade of the mill soundbar at around $700-800, or a wireless HiFi speaker at around $700. The real difference with Soundots is that your sound system is portable, compact and comes with the capability to split up.

So, you get our point. The sky is the limit. If you have any further questions about this subject, we definitely encourage you to reach out. We’re more than happy to help tailor your dream system for you.

Quality to Expand

Let’s talk price though...

Look, we get it. You’ve seen speakers that cost a fraction of what we’re asking, but here’s the thing:

Quality is important. It really is. The Soundots that you purchase today are going to play for years and years, no matter if you stick to two, three or six for the rest of your life or if you decide to expand down the line.

It would have been easy for us to put our AI in a cheap speaker with bad components and call it a day, but we’re not interested in that. We’re in this for the long run, and that means taking risks.

Ultimately, we’ve spent the last years developing our own dream speaker, and our dream speaker is packed with high-quality components and technologies that serve the listener.

Three Soundots locked horizontally makes for a curved soundbar for your TV. 
 

The Roots

Our founder Fredrik Gunnarsson is the visionary behind Soundots and his passion is to make great sound - and the experiences that goes with it - available to everyone.

Out of this passion, our journey began in Sweden in 2014 when we successfully developed and crowdfunded the first intelligent modular speaker. Now, we're making it even better.

If you backed us back in 2014, we hope that you'll be as excited as we are about the new features. If you are about to take your first step into the Soundots world - welcome aboard this vibrant journey!

Introducing Soundots Ai-2

The Ai-2 is the next step in the Soundots evolution. It follows in the footsteps of its predecessor - the stacking is still king - and while it performs above and beyond on its own, it is of course fully compatible with the Ai-1 (and our upcoming products!). With Soundots, buying a new speaker doesn't mean throwing your old one away. It's all about expanding on what you already have! 

Natural Colors

After figuring out how many Soundots Ai-2 you want, the next step is picking a color. Our award-winning design lean on natural materials and colors. We want your Soundots to look good in any environment. Soundots Ai-2 comes in the new color Matte Black, and of course we're not letting go of the tried and tested Industrial Gray.

 

Main Features and Improvements

  • Two USB-C connections allow for more efficient charging. This also opens up for a greater range of external connections! Connect to wifi, Alexa, Chromecast etc. with ease.
     
  • Fiber-armed plastic chassis for increased durability and sustainability. Feel comfortable carrying it in a backpack: it can take a punch! Soundots was made to be used. 
     
  • Improved locking-mechanism. We developed a new and improved magnetic system for locking your Soundots side-by-side to each other. 
     
  • A wider range of RGB lighting options makes the sound system come to life with expression. Let your system light up the party or shut the lights off for movie night!
     
  • Improved touch-panel, now located on top of the speaker for easy access. Everything can also be controlled via the Soundots app (available for iOS and Android).
     
  • Integrated Bluetooth 5.0 technology for even faster and more stable Bluetooth connectivity. 
     
  • A substantial update to the main processor with four times the capacity of that in the Ai-1.

     

Words From Our Reviewers.

We also encourage you to read about us over at these publications:

How Does Soundots Stack Up?

Below, you can read more about the power that you gain from stacking Soundots together. Note that the raw equivalent power expands exponentially as you stack more and more.

 

Technical Stuff

Interested in the details of one Soundots Ai-2? Awesome! We hope this tables will satisfy your curiosity regarding the inner workings of Soundots. If not, don't hesitate to contact us! We'll happily answer any questions you might have.

The Prototype

Soundots Ai-2 is currently under development. Below, you can catch a peak at the first prototype, spray-painted black so that we could at least get a feel for what the matte black is going to look like when it's blasting some tunes for us later this year. 

 

Prototype movie from Soundots on Vimeo.

 

Can't wait? Need Soundots right now?

We know the feeling. Visit www.soundots.com to claim your Soundots Ai-1 while you wait for the Soundots Ai-2. They will sound just as great together!

 

Risks & Challenges

In 2015 we successfully ran and fulfilled an Indiegogo campaign. That's how we funded our first generation of Soundots (it was called AiFi at the time). We are familiar with the challenges and risks that come with a crowdfunding campaign and we are not starting from scratch. Ever since the launch of the Ai-1, we have been working on improving the Soundots formula, along with the associated hardware, applications and technology. Our team is made up of some of the brightest minds in the industry and we have confidence that we will deliver beyond your expectations.

However, we do ask for your understanding regarding the possibility of delays. It's not uncommon that something unforeseen happens that will compromise the quality of the final product unless carefully handled. We will not release the Ai-2 before we are absolutely happy with it.
story_txt:
Why Soundots?
Soundots Ai-2 is a compact speaker capable of playing high-quality sound in true stereo with a clarity and a bass response like you’ve never heard before. That’s all well and good, but the true power of Soundots lies in its capability of stacking with others of its kind.

If that sounds confusing, think of it like this: you have three Soundots. You can use your three Soundots as three separate Bluetooth speakers. You can also stack those three Soundots together, vertically, horizontally, or both, and they will instantly start playing together. Suddenly you have a soundbar for your TV and a beefy sound system for your party next Saturday.
But how is this possible?, you ask with a confounded look upon your face.
It’s all done with the help of... c o m p u t e r s.
Yep, there’s a built-in artificial intelligence. We made it in-house in Sweden. We then named it aiFi and started rocking. Because that’s exactly what aiFi does. It makes sure that no matter how you stack your Soundots, the sound system optimizes the audio for you.
So, this is basically a game changer?
Yes. If you ask us, we truly think that this is the future for speakers and sound systems.


Woah! 360! Get that VR headset out and let's watch this thing! 
Alright, but just so I get it... Soundots is a portable speaker that stacks with other Soundots?
Yup!
So... How does it compare to other speakers?
Well, that depends! Luckily, we’ve done tests. Many, many tests. One lone Soundots can hold its own against any speaker of the same size. We recommend checking out some of our reviews which you can find below.
The real magic happens when you stack them together, and that’s the fun and much more interesting part. And, just so you know what we’re talking about here, the stacking capability is virtually endless. You could in theory stack 65 000 Soundots together and they would still work and perform, but you would probably have to get a bigger back yard...

Three Soundots is comparable to any trade of the mill soundbar at around $700-800, or a wireless HiFi speaker at around $700. The real difference with Soundots is that your sound system is portable, compact and comes with the capability to split up.

So, you get our point. The sky is the limit. If you have any further questions about this subject, we definitely encourage you to reach out. We’re more than happy to help tailor your dream system for you.
Quality to Expand
Let’s talk price though...
Look, we get it. You’ve seen speakers that cost a fraction of what we’re asking, but here’s the thing:
Quality is important. It really is. The Soundots that you purchase today are going to play for years and years, no matter if you stick to two, three or six for the rest of your life or if you decide to expand down the line.
It would have been easy for us to put our AI in a cheap speaker with bad components and call it a day, but we’re not interested in that. We’re in this for the long run, and that means taking risks.
Ultimately, we’ve spent the last years developing our own dream speaker, and our dream speaker is packed with high-quality components and technologies that serve the listener.



Three Soundots locked horizontally makes for a curved soundbar for your TV. 
 

The Roots
Our founder Fredrik Gunnarsson is the visionary behind Soundots and his passion is to make great sound - and the experiences that goes with it - available to everyone.
Out of this passion, our journey began in Sweden in 2014 when we successfully developed and crowdfunded the first intelligent modular speaker. Now, we're making it even better.
If you backed us back in 2014, we hope that you'll be as excited as we are about the new features. If you are about to take your first step into the Soundots world - welcome aboard this vibrant journey!
Introducing Soundots Ai-2
The Ai-2 is the next step in the Soundots evolution. It follows in the footsteps of its predecessor - the stacking is still king - and while it performs above and beyond on its own, it is of course fully compatible with the Ai-1 (and our upcoming products!). With Soundots, buying a new speaker doesn't mean throwing your old one away. It's all about expanding on what you already have! 
Natural Colors
After figuring out how many Soundots Ai-2 you want, the next step is picking a color. Our award-winning design lean on natural materials and colors. We want your Soundots to look good in any environment. Soundots Ai-2 comes in the new color Matte Black, and of course we're not letting go of the tried and tested Industrial Gray.

 
Main Features and Improvements


Two USB-C connections allow for more efficient charging. This also opens up for a greater range of external connections! Connect to wifi, Alexa, Chromecast etc. with ease. 

Fiber-armed plastic chassis for increased durability and sustainability. Feel comfortable carrying it in a backpack: it can take a punch! Soundots was made to be used.  

Improved locking-mechanism. We developed a new and improved magnetic system for locking your Soundots side-by-side to each other.  

A wider range of RGB lighting options makes the sound system come to life with expression. Let your system light up the party or shut the lights off for movie night! 

Improved touch-panel, now located on top of the speaker for easy access. Everything can also be controlled via the Soundots app (available for iOS and Android). 

Integrated Bluetooth 5.0 technology for even faster and more stable Bluetooth connectivity.  

A substantial update to the main processor with four times the capacity of that in the Ai-1. 

Words From Our Reviewers.

We also encourage you to read about us over at these publications:

How Does Soundots Stack Up?
Below, you can read more about the power that you gain from stacking Soundots together. Note that the raw equivalent power expands exponentially as you stack more and more.
 

Technical Stuff
Interested in the details of one Soundots Ai-2? Awesome! We hope this tables will satisfy your curiosity regarding the inner workings of Soundots. If not, don't hesitate to contact us! We'll happily answer any questions you might have.

The Prototype
Soundots Ai-2 is currently under development. Below, you can catch a peak at the first prototype, spray-painted black so that we could at least get a feel for what the matte black is going to look like when it's blasting some tunes for us later this year.

Can't wait? Need Soundots right now?
We know the feeling. Visit www.soundots.com to claim your Soundots Ai-1 while you wait for the Soundots Ai-2. They will sound just as great together!


 
Risks & Challenges
In 2015 we successfully ran and fulfilled an Indiegogo campaign. That's how we funded our first generation of Soundots (it was called AiFi at the time). We are familiar with the challenges and risks that come with a crowdfunding campaign and we are not starting from scratch. Ever since the launch of the Ai-1, we have been working on improving the Soundots formula, along with the associated hardware, applications and technology. Our team is made up of some of the brightest minds in the industry and we have confidence that we will deliver beyond your expectations.
However, we do ask for your understanding regarding the possibility of delays. It's not uncommon that something unforeseen happens that will compromise the quality of the final product unless carefully handled. We will not release the Ai-2 before we are absolutely happy with it.

story:
Chef’s Collection was born to redefine what premium cutlery should be about: high-quality materials, extreme performance, elegant design, and durability, at an incredible price.

 

Premium Damascus Steel Knives

Damascus steel has been the ultimate reference in cutlery for centuries. It was originally used in the manufacturing of ancient swords and is widely known for its superior quality, hardness, and long-lasting keen edge.

We are now launching our Damascus Steel Collection on Indiegogo. Each knife of this collection has been designed to deliver the best in class experience to customers, by utilizing high-quality materials and meticulously handcrafting each knife to achieve the perfect balance of performance, precision, durability, and elegance. 

 

 

The blades of this collection are forged with 67 layers of premium VG10 Damascus steel and vacuum seal heated creating an extremely sharp, durable, and shining blade.

The knives are designed with full tang handles for maximum durability and finished with premium Rosewood.

This collection is an expression of art that will excite cooking enthusiasts around the world. We are proud and passionate about the products we are developing and have no doubt that you will fall in love with them as well.

​Join us, and help bring Chef’s Collection to life. 

www.chefscollection.co

 

 

Choose your perk

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have already manufactured and delivered the knives to dozens of customers. The feedback has been incredible!!! The knives are handcrafted masterpieces. Each knife has been meticulously manufactured to achieve extreme sharpness, perfect balance, incredible performance, and lasting durability. 

We are shipping new orders in 7 to 10 days. 

 

Buy with confidence! 100% money-back guarantee! If you are not satisfied, we will refund your perk. No questions asked.

 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk is a possible delay in shipping due to high volume seasonality.  Every order will be fullfileed.

story:
Save a bunch of time in a distressed situation

  • 3 beers - 9 min.
  • 6 beers - 12 min. 
  • Wine - 11 min.
  • Ice Cubes - 30 min.  

 

CHILL YOUR DRINKS EASILY

  1. Insert your warm beverages into the InnoChiller.
     
  2. Throw the InnoChiller in your feezer and turn it on
     
  3. Wait approx. 10 min. 
     
  4. Drink your beers or whatever you have cooled down!

 

                                                      Choose from the 4 pre-installed programs
 

                                     Put it in any freezer for 10 min. or fridge for 20 min. 

 

Shipment has started! 12th, May 2020

 

 

 

 

 

 

Warm drinks are just the worst. 

Once we’ve opened up a warm one, we all regret it, wasting what could have been an ice-cold refreshment and knowing that it’s not the same, but none of us have the time to sit and wait up to 50 minutes for our drinks to get cooler in the freezer or even 2 hours in the fridge without InnoChiller!

You can put your drinks into the freezer, but you’ll still be waiting at least 50 minutes. With the InnoChiller, be the saviour of the party by cooling drinks to the perfect temperature in under 10 minutes. 

 

 

So versatile

Cool down anything you wish in the InnoChiller

 

 

Not only is InnoChiller great for drinks, but it can also speed up the freezing process of ice cubes and fast freezing of meats to preserve the flavors.

 

 

Don’t Worry About Over-freezing Your Drinks Into An Icy State. 

With the alarm and & timer functions, you’ll hear when your drinks are ready to... Drink! Choose from 4 pre-installed programs that suit the drink you want cooling.

When the program has finished the InnoChiller will sound an alarm to let you know it's done and it will, of course, stop the fan so the cooling process is slowed down. 

Each program has been timed according to the experiences we have had by testing the InnoChiller over and over again..... hic!

 

 

 

 

 

The InnoChiller works by blowing cold air over your warm beverages, utilizing the effect from wind-chill. 

The InnoChiller uses forced convection (the process of energy exchanged through air or liquids) to create the chill effect. The InnoChiller helps the speeding up of the energy exchange by increasing the airflow around the beverage and thereby improving the convection.

 

 

The temperature conversion takes place in 3 steps:

  1. Convection from the cold freezer air through the boundary layer of air on the can
     
  2. Conduction through the solid aluminum can that contains the beer
     
  3. Convection from the aluminum through the beer on the inside of the aluminum can.

This chilling effect is exactly the same thing you feel when you step outside on a cold day with high winds - it feels much colder than it actually is.

 

We encourage you to test your own perfect timing as the results can vary depending on these 4 factors which can change how the performance of InnoChiller is perceived:

The temperature inside the freezer.

Freezer size.

Goods already stored in the freezer.

Beverage temp. preference.

No matter what, you will always cool down your drinks much faster regardless of what freezer you have available. And remember, you can also use the InnoChiller in your fridge, just run the program twice. 

 

 

 

No. We get asked this urban legend a lot.

The cold air inside a freezer can't contain as much water, and will soon be saturated with the maximum amount of water vapor after a brief cooling down period. This prevents the wet towel from evaporating. The evaporation depends on humidity of air, and the humidity of air in a freezer largely depends on condensation on the surface of the cooling elements, and thereby defeats the whole purpose wrapping a wet towel around your bottle. 

By adding a wet towel to your bottle you actually insulate the bottle with one more layer of resistance, if the water can't evaporate. 

This means the heat transfer now need to go through 5 steps instead of only 3:

  1. Convection from the cold freezer air through the boundary layer of air on the wet towel.
     
  2. Conduction through the wet paper towel.
     
  3. Convection through the water between the towel and the bottle.
     
  4. Conduction through the solid glass bottle that contains the wine.
     
  5. Convection from the bottle through the wine on the inside of the bottle

                    Temperature measured from the center of the liquid inside the bottle

 

Confused? Don't be! The InnoChiller is incredibly efficient, it even outperforms a bucket of ice and water in many cases. 

 

 

The specially designed fan ensures a high airflow across the products you wish to cool down. The fan has also been designed to overcome various kinds of resistance inside the InnoChiller, this means you can pretty much fill up the whole InnoChiller with beverages and the fan will still be able to squeeze air past your drinks. 

 

We have chosen a 21700 type cell which is capable of delivering 4000 mAh. This makes it possible to run the InnoChiller for 45 min. inside the freezer. Did you know - The next generation of Tesla cars will have battery packages based on this type of cell and it is widely known as a high capacity and highly reliable Li-Ion cell. Cool right?

After the battery has discharged completely you can still use the InnoChiller, simply connect the charger and flat-cord USB cable through the door on your freezer and continue to cool down beers for your thirsty guests all night. 

 

To make it easy and quick to use the InnoChiller we have made a visual interface with a 1.3" 128x64 pixels OLED display which makes it very easy to select a program. The reason for choosing an OLED screen is because of its good performance at low temperatures. 

 

 

 

 

*The InnoChiller has been made so it fits in almost every home freezer. Whether it’s a large kitchen freezer or small European door-freezer. We’ve made it as small as possible while making sure it’s versatile, ensuring it can hold up to 6 beers/soft drinks and a lot of other beverages. 

 

 

Don't have a freezer? You can use InnoChiller in the fridge. Simply run the program twice - easy!

 

 

 

In each package you will find:

One InnoChiller.

Ice Cube tray with lid.

Charger (with your country's socket).

2m flat-cord USB cable.

Manual.

 

Choose from these two colors:

 

 

 

In the first quarter of 2019 we received the very first prototypes from the factory in China and we were thrilled to see the result and we soon after ordered the first test batch. 

This test batch was shipped to us in June and it also proved to exceed our expectations, so we feel very confident that all design hurdles, logistics, supplies etc, is completely set and ready to scale up. 

At the moment we are producing the first large scale batch which will be delivered to our backers in January. 

 

Production August 2019

Below are some photos from the production start-up in August 2019, we will continue to add updates production progress. 

 

Photos of the first plastic components

The photos from the completed components will be added to this section here. Later we will also add photos from the assembly line and finally pictures of the actual fulfillment process. 

Make sure to follow the updates for instant notification on the progress. 

        Meeting with packaging supplier

      Completed Main Compartments

    Ice Cube Trays

 

InnoChiller founders

Mads and Jesper

We are both engineers and 31 years old. We started InnoChiller in 2016 after a few months of initial testing. 

The idea for the InnoChiller came to be on a normal Tuesday evening where we were drinking a decent amount of beers until it happened - we had no more cold beers left. 

Of course we panicked and quickly threw some beers into the freezer and waited for them to get cold. We waited for some 50 min. before we felt the beers was cold enough to drink, and in that time we discussed ways of cooling down faster than the freezer could do it. 

We looked for ice cubes but we had used the rest on making Mojitos the day before... so we tried to put wet paper towel around the beers and then throw them in the freezer, but still no improved result. 

Jesper was working with industrial refrigeration design at the time and he suggested we could use the same technique as they use in big slaughterhouses to quick cooling the meat, simply blow cold air over the beers and see what happens. 

It worked! And we started developing a solution that could run on battery inside the cold environment of a freezer. This idea also gave us a good excuse to get together and "test" the InnoChiller frequently, and the rest is history. 

Cheers!
