story:
To our contributors,

First and foremost we thank you for clicking on our campaign, we would like to introduce ourselves David Moore, and Dino Jakupovic. Founders and C0-CEO'S of Cut-Today co.

Our patent division is dedicated to providing our consumer with the most effective, yet practical and beneficial products. This is one of many patents that we have, and was the brainchild of our own personal struggles with shaving. 

Being busy professionals, and also bald.. We found it imperative to use products that are more effective, streamlined, and efficient, yet the very thing we use the most every day we find to be cumbersome. 

We researched and scoured other potential suitors but they were invested in adding more components instead of fixing the actual nuances of the razor. So we did our own market research and gathered a substantial amount of evidence and confidence to patent the GR4.

We saw what was being offered on the market and no matter what "new" shaving razor was presented, it still did not solve the most common problems:

Convenience: For gel usage in travel and function allowing both the razor and gel to  get through security checkpoints with no hassles.

Clogging: This is by far the most common issue regardless of foam or gel, multiple blades or one, electric or wet shave

What We Need & What You Get

We need our goal of 750,000 USD for:

  • Three prototypes
  • Development Progress App Design
  • Marketing
  • Mass Production
  • Licensing and Distribution
Our perks: 
  1. 10$-Founders appreciation on website and App
  2. 20$-Lifetime coupon 10% off of purchase, founder's appreciation and App
  3. 50$-First razors produced, and all perks above
  4. 100$-1 razor a month for lifetime, and all perks above
  5. 1,000$-Be featured on our first commercials
If we do not reach our goal:
We will allocate whatever the funds we receive into the most important parts of the process, first being the Three prototypes.

The Impact

If the funding is successful and the execution of the razor we want to bring our other patents to market, and help people with good ideas reach their goals by volunteering out time to teach them basic business principles. 

We strongly believe that every persons dream can come if given the right light, knowledge. and direction. We want to be the support and spark-plug to further push innovation and inventions in America. 

Risks & Challenges

Of course with any business venture there are always risks involved. We purposely chose to exclude the exact mechanism of the razor in the video, in order to protect our idea until launch. Although our patent includes both the gel dispenser and the shutter system we are well aware of the loopholes companies can find in order to take an idea and make it theirs. Bringing this to market will be a challenge, but we are confident in our team who is motivated, passionate, and educated to bring the product to light. 

But most importantly we are also confident in the generosity of people, we understand as a small business getting the capital to invest in an idea can be challenging, and sometimes even defeating. That is why our most valued component is YOU, the consumer. Our promise to you is that we will do everything in our capacity to make this dream of ours a reality, and to one day return the favor unto others. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the means to contribute, but you can be our biggest asset by spreading the word to your friends, family, and loved ones. Help us turn the GR4 into a reality!

We again want to extend our deepest gratitude for any amount given, and any one who shares. 

-Dino Jakupovic

-David Moore

CUT-TODAY CO.
story_txt:
To our contributors,
First and foremost we thank you for clicking on our campaign, we would like to introduce ourselves David Moore, and Dino Jakupovic. Founders and C0-CEO'S of Cut-Today co. Our patent division is dedicated to providing our consumer with the most effective, yet practical and beneficial products. This is one of many patents that we have, and was the brainchild of our own personal struggles with shaving. 
Being busy professionals, and also bald.. We found it imperative to use products that are more effective, streamlined, and efficient, yet the very thing we use the most every day we find to be cumbersome. 
We researched and scoured other potential suitors but they were invested in adding more components instead of fixing the actual nuances of the razor. So we did our own market research and gathered a substantial amount of evidence and confidence to patent the GR4.
We saw what was being offered on the market and no matter what "new" shaving razor was presented, it still did not solve the most common problems:

story:
What is it?

LAMP Diagnostics (formerly The Pussy Protector) is a hand-held device that can be used as a screening tool for bacteria and viruses. It amplifies target DNA to tell you if a particular organism is present in your sample. It's small, easy to use, and gives rapid results. 

LAMP Diagnostics is versatile - it can screen for any living thing that you nominate, by adding primers for that organism. This cutting-edge technology has endless uses, and we envision applications for it in laboratories, hacker spaces, and educational facilities. Better yet, we believe we can make it for a fraction of the cost of traditional DNA amplification technologies whilst still ensuring reliable and precise diagnostics. 

We believe that the ability to carry out rapid, point-of-care DNA testing is the next big thing in medicine - it has numerous applications both here and in the developing world. For example this device could be used to screen for STIs, or to detect MRSA in hospitals. It could also be used to check for malaria in places where genomic medicine has been traditionally difficult to access. And the applications aren't just health-related - LAMP Diagnostics could be used for a whole world of environmental samples. Testing for water contamination or agricultural pathogens are just a few examples of how this technology could be applied.

We don't love disease, but we do love LAMP! 

Using Loop-mediated isothermal AMPlification (LAMP) to amplify DNA from a sample, LAMP Diagnostics is able to detect the presence of target organism(s). All you need are the right primers - a set of six short segments of DNA specific to the organism you're looking for - and you're ready to go!

Your sample, these primers, and a mixture containing all the other necessities for the reaction are loaded into the entry ports and mix together as they travel through the lanes and into the wells where the LAMP reactions take place. If your target organism is present, the reaction will amplify a section of its DNA over and over again (here's a really cool video that shows you how this part happens). As this happening, a fluorescent dye is being woven into that section of the DNA. This means that the more of your organism is present, the more fluorescence is produced. This is what we measure to give you a positive or nagative reading on the LED display screen.

The Nitty Gritty

Our prototype uses a 3D-printed, resin-moulded microfluidic cartridge that takes in up to four samples. At this stage of the design, samples and reagents are loaded via syringe. We hope to eventually modify this to produce cartridges that are pre-loaded with the freeze-dried LAMP reagents, for even simpler use. These cartridges are single-use only, and replacement cartridges will be made available for a very low cost (current estimate is under $10). 

Once injected into the entry ports, each sample will mix with the reagents as they travel through the carefully-designed microfluidic channels to a set of reaction chambers. LAMP is carried out in quadruplicate for each sample lane. 

Like we said above, LAMP is an isothermal reaction. This means that unlike standard PCR (which cycles through three temperatures to amplify DNA), the entire amplification reaction is carried out at the same temperature. Even better, the protocol is extremely robust, as the polymerase is active over a range of ~10 degrees Centigrade. The protocol is also better equipped to deal with complex raw samples (e.g. blood and urine) that typically inhibit PCR amplification. More details on how awesome LAMP is can be found in this paper. 

Our device uses indium-titanium oxide (ITO) glass to evenly heat all 16 reaction wells. As target DNA is amplified, a fluorescent dye (SYBR Green) is intercalated into the molecule, and is excited by a series of LEDs.The fluorescence emitted by the dye is read by an array of 16 phototransistors, which average the data for each sample lane and display a positive or negative reading on an OLED screen on top of the device. To give credit where it's due, our inspiration came from an open-source genomic diagnostic system published by Myers et al. 

Once we have a good prototype up and running, we'll be able to tell you more exact details about sensitivity and specificity. For now we can tell you that research has proven LAMP to be a robust, sensitive, and superior to traditional PCR and qPCR techniques. 

Hang on a second, hasn't this description changed?

Yes. We began this campaign at Hackagong 2015, aiming to make a cheap, handheld device for rapid DNA amplification. Hackagong is all about solving a specific problem, and we thought that a great first use for our device could be at-home screening for STIs and UTIs. Since our idea's conception in a manic 30 hour competition, we've done some more research and learnt that it is actually not legal to produce a device that can screen for infectious diseases at home. This is something that must be done through a health professional (I know, we're really annoyed about that too). 

Whilst we are going to continue working on the original idea of creating a rapid screening device for STIs and UTIs, we want to ensure that all our donors know it's something that we would only be allowed to produce for healthcare professionals or overseas export. Funding raised in this campaign is still going towards making this a reality, we just decided to emphasise the device in and of itself at the forefront of our campaign once our initial idea of at-home testing proved unviable in Australia. 

Who are we?

Biofoundry is Australia's first community laboratory for citizen scientists. Our mission is to democratise science by breaking cost entry barrier to science education and research.

story:
Hi, my name is Tracy Kean and I am the owner of T L Kean Co. a small manufacture and distribution company based in Northern California. Over the last few years I have been developing Pro Polish White TM, The Fast Easy Way for Whiter Brighter Teeth.

      Money has been a hurdle, with patent costs and laboratory costs just a few of the expenses.  Like I said we are a small company and that is why I need your help, getting the funding for the first out-sourced manufacturing run, we are looking for $10,000.00 to cover a small batch run, start up and marketing costs for on-line shopping sites and website, and build our brand name. 

           


           YOUR SMILE SAYS A LOT ABOUT YOU, 

          Everyone wants a cleaner, whiter, brighter smile right but

                

                IF YOU LOVE COFFEE – USE TOBACCO – DRINK

                                           WINE OR SODA?

             THEN YOUR TEETH ARE STAINED!


   *REGULAR TOOTHPASTE LEAVES BEHIND RESIDUES THAT DULL AND  DISCOLOR YOUR TEETH AND DENTAL WORK.*

                               

                             

                                 
                   ARE YOUR TEETH WHITE OR COULD THEY BE WHITER?
                      Remove the Gray even Bleaching won't remove gray

Pro Polish White TM combines the easy of toothpaste with the stain removing power of bleaching treatments, the gentle: 7.5 pH balance formula works with out bleach, fluoride, or harsh levels of abrasives. 
          

                                    

                           Clean and polish in one easy step.

     

The magic Pro Polish White TM instantly hydrates the top layer stain, removing up to 3 shades with the first use, with a full deep cleaning in just 12 days with normal brushing.  Keep that beautiful smile, brush with  Pro Polish White TM two times a month to remove new stains and maintain that great high polish shine everyone loves.

______________________________________________________________________________

Baylor University’s New Product Evaluation Report found: Pro Polish White TM to be “Superior – a noticeable improvement” to all other products or procedures currently available on the market.

 

Read more about my story on Invention stories Tales from the Inventor:

http://inventionstories.com/


                                    


                           Restore to original color


Pro Polish White TM is the Ultimate Stain Remover:  Get whiter brighter smoother teeth in just 1 minute.  Use Pro Polish White TM Share Pro Polish White.

100% of users reported no sensitivity during or after use. 

Perfect for a Men and Woman. 

Patent Pending 

**Independently laboratory testing. 


Manufacturing:

The Manufacture is ready to go with the prototype complete, so we expect to able to fill your order in 3 months once the campaign ends. With your support/pledge we can give back to the community that has been so kind to us by expanding the business and hiring new workers. 

.

The look of the product: 

A lot of time has gone into the type of packaging due to the size and our desire to convey how special it is.  We have come up with a convenient single package that is easy to handle for all sizes of hands approximately 1 inch wide and 2 inches long, stand up cap, in a HDPE 5 layer co extruded tube to ensuring self-life. 

Labeling:  custom color pearl matte (light purple/gray) Silk Screen: Up to 3 colors. When you run your fingers over the art on the tube it is raised up and will always remain glossy, even on a matte finish tube.  

The Label:  Front:

PRO POLISH WHITE TM

BLEACH FREE, FLUORIDE FREE, LOW ABRASIVENESS

The Ultimate Stain Remover:  Get Whiter Brighter Smoother Teeth in just 1 minute

    MINT  15ML 

Back:

Directions:  apply 1 ml of PPW to a toothbrush or cleaning devise, brush teeth thoroughly but gently on all exposed surfaces for 1 to 2 minutes rinse, use once a day for 12 day, to reveal your natural tooth color or original color of bridges or crowns.  Use 2 to 4 time a month to maintain. 

PRO POLISH WHITE TM is cosmetic supplement to your regular oral hygiene routine. 

Warning:  Keep out of reach of children, Not recommended for consumers under 16 or pregnant or nursing mothers. Consult, with your doctor if any medical conditions exist before using any dental cleaning process.  Do not swallow

story:
Staff and Development journey:

The leader of this project is Hadi Salame, a computer science student. Hadi is working on 3D-Printers to provide an exceptional experience in the 3D-Printing technology. This version of H3D is not going to be last version of Hadi's improvement since he has put plans to introduce cutting-edge technology in the 3D-Printing in the near future.

H3D features:

Very high 3D-Printing quality:

Future upgrades:

After few months of releasing H3D

1-  There will be a very simple kit  with an affordable price that you can install to your H3D Printer that adds a new feature to your 3D-Printer which is RESUMING AFTER COMPELLING POWER OFF. After this feature you will not suffer from power cutting off .(Free for backers)

2- The printing space will be increased.(Special offer for backers)

3- Another simple kit will be released to enclose your 3D-Printer, which will contain a filter and will be easy to install when you want to print with ABS or any other materials that need enclosure and easy to remove when you want to print with PLA .(Special offer for backers)

4- The most important thing for all 3D-Printing amateurs is printing with multi-colors at once, so we will release later a Multi-Material kit .(Special offer for backers)

Special Perks:

Be an early bird!

Contributing in this project will grant you a free filament, some tools and a special backers' warranty with the following details:

An extra free PEI sheet

A 365 days  free warranty ONLY FOR BACKERS!, while this offer will be paid later.

The only things we will not be able to cover are shipping, consumable parts or parts that become damaged by misuse or unusual force.

Successful Experience:

This version of H3D was presented in the famous international fair "Maker Faire" and has noticeably attracted many experts who were astonished by the printing quality and inquired on how to order it.

The impact of your contribution:

Succeeding in this project and realizing the target will definitely help H3D making this technology affordable for everyone.

What to do with the money?

Your contribution helps a lot because the target of this project is only $100,000 USD. Our plan details.

Cannot contribute?

You can still help us!

If you feel enthusiastic about this project you can still take part by spreading the word online. Do not forget to share this campaign on social media using Indiegogo's share tools.

Contact us:

If you want other than English language or if you  have any question please feel free to contact us any time :

h3d2018@gmail.com

Instagram: @h3d_printers

story:
Preferisci in italiano? Vai a fondo pagina! 

Soundpotai is a revolutionary Bluetooth® soundbox, like you haven't seen nor heard before: an innovative sound experience. It is realized in extra-resistant multi-layer cardboard, so resistant that you can seat on it! The HI-FI technology inside, together with its special shape and the material itself are able to replicate the same sound principle of acoustic musical instruments. Exactly! Thanks to its vibrations Soundpotai spreads in the air a clean and natural sound as the soundbox of a guitar does. The great thing is that in your room you will hear a diffused and full sound without guessing its origin, even if you will be sitting on it. You can use it as a design object, a real home decor item that will enhance your indoor.

No more dinners with friends who are far from the speaker and cannot hear the music. Now the music will be all around you: literally an enveloping sound experience.



Soundpotai is a design soundbox in the shape of a cube available in two different sizes:
Large 40x40x40 (cm) and Medium 33x33x33 (cm).

Pay attention the medium size can be used as a seat but is less comfortable for a normal height adult and has a less maximum weight capacity. It has been conceived as a kids’ seat.

Take a look at the available patterns before choosing your Soundpotai:
 


 



 

 




 


 


Bohemian Rhapsody or Space Oddity? With Soundpotai the rhythm of the music will add style to your life by coming to life in a simple and functional home decor item that will amaze you. From now on you’ll want to hear every sound through Soundpotai.



 


 


 

 





 



Actually, it is not an Hi-Fi system literally. Soundpotai is an home decor object and a soundbox that decorates your house. You'll get: design, enveloping natural stereo sound and an ottoman seat, all in one. We are sure that the experience of our soundbox will amaze you. Because we know the amazement on the faces of those who have tried and listened to Soundpotai. Thus overcoming the most difficult test: the field test.

 

SOUNDPOTAI consists of a multi-layer cardboard box which houses an amplifier and two vibrating units. The 50W power amplifier receives the audio signal from Bluetooth devices or from devices connected via the AUX input jack.

The vibrating units connected to the amplifier are two Sound Exciters. The Exciters are made of a motor unit, a moving coil and a suspension system. They are applied to the walls of the box and while releasing the sound waves they cause the vibration of the cardboard. That’s how the box turns into a stereo speaker.

 


The cardboard we use, was once used in the industrial sector to pack and protect heavy (and expensive) components and machinery. This material Is eco-friendly, It Is light but, thanks to its multilayer composition, is also very robust and extra resistant (1.4 cm thick and certification of resistance according to Fefco standards). It is assembled without the use of any glue, 90% made of recycled material and 100% recyclable. Try it, we do it every day.


Milan Design Week 2019

We exhibited at FuoriSalmone in Lambrate Design District, in an unconventional and special design location, where we showed all our products online on www.rippotai.it,  we could let people test Soundpotai. The surprise in their faces and all their positive comments made us proud and sure this campaign could succeed.

 

Reviews from real testers

Mariantonietta L. “When I sat down I thought it didn't hold me but it's sturdy and then the sound is beautiful. It feels like wearing music”.

Daniele L. “It's beautiful.”

Andrea V. “A design object! I didn't think that cardboard, even if hard and resistant, could make so much. I fell in love.”

Helene C. “My legs were shaking with music, and it wasn't even loud. I must have just made a funny face. Very cool. I have to have it at home.”

Sergio D. “Man, everything vibrates. Music is heard everywhere!”

Lorenza T. “Sincere congratulations. A product I didn't know at all. And then I like the idea of sustainability. I take care about that at home.”

Silvia Maria A. “The sound is enveloping. It seems to be at a concert.”

Davide V. “Natural sound, great.”

Benedetta Z. “You can't understand, until you try it you don't believe it.”




Elena and Tito are the two founding partners who deal with all the strategic and creative experience of La Fattory, the company that owns the Rippotai brand.

Elena - “Yes, La Fattory, without the English C. A mix between the Italian word “fattoria” which in English means “farm” and the correct word factory.

That’s because we consider our company as a place where you work hard as in a farm of ideas and experiences in which creativity is sown every day. And where respect for the environment and sustainability is a true value, a mission for every future development.”

Tito - “La Fattory is a laboratory of ideas that carries out tailor-made communication projects. We give companies all the attention and support they deserve to define the strategy and then apply the style that makes them unique. Rippotai was born just thinking about a tailor-made project for one of our customers that required an innovative and sustainable gift for its customers.

Later we transformed the boxes for the house and the office into real design objects and our home decor cubes became: lamps, chairs, games for children.”

Elena - “When we thought of even putting music in it, we didn't imagine that it would do so well.”

Elena and Tito are the founders of Rippotai, they met for sporadic collaborations and now besides being colleagues and partners, they are good friends in life.

As well as being the CEO, Tito is the top designer and art director of the company. It is thanks to him that the Rippotai world is so colorful and exciting.

Elena is the meeting point with reality, she materializes dreams with strategy and a firm attitude. And in her spare time ... she translates everything into all the languages she knows (she is polyglot).





Giovanni and Andrea: they are our two accelerators “angels”, who believed so much in this project that became part of the company.

Giovanni is a startup and fundraising expert. Hard worker, he is a sport enthusiast who believes sport is a school of life for all entrepreneurs. Pragmatic, dreamer and with an entrepreneurial spirit, he prefers numbers to words. He is our CFO and manages all the numbers and sometimes... us!

Andrea is our reference for everything related to digital innovation and business communication and organizational models, he is  our connection with universities and business schools for his various collaboration with the Sapienza University of Rome and other Business Schools.
 



Roberto is our technical audio engineer. He is an architect, design lover and obviously he is very fond of audio systems.

 



 


 






 


Soundpotai, good vibes d’arredo!

La seduta di eco-design diventa una cassa acustica che vibrando amplifica il tuo ambiente con un suono pulito, naturale e stereo .


Overview

Soundpotai è una cassa armonica Bluetooth® rivoluzionaria, come non ne hai viste né sentite prima: un’esperienza sonora innovativa. Ed è  realizzata in cartone super resistente, tanto che ti ci puoi sedere sopra. La tecnologia HI-FI al suo interno, abbinata al materiale e alla sua forma utilizzata, replicano lo stesso principio fisico sonoro degli strumenti musicali acustici. Esatto!

Tramite le vibrazioni sonore SOUNDPOTAI diffonde nell’ambiente un suono naturale, stereo e omnidirezionale. La cosa fantastica è che ti ci potrai sedere sopra o usarlo come un oggetto di design, un vero componente di arredo che saprà valorizzare il tuo indoor.

  • Patent pending
  • Le vibrazioni sonore diffondono nell’ambiente un suono omnidirezionale e stereofonico
  • Un arredo componibile e di design che arreda i tuoi spazi anche con la musica
  • Great Sound, Green sound: eco-friendly, extra-resistant, multi-layer cardboard
  • Lo colleghi a tutti i tuoi device tecnologici: lo usi per le playlist preferite, per le call di lavoro, per i giochi e i video.
  • Sieditici sopra, o semplicemente tocca con la mano: sentirai le vibrazioni delle onde sonore attraverso il tuo corpo.

 

Soundpotai, la cassa armonica in cartone super resistente che vibra, suona e arreda

Più Bohemian Rhapsody o più Space Oddity? Con Soundpotai il ritmo della musica saprà aggiungere stile alla tua vita prendendo forma in un componente d’arredo semplice e funzionale che ti stupirà. Ogni suono da adesso in poi vorrai sentirlo soltanto attraverso Soundpotai.

  • Patent Pending
  • Compatibile con tutti i device audio
  • Connettività Bluetooth 4.0
  • Suono stereo omnidirezionale a 360°
  • Suono basato sulle vibrazioni
  • Green ed ecosostenibile
  • Seduta e arredo componibile

 

L’esperienza del suono omnidirezionale

Il suono stereo con un solo speaker, ovunque ti posizionerai da esso: ti sembrerà di assistere ad uno spettacolo dal vivo.

 

Le stesse emozioni vissute in un live

Ascolta il ritmo che pulsa attraverso il tuo corpo come se fossi presente allo show. Senti che batteria!

 

Aumenta la tua esperienza di gioco in una maniera incredibile

Colpi di spada e di magia, l’armatura che letteralmente si scuote… wow ci sei seduto sopra!


Immergiti nelle tue playlist comodamente seduto sul piano

La musica ti avvolge mentre tocchi letteralmente gli strumenti musicali che rilasciano la loro vibrazione nel living di casa tua.


Fatti le coccole sonore

È il momento del relax, solo per te o assieme ai bambini. La giornata scorre tranquilla avvolti dal caldo suono rassicurante di Soundpotai mentre lo personalizzate con i vostri disegni.

 

Soundpotai è diverso dalle altre casse sonore e dagli altri sistemi HI-FI

A dire il vero, Soundpotai non è un impianto Hi-Fi nel vero senso del termine.  Soundpotai è un componente d’arredo di design ed una cassa acustica che arreda casa tua… anche con la musica! Riceverai: design, un suono naturale ed avvolgente ed una seduta tutti in unica soluzione. Siamo sicuri che l’esperienza della nostra cassa acustica ti stupirà... Perché conosciamo bene lo stupore sui visi di chi ha provato e ha ascoltato Soundpotai. Superando così il test più difficile: la prova sul campo.

Commenti dei nostri “Soundpotapper” durante la Milano Design Week 2019

 

Milano Design Week 2019

Presenti al FuoriSalmone durante il Lambrate Design District abbiamo esposto e fatto provare Soundpotai insieme al resto della gamma dei prodotti già in vendita sull’ecommerce Rippotai®. Sono stati in moltissimi a lasciare commenti positivi dicendoci che erano tra le cose più belle e originali viste a Milano in quei giorni. E noi non possiamo che credergli.

 

Commenti reali

Mariantonietta L. “Quando mi sono seduta pensavo non mi tenesse invece è robusto e poi il suono è bellissimo. Sembra di indossare la musica”.

Daniele L. “È bellissimo.”

Andrea V. “Un oggetto di design! Non pensavo che il cartone anche se duro e resistente potesse rendere così tanto. Mi sono innamorato.”

Helene C. “Mi tremavano le gambe per la musica, e non era neanche ad alto volume. Devo aver fatto proprio una faccia buffa. Fichissimo. Lo devo avere in casa.”

Sergio D. “Cavolo, vibra tutto. La musica si sente dappertutto!”

Lorenza T. “Complimenti davvero. Un prodotto che non conoscevo per niente. E poi mi piace l’idea della sostenibilità. Io in casa ci sto attenta.”

Silvia Maria A. “Il suono è avvolgente. Sembra di essere ad un concerto.”

Davide V. “Suono naturale, di tutto rispetto.”

Benedetta Z. “Non puoi capire, finché non lo provi non ci credi.”

 

Come funziona Soundpotai

SOUNDPOTAI è costituito da una box in cartone multistrato al cui interno sono alloggiati un amplificatore e due diffusori acustici. L’amplificatore di potenza di 50W riceve il segnale audio dai dispositivi bluetooth o da dispositivi collegati tramite la presa jack di ingresso AUX.

I diffusori collegati all’amplificatore sono due Sound Exciter (eccitatori sonori). Gli Exciter sono costituiti da un gruppo motore, una bobina mobile e un sistema di sospensione. Sono applicati alle pareti della box e rilasciando le onde sonore fanno vibrare il cartone. La box si trasforma così in un altoparlante stereo.

 

Specifiche tecniche

  • Distanza operativa Bluetooth: circa 10 metri
  • Protocollo Bluetooth: 4.0 + EDR
  • Potenza nominale amplificatore: 50W x 2
  • Input: Bluetooth, presa AUX 3,5mm
  • Amplificatore Classe D
  • Exciters Power Handling (RMS): 10 watts
  • Exciter frequenza di risonanza: 300 Hz

 

Il team

Elena e Tito sono i due soci fondatori che si occupano di tutta l’esperienza strategica e creativa de La Fattory, l’azienda proprietaria del brand Rippotai.

Elena - “Rippotai è un’idea coltivata con cura e passione da La Fattory. Sì, la Fattory, senza la C. Perché è un luogo in cui si lavora sodo come in fattoria, una cascina di idee ed esperienze in cui la creatività viene seminata ogni giorno. E dove il rispetto dell’ambiente e della sostenibilità sono un valore vero, una missione per ogni sviluppo futuro.”

Tito - “La Fattory è un laboratorio di idee che realizza progetti di comunicazione tailor made per le aziende. Rippotai è nato proprio pensando ad un progetto per uno dei nostri clienti che ci ha richiesto un gift innovativo e sostenibile per i suoi clienti. In seguito abbiamo trasformato le scatole per la case e l’ufficio in veri e propri oggetti di design e i nostri cubi d'arredo sono diventati: lampade, sedute, giochi per bambini.”

Elena - “Quando abbiamo pensato di metterci dentro addirittura la musica non immaginavamo che ci sarebbe riuscito così bene.”

Elena and Tito sono i fondatori di Rippotai, si sono incontrati per collaborazioni sporadiche e ora, oltre ad essere colleghi e partner, sono amici nella vita.

Tito oltre ad essere il CEO,è il top designer nonché art director dell'azienda. E' grazie a lui se il mondo Rippotai è così colorato ed entusiasmante.

Elena è il punto d'incontro con la realtà, concretizza i sogni con strategia e piglio deciso. E nel tempo libero...traduce tutto in tutte le lingue che sa. (è poliglotta)

Giovanni e Andrea: sono gli  “angels” alla base della nostra accelerazione, che hanno creduto talmente tanto in questo progetto da essere entrati a far parte dell’azienda.

Giovanni è un esperto di startup e fundraising. Duro lavoratore. Appassionato di sport che ritiene  essere una scuola di vita per chi fa impresa. E’ pragmatico, sognatore e con un grande spirito imprenditoriale. E’ il nostro CFO e gestisce tutti i numeri e talvolta...anche noi!  

Andrea è il nostro riferimento per tutto quello che concerne innovazione digitale, business communication e modelli organizzativi. E’ il nostro collegamento con università e scuole di business grazie alle sue numerose collaborazioni con università come La Sapienza di Roma e altre realtà di formazione imprenditoriale.

Roberto è il nostro tecnico audio. E’ un architetto, amante del design e ovviamente va pazzo per i sistemi audio.


Project timeline

Settembre 2018 - Idea

Novembre 2018 - Studio e affinamento del Design

Dicembre 2018 - Primo Prototipo realizzato

Gennaio 2019 - Ordine del materiale e dei componenti

Febbraio 2019 - Campione definitivo

Marzo 2019 - Production QA, Finalize Tooling for Production

Aprile 2019 - Presentazione e test sul campo alla Milano Design Week, FuoriSalmone Lambrate

Giugno 2019 - Lancio su Indiegogo

Luglio 2019 - Produzione!

Settembre 2019 - Spedizione e consegna ai nostri Backers

Thanks to its vibrations Soundpotai spreads in the air a clean and natural sound as the soundbox of a guitar does. The great thing is that in your room you will hear a diffused and full sound without guessing its origin, even if you will be sitting on it. You can use it as a design object, a real home decor item that will enhance your indoor.No more dinners with friends who are far from the speaker and cannot hear the music. Now the music will be all around you: literally an enveloping sound experience.Soundpotai is a design soundbox in the shape of a cube available in two different sizes:Large 40x40x40 (cm) and Medium 33x33x33 (cm).Pay attention the medium size can be used as a seat but is less comfortable for a normal height adult and has a less maximum weight capacity. It has been conceived as a kids’ seat.Take a look at the available patterns before choosing your Soundpotai:      Bohemian Rhapsody or Space Oddity? Duro lavoratore. Appassionato di sport che ritiene  essere una scuola di vita per chi fa impresa. E’ pragmatico, sognatore e con un grande spirito imprenditoriale. E’ il nostro CFO e gestisce tutti i numeri e talvolta...anche noi!  Andrea è il nostro riferimento per tutto quello che concerne innovazione digitale, business communication e modelli organizzativi. E’ il nostro collegamento con università e scuole di business grazie alle sue numerose collaborazioni con università come La Sapienza di Roma e altre realtà di formazione imprenditoriale.Roberto è il nostro tecnico audio. E’ un architetto, amante del design e ovviamente va pazzo per i sistemi audio.Project timelineSettembre 2018 - IdeaNovembre 2018 - Studio e affinamento del DesignDicembre 2018 - Primo Prototipo realizzatoGennaio 2019 - Ordine del materiale e dei componentiFebbraio 2019 - Campione definitivoMarzo 2019 - Production QA, Finalize Tooling for ProductionAprile 2019 - Presentazione e test sul campo alla Milano Design Week, FuoriSalmone LambrateGiugno 2019 - Lancio su IndiegogoLuglio 2019 - Produzione!Settembre 2019 - Spedizione e consegna ai nostri Backers

story:
Who We Are!

BlendTelligent smart blender is the first of its kind!  We're bringing to you a blender that not only you can take anywhere with you, and blend at anytime, but also a blender that will provide you with an accurate calorie consumption.  The BlendTelligent blender connects via bluetooth, to an app on your smart device, and shows exactly what you're putting in your body with patent pending technology!  We've even taken it a step further to allow consumers to see what the percentage of carbs, sugars, protein, and fats you're consuming with each blend.  The BlendTelligent app community is loaded with useful information to make sure that you stay on track and committed to a healthier lifestyle.  Recipe competitions, daily health tips, daily/weekly tracking, and progress reports just to name a few!  Join the movement today, and regain control of your calorie consumption by being one of the first to own this personal smart blender...blend smart, blend right, BLENDTELLIGENT!


Why We Need You!

 The funding that BlendTelligent is requesting, is to finish out the last stages of manufacturing.  With the help from funders like you, we can ensure to have these out to the public by the end of 2015!  By contributing funds, you are a part of this movement to help keep a healthy lifestyle.

You will be helping with thw launch of this smart blender, and become a pioneer in the home appliance field!  How cool would it be to to know that you can tell your friends that you helped start a product the first of its kind!?

Upon hitting our goal, we'll be rolling these smart blenders out to consumer and stores.  But if you choose to purchase your smart blender on the funding page, you'll get yours before the mass public!  Not to mention, the soft stylish, BlendTelligent fashion tee.  No worries, you don't have to purchase the BlendTelligent smart blender to get the stylish tee, you can purchase one and still support the movement!

The Impact

BlendTelligent is trying to encourage a healthier lifestyle for everyone with this smart blender!  Many individuals are constantly on the go, and this blender will not slow you down.  The calorie breakdown will allow consumers to continue to be mindful of what they’re putting in their bodies, and maintain the determination for a more healthy life.  How often do you see someone out, “shaking” a drink product for consumption after a workout at the gym?  Or how have you, or someone you know, used a blended drink as a meal substitute?  But how often have you seen someone pull out a blender with an app, and know exactly what they are consuming? Exactly!

This smart blender is not just for consumption purpose, but also a lifestyle changing instrument. Become more conscious about what you drink, what you eat, and stay focused on revamping YOU!

Risk & Challenges

Like being any pioneer with something, there is no handbook to follow and you make your own path.  With BlendTelligent being so passionate about this new appliance, and the fact we want to pass this product onto consumers, we will make sure that your product is made with the utmost quality.  The fact that you’re taking out your time to read about our product, speaks volumes in itself!  Hasn’t been the most easy journey, but we’ve kept pushing to get this smart blender out.  Whats the saying, oh yea…team work, makes the dream work!

Any obstacles that arise that could delay the launch of the smart blender, we’ll tackle head on, while keeping the masses informed.  By choosing to contribute, you’re not just a client, you’re part of the company, and it’s owed to you to be informed on progress!

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We understand that some would like to help, but not be in the position to do so monetarily at this time.  Hey, we’ve been there before and completely understand!  The best way to support if you’re in a crunch, and can’t do so with money…then word-of-mouth is all we ask.  Tell everyone you know about this appliance; Grandma Jane, Cousin Jake, Aunt Deb, Uncle Mike, the family pet Spot, EVERYBODY.  You can also spread using social media through the share tools.  Every little bit counts, and we appreciate it all!

story:
Short Summary

Background

My Name is Thomas Kimbrough from Chicago and I am the founder and Managing Director of PCG Realty (Est. 2016). Currently I hold a Masters of Human Resources Management from Keller Graduate School of Management, Illinois (USA), Masters in Business Administration from Tiffin University, Ohio (USA), Executive Masters in Business Administration from the University of Bucharest, Romania (EU), as well as a Bachelor’s degree in Political Science from Kaplan University (USA). Prior to moving to the Ukraine, I was a Non Commissioned Officer in the United States Army with duty assignments in South Korea, Germany, Italy, and Afghanistan.

PCG Realty is a legally registered Limited Liability Corporation in Kyiv, Ukraine (EDRPOU 40778489 - No VAT. Single Tax Payer Group: 3; Rate: 5%) Verify at: https://cabinet.sfs.gov.ua/cabinet/faces/public...

Project Background 

Since my time in the Ukraine my company and I have observed  discrimination within the Ukrainian housing market. Some Ukrainian citizens from Crimea and Donetsk have been discriminated against since they are from the war torn eastern part of the country. Not only are these individuals being discriminated against,but also individuals from several other countries around the globe. My goal is to provide affordable housing to those in need at a low monthly cost and change the discriminatory practices that exist in the Ukraine through actions, education, and determination. 

All monies earned from the subsidized rental fees will be reinvested to purchase additional subsidized housing for people in need.

story:
The Roome Mini Plus uses artificial intelligence to adapt to your behavior

It learns from your behavior and works according to your movements. No more stubbed toes in the middle of the night, or a partner complaining the you’ve left the light on.

When you enter the room in the dark, the lamp illuminates, when you fall asleep, it turns itself off. When you go to the bathroom during the night, the lamp will light up the floor with dimmed light as soon as you get out of bed.

You can control your Roome Mini Plus from your smartphone with both iOS and Android devices. With its easy to use app and long battery life it is ideal for indoor and outdoor use. You can put it on your bedside table, use to check on your children without waking them up, or even take it out camping.

 

 

Here are some of the amazing features we have built into the Roome Mini Plus.

 

To find out more about these features, ask our experts in the comments below. We love talking to future backers!

 

The beauty and quality of the Roome Mini Plus is not only apparent in the technology. We spent as much thought and care on the product design.

The Roome Mini Plus is beautifully crafted from premium and the LED is set behind a durable semi-transparent PMMA lampshade. A leather belt is attached to the lamp so you can use it as a lantern.

  

 

The Roome Mini Plus design was inspired by raindrops. It is a simple, pure and stylish product, which would fit easily into any decor.

 

 

You can use Roome Mini Plus with or without its aluminum base attached. The aluminum is magnetic so it easily attaches to the lamp.

When the base is attached, it simultaneously supplies the LED with light and charges the lithium built-in battery. Roome Mini Plus' fully charged battery can last up to 10 hours.

 

 

With up to 10 hours of ​battery, it is the perfect companion for evening meals in the garden, walks in the park, or nights at the beach. Whether you’re in the house or on a trip, the Roome Mini Plus is perfect to guide your path and offer dimmed, beautiful lighting to your evening.

 

Presence Detection

Roome Mini Plus uses presence detection sensors to turn on when you enter the room in the dark. Roome Mini Plus will also automatically turn off to save energy and protect the environment.

 

Intelligent Learning

Roome Mini Plus is conveniently small and amazingly intelligent. It learns from your behavior by analyzing your movement throughout the day. After only a short period of time, the lamp can control the light for you. For example, when you feed your baby in the night, Roome Mini Plus will turn on a dimmed light to provide enough illumination without disturbing their sleep.

 

App Control

Roome Mini Plus is Bluetooth enabled and works with our custom iOS and Android app. With the app, you can dim the light, enable presence detection, and set the light to turn off at a set time.

 

 

 

ROOME has a dedicated engineering team that’s focused on presence detection and machine learning. Roome brings home automation technology to your life and makes your home more convenient and comfortable.

We believe that technology can enrich our lives and improve our lifestyle. We incorporate technology into your everyday products such as lights, wall switches, curtains and home appliances and now they can work better for you, making you feel more in control, more efficient and more delighted. We are dedicated to creating an intelligent home that always knows what you need and when you need it. For more information about our products, please visit our website: www.myroome.com

story:
It is told that plants have feelings too, they can sense pain, danger and they can even enjoy music. We created SPOT, a specially designed pot that makes your plant feel at home.

SPOT gives your plant the leverage to grow and thrive, by doing analysis on its surroundings and taking metrics through sensors to get the optimal watering times.

SPOT is easy to setup, works seamlessly and requires nearly 0 attention, however it will notify you when actions are required or when your plant needs you.

We're wrapping SPOT with features to make it not only a smart pot, but a great experience.

SPOT can tell you when your plant is thirsty, cold or not receiving enough light, SPOT can also help you diagnose your plant and figure out potential growth blockers.

In the age of the internet of things (IOT), there's no doubt that the world is shifting towards the digitization of everything, so why not your plant? SPOT is connected to the internet and you can monitor and track how your plant is doing from anywhere.

SPOT includes a camera that snaps images/videos of your plant on demand or on a schedule to capture amazing time-lapses.

Those camera snaps can be used as your social media bragging rights to show off with your plant's progress, but also SPOT is all about the community and if for some reason your plant is not doing well, you can share your plant's sensors data history with a professional or with people or friends who've had successful experiences.

SPOT's mobile application will make it easy to view, manage and share your plant's selfies & history.

Just login, choose your plant type and we will figure out the rest.

SPOT doesn't just have geeky metrics and fancy graphs, SPOT looks great and can even look greater with your own custom designs, below is some of the patterns we thought would look cool. 

SPOT has 3 Modes of Operation

1) Smart Watering

SPOT will analyse and take smart watering actions by itself based on an algorithm we're developing that takes to account your plant type, its specific needs and all the sensor measurements.

2) Scheduled Watering

If you know better about your plant and need scheduled watering, SPOT will water your plant on a predefined schedule that you set.

3) Manual Watering (On-Demand)

For those of you who still prefer the traditional watering method, SPOT will notify when your plant requires watering and with a click of a button, you can do so from anywhere in the world.

We started sketching and tinkering with ideas in late 2016, and we tried different designs and renders, and after a lot of waves and tides we ended up with SPOT.

We experimented with almost all the sensors we could find on the market and we made critical decisions on what features we should include.

SPOT became a feasible idea when we executed our 3D CAD design and made it and actual Plexiglas product.

We are planning a few months ahead before the first complete prototype, once we finalize that, we will post an update and get your thoughts and final ideas wrapped up, then we will start the line of production, and expect our first shipment in late December 2017 or Early 2018.

There's no doubt that some challenges may be faced along the way, this is why we are very transparent about our progress, we are 80% into a working prototype, but we have most of the manufacturing plan ready.

We will keep posting updates.

We chose crowdfunding instead venture capital because we believe in the crowd rather than some VCs in suits.

We're building a community, not a business, so for that we decided to make SPOT OpenSource, both hardware and software, meaning we will give you access to our entire documentation, schematics, code, designs and algorithms so that you can even build one on your own.

We want to spend the next few months working closely with agriculture professionals and experiment with more ideas to make SPOT even more exciting.

 

Featured on:

story:
All the placed orders will be locked on August 20th. Please make sure you finish below before 20th:

Check your address on Indiegogo if correct or not.

Enter your address by UPS link (https://www.ups.com/us/en/Home.page) to check if your address can be found in UPS system successfully, we will ship goods out by UPS service.

If you need to change your shipping address on the Indiegogo account, please refer to this link (https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/212528078-How-do-I-update-my-shipping-address-) for more details.

Orders on and before August. 20th will be delivered on August 25th. Orders after August. 20th will be shipped out in September.

Aging of products

Packaging of products 

 

OVERVIEW

The AvaCube Smart Voice IR hub with Alexa Built-in provides hands-free IR appliances control and the many benefits of Alexa Voice Services integrated directly into your Home to make life smarter and easier.

How many smart devices do you have in your home?

One? Two? None?

Here is the thing: we can guarantee that no answer you offer is going to be correct.

In fact, the number of smart devices in your home, whether you know it or not, is actually infinite at this very moment. Even if you don’t own your own Alexa, you can take advantage of all the convenience that Alexa Voice Services and other digital assistants have to offer.

Yes, it’s possible, thanks to AvaCube.

Let us show you how.

SMART HOME HUB WITH ALEXA

With Alexa built-in you can use just your voice control all traditional IR devices. Change TV channel and volume, air conditioner temperature, and more hands-free.

HOW IT WORKS

AvaCube turns most remote-controlled AC, TVs, and more IR home appliances smart in seconds. Forget about complicated installation and forget about confusing ancillary apps. The entire process for running AvaCube is only three simple steps.

Step 1: Connect the device, install the AvatarControls app, and link AvaCube to your WiFi.

Step 2: Connect the AvatarControls app to your IR device, enabling DIY learning mode.

Step 3: Get started! You can control any of your IR devices, simply asking Alexa or your smartphone to do whatever you want to do.

Free App for AvaCube

The AvaCube connects to your smartphone using Wi-Fi, remotely control home appliances from anywhere, add and control multiple devices at once with one App. Easily share devices among family members, receive real-time alerts to ensure safety.

THE BENEFITS

With Alexa built-in you can use just your voice to control all traditional IR devices. Change TV channel and volume, adjust air conditioner temperature, and more hands-free functions.

  • Smarten IR Devices

Hundreds of devices which with IR frequency of 38k Hz supported, such as Air Conditioner, TV, STB, TV Box, DVD, Projector, Fans and etc including most branded and unbranded devices

  • Control from anywhere

Your IR appliances can be controlled from outside of your home.Turn on the air conditioner in advance on the way home. Go home and enjoy a comfortable life immediately.

  • Contactless Control

Just say the wake word "Alexa" to control your smart home devices. Listen to music or your favorite radio stations without lifting a finger, like this "Alexa, I'm back", "Alexa, Turn off the TV" ...

  • Save Money

You can use AvaCube to control hundreds of IR devices, such as Air Conditioner, TV, STB, TV Box, DVD, Projector, Fans etc, there's no need to replace it with a new smart device

  • Alexa Built-in

Using Amazon Alexa's user-friendly, intuitive, voice-recognition system, you can take advantage of more than 100,000+ skills, everything from music to calendars to shopping to control your home appliances and beyond

  • Share with Family

Multiple people can download the app or use voice control, allowing you to share the fun with your family.

JUST ASK ALEXA

Using Alexa on “AvaCube” is simple and handsfree - just ask, and “AvaCube” will respond instantly. Tap and ask feature is also available.

  • 100,000+ Alexa Skills
  • Smart Home Voice Control
  • News and Information
  • Timers and Alarms
  • Announcements
  • Music and Games

IR Blaster Inside

Make you easier to control IR home appliances like fans, air conditioners, TVs, and set top boxes. A massive IR code library provides compatibility with 99% of mainstream household appliances, and a comprehensive 360-degree signal coverage. A DIY learning mode allows for infinite possibilities.

Voice Control Your Smart Home

Ask Alexa to turn on your lights or fans, control your thermostat, garage door or sprinklers and all Powered by Tuya 90,000+ IOT smart devices, like smart bulbs, smart strip lights, smart sockets, smart switches.

Here at Avatar Controls, we're in the business of making your life easier. We started with connecting the traditional home appliances to internet, making it easier to use and add to your smart life routines, follow and back us.

AvaCube – in Your Home

We are currently offering AvaCube at an exclusive discount through this campaign, making our smart control innovation available to you at a much lower price point than you will ever see again. This is on top of the fact that AvaCube is a pioneering device unlike anything else available on the market. We have set our goal for this campaign at $50,000, but the more we raise, the more widely we will be able to distribute AvaCube and the more funding we can divert to continued research and development.

To learn more about the discounts that we are offering and other rewards that you can claim through this campaign, just read on below.

Contribute to this campaign and claim AvaCube for your home today!

Risks & Challenges

AvaCube is already functional and effective. We use it in our own homes and offices, controlling all of our devices – new and old – with an exactness and a convenience that most would have never imagined possible. Still, we know that because of the global situation, delays in shipping could arise. If we encounter any logistical difficulties that force us to push back our reward distribution, we will be open and transparent, providing regular updates to all of our supporters.

AvaCube Sample Demonstration

AvaCube Sample Disassembly

AvaCube Package

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of AvaCube at this moment, the greater our efforts to spread it worldwide will be.

About Us

The team behind AvaCube is based in Costa Mesa, California. We are passionate about turning homes into smart homes the easy and convenient way, and we are making great strides toward doing that.

Discover AvaCube with us!

We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time.
story_txt:
All the placed orders will be locked on August 20th. Please make sure you finish below before 20th:
Check your address on Indiegogo if correct or not.
Enter your address by UPS link (https://www.ups.com/us/en/Home.page) to check if your address can be found in UPS system successfully, we will ship goods out by UPS service.
If you need to change your shipping address on the Indiegogo account, please refer to this link (https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/212528078-How-do-I-update-my-shipping-address-) for more details.
Orders on and before August. 20th will be delivered on August 25th. Orders after August. 20th will be shipped out in September.

Aging of products


Packaging of products 
 
OVERVIEW
The AvaCube Smart Voice IR hub with Alexa Built-in provides hands-free IR appliances control and the many benefits of Alexa Voice Services integrated directly into your Home to make life smarter and easier.
How many smart devices do you have in your home?
One? Two? None?

Here is the thing: we can guarantee that no answer you offer is going to be correct.
In fact, the number of smart devices in your home, whether you know it or not, is actually infinite at this very moment. Even if you don’t own your own Alexa, you can take advantage of all the convenience that Alexa Voice Services and other digital assistants have to offer.
Yes, it’s possible, thanks to AvaCube.
Let us show you how.
SMART HOME HUB WITH ALEXA
With Alexa built-in you can use just your voice control all traditional IR devices. Change TV channel and volume, air conditioner temperature, and more hands-free.

HOW IT WORKS
AvaCube turns most remote-controlled AC, TVs, and more IR home appliances smart in seconds. Forget about complicated installation and forget about confusing ancillary apps. The entire process for running AvaCube is only three simple steps.

Step 1: Connect the device, install the AvatarControls app, and link AvaCube to your WiFi.
Step 2: Connect the AvatarControls app to your IR device, enabling DIY learning mode.
Step 3: Get started! You can control any of your IR devices, simply asking Alexa or your smartphone to do whatever you want to do.
Free App for AvaCube
The AvaCube connects to your smartphone using Wi-Fi, remotely control home appliances from anywhere, add and control multiple devices at once with one App. Easily share devices among family members, receive real-time alerts to ensure safety.

THE BENEFITS
With Alexa built-in you can use just your voice to control all traditional IR devices. Change TV channel and volume, adjust air conditioner temperature, and more hands-free functions.
Smarten IR Devices
Hundreds of devices which with IR frequency of 38k Hz supported, such as Air Conditioner, TV, STB, TV Box, DVD, Projector, Fans and etc including most branded and unbranded devices
Control from anywhere
Your IR appliances can be controlled from outside of your home.Turn on the air conditioner in advance on the way home. Go home and enjoy a comfortable life immediately.
Contactless Control
Just say the wake word "Alexa" to control your smart home devices. Listen to music or your favorite radio stations without lifting a finger, like this "Alexa, I'm back", "Alexa, Turn off the TV" ...
Save Money
You can use AvaCube to control hundreds of IR devices, such as Air Conditioner, TV, STB, TV Box, DVD, Projector, Fans etc, there's no need to replace it with a new smart device
Alexa Built-in
Using Amazon Alexa's user-friendly, intuitive, voice-recognition system, you can take advantage of more than 100,000+ skills, everything from music to calendars to shopping to control your home appliances and beyond
Share with Family
Multiple people can download the app or use voice control, allowing you to share the fun with your family.
JUST ASK ALEXA

Using Alexa on “AvaCube” is simple and handsfree - just ask, and “AvaCube” will respond instantly. Tap and ask feature is also available.

100,000+ Alexa Skills
Smart Home Voice Control
News and Information
Timers and Alarms
Announcements
Music and Games

IR Blaster Inside

Make you easier to control IR home appliances like fans, air conditioners, TVs, and set top boxes. A massive IR code library provides compatibility with 99% of mainstream household appliances, and a comprehensive 360-degree signal coverage. A DIY learning mode allows for infinite possibilities.
Voice Control Your Smart Home

Ask Alexa to turn on your lights or fans, control your thermostat, garage door or sprinklers and all Powered by Tuya 90,000+ IOT smart devices, like smart bulbs, smart strip lights, smart sockets, smart switches.

Here at Avatar Controls, we're in the business of making your life easier. We started with connecting the traditional home appliances to internet, making it easier to use and add to your smart life routines, follow and back us.
AvaCube – in Your Home
We are currently offering AvaCube at an exclusive discount through this campaign, making our smart control innovation available to you at a much lower price point than you will ever see again. This is on top of the fact that AvaCube is a pioneering device unlike anything else available on the market. We have set our goal for this campaign at $50,000, but the more we raise, the more widely we will be able to distribute AvaCube and the more funding we can divert to continued research and development.
To learn more about the discounts that we are offering and other rewards that you can claim through this campaign, just read on below.
Contribute to this campaign and claim AvaCube for your home today!
Risks & Challenges
AvaCube is already functional and effective. We use it in our own homes and offices, controlling all of our devices – new and old – with an exactness and a convenience that most would have never imagined possible. Still, we know that because of the global situation, delays in shipping could arise. If we encounter any logistical difficulties that force us to push back our reward distribution, we will be open and transparent, providing regular updates to all of our supporters.
AvaCube Sample Demonstration

AvaCube Sample Disassembly

AvaCube Package


Other Ways You Can Help
In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of AvaCube at this moment, the greater our efforts to spread it worldwide will be.
About Us
The team behind AvaCube is based in Costa Mesa, California. We are passionate about turning homes into smart homes the easy and convenient way, and we are making great strides toward doing that.
Discover AvaCube with us!
We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time.

story:
Now Manufacturing!

The first LED UV-C germ killer with up to 10 times the power vs. most competitive products, and industry-leading capacity to handle cleaning all of your important items. 

Our patent-pending solution, over 6 months in development, was designed using the same, state of the art LED technology used in hospitals to clean medical devices and rooms.  With 10 high-grade LED lights surrounding all sides and proprietary glass to transmit UV-C light onto the bottom of items, GloBox is the FIRST and ONLY UV-C device for the home to deliver 360-degree coverage to ensure your items are thoroughly cleaned of pathogens.  Lower powered competitive devices can take 10 or even 30 minutes to work, but GloBox’s 10 Powerful LED lights can kill 99.99% of germs in only 60 seconds. 

 

​

GlowBox uses the same UV-C light technology that is scientifically proven by hundreds of research studies to be effective in killing almost all pathogens. 

Each germ requires a different amount of light exposure to be inactivated. GloBox 60 second cycle produces enough light power to completely kill most common germs and has a 3-minute deep clean function to provide extra light exposure. For very small objects, we recommend using the 3-min cycle due to the distance from the light sources being greater. GloBox will include a table of germs and recommended cycle times. Below are some of the most common germs and their required UV-C dosage from studies conducted by UC Berkeley, American Ultraviolet Company, Boston University, UV-Light.co.UK, and more. More data available upon request. 

Based on scientific research by third parties on the amount of UV-C light dosage required to kill the listed pathogens, which GloBox meets or exceeds in required fluence during a cleaning cycle. 

 

 

No Need to Ever Replace The Lights

LED technology is rated at up to 25,000 hours, and at a 60-second cleaning cycle, that's a million cleaning cycles. 

 

Environmentally Friendly

GloBox uses no harsh chemical cleaners, heat, or residues.

 

GloBox Safely Cleans Electronics and Household Items

  • Electronics including phones, tablets, remotes, headphones
  • Household items including keys, sunglasses, shoes, toys, kitchen utensils, mail, packages
  • Food items including produce, cans, boxes, and bagged items
  • Cosmetics, skincare, and cleaning products

 

 

Viewing Window Indicates GloBox is Working

You will know GloBox is working because we designed it with a safety window that allows you to see the lights are on and cleaning.

Safety Switches Ensure Lid Must be Closed to Operate

GloBox protects you from the UV-C light by using safety switches that only allow power to the lights when the lid is completely closed.  This adds safety to those with curious kids in the house. 

 

How GloBox Operates

  1. Uses standard USA wall outlet, 110v current, plug it in
  2. Determine what you want to clean; keys, phone, glasses, mail, delivered packages, small groceries, shoes
  3. Put items in the GloBox
  4. By default, the 60-second cycle is selected. Optionally press the 3-minute boost button for extra cleaning powerful enough to kill some molds.
  5. Close the lid
  6. When and only if the lid is completely closed, GloBox starts cleaning your items. Power is only connected to lights when lid is fully closed.
  7. Wait 60 seconds or 3 minutes depending on cycle, and your items are clean and sanitized.
  8. Remove items
  9. Clean as often as you want

 

Currently in Production and Shipping to Your Home in January

GloBox is currently in production with tooling and molding provided by our partners Zen Molds.  Our state of the art manufacturing partner specializes in the latest LED UV-C technology.  Our 3PL fulfillment system is in place and ready to ship GloBox to your home in January.

 

Why GloBoxs LEDS are better than Bulbs

  • Break/Shock Proof
  • Cleaning power output is immediate and highly tuned, whereas halogen bulbs need to warm up to full strength. 
  • Environmentally friendly compared to halogen bulbs with mercury, and no need to change the bulbs every year
  • Last longer = up to 15X longer lifespan. Combined with 1/10th the time required to clean, you get 100X more uses resulting in up to a million+ cleaning cycles.

 

Scientifically Proven Technology

GloBox uses the same UV-C technology used in water, air, and hospital purification to kill 99.99% of pathogens. GloBox is designed and tuned to effectively kill even the most harmful germs to 99.99% or more using scientific research as the foundation for how much power is needed.

 

Background/History

UV has been studied since the mid-20th century on its effects and germicidal ability to kill bacteria and viruses. Scientists have been awarded Nobel Prizes and over the last 100 years the technology has advanced to highly efficient lamps and LEDs used in medical and consumer sanitization applications.

 

How UV-C light kills germs / pathogens

UV-C light works by disrupting cell function, thereby inactivating and killing the germs. While Ultraviolet light exists between invisible light wavelengths of 10nm and more visible wavelengths of 400nm (commonly used in blacklights), the optimal germicidal wavelength is around 265nm. GloBox UV-C lights are tuned specifically to produce light in the optimal germicidal wavelength.

 

Certified and Approved Technology

GloBox uses the same UV-C germicidal technology as FDA approved technology used in hospitals and certified components such as standard UL power supplies. 

 

Team Credentials and Development History

Our team of engineers has a combined 50+ years of experience with development, production and launch of consumer devices.  Over 6 months in development, through 18 prototypes, and rigorous testing, we have developed the most advanced product available on the consumer market.  Our state of the art manufacturing partner specializes in the latest LED UV-C technology.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kat Granke and I am a Master's in Mental Health and Wellness Counseling student from NYU. I have been working with children my entire life through babysitting, programming, behavioral therapy and my education to counsel them. I see so many children fall behind in school because they are not getting the resources to learn that they need, and I am here to provide that. 

This desk combines the needs of kiddos, who are unique in each of them, with the benefits proven in fidgeting. Beyond that, it combines the need for the body to release energy in a productive way, which is usually the energy leading to distractibility. If we can help children to mindlessly release pent-up energy, we are providing them the chance to learn in their own ways.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am looking to raise the money to get this project off the ground- and manufacturing multiples is rough to afford as a student.
  • I am grateful for any donations, but the more the better. The more money raised, the more product can be made, and the more exposure and market research can happen.
  • I am a one-woman operation as of now, and I made this to change lives and help children to be able to learn better. All donations will go to manufacturing the product until there is a sustainable profit coming in. 
  • Those who donate will get a 20% discount off of the purchase of their first TheraDesk!

The Impact

We all know that the children of today are the future of tomorrow, and the following is what this project can do to help them discover their own potential. 

  • Less distractibility for kiddos while trying to complete work.
  • Increased confidence for children who are able to learn without as much difficulty
  • Providing an outlet for kiddos provides parents less arguments over work!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is taking a new idea and putting it to the world in a way they may not be ready for; but I believe that this risk can change the lives  and education of many kiddos and their families. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute funds, there are still things you can do:

  • Spread the word about this revolutionary product
  • Share through Indiegogo and remind your friends of the benefits and 20% off their first discount!

story:
Fully funded in our first crowdfunding campaign ever and featured on Galileo in German TV before the system is on the market... Yes, we are proud to have the opportunity to share the story with more people!

systemson - a creative furniture system

A creative furniture system consisting of a small number of basic building blocks but offering endless possibilities.

In total, our range includes eight different assembly kits as well as one creative kit. Each kit comes in flat, compact packaging and includes an instruction manual.

Rediscover the creative joy of your childhood or have fun building your own furniture together with your family. Be your own interior designer and experience the satisfaction of creating your own design objects.

 

The story

What started as a project for a modular shelf system developed into a whole family of different furniture building kits offering a modularity as free and flexible as the building blocks we all grew up with and loved as children. Inspired by classic toys and famous truss structures we kept on developing the system without however compromising on the simplicity of our initial concept. In order to maximize the number of designs that are possible with our basic elements, we calculated and tested a number of different sizes and distances between the holes in the various elements.

In addition, we found that the flexibility and bendability of our straight elements opened up a whole new range of possibilities.

At this point, we decided to stop creating new kits and introduce the system to the public through crowd funding, in order to give our customers an open creative space and also to allow us to be inspired by your creations.

The ending "son" in Scandinavian surnames relates to a family. We chose the name systemson for our system because it truly is a family of products that will continue to grow.

The company

Son of nils was founded in 2008 in Berlin by Pierre Nilsson who is originally from the north of Sweden and who is a long-time resident of Berlin. Son of nils stands for functional design that aims to allow the customer to have an interactive and emotional part in the daily use of the objects. The interactive part of this project succeeded above our expectations. The user can not only change the size of the objects and rebuild them to make other items, it is also possible for the user to create his or her own objects in endless variations.

http://www.sonofnils.com

 

Assembly kits overview

 

Assembly kits details

 

Small Web Lamp

A ceiling lamp with an attractive, web-like lamp shade, suitable for smaller rooms, windows, or dedicated corners. Choose a light bulb for the E27 socket depending on your room situation. Color - anthracite. The E27 socket and a 2-meter black/white textile cable, screws, and tools are included. The small web lamp consists of 13 individual pieces. Assembly time is about 15-25 minutes.

> Pre-order special €39 (20% off) <

 

Half-sphere Web Lamp

As above but larger, consisting of 40 pieces. Suitable for larger rooms. Choose a light bulb for the E27 socket depending on your room situation. Color - anthracite. The E27 socket and a 3-meter black/white textile cable, an adjustable hanging kit, and screws and tools are included.  Assembly time is about 30-45 minutes.

> Pre-order special €79 (20% off) <

 

Full-sphere Web Lamp

Same as above but full-sphere, consisting of 64 pieces.  Suitable for larger rooms. Assembly time is about 45-60 minutes. 

> Pre-order special €99 (23% off) <

 

Small Tower Lamp

The small tower lamp has an architectural truss look and is perfect for spaces that need ambient light. Choose a light bulb for the E27 socket depending on your room situation. Color - anthracite, black feet. The E27 socket and a 4-meter black/white textile cable with foot switch, feet, screws, and tools are included. The small tower lamp consists of 17 pieces. Assembly time is about 20-30 minutes.

> Pre-order special €59 (19% off) <

 

Large Tower Lamp

Same as above but bigger, consists of 41 pieces. Assembly time is about 45-60 minutes.

> Pre-order special €79 (24% off) <

 

Stool

A lightweight but very solid stool with an architectural look. The hole in the middle makes it easy to move and keeps it dry if you use it outside. Color - anthracite, black feet. Feet, screws, and tools are included. The stool consists of 13 pieces. Assembly time is about 15-25 minutes.

> Pre-order special €59 (21% off) <

 

Truss Shelf 220

The shelf system 220 has an architectural truss style and is very modular. Color - anthracite, black feet. Feet, screws and tools are included. Each section measures 300 mm in height (11.8″) so you can add or remove sections to gain the desired height. The Truss Shelf 220 consists of 38 pieces. The width will depend on the width of your chosen shelf boards. It is also easy to add a holder to make a third unit in-between two shelf units. Very stable construction that has been tested with 120 kilos. Please contact us if you want to use other shelf systems.

> Pre-order special €59 (22% off) <

Optional

Shelves are optional and are not included. You will be offered the possibilty to add shelf boards to your pledge after the campaign has ended. Our standard shelves come in 18 mm birch plywood with grey or white melamine coating, measuring 800 mm/31.5″ x 220 mm/ 8.7″. For environmental reasons we only ship these within the EU. Measures and templates for the shelves can be found in the manual. Standard depth sizes (200 mm/7.9″) purchased from a hardware store also fit the shelf system 220.

 

Truss Shelf 320

Same as above but with 320 mm depth and 300 mm higher. Consists of 50 pieces.

> Pre-order special €89 (19% off) <

Optional

Shelves are optional and are not included. You will be offered the possibilty to add shelf boards to your pledge after the campaign has ended. Our standard shelves come in 18 mm birch plywood with grey or white melamine coating, measuring 800 mm/31.5″ x 320 mm/12.6″. For environmental reasons we only ship these within the EU. Measures and templates for the shelves can be found in the manual. Standard depth sizes (300 mm/11.8″) purchased from a hardware store also fit the shelf system 320.

 

Creative Kit

Includes all of the kits described above (small web lamp, small tower lamp, stool, truss shelf 220, half-sphere web lamp, large tower lamp, truss shelf 320, full-sphere web lamp). Colour - anthracite. Includes all five kits of sockets and black/white textile cables, 28 feet, two adjustable hanging kits, screws, as well as all tools. Create all of the kits or create and invent anything you want, the decision is yours...

> Pre-order special €499 (30% off) <

 

VAT, and Customs Duty

Fees for VAT and Customs Duty may apply outside the EU. Please check what applies in your country before you make a pre-order.

 

Stability and Liability

Since we only provide the building kits and have no control over what the user creates with them, we can take no liability for any such creations made. 

Nevertheless, we of course have tested the quality and the stability of our creations (i.e. the Truss Shelf 220 with 120 kg over a longer time). We provide English-language manuals together with easy-to-understand illustrations. We recommend the creations for normal household use.

Timeline

  •  2018 - Research, testing, ideas
  •  2019 - Final idea, first prototypes, developing of idea
  •  2020 - Testing of prototypes, developing of products, test orders, lockdown...
  •  March 2021 - Crowdfunding (successful)
  •  April-June 2021 - After sales, order and supervise production
  •  August - October 2021 - Preparing and sending out kits

If you like our project

then share it with your friends and family! You’ll find the links to the right of our video at the top of the page.

 

Questions

We will be happy to answer any question you may still have.

 

Retailers

Please contact us if you are interested in our products...
