Small Web Lamp

A ceiling lamp with an attractive, web-like lamp shade, suitable for smaller rooms, windows, or dedicated corners. Choose a light bulb for the E27 socket depending on your room situation. Color - anthracite. The E27 socket and a 2-meter black/white textile cable, screws, and tools are included. The small web lamp consists of 13 individual pieces. Assembly time is about 15-25 minutes.
> Pre-order special €39 (20% off) <
 
Half-sphere Web Lamp

As above but larger, consisting of 40 pieces. Suitable for larger rooms. Choose a light bulb for the E27 socket depending on your room situation. Color - anthracite. The E27 socket and a 3-meter black/white textile cable, an adjustable hanging kit, and screws and tools are included.  Assembly time is about 30-45 minutes.
> Pre-order special €79 (20% off) <
 
Full-sphere Web Lamp

Same as above but full-sphere, consisting of 64 pieces.  Suitable for larger rooms. Assembly time is about 45-60 minutes. 
> Pre-order special €99 (23% off) <
 
Small Tower Lamp

The small tower lamp has an architectural truss look and is perfect for spaces that need ambient light. Choose a light bulb for the E27 socket depending on your room situation. Color - anthracite, black feet. The E27 socket and a 4-meter black/white textile cable with foot switch, feet, screws, and tools are included. The small tower lamp consists of 17 pieces. Assembly time is about 20-30 minutes.
> Pre-order special €59 (19% off) <
 
Large Tower Lamp

Same as above but bigger, consists of 41 pieces. Assembly time is about 45-60 minutes.
> Pre-order special €79 (24% off) <
 
Stool

A lightweight but very solid stool with an architectural look. The hole in the middle makes it easy to move and keeps it dry if you use it outside. Color - anthracite, black feet. Feet, screws, and tools are included. The stool consists of 13 pieces. Assembly time is about 15-25 minutes.
> Pre-order special €59 (21% off) <
 
Truss Shelf 220

The shelf system 220 has an architectural truss style and is very modular. Color - anthracite, black feet. Feet, screws and tools are included. Each section measures 300 mm in height (11.8″) so you can add or remove sections to gain the desired height. The Truss Shelf 220 consists of 38 pieces. The width will depend on the width of your chosen shelf boards. It is also easy to add a holder to make a third unit in-between two shelf units. Very stable construction that has been tested with 120 kilos. Please contact us if you want to use other shelf systems.
> Pre-order special €59 (22% off) <
Optional
Shelves are optional and are not included. You will be offered the possibilty to add shelf boards to your pledge after the campaign has ended. Our standard shelves come in 18 mm birch plywood with grey or white melamine coating, measuring 800 mm/31.5″ x 220 mm/ 8.7″. For environmental reasons we only ship these within the EU. Measures and templates for the shelves can be found in the manual. Standard depth sizes (200 mm/7.9″) purchased from a hardware store also fit the shelf system 220.
 
Truss Shelf 320

Same as above but with 320 mm depth and 300 mm higher. Consists of 50 pieces.
> Pre-order special €89 (19% off) <
Optional
Shelves are optional and are not included. You will be offered the possibilty to add shelf boards to your pledge after the campaign has ended. Our standard shelves come in 18 mm birch plywood with grey or white melamine coating, measuring 800 mm/31.5″ x 320 mm/12.6″. For environmental reasons we only ship these within the EU. Measures and templates for the shelves can be found in the manual. Standard depth sizes (300 mm/11.8″) purchased from a hardware store also fit the shelf system 320.
 
Creative Kit

Includes all of the kits described above (small web lamp, small tower lamp, stool, truss shelf 220, half-sphere web lamp, large tower lamp, truss shelf 320, full-sphere web lamp). Colour - anthracite. Includes all five kits of sockets and black/white textile cables, 28 feet, two adjustable hanging kits, screws, as well as all tools. Create all of the kits or create and invent anything you want, the decision is yours...
> Pre-order special €499 (30% off) <
 
VAT, and Customs Duty
Fees for VAT and Customs Duty may apply outside the EU. Please check what applies in your country before you make a pre-order. Stability and Liability
Since we only provide the building kits and have no control over what the user creates with them, we can take no liability for any such creations made. 
Nevertheless, we of course have tested the quality and the stability of our creations (i.e. the Truss Shelf 220 with 120 kg over a longer time). We provide English-language manuals together with easy-to-understand illustrations. We recommend the creations for normal household use.

Timeline

 2018 - Research, testing, ideas
 2019 - Final idea, first prototypes, developing of idea
 2020 - Testing of prototypes, developing of products, test orders, lockdown...
 March 2021 - Crowdfunding (successful)
 April-June 2021 - After sales, order and supervise production
 August - October 2021 - Preparing and sending out kits

If you like our project
then share it with your friends and family! You’ll find the links to the right of our video at the top of the page. Questions
We will be happy to answer any question you may still have. Retailers
Please contact us if you are interested in our products...

story:
All frames include a themed 5-print Art Pack of your choice from our talented artist partners.

With internal dimensions of 11" x 14", you can easily insert the included art or any standard sized art prints.

Colorimetry App

  

Easily control your Colorizer Frame over Wifi using our Colorimetry app for iOS and Android

  • Choose from over 10 stunning effect modes
  • Customize color with over 2 billion shades available
  • Control your frame from the comfort of your couch with Alexa:
    • change color/brightness
    • choose visual effec t
    • synchronize multiple frames to the same color/effect

The Colorimetry App works on iOS, Android, and web browser, making it easy to connect your frame to your preferred device over a standard WiFi network.

 The power of color customization is at your finger tips!

    Changing the art using our hinged-door design is a simple process which does not require that you remove the frame from the wall. 

    Technical Specifications

    • External dimensions 12" x 15" x 2.25"
    • Internal dimensions 11" x 14"
    • 3mm scratch-resistant acrylic sheet provides a clear and safe viewing experience
    • 75 WS2812B digital LEDs capable of showing 2 billion colors
    • 3G WiFi support for wireless control; access point available if internet outage
    • Alexa support: turn on/off, set brightness, enable startup effect
    • Requires 2-3 amps of current from a North American 120v wall socket or USB battery pack

    What's included?

    • Colorizer Frame
    • 5-print Art Pack of your choice
    • Smartphone app for iOS and Android
    • Power supply with cord (NA plug)

    Art Packs

    We have partnered with many talented artists from around the world to bring you some of the most stunning and reactive pieces which provide a powerful visual effect, optimized for the best viewing experience in the Colorizer Frame.

    We offer 5 different themed Art Packs - you can add additional packs as an "add-on".

      

     

     

     

     

     

     

      Coloring Packs

      In addition to our art packs, we also have coloring packs that let you explore your creative side and make the experience more personal.  Add your own artistic works to the frame and see them in a whole new light!

       

       

      The Colorimetry Team

      The Colorimetry Team has shipped thousands of Colorizer lights around the world and has been hard at work to bring an integrated product experience that will wow users.  Our ten years of collective experience working on hardware and software products gives us confidence to bring customers a high quality product that is both easy and fun to use.

      Our Origins

      International Shipping

      International shipping is available and will be charged upon order fulfillment.  Customs duties may apply.  

      Risks

      Due to sourcing parts from many manufacturers, some international, a delay in our production line is possible. We have scoped the initial goal to what we view as attainable and are ready to adapt strategy to meet demand and interest.

Coloring Packs
In addition to our art packs, we also have coloring packs that let you explore your creative side and make the experience more personal.  Add your own artistic works to the frame and see them in a whole new light!

 

 


The Colorimetry Team
The Colorimetry Team has shipped thousands of Colorizer lights around the world and has been hard at work to bring an integrated product experience that will wow users.  Our ten years of collective experience working on hardware and software products gives us confidence to bring customers a high quality product that is both easy and fun to use.

Our Origins


International Shipping
International shipping is available and will be charged upon order fulfillment.  Customs duties may apply.  
Risks
Due to sourcing parts from many manufacturers, some international, a delay in our production line is possible. We have scoped the initial goal to what we view as attainable and are ready to adapt strategy to meet demand and interest.

story:
We wanted to improve the way you live your home or your favorite spaces and we did it by creating a unique, smart solution to meet your needs and standards.  Feel free to enjoy your favorite voice assistant, ezon.io is always ready for you.

ezon.io does not disturb and does not clutter. We could have made bulky external devices, but we opted to leave the design of your beloved environments intact.

ezon.io will be your favorite companion to control and automate all the applications you want like no one did it before. All without having countless devices and apps. Our first rule is to increase your degree of safety and comfort without making it stressful.


Everything is just at your fingertips, ezon.io is quick, easy, and intuitive to use. With the free companion app, you will be able to manage all your devices in a few easy steps. 


When you are away from home, close your shading system and make yourself sure that all your appliances are working as they should, a notification will warn you if something no longer works, preventing possible issues.

ezon.io turns your non-smart devices into smart devices. You never thought that could be possible. Also makes it easy to access any device via a remote or through your preferred voice assistant.

Like us, and all the techies, you're probably always busy, so saving time with the automated features is such a game-changer. Save time on boring tasks and focus on what really matters for you.

The ezon.io devices are suitable for both existing and new installations, only take up a little space, and will never bother you.

You can keep the little ones safe by turning off dangerous appliances that may come into contact with them. At night, don't risk waking up all the family while you come back late from the office, you can configure the lights to turn on in different ways based on time.

Control all the lights via your smartphone and voice or with the ezon.io switches. Don't be blinded by the lights or wake up your loved ones again.

Create a personalized atmosphere that fits your current mood. The illunaluce x ezon.io set of Italian design Smart LED lamps are designed to make your environment modern and elegant while keeping an eye on the environment.

Control a wide range of devices and appliances.
ezon.io supports 90/260V AC and  MAX 30V DC appliances. The ezon.io devices allow you to control the consumption of appliances, allowing them to be detached when necessary.

Open and close your roller shutters, curtains, garage door, and barriers or manage any bi-directional motor. With our ezon.io blind manager, it’s now possible to control many applications.

When you come back home open your shutters or curtains and turn on your appliances as TV or radio at the same time without controlling all the appliances individually. There are endless possibilities.

Follow the sunrise and sunset and control your appliances accordingly. Choose a specific time to toggle your scenarios or dim the lights precisely. 

ezon.io user interfaces are designed with the human in mind, not a robot. The ezon.io companion app provides unparalleled control over your environment, it's simple and quick to use and is available for both iOS and Android.

With the ezon.io Remote Button you can quickly recall scenarios or applications with a tap.

The Smart Home features are also available through your preferred voice assistants such as Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.




Interconnected Stand-Alone Solution. No point of failure.

All ezon.io devices are equipped with a localized configuration that allows them to work for you without interfacing with any control unit.


All devices can connect to each other using an innovative wireless connection, thus also acting as a signal repeater without necessarily having to work with a wifi access point and wifi repeaters.



 

To take advantage of the voice and remote control services, it's necessary to use a dedicated ezon.io device that provides internet access to the ezon.io devices' internal network.

How ezon.io can save your day from vendor fragmentation: When you buy (you shouldn't, really) a competitor device, usually it's a bunch of fragmented and specific appliances, that don't allow interoperability with all the devices that live with you in your home.



The ezon.io family has been designed to guarantee an infinite range of opportunities with their connected devices.

 

ezon.io Switch and Touch devices are our solutions for migrating your current switches or buttons to a Smart Home device.

These products can read the change of position or pressure on the existing physical command (or in the case of the ezon.io Touch, on a blind plug), and depending on their configuration they can send a command to other ezon.io devices set up for the reception.
 
The device can be configured to have multiple functions such as controlling the ezon.io relays (that can be used for light fixtures/sockets, etc ..), and even groups of them, and to recall back customized scenarios and automation.

As all the ezon.io devices, ezon.io Switch and ezon.io Touch are fully configurable also with a date and time schedule, for example, you can decide that a specific ezon.io device could act differently on Monday from 9 AM to 10 PM.
 
 
ezon.io Switch Relay and Touch Relay devices are our solutions for migrating your current switches or buttons to a Smart Home device, but they also integrate a configurable relay.

By combining the features of ezon.io Switch/Touch and ezon.io Relay, they are the right choice if you have a simple light application. With additionals ezon.io Switches you can add several points of control for your lighting application.

ezon.io Relay is our device to control and automate unlimited applications in your favorite Personal Spaces.

The ezon.io relay is capable to disconnect or restore the power supply to an electrical socket, open and close a door,  turn on and off a light fixture, control your sprinkler system, and much much more.

It can be used at your will in combination with the ezon.io family devices such as Switches, Touch, Remotes, Sensors to match every need.
It also performs customized scenarios and automation.
 
ezon.io Energy Manager device keeps track of your consumption and avoids annoying electrical disconnections due to excessive demand.

ezon.io Energy Manager integrates a lot of cool functions and tech, but it's still simple to operate, like all the ezon.io ecosystem. It communicates instantaneous absorption data and consumption statistics, that can be used for statistical use or, combined with others ezon.io Energy Managers can manage the disconnections of the sockets according to the configured priority through its built-in relays.
 

ezon.io Blind Manager device control and automate your shading system as rolling shutters and electrical blinds.

The ezon.io  Blind Manager allows the setting of your shading systems on different positions and different heights according to your needs.

The versatility of individually controlling each shade allows you to build customized scenarios based on your needs and ambiance conditions. This guarantees extreme flexibility and energy savings (up to 44% on your current bill).

Control your home remotely or via your voice whilst adding a personal touch to your ambiance with ezon.io Light Hub
ezon.io Light Hub is a multifunctional device that combines an ambient design RGB LED lamp and cloud-based features such as “ezon.io Worldwide”,  and voice assistant integration for providers like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

 


 

Control other ezon.io devices such as Illunaluce x ezon.io lamps, relays, and shading systems with the Light Sensor. 
The ezon.io Light Sensor can determine the level of light present in an environment. Like the ezon.io Switch is fully configurable so, for example, you can decide to dim an Illunaluce x ezon.io LED light fixture to keep a specific level of light in your work environment. It comes with a built-in rechargeable battery included.

Control the ezon.io devices and scenarios by simply pressing on the embossed logo.
The ezon.io Remote Control it's basically an ezon.io Switch with superpowers. You can take it anywhere into your personal space (for example near the sofà).
It comes in two form factors and is up to you to select the one that better integrates into your own mood. Built-in rechargeable battery included.
 

 


Our design lamps consist of a broad range of different models to meet every need.

For the Indiegogo campaign, We propose on the market the first results of the collaboration between Ilunaluce and ezon.io.

Made with the best construction standards, always connected, they use a plastic material that minimizes waste into the environment, from certified sources.



Light up your projects and ideas with a revolutionary connected design table lamp, designed for maximum freedom of positioning, equipped with a long-lasting battery and a 180-degree swiveling light beam. Perfect for professional lighting of the work area. The intensity of the LED light can also be finely adjusted according to needs, by an integrated button, the ezon.io app, or from other ezon.io devices (such as Remotes and Switches). 



Light up your relax and reading environment with a revolutionary connected design table lamp, with its compact structure and timeless design is crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees. The intensity of the LED light can also be finely adjusted according to needs, by an integrated button, the ezon.io app, or from other ezon.io devices (such as Remotes and Switches). 


Light up your social and relax environment (such as your living room) with a revolutionary connected design ground lamp, with its compact structure and timeless design is crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees. It comes in two versions: RGB and White. The intensity of the LED light can also be finely adjusted according to needs, by an integrated button, the ezon.io app, or from other ezon.io devices (such as Remotes and Switches). 

Light up your favorite environment with a connected design ceiling lamp, crafted to enlighten a large area below and create mood lighting above it. Both LED light sources are finely adjustable in light intensity as needed.

Light up your favorite environment with a connected design tubular ceiling light, crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees allowing freedom of installation according to your tastes, the LED light source is finely adjustable as needed, being able to always choose the intensity of the light.



The RGB connected design tubular ceiling light, which's been crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees that allows freedom of installation according to your tastes.
According to your mood, you can change the color by mixing up the RGB bright LEDs.
Hosting a party? Some nice effects are included.

Sustainability
ezon.io has a strong focus on the environment, aware of the environmental impact of plastic products in the terrestrial ecosystem, has designed its devices by minimizing the excesses of non-recyclable materials, using eco-sustainable packaging and rechargeable batteries. The devices have also been designed to exceed your expectations in terms of durability even in the future with software updates, new additions, and continuous support. ezon.io always remains attentive to the search for new production processes that will allow in the future to further reduce the environmental impact.


Already in manufacturing

Already in production! To obtain a product that maintains high-quality standards We bought the best raw materials, and We invested in tools and professionals,  to manufacture ezon.io devices by ourselves.

This step We took, it's also a game-changing opportunity for our backers.  As early backers before the crowdfunding platforms took off, We know the anxiety about waiting for a product that it's late on schedule due to a manufacturer delay and for ezon.io this isn't gonna be a problem anymore!

Why a crowdfunding campaign and why order now?
We decided to land on Indiegogo to spread the word about our journey and to expand our production volume. It is also important for us to create a lively community in which to receive support and feedback on the ezon.io ecosystem.

Aware of this, to thank all those who decide to support us by becoming backers, We decided to propose our products through advantageous bundles and add-ons at a discounted price.


The ezon.io Home Pack is the ideal product to control one of your lighting applications from two existing control points. This Pack is upgradable with our ezon.io add-ons and other Perks available on Indiegogo.


The ezon.io Energy Manager PACK is an incredible companion for your appliances, with 2 ezon.io Energy Managers it will be possible to know the appliance's consumptions in real-time and to avoid unpleasant inconveniences such as electrical disconnections due to excessive demand.


The ezon.io Roll-up PACK is a perfect Smart Manager for your shading systems such as motorized blinds or shutters.


The ezon.io Smart Desk Lamp is our best seller to support your Work and Study moments. You can choose your favorite design between Sodio and Berillio during the checkout process.


The ezon.io Floor Lamp PACK lights up your personal spaces such as your living room, in a Smart Way.  It also includes an ezon.io Remote Control, and its battery charger so you can set-up for example a preferred scenario.
You can choose between the RGB version and the White one during the checkout process.


The ezon.io BUNDLE is the perfect choice for those who would like to upgrade their entire non-smart-home into a next-generation Smart Home. 
It includes: 2 x ezon.io Switch, 3x Switch Relay, 1x Relay, 1x Light Hub, 2x Remotes, 1x Battery charger.




ezon.io is born from an idea of tech expert innovators in hardware and software solutions in reply to people's new needs.

We used to build custom products and services for many large facilities and tech startups.

The in-house developed innovative tech has attracted new professionals who joined the group, for example, a mechanical engineer and a financial specialist.

With a complete team, We’re now an efficient and tested structure that has given birth to a new ecosystem.

For ezon.io we have in fact joined our areas of expertise to realize one of the best Smart Home solution to the market.

ezon.io is based in Italy (Monza), where almost all of our global value chain is located.

 

 




We tested our products in our spaces and houses for more than a year. We assessed some fixes and improvements, but We're quite sure about our product.

All the devices are upgradable Over The Air, and the App with the cloud infrastructure it's still evolving fast, so if something goes wrong We can deliver a software upgrade that fixes it.

Due to the unstable shipping rates, caused by major issues that everyone was involved in in the past months, We can't provide an accurate shipping rate for your perks.

Our shipping partners are currently in a constantly evolving situation (that We hope will be resolved soon), so they asked to postpone the shipping rate quotation at the end of the campaign, however an overview of the quotation it's available in a shipping policy.

Like the ezon.io Switch is fully configurable so, for example, you can decide to dim an Illunaluce x ezon.io LED light fixture to keep a specific level of light in your work environment. It comes with a built-in rechargeable battery included.




Control the ezon.io devices and scenarios by simply pressing on the embossed logo.The ezon.io Remote Control it's basically an ezon.io Switch with superpowers. You can take it anywhere into your personal space (for example near the sofà).It comes in two form factors and is up to you to select the one that better integrates into your own mood. Built-in rechargeable battery included. 

 





Our design lamps consist of a broad range of different models to meet every need.For the Indiegogo campaign, We propose on the market the first results of the collaboration between Ilunaluce and ezon.io.Made with the best construction standards, always connected, they use a plastic material that minimizes waste into the environment, from certified sources.

Light up your projects and ideas with a revolutionary connected design table lamp, designed for maximum freedom of positioning, equipped with a long-lasting battery and a 180-degree swiveling light beam. Perfect for professional lighting of the work area. The intensity of the LED light can also be finely adjusted according to needs, by an integrated button, the ezon.io app, or from other ezon.io devices (such as Remotes and Switches). Light up your relax and reading environment with a revolutionary connected design table lamp, with its compact structure and timeless design is crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees. The intensity of the LED light can also be finely adjusted according to needs, by an integrated button, the ezon.io app, or from other ezon.io devices (such as Remotes and Switches). 




Light up your social and relax environment (such as your living room) with a revolutionary connected design ground lamp, with its compact structure and timeless design is crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees. It comes in two versions: RGB and White. The intensity of the LED light can also be finely adjusted according to needs, by an integrated button, the ezon.io app, or from other ezon.io devices (such as Remotes and Switches). 
Light up your favorite environment with a connected design ceiling lamp, crafted to enlighten a large area below and create mood lighting above it. Both LED light sources are finely adjustable in light intensity as needed.
Light up your favorite environment with a connected design tubular ceiling light, crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees allowing freedom of installation according to your tastes, the LED light source is finely adjustable as needed, being able to always choose the intensity of the light.
The RGB connected design tubular ceiling light, which's been crafted to enlighten the area at 360 degrees that allows freedom of installation according to your tastes.According to your mood, you can change the color by mixing up the RGB bright LEDs.Hosting a party? Some nice effects are included.



Sustainability

ezon.io has a strong focus on the environment, aware of the environmental impact of plastic products in the terrestrial ecosystem, has designed its devices by minimizing the excesses of non-recyclable materials, using eco-sustainable packaging and rechargeable batteries. The devices have also been designed to exceed your expectations in terms of durability even in the future with software updates, new additions, and continuous support. ezon.io always remains attentive to the search for new production processes that will allow in the future to further reduce the environmental impact.




Already in manufacturing



Already in production! To obtain a product that maintains high-quality standards We bought the best raw materials, and We invested in tools and professionals,  to manufacture ezon.io devices by ourselves.

This step We took, it's also a game-changing opportunity for our backers.  As early backers before the crowdfunding platforms took off, We know the anxiety about waiting for a product that it's late on schedule due to a manufacturer delay and for ezon.io this isn't gonna be a problem anymore!



Why a crowdfunding campaign and why order now?

We decided to land on Indiegogo to spread the word about our journey and to expand our production volume. It is also important for us to create a lively community in which to receive support and feedback on the ezon.io ecosystem.Aware of this, to thank all those who decide to support us by becoming backers, We decided to propose our products through advantageous bundles and add-ons at a discounted price.




The ezon.io Home Pack is the ideal product to control one of your lighting applications from two existing control points. This Pack is upgradable with our ezon.io add-ons and other Perks available on Indiegogo.The ezon.io Energy Manager PACK is an incredible companion for your appliances, with 2 ezon.io Energy Managers it will be possible to know the appliance's consumptions in real-time and to avoid unpleasant inconveniences such as electrical disconnections due to excessive demand.The ezon.io Roll-up PACK is a perfect Smart Manager for your shading systems such as motorized blinds or shutters.The ezon.io Smart Desk Lamp is our best seller to support your Work and Study moments. You can choose your favorite design between Sodio and Berillio during the checkout process.The ezon.io Floor Lamp PACK lights up your personal spaces such as your living room, in a Smart Way.  It also includes an ezon.io Remote Control, and its battery charger so you can set-up for example a preferred scenario.You can choose between the RGB version and the White one during the checkout process.
The ezon.io BUNDLE is the perfect choice for those who would like to upgrade their entire non-smart-home into a next-generation Smart Home. It includes: 2 x ezon.io Switch, 3x Switch Relay, 1x Relay, 1x Light Hub, 2x Remotes, 1x Battery charger.


ezon.io is born from an idea of tech expert innovators in hardware and software solutions in reply to people's new needs.
We used to build custom products and services for many large facilities and tech startups.
The in-house developed innovative tech has attracted new professionals who joined the group, for example, a mechanical engineer and a financial specialist.
With a complete team, We’re now an efficient and tested structure that has given birth to a new ecosystem.
For ezon.io we have in fact joined our areas of expertise to realize one of the best Smart Home solution to the market.
ezon.io is based in Italy (Monza), where almost all of our global value chain is located.
 



 





We tested our products in our spaces and houses for more than a year. We assessed some fixes and improvements, but We're quite sure about our product.All the devices are upgradable Over The Air, and the App with the cloud infrastructure it's still evolving fast, so if something goes wrong We can deliver a software upgrade that fixes it.Due to the unstable shipping rates, caused by major issues that everyone was involved in in the past months, We can't provide an accurate shipping rate for your perks.Our shipping partners are currently in a constantly evolving situation (that We hope will be resolved soon), so they asked to postpone the shipping rate quotation at the end of the campaign, however an overview of the quotation it's available in a shipping policy.

story:
Shipments

Ships within 1-5 days from Hong Kong warehouse.

Usually, it will be delivered within 3-8 business days according to the Country.

Already shipped to more than 50 Countries.

Most Shipping countries:

United States, Singapore, Canada, Australia, United Kingdom, Hong Kong, Germany, France, Russia, India, Japan, South Korea, ...

Rigavit is a very compact, battery powered device that cares of your plants while you are busy or abroad.

Taking care of your plants becomes hard sometimes, when you travel, go on a vacation or even when you are at home, you have lots of other responsibilities like your kids, cooking, work, you may forget to water your plants.

That is why we wanted to create a very simple, small and elegant device that works with battery and standard water bottles. and simply to take care of our plants while we are busy or abroad.

  • Fill your water bottle. Place 1 hose to your flower, and other hose to bottle.
  • Set amount of water and timer from buttons on device.

  • Press "Start" Button. That is it.
  • It will provide a specific dose of water on schedule you set to your plants for about 6 months

  • Very Easy and Safe to Use
  • No need to ask anyone to water your plants
  • No need to worry about your flowers anymore
  • Your plants are always well cared
  • Gives a comfort feeling
  • You earn extra free time
  • Your absence up to 6 months won't be a problem
  • Flowers watered at exact time with exact amount of water even when you are at home or office
  • You can forget if you water them or not, Rigavit won't
  • Avoids extreme watering if two person are unaware of each other.
  • It always supplies same amount of water
  • ...

  • Indoor Home and/or Office use
  • Works only with 4 AA battery which will work about 3-6 months depending on your interval.
  • Uses standard water bottles as water supply
  • Fits to all kind of pots (circular, rectangular, square)
  • With 1 device and 1 bottle you could water up to 3 plants.
  • Could be used with or without nozzle
  • No Plugs, No cables needed
  • Bendable nozzle ensures you water necessary area on pot.
  • White, Red, Yellow, Green, Black colors.
  • Status Led : blinks every minute if battery level is good and working. blinks every 2 seconds if battery level is critical

 

Device comes with bendable silicone nozzle, it is 9 mm diameter, 15 cm length, a state of the art., it has 14 angled holes. With angles, how high you mount, it will water bigger area.

When watering the plants, the biggest trick is to penetrate water to a larger surface of your plant. Watering only 1 spot will not make your flower very happy. 15 cm long bendable silicone nozzle will reach a larger surface of your flower. This silicone nozzle has 14 watering holes and you can adjust it's shape easily for your convenience.

You can also order more bendable silicone nozzles,

 

bendable silicone nozzle

you can use it with this nozzles or without nozzle. it is up to you.

without nozzle

Rigavit works with all plastic, glass water bottles or any other water containers. All you need is to choice right size depending on your absence and plant's water need.

Box Includes

1 x Rigavit Device

1 x Rigavit Device Holder

1 x Bendable Silicone Nozzle

1 x Nozzle Holder

2 mt Hose

User's Manual

*Batteries not included.

 

 

Rigavit Colors

 

Click here if you want to be dealer in your region

Q- Can we use Rigavit in different countries ?

A- Yes. Our device works with 4 AA battery which you may be able to find anywhere in the world

Q- What is the size of Rigavit ?

A- 136 x 35 x 40 mm

Q-I am going on vacation for 4 weeks, will Rigavit water my plants for that long ?

A- Yes, Rigavit will work for 4 to 6 months with the same batteries. As long as you have a big watering can, your plants are under control.

Q- I have many flowers at my home, should i buy many Rigavit ?

A- If your flowers are close to each other, you can use only 1 Rigavit which will take care of up to 3 flowers. But if they are away from each other because of the sun light issues, you may need to buy more than 1 Rigavit...

Q-How do i let you know about which color i want ?

A- We’ll ask about the color to all our backers before the shipment. Alternatively, you can e-mail us.

Q- Can i use it without Nozzle ?

A- Yes, you can use it with or without nozzle.

Q- Do i have to use hose in kit?

A- No, you can use any hose that fits to device.

Q- How do i order extra nozzles ?

A- Please change your pledge price by adding the total amount of nozzle kit For example, if you want to buy 2 more bendable nozzle kit, please add 2X6$=$12 to your original pledge price.

Q: Do I get warranty for my Rigavit ?

A- Yes. We have one-year warranty for Rigavit.

story:
Blacksor will protect your personal home internet network or your business internet network. Blacksor Technology block hackers and malwares from getting inside the internet network, blacksor technology is a cloud based structure that is connected to blacksor secured servers and on the disk on key devices there is the cloud connection that operate the entire secured technology. Blacksor identify the packets and the intervals of the suspicious access That The Malware Or Hackers printed and generated or any malicious software identification and block it instantly and will audit the attack.

Blacksor block the malware from getting inside the network and audit it. Also please note  that the cyber world is changing a lot and blacksor will always get the updates with us as it is cloud based security installed on the blacksor disk on key so in case new attacks came in the blacksor will always know how to handle it and will always stay up to date in order to protect the network.

Blacksor Have Smart algorithm that act on real time to prevent hack, scam, identity thiefs, malwares, ransomware attack, It Will Block Suspicious IP's and behaviors Of Online Users

1. Blacksor Product Moves To Shipping Stage And Have Begun Process Orders Of Blacksor Disk On Key Device. First 2,000 Pieces Are Being Shipped Soon And The manufacturer Have Started The Mass Production Creation. As Of Now We Already Have Final Inventory ready With The Blacksor Software.

See On The Videos In The Story Section The Shipping Process Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UqKtNO0X62Y 

2. Blacksor Product Proof Of Production Stage The Team Have Begun The Mass Production Process Of Blacksor Disk On Key Device. First 2,000 Pieces Are Ready To Be Shipped Soon And The manufacturer Have Started Using The Prototype To Create The Tulling For Mass Production Creation. As Of Now We Already Have Final Inventory ready And Soon The Mass Production Will be Able To Generate 1 Million Pieces Per Month For Delivery With Blacksor Software.

See On The Videos In The Story Section The Mass Production Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6H4cxhC2fxc 

3. Blacksor Campagin is a relaunch/continuation of the previous campaign

It is a first of its kind innovative solution that protect you from hackers and identity thieves by blocking any illegal access to your network.

COMPLETE NETWORK SECURITY PROTECTION

Your network security deserves the best protection. Traditional tools can't solve all security problems, blacksor redefines network security. Prevent Cyber Attacks. Network Traffic Analysis.

The Ultimate software to protect from hackers and identity thieves and protects your data.

Our Approach To Security

The Goal Of Blacksor Team Is To Protect Home And Work Networks From Hackers And Identity Thiefs and malware treats Accessing And Taking Advantage And Harm You

Innovative Cyber Protection Of Your Office And Home Network Online

Blacksor Prevention Software That Is Installed On Disk On Key And Connected To Your Network Internet Router Will Protect Your Intire Network Connection And All The Devices That Is Connected To The Network And That is Using The Netwrok! The Blacksor Will Be The Netwrok Guardian And By Using It Your Will NOt Need Any Anti Virus For Each Device As Our Smart Algorithm Will Protect All The Devices That Is Connected To The Network

Include: All Internet Connection, PC, Mobile, CCTV, Tv, Any Network Adapters, Intercom, Smart Home Systems And More...

Blacksor is literally plug and play.

  • No need to install any individual software on each of your device.
  • Blacksor connects to your home network and starts scanning your network immediately.

Blacksor device connects to USB plugins and to network plugins with adapter so in case your router doesn’t have USB port, we offer this connector that will enable you to use Blacksor on your router even if it doesnt have USB port. (available as an addon in perks)

 

  

Using an efficient Content Delivery Network, Blacksor improves performance by optimizing the traffic and analyzing it in real time to prevent potential fraud, phishing links and keeps your home or office network safe from identity thieves and sneaky hackers.

Unlike traditional cybersecurity devices, the Blacksor acts like a guardian for your network eliminating the need of installing antivirus software on all your devices.

Blacksor provides advanced malware & ransomware protection by identifying a potential threat before it does any damage and block it instantly.

BLACKSOR Group was set up in 2013 and represents considerable authority in giving vital and esteem added counseling administrations to the business and business divisions.

The gathering is one of the most established and driving in its field Worlwide, with high notoriety and a wide customer base, both in the business division in Israel and abroad and in open associations and organizations.

The BLACKSOR Group works Worldwide, utilizing the sending of expert universal foundation and broad experience.
The human capital of the gathering is gifted in the territories of data gathering, examine vital arranging and innovation. Previous senior officials work in first-class units in The Israeli intelligence Units

The BLACKSOR Group gives its customers expert and great data, with the most extreme consideration to keep up corporate morals and tact and to utilize just lawful methods. The activities are done intimately with driving legitimate consultants in the economy.

The BLACKSOR Group's proficient tasks make it conceivable to acquire a particular upper hand and a complete, extraordinary and modern picture of the market and contenders

 

Customs & Duty

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. 

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all duties or taxes in your country if applicable. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through indiegogo.

If you would like to estimate your duties, you can use this online tool (remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency):

simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs (including marking an order as a gift, which we cannot do). Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

 

Shipping & Return Policy

It is critical that you enter your correct, valid address when placing your order. If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address or moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

We are not accepting returns of the blacksor disk on key that are ordered via Indiegogo . However, if your device is not perfect, please reach out to us at info@blacksor.com, and we will do whatever we can to help make it right!

 

Risks and Challenges

As you can see on the timeline, we have been working on this product for more than a year, and have already completed the design / development and have moved forward on the process of creating all the molds, fixtures, and processes needed for mass production.

Here are a few risks and challenges that we can think of:

Product Manufacturing Delays

We’ve produced a small run of samples and we feel confident that a large production order will be successful; however, it is common that factories can have unforeseen setbacks. We plan to stay in constant communication with our manufacturer including working on-site to resolve any challenges that may arise.

Shipping Delays

As with any manufactured good, delays can happen -- a typhoon can hit, or a pallet can get stuck in a shipyard. We’ve padded our schedule to accommodate some changes, but will let our backers know immediately if we foresee any updates to the timeline for delivery.

story:
Help to build Tommys House.

Sometimes people fall on hard times and they have nowhere left to go. According to the publication “Estimating the Need,” (PIT Report), it is projected that over the course of this year, 25,612 adults and children will be experiencing homelessness in the State of New Jersey. Many of these people turn to homeless shelters to find a place to live temporarily. To date, the availability of beds, or even floor space, in New Jersey's homeless shelters falls short of the need by more than 20%. By this equation, more than 5,000 men, women and children will not have a place to sleep on any given night in New Jersey.

James Damico, President and Founder of Tommys House will gladly tell you: “If you are like me, you cannot turn away from seeing the pain, your heart breaks, you reach into your pocket for 10 or 20 dollars to give, but you know that the cash is not going to keep them warm or safe. Instead, support Tommys House to put your heartfelt gift into action and provide that safe and warm place for these less fortunate people to rest their heads. I see the commercials for helping animals, and thank goodness they have shelters for animals, but what about our fellow man?”

Tommys House is breaking ground on building a new temporary housing facility from an existing structure in Passaic County. The facility will offer temporary emergency housing for homeless men and women in Passaic and neighboring Bergen Counties. With the opening of this much needed shelter, Tommys House will provide to those who are in need, a warm bed, and access to a hearty meal, clean showers, clothing and a safe environment where they can rest their heads for the night.

Tommys House will also assist with referral services, to help set up treatment and/or follow up care. We have access to both state funded and private institutions in the mental health, substance abuse, and medical fields. Along with referral to treatment facilities we also help with referring to housing, social services, food services, and the basic necessities for short-term stabilization back into society. Here at Tommy’s House we are the helping hand to pick up those who need help, back onto their feet.

At Tommys House, we value each and every person as a fellow human, and will empower the homeless to build a positive future by providing the resources and assistance critical to growth and stability in society.

The name of each donor will be included on a Wall of Thanks in the Building. It is important for the homeless community to see how many people have given in support of them. This is a critical step in their progress toward self-sufficiency, and to feeling a connection to the community they live in.
story_txt:

According to the publication “Estimating
the Need,” (PIT Report), it is projected that over the course of
this year, 25,612 adults and
children will be
experiencing homelessness in the State of New Jersey.
 Many of
these people turn to homeless shelters

place to live temporarily.  To date, the

story:
Helpfulpeeps makes it easier than ever for people who want help to connect with people who are able & willing to help. For Free! 

After a massively successful pilot launch we are now ready to grow. We invite you to back our campaign and be part of our journey!  

The Founders

Helpfulpeeps was founded by Saf and Simon who both left successful careers in the corporate world to pursue a life driven by purpose rather than money. 

They identified a number of challenges that they wanted to address such as: 

  • Society's over-reliance on money - Despite recessions and the mounting debt crisis society still seems to put 'money' on a pedestal and measures value primarily in terms of dollars or pounds. Isn't our Human Capital (time/energy) equally if not more valuable? 
  • Lack of a sense of community - Despite the internet revolution and the advancement of technology it can be argued that we are more disconnected than ever. Could we use technology to re-create the best aspects of traditional community life? 
  • Barriers to charity based volunteering - In today's 'on demand' world where everyone leads busy lives there seemed to be a number of barriers that prevents helpful people from getting involved in traditional volunteering be it lengthy forms to fill in or committing to a set number of hours per week. What if there was an easier way? Wouldn't more people get involved if you could help on your terms around your schedule?


Your help will enable us to continue our work and to take the next steps towards creating the worlds most helpful network! 

Your help will go towards supporting us in the following areas:

  • Growing the community: This is our primary focus at the moment and the majority of funds raised will be invested in growing the network. This is because there is a direct correlation between the size of the community and the helpfulness of the network. To achieve our vision we must expand the network as quickly as possible. 
  • Events that Inspire: We will organise regular offline events that bring people together and inspires the community. We want to make an impact at the grass roots level in communities across the UK and globally.
  • Improving the product: We are constantly looking to improve the platform based on your feedback. We want to improve your user experience and keep bringing you new features. These include filtering by location, advance search functionality, categorisation of posts and much more. 

Please see below some of the twitter love that we've received!

In the couple of months since we launched our pilot campaign, we have achieved all of this with zero marketing budget!



We also get daily emails, tweets and facebook messages of support and encouragement. This serves as a reminder that many of you share in our vision and this helps keep us going through the ups and downs on our startup journey.

Having run this pilot campaign we feel that we have validated our idea and proven our concept works. Our goal now is to grow the network so that more people can join in and reap the benefits of being part of this helpful community. 


Step 1 browse through a list of relevant appeals for help 

Step 2 engage with other users via comments and offer help 

Step 3 help someone in real life and earn karma! You will also receive a testimonial as a way of showing their appreciation for your time and effort. 

Users can post an appeal for help with just about anything (as long as it's legal!). 

Some Examples based on recent successful appeals are: 

  • Lift to the airport
  • Learning to ride a bicycle
  • DIY skills
  • Help with moving house 
  • Advice on SEO, Sales, Logo design, App Development etc 

1. Help us spread the word about our campaign

  • Share this campaign on Facebook 
  • Tweet about this campaign 
  • Email your friends, family & colleagues and share our story with them 
  • Shout about helpfulpeeps from the rooftops :) 

2. Join us at www.helpfulpeeps.com and become part of the community! It's Free!

3. Do you know any helpful people? Invite them to join and help us grow the community.
4. Become a helpfulpeeps ambassador and help us grow the community in your area. 
If you've managed to get this far - Thank You so much for your time. You're part of our helpfulpeeps family now!

story:
Short Summary

HomeologyShop is a design platform and online retail store where anyone can submit a design to be included in the Homeology home accessories range and earn revenue from the sale of that product on HomeologyShop.com.

The concept came about when award-winning interior design and DIY blogger Germarie Bruwer of Homeology.co.za realized that there is a growing need not only for young graphic and interior designers to get exposure for their work, but also for the home owner to have a real choice when it comes to what they put in their homes. This puts creativity back in the hands of the artisan as well as the consumer, in a sustainable and affordable way.

"We have come across so many incredibly creative people doing beautiful work, but they do not have the exposure or enough momentum to sell their products and make a living from it."

HomeologyShop gives the designer, entrepeneur, artist and anyone with an idea the chance to see that idea being manufactured and sold through our shop.

Every 2 weeks, a new design for the range will be chosen by public voting and we will then put it into production right here in South Africa and shipped to the world. We will start with cushion covers and canvass prints and plan to expand the range into crockery, fabric, lighting and even furniture as our design database grows. Anyone, anywhere can submit their design. If the public likes it, we'll make it!

Each design will have a limited print run based on popular demand, so every piece that you buy is a piece of art for your home.


What We Need & What You Get

The blog already provides a great following for our brand, so launching the design platform and shop really only requires designers to submit their work and customers to buy those products. Sounds simple, right?!

  • The shop will be launched with a design competition for interior and graphic design students. The winning designer and 2 runners up all get their designs manufactured, with prize money for the 3. Funding will go towards a R6,000 grand prize, R3,000 for the second place and R1,000 for the 3rd place. The prize money is a big enough incentive to get as many students as possible to participate in this initial competition which will give us momentum. The winning designers will of course also get profit share on any of their designs sold as per the profit share agreement.
  • Our cushions will be for sale through the online store at R280 incl local shipping. Including international shipping, each cushion will cost roughly $30. So your additional $5 will go towards getting the ball rolling.
  • Pretty soon, our store will be stocked with unique, creative home accessories for you to purchase - and the designer gets a percentage of that profit.
  • Even if we don't get all the funding required, we will still launch this platform. It will just take longer to get the full functionality and production going - but we shall prevail!

The Impact

Fresh, new and interesting designs that didn't take months to get to the consumer by which time they are not trending anymore. It gives the artisan the opportunity to create their own products out into the market and the consumer to create their own style by curating their accessories.

Risks & Challenges

Making a name for yourself as an artist or designer - and knowing if your product is going to be successful in the market - is difficult and a huge risk which many  people cannot afford to take. Our platform lets designers know if there is a demand for their product before it's put into production, theregy elliminating the risk .

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if design and home accessories is not your thing, if you can see the merit in giving the consumer choice while supporting artisans, please share our vision with your friends.

Any support, whether financial or by sharing our story will help to bring this project to life.

THANK YOU!

Germarie Bruwer

Homeologyshop.com

story:
Hello, and thanks for checking out my Indiegogo campaign.  My name is Nick and I love making buttons.  I live in Connecticut with my wife and daughter.  I am a geek, a gamer, a renaissance faire performer, and a graphic designer.  Two years ago, I discovered a basic button maker at my job, and that started my addiction to making pinback buttons.  Since then, I have purchased a 2.25" professional button maker, and have designed and made thousands of buttons.  Geek buttons, rennie buttons, memorial buttons, promotional buttons.  You name it!  Still, I think there is more I can do if I can make smaller buttons.  I want to purchase a 1.5" button maker, but I can't do it alone.

My goal is to collect funds to purchase a Tecre 1.5" Button Maker, Graphic Punch, and 1000 Pinback Button Parts.  The funds collected will go towards:

  • Equipment and Components - $450.00
  • Shipping Supplies and Postage - Apx. $80.00
  • Indiegogo Fees - Apx. $30.00
  • Printing and Manufacturing Time - $90.00

By contributing to my campaign, you get buttons.  You can select any from my current catalog, or send me artwork for your own buttons!  Click here for my current catalog.  Up your donation by $5, and I will design a custom button for you!  I will then mail your buttons to you via US Postal Service, using First Class Mail or Priority Mail, whichever is less expensive.  Sorry, but shipping to U.S. only.
If I don't meet my goal, purchasing the button maker will not be possible.  However, I will still send every one their order as 2.25" Buttons.

So what if I exceed my goal?  Bonus round for my supporters!  When we meet certain milestones, I plan on making more options available.

If we exceed $750.00, I will double everyone's Perks!

If you contribute enough to achieve a Perk, please take a look at the catalog.  It is filled with my original designs.  Tell me which design(s) you would like and how many of each.  You may also send me print-ready artwork.  Artwork should be in JPG, PNG, or PDF formats, the higher he resolution the better.
If you contribute an extra $5, or select a Perk that includes a custom design, please let me know what you would like your button to look like.  Be as descriptive as possible, and forward any photos or artwork you would like to be included.  I will then create the design and provide a proof for your review.  You will have a chance to make changes or corrections, and I will provide another proof.  Once I have your approval, I will send you an electronic version to post wherever, and I'll get your buttons printed and pressed.

I know not everyone can contribute financially.  Please, spread the word.  Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pony Express!
Thank you for taking the time to read my pitch, and thank you in advance for your support.

story:
About this project

The Most Intelligent, Productive & Assistive Smart Mirror You'll Ever Use.

Eve is a fully customizable, touchscreen interactive smart mirror that allows you to experience your home in a whole new way. We made it light, tiny, and beautiful. It fits perfectly in every studio, workshop, and home! Let me show you how cool this smart mirror can be.

 

WHO SHOULD USE EVE SMART MIRROR? 

Whether you are an early adopter, a smart home enthusiast, or new to the smart home scene, the beauty of Eve Smart Mirror is that it can work for everyone. The Eve Smart Mirror is simple and familiar, simple plug and play operation until an Eve Smart Mirror Application brings it to life. It is compatible with an ever-growing list of applications/technologies. It is easy to install and will work with different frames by easily swapping frames in and out as your needs change.

AN ORDINARY MIRROR WITH AN INNOVATIVE TWIST.

Eve Smart Mirror is a new type of mirror, but it's also the natural evolution of a product category that's not seen much innovation in the last century.

Smart home technology is already in our everyday lives… from simple thermostat comfort and energy efficiency to more elaborate security and home automation. But often the question is… where to begin? 

With any new technology boom, there are always going to be several competing devices… wouldn’t it be great if there was one device with the capability to work with all devices? 

That’s why we created Eve.

 

Eve has your back!  

  • No setup. Just plug & play! 
  • No need to rely on any other device or equipment
  • No need to rely on local WIFI 
  • Freedom to move around the room, while controlling everything from your voice

Smudge Proof Touch Screen

So you may be wondering, what about smudges? Won't my finger prints be all over the mirror? Well, we have some great news, we've worked around the clock to make sure that your Eve Smart Mirror is not only an enjoyable experience but also a clean one. By incorporating the latest smudge proof technology, we've ensured that no traces will be left behind.

 

 

App Store

This is a mirror designed for you. We not only wanted to give you a unique experience in your home, but we also wanted it to be personal. We've partnered with a team of developers and created what is now known as the Eve Smart Store.

What is the Eve Smart Store?

The Eve Smart Store has everything you could imagine. With over 500+ Applications to choose from, the Smart Store will provide you with unlimited things to do on your Eve Smart Mirror. We have opened our App Store to all developers, thus allowing anyone to submit their creative applications as a contribution to our app store. By including an App Store in our mirrors, we are bringing our customers a pleasant and exclusive experience.

App Show Case

These are just a few examples of the 500+ Applications you can choose from on your Eve Smart Mirror. There are no boundaries when it comes to the unlimited features Eve beholds.

 

Manage your Home

We wanted to deliver a more connected experience to your home by giving you the ability to control your lights and your blinds. Wake up feeling refreshed as your blinds open effortlessly, pouring in natural sunlight. Or adjust your bedroom lights, with the ability to fade on or off, providing you with a relaxing start to your day. By including these innovative features in your Eve Smart Mirror, we are making your day easier than ever before.

Interchangeable Frames

We've partnered with the finest frame manufacturers in Houston, Texas. With the combined effort of both teams, we've created an interchangeable frame so easy to install, anyone can do it. We've made the frames an affordable price of $59.00. There are plenty of designs to choose from in order to furnish your Eve Smart Mirror.

Voice Activated

We understand you may not always be in the mood to get up, we feel the same way. Don’t worry, on the occasion you do decide to lay in bed, the Eve Smart Mirror is Voice Activated and ready to assist. You can control most features with your voice, allowing you to use your mirror wherever you are in your room.

 

Motion Detection / Facial Recognition

Your Eve Smart Mirror may be used by multiple people. That being said, we've organized a simple way for Eve to store multiple profiles. The mirror is designed to automatically detect motion and begin the facial recognition process. Eve then proceeds to load your custom profile, including your settings and personal applications- allowing several users to create their own personal experience. This setting can also be turned off if undesired.

Water Proof

We know accidents happen, say you accidentally spill your drink on your new Eve Smart Mirror. Just wipe it off and keep your good day rolling! Eve is 100% waterproof to ensure there is no damage to your mirror.

 

 

Here are some other cool things about Eve Smart Mirror

 

READY TO BACK THIS PROJECT? HERE'S WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW.

HOW TO BACK :

 

1. Choose a reward level. 

2. As our backer community grows, so will our ability to release new technology. We’ll post these “add-ons” as they become available, and communicate them as an update. 

3. Relax, you're done for now. All details like shipping information and add-on specifics will be collected after the campaign has ended.  

ABOUT US

Eve Smart Mirror was born out of necessity, for our own use. We then realized that so many of our friends loved the mirror them selfs.

Eve was developed in December of 2015. Eve was created to change the way you look at mirrors. We believed that we could give you a product that brings a more personal connection to any home.

So far all of our feedback has been over the top, everyone from professionals “on-the-go” to teenagers are enjoying the many useful benefits of Eve Smart Mirror. Together with our team, we take our passion for innovation beyond our products and in every decision we make. 

 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

We've now finalized our Eve Smart Mirror prototype, but moving to the production phase requires significant capital and scale. We need your help to finance the required tooling and meet minimum order quantities. We've spent months working out all of the details at all levels of this project, and are very excited about finally having the opportunity to bring the simplicity and reliability of Eve Smart Mirror to each one of you. 

SPREAD THE WORD 

The EVE SMART MIRROR needs pledging but above all, it needs your attention and interest! 

If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons. Help us spread the word and get things started! 

 

 

Thank You! 

We are beyond grateful to everyone who has reviewed an backed our campaign and helping us spread the word. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. 

Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve. 

You are part of our EVE family.

We made it light, tiny, and beautiful. It fits perfectly in every studio, workshop, and home! Let me show you how cool this smart mirror can be. WHO SHOULD USE EVE SMART MIRROR? Whether you are an early adopter, a smart home enthusiast, or new to the smart home scene, the beauty of Eve Smart Mirror is that it can work for everyone. The Eve Smart Mirror is simple and familiar, simple plug and play operation until an Eve Smart Mirror Application brings it to life. It is compatible with an ever-growing list of applications/technologies. It is easy to install and will work with different frames by easily swapping frames in and out as your needs change.AN ORDINARY MIRROR WITH AN INNOVATIVE TWIST.Eve Smart Mirror is a new type of mirror, but it's also the natural evolution of a product category that's not seen much innovation in the last century.Smart home technology is already in our everyday lives… from simple thermostat comfort and energy efficiency to more elaborate security and home automation. But often the question is… where to begin? With any new technology boom, there are always going to be several competing devices… wouldn’t it be great if there was one device with the capability to work with all devices? That’s why we created Eve. Eve has your back!  
No setup. Just plug & play! 
No need to rely on any other device or equipment
No need to rely on local WIFI 
Freedom to move around the room, while controlling everything from your voice
Smudge Proof Touch ScreenSo you may be wondering, what about smudges? Won't my finger prints be all over the mirror? Well, we have some great news, we've worked around the clock to make sure that your Eve Smart Mirror is not only an enjoyable experience but also a clean one. By incorporating the latest smudge proof technology, we've ensured that no traces will be left behind.  App StoreThis is a mirror designed for you. We not only wanted to give you a unique experience in your home, but we also wanted it to be personal. We've partnered with a team of developers and created what is now known as the Eve Smart Store.What is the Eve Smart Store?The Eve Smart Store has everything you could imagine. With over 500+ Applications to choose from, the Smart Store will provide you with unlimited things to do on your Eve Smart Mirror. We have opened our App Store to all developers, thus allowing anyone to submit their creative applications as a contribution to our app store. By including an App Store in our mirrors, we are bringing our customers a pleasant and exclusive experience.App Show CaseThese are just a few examples of the 500+ Applications you can choose from on your Eve Smart Mirror. There are no boundaries when it comes to the unlimited features Eve beholds. Manage your HomeWe wanted to deliver a more connected experience to your home by giving you the ability to control your lights and your blinds. Wake up feeling refreshed as your blinds open effortlessly, pouring in natural sunlight. Or adjust your bedroom lights, with the ability to fade on or off, providing you with a relaxing start to your day. By including these innovative features in your Eve Smart Mirror, we are making your day easier than ever before.Interchangeable FramesWe've partnered with the finest frame manufacturers in Houston, Texas. With the combined effort of both teams, we've created an interchangeable frame so easy to install, anyone can do it. We've made the frames an affordable price of $59.00. There are plenty of designs to choose from in order to furnish your Eve Smart Mirror.Voice ActivatedWe understand you may not always be in the mood to get up, we feel the same way. Don’t worry, on the occasion you do decide to lay in bed, the Eve Smart Mirror is Voice Activated and ready to assist. You can control most features with your voice, allowing you to use your mirror wherever you are in your room. Motion Detection / Facial RecognitionYour Eve Smart Mirror may be used by multiple people. That being said, we've organized a simple way for Eve to store multiple profiles. The mirror is designed to automatically detect motion and begin the facial recognition process. Eve then proceeds to load your custom profile, including your settings and personal applications- allowing several users to create their own personal experience. This setting can also be turned off if undesired.Water ProofWe know accidents happen, say you accidentally spill your drink on your new Eve Smart Mirror. Just wipe it off and keep your good day rolling! Eve is 100% waterproof to ensure there is no damage to your mirror.  Here are some other cool things about Eve Smart Mirror READY TO BACK THIS PROJECT? HERE'S WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW.HOW TO BACK : 1. Choose a reward level. 2. As our backer community grows, so will our ability to release new technology. We’ll post these “add-ons” as they become available, and communicate them as an update. 3. Relax, you're done for now. All details like shipping information and add-on specifics will be collected after the campaign has ended.  ABOUT USEve Smart Mirror was born out of necessity, for our own use. We then realized that so many of our friends loved the mirror them selfs.Eve was developed in December of 2015. Eve was created to change the way you look at mirrors. We believed that we could give you a product that brings a more personal connection to any home.So far all of our feedback has been over the top, everyone from professionals “on-the-go” to teenagers are enjoying the many useful benefits of Eve Smart Mirror. Together with our team, we take our passion for innovation beyond our products and in every decision we make.  HOW CAN YOU HELP?We've now finalized our Eve Smart Mirror prototype, but moving to the production phase requires significant capital and scale. We need your help to finance the required tooling and meet minimum order quantities. We've spent months working out all of the details at all levels of this project, and are very excited about finally having the opportunity to bring the simplicity and reliability of Eve Smart Mirror to each one of you. SPREAD THE WORD The EVE SMART MIRROR needs pledging but above all, it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons. Help us spread the word and get things started!   Thank You! We are beyond grateful to everyone who has reviewed an backed our campaign and helping us spread the word. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve. You are part of our EVE family.

story:
Short Summary

So many pet products over promise and under deliver. We wanted to create a quality pet brand using natural and environmentally friendly ingredients, truly make pet owners lives easier and celebrate our pets  great personalities. So we created the You Animal! brand. 

Our first product is the 30 Day All-in-One cat litter system. The unique multi-layer, all natural litter neutralizes odors for 30 days, eliminates clumping by absorbing the urine and reduces scooping by 80% . Just Scoop the Poop!  After 30 days, pull up the biodegradable liner and toss the litter in the garbage or compost. The corrugate case and handle can be recycled.

Non-toxic and safe for both cats and kittens, it costs less than a cup of coffee per day, and a fresh case can be delivered to your door each month.

With your support, we can begin manufacturing locally, and continue building our product line.

Please consider our offers and share our story to help bring  a little You Animal! personality to your home.

story:
Our Story

Adventure Media (www.adventureml.com) is a Company striving for the excellent products for our customers who can get the benefits of convenience, joyfulness and last but not least, human touch and that is why we are now launching EGGlight  (www.oursmartproducts.com/egglight.html)

Adventure Media Ltd. was founded in 2010 in Hong Kong with the passion of utilizing Internet as the platform for the services of marketing and sales which include social media marketing and selling Internet of Things (IoT) & related products as we believe that will foster the flow of products, maximize the economies of scale and lower the cost of production.          

Our Campaign is to launch the "EGGlight" which is a humanized lamp like an egg and you can light it up and dim it through a gentle touch on the top and change its white color to the warm one through touching its smiling face.  By such actions, the user can have more fun, convenience and personal touch than just pressing buttons and as a result, a more peaceful mind and better mood for the day and that is this product's most outstanding part.

The contributors/backers can help us a lot in this campaign as they can help for us to get it produced in large scale, at a lower cost, with more noise and as a result more people know about it and buy it.  It can be evolved into an even more perfect product in the future with more touching features that the customers want to experience. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Ideally, we need at least US$20,000 for large scale of production, delivery and marketing, etc. costs in order to bring it to you with the lowest possible cost and shortest period of time as we know these 2 factors are most important to you.
  • Our unique perks can show how much we care about your needs and our commitment to the above criteria!
  • Even if we don't reach our entire goal, we will still deliver what you want with the same price and delivery schedule as we know that your support is so vital to us and after all, our goodwill is priceless.   

The Impact of our EGGlight Project

  • Our project is valuable to the contributor and to the world as we want to change the concept of LED lamp: EGGlight is portable, waterproof, drop-proof, touch to turn on/off and long touch for dimming/brightening and after all, it is your boon companion with a smiling face!  

  • We have tons of innovative products selling in our www.oursmartproducts.com and other channels, both online and offline, and we have much confidence of having a brilliant success for EGGlight's launch;

  • You are always welcome to share your views/comments on our EGGlight at david@adventureml.com and I will personally reply each and every single email in 2 days.

Risks & Challenges

We can't see any risks & challenges in delivering EGGlight to our backers as it is ready to get produced once quantity confirmed.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can always help us by getting our EGGlight's launch spread through your social networks and friends and by doing so, you really help us a lot in marketing and finally producing it!
  • Please also use the Indiegogo share tools in achieving the above goal!
