story:
Let’s face it, everyone dreads installing traditional curtain brackets as it requires 15 minutes or more to measure for correct height and width for just one window.  Additionally, traditional curtain brackets require screws, wall anchors, and major tools for installation and once removed, large holes are left behind.  There are products on the market intended to bypass this method of installation, but they also have the following limitations:

  • Some still requires measuring for height and width. 
  • Some can only be installed on windows with window trim, while others can only be installed on windows without window trim.
  • Some cannot be installed on windows with existing blinds.
  • Once removed, products with adhesive backing tends to remove paint from the wall surface.
  • Even after installation, some products will still allow sunlight to pass through the sides and top of curtains.

 

The patent pending Speedy Hang curtain brackets  (main bracket shown below) provides solution to these problems by using position tools and two small diameter finishing nails.  Using the same method as picture hangers, the finishing nails are inserted through the bracket mounts at an angle.  This, along with the lower mount section and support leg allows each bracket to extend approximately 3 1/2 inches (88.9 mm) from the wall surface.  Also, each curtain bracket is capable of supporting up to 5 lbs (2.27 kg) of weight.

 

 

  • Time: Each bracket installs in less than one minute.
  • Requires no measuring for height and width.
  • Hassle free installation and uninstalling.  
  • Requires no major tools.
  • Requires no screws or wall anchors.
  • No large holes left behind.
  • No need to nail into a wall stud.
  • Installs on windows with or without window trim.
  • Installs on windows with existing blinds.

Just imagine installing two Speedy Hang curtain brackets in a fraction of the time it would take to correctly install two traditional brackets.  This is how simple it is to install our brackets!

 

 

 

The main curtain bracket is designed for installing on the left and right sides of the window trim or window frame.  Once installed, the center of curtain rod will be placed approximately 3 1/2 inches (88.9 mm) above the window trim or window frame.

 

 

The positioning tools were developed to simplify the installation of the main curtain bracket.  These tools are reversible which will allow the customer to effortlessly install the main curtain brackets on the left and right sides of the window. 

Note:  It is not mandatory to use the positioning tools when installing the main curtain brackets, but if not used, you will be required to measure for correct height and width.

 

This positioning tool is designed to install the main curtain bracket on windows with window trim.  Once installed, the brackets will be placed approximately 2 inches (50.9 mm) on each side of the window trim and approximately 3 ½ inches  (88.9 mm) above the window trim. 

Have existing blinds installed above your window frame?   Simply use this tool in the same matter as you would to install on windows with trim.  Once installed,  the center of the brackets will be placed approximately 2 inches (50.8 mm) from the left and right sides of the blind frame.

 

 

 

 

 

 

This positioning tool is designed to install the main curtain bracket on windows without window trim.  Once installed, the brackets will be placed approximately 4 inches (101.6 mm) on each side of the window frame and approximately 3 ½ inches (88.9 mm) above the window frame.  The positioning tool can also be used with windows that have blinds installed in the window frame. (Note: blinds must be recessed into window frame at least 1/4 inch (6.35 mm).  

 

 

 

 

 

Have extended length windows or windows that are in close proximity to a corner?  No Problem! Speedy Hang center curtain brackets installs just as simple and also works with the main curtain brackets.

 

This center curtain bracket is designed for extended length windows with window trim or windows that are within close proximity to a corner.  Once installed, the center of curtain rod will be place approximately 3 1/2 inches (88.9 mm) above the window trim.

 

 

 

This center curtain bracket is designed for extended length windows without window trim or windows that are within close proximity to a corner wall.   Once installed, the center of curtain rod will be place approximately 3 1/2 inches (88.9 mm) above the window frame.

 

        

 

 

  • Apartment/Dorm dwellers
  • Homeowners
  • Home staging companies
  • Just about any residential place that have windows!

 

  • Room dividers
  • Closet door replacement
  • Lightweight items such as decoration, plants etc.

 

During my 23 years in the United States Air Force, I was required to move to a different duty location every 3 to 4 years.  Because of this, I have never desired to own a home. I didn’t want to deal with the nightmare of renting my place out or selling my home in fear of losing money, once I've moved.  So, I choose to rent instead. But, when it came to hanging window treatment, I always ran into the same problem.  I was always told from the apartment manager/landlord (written or verbally) that tenants were not permitted to drill holes in the walls to hang curtains or would face stiff penalties.  Most apartments would have blinds installed which was perfect for privacy, but would still allow sunlight to shine through.  I have tried other curtain hanging products, but they would either still let sunlight pass through the sides or the product did not provide a professional look. 

After I've moved into my current apartment, I had a discussion with the apartment manager about hanging window treatment.  She informed me that holes can be no larger than the size of picture hanger nails (finishing nails), then she opened her desk drawer and pulled out a couple to show me the size of the nails.  This is when the idea came to develop curtain brackets that could be supported by these small nails.  The timeline below outlines Speedy Hang bracket history:

 

 

Hello,

 We are Robert and Ronald Burdette, the owners of 2RLB Enterprise, LLC and inventors of Speedy Hang curtain brackets. Two years ago, we had a goal to change the way people install curtain brackets.  We have worked long and hard developing and revising our prototypes to ensure they can be installed in seconds while at the same time, causing minimal damage to the wall surface all while achieving a professional look.

Currently, our brackets are produced using a 3D printer and we would like to move to the next phase by bringing our products to market.  This requires us to employ an injection molding company to produce the molds plus other start-up costs.  As you may or may not know, the initial cost of the injection molds are not cheap and this is where we could use your help. 

Our goal is to raise $25,000 to assist with initial production costs.  Profits from the sale of the Speedy Hang Curtain Brackets will go towards manufacturing, overhead, marketing/advertising, taxes, profits, and also assist in bringing other amazing products to market.

In appreciation for your support, we have listed several perks which will give you first hand on the products and initial production discounted prices. 

 

Risks and Challenges are very low – We have been personally testing our prototypes since August 2016 and we have not experienced any problems.  Furthermore, once we’ve file for our provisional patents, we’ve shared products with selected family, friends and co-worker for real-world testing and received positive feedback.

 

  • Get the word out! Tell friends and family members about our amazing products and crowdfunding campaign and encourage them to take advantage of our initial production discounted prices.  We all know someone that is currently living in a home, apartment or dorm and is in need of curtains.
  • Share on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Can I claim multiple perks?
Sure you can and thanks for your support!

Will the brackets support more than 5 lbs?

Currently, our brackets are produced by a 3d printer using Polylactide (PLA) filament.  Through our very own testing and evaluations, we have determined the maximum weight of 5 lbs each.  Once the brackets are produced using the injection mold process, we will re-evaluate and adjust the maximum weight accordingly.  2RLB Enterprises, LLC will not be responsible for any misuse of our products.

I would like to hang my curtains higher than the height the positioning tool offers and the window is also extended length.  How would you suggest I hang the curtains?  

This is simple!  Since you are not using the positioning tool, you will need to measure for correct height and width.  Then, you would use a main curtain bracket instead of a center bracket which could be obtained by purchasing the two main curtain bracket perk. 

What colors are available? 
For our initial campaign production start-up, we will offer the brackets in silver with the possibility of other colors later in the campaign.  

Does the Speedy Hang Curtain Bracket System come with a warranty?
Yes, our product will come with a 1 year warranty. 

What happens if the project gets pushed back past the delivery date?
While we will do our best to deliver on the estimated time frame, we also want to make sure we produce a quality product that you are extremely satisfied with. There may be certain delays beyond our control which may delay the project. However, we will always be transparent and keep you all up to date.

Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?
The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into product development, purchasing of materials, and manufacturing to deliver the Speedy Hang Curtain Bracket System to your home.  Refunds will only be issued if we cannot deliver the final product after exploring all possible options. We will do our best to be transparent and keep you updated on all developments.

Can you ship outside of the United States?
For our initial campaign production start-up, we are limited to shipping to the 48 contiguous states with the possibility of shipping to the other US territories and other countries in the near future.

Will the Speedy Hang Curtain Bracket System vary from the prototypes listed above? 
We have spent two years researching and developing our prototypes using computer-aided design software.  If any revisions are required by the injection mold company, they will be minor.

 

We like to thank you for taking time and interest in our products. We are hoping you become a supporter in our journey in bringing our products to market.

Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into product development, purchasing of materials, and manufacturing to deliver the Speedy Hang Curtain Bracket System to your home.  Refunds will only be issued if we cannot deliver the final product after exploring all possible options. We will do our best to be transparent and keep you updated on all developments.
Can you ship outside of the United States?For our initial campaign production start-up, we are limited to shipping to the 48 contiguous states with the possibility of shipping to the other US territories and other countries in the near future.
Will the Speedy Hang Curtain Bracket System vary from the prototypes listed above? We have spent two years researching and developing our prototypes using computer-aided design software.  If any revisions are required by the injection mold company, they will be minor.
 

We like to thank you for taking time and interest in our products. We are hoping you become a supporter in our journey in bringing our products to market.

story:
IMPORTANT UPDATE:

I've had a couple of people who have pointed out that this is a "big ask," and so I want to address that here. Yes, $160,000 is a fair chunk of change. We've set that goal because the land we want to buy is $150,000, and we need to also be able to cover the costs of the campaign itself (fulfillment of Perks and the percentage Indiegogo takes.) That said, however, I want to emphasize a couple of very important points:

1. This campaign is about buying a specific lot that is currently available and ideal for what we want to do. We have other funding that will be coming down the pike later, with a couple of investors already confirmed. However, we're still in negotiations as to the best way to bring one of them on board, and the other won't be ready to invest for at least a couple of months. We also have a couple of other investor pitch opportunities we're pursuing, but these won't happen until late in the fall. The point, then, is that the lot could sell before we finalize these investments. That's why we decided to do crowdfunding NOW. 

2. Even if we don't raise the whole amount, as long as we can come up with an acceptable down payment, we'll be able to buy the lot by getting a loan for the balance. So obviously, the bigger the down payment, the better off we'll be. Even if all we raise is earnest money, it will get the purchase rolling.

So, if you've been considering contributing but feel like it would just be a drop in a very large bucket, please know that your contribution WILL make a difference.

And now, back to the campaign . . .

Why laundry?

Salutations, and thanks for checking out our campaign! 

My name is Susan Carpenter Sims, and Beyond Laundry is the passion project I've been wanting to launch for several years. I've been studying green building and sustainable living systems for over a decade, and when I moved to Taos, New Mexico in 2008, I started formulating the idea for a green laundry center. 

I'm a single mother of four who's relied on laundromats for most of my adult life, so it didn't take me long after moving here to realize that there was a need for one on the south end of town.

Almost immediately, I began to envision an alternative that involved rainwater harvesting and greywater irrigation of a garden on the premises. And I thought:

  • Wouldn't it be nice to do your laundry somewhere clean and pleasant and spacious, with a lush greenhouse and a garden outside where you could sit and enjoy yourself while your clothes are washing? 
  • And how cool would it be if there was free WiFi, and, say, a children's play area so that you weren't constantly trying to keep your kids from climbing into laundry carts and running around the place slamming washing machine doors? 
  • And for that matter, how about if there was a snack bar selling healthy food, so that they wouldn't beg for candy bars from overpriced vending machines?

I started writing a business plan and looking for commercial washers & dryers that are highly energy- and water-efficient, and that's how I found our wonderful distributor, Bob Ropp of Sunshine Sales, who will provide us with the high-speed, environmentally-friendly Continental Girbau washers & dryers we'll use. 

Back in 2009, Bob actually came all the way to Taos from Arizona, and we looked at possible locations together. And then we sat down and talked about how much it would all cost - to get these top-of-the line machines & install them, and to remodel or build a building to handle high energy and water needs, as well as all the many things that go into starting any brick-and-mortar business.

At that time in my life, it was more than I could imagine raising; it just seemed impossible. And the truth is, I just wasn't ready. Sadly, I shelved the plan and focused on starting a writing & editing business instead, because I could do that with the very little money I already had.

Fast forward to the present

The last few years of living and running a business in this amazing, entrepreneurial, sustainability-oriented, innovation-encouraging town has grown me a lot. I've gained even more knowledge about green building, rainwater harvesting, and greywater recycling, not to mention how to run a business successfully. And now I have the confidence, experience, and skills to make it happen, not to mention a great team who's 100% behind this plan. We've been working hard to bring the vision to life, and as of July 7th, 2015, Beyond Laundry is officially a Limited Liability Company in the state of New Mexico. Woo hooo!!!

Yes, the startup costs are higher than average for a small business, but I believe that most people can easily recognize how practical, profitable, and positive this really is. That belief has already been confirmed by countless conversations with all kinds of people who invariably say:  "What a great idea!" 

And that's why we're running this campaign, because we trust that you, dear reader, will understand the beauty and importance of what we're doing, and will want to be part of it too.

What your backing will do for this project

Because we're building from the ground up, and because designing the greywater system is so site-specific, the first thing we need to do is buy land. There's an ideal one-acre lot for sale right now for $150,000, which is a great price for such a large lot with high visibility and easy access on the main road through town, AND it's on the south side of town, exactly where we want and need to be. 

As you can see in the video and photo below, there is currently a house trailer on the property that will be moved off, and where it is now is more or less where our building will eventually be. The whole back area of the lot can be for food-producing gardens and even an orchard.

Our goal for this Indiegogo campaign is to raise the funds to pay cash for this land, (We've made $160,000 our goal for this campaign so that, after paying for the land, we'll have money left over to cover the Indiegogo costs and those of sending out the perks we're offering to our backers.)  

Buying the land outright will help us leverage further funding we're going to need for construction and equipment, as I explain in this brief video tour of the lot:


And, since in the video I forgot to point out the south boundary, here's an aerial view:

Every donation we receive through this campaign will go towards buying the land: If we raise the total amount we'll buy it outright; if we don't, whatever amount we raise will go toward a down payment. 

If (heaven forbid!) the land sells before we can buy it, we'll go to Plan B: find another lot. And the beauty of our plan is that it's flexible, meaning that we can implement it as incrementally as we need to, and scale it to match available funding. The key is to tackle it one component at a time and build on successes as we go, and that starts with the land.

And, if we're so fortunate (and you all are so generous!) that we raise more than the we need for the land, the excess funding will go toward the next step: 

Constructing the building

We're excited to be partnering with Mark Goldman and his Green Construction Technology Program at the University of New Mexico-Taos. He's serving as a consultant to this project and helping us make decisions about the construction process. 

We're planning to utilize steel construction, which is both low-cost and environmentally friendly. The building is planned at 2400 sf, and we already have a preliminary floor plan, which Bob and the awesome guys at Continental Girbau put together based on my hand-drawn sketch:

A few minor changes are being made to this design, (and we'll be attaching a greenhouse to the south side) but for the most part, it gives a pretty accurate depiction of what the inside of Beyond Laundry will be like.

How we'll say, "Thank You"

We have some cool goodies in store for you when you when you back us (besides the satisfaction that comes from knowing that you're a part of an innovative and replicable way to increase the health of the planet). 

For example, our regular-fit T-shirt:

and our bumper sticker (not larger than the T-shirt in real life, of course):

We're also offering some perks in the realm of free laundry service, and some for sponsor benefits, so you can pick the level of backing and the perk that's the best fit for you.

IMPORTANT:  Please do keep in mind that if you select a perk involving laundry service or sponsor benefits that involve recognition in the building itself, we're not going to be able to deliver those as quickly as the other perks. Once we buy the land we still have a building to construct and washers & dryers to install, and that's not going to happen overnight. But we'll continue to update this page and the website as we progress, so as our timeline unfolds, you'll know exactly what's happening as we go along.

Environmental & social impacts

We're planning to have 22 efficient washing machines and 24 dryers in our Taos location. We estimate that we can harvest about 29,000 gallons of rainwater a year from our roof, but that's only a small fraction of the amount needed for the washers, which we estimate at over a million gallons a year! 

However, that million gallons will also turn into valuable greywater after it runs through the washers, and we'll use it to irrigate a greenhouse, a community food garden, and an orchard.

And, even after all that, there will still be so much greywater left over that we'll purify and recycle it to reuse in the washers, meaning that we can bring our reliance on the town's water supply to basically nothing. 

We're also going to use solar for as much of our power source as we can, and will be seeking funding for this through the USDA Rural Energy for America Program, which helps small businesses in rural areas incorporate renewable energies at a very low cost.

That means we will have the following impacts:

  • saving many thousands of gallons of precious water a year 
  • producing healthy food for our community
  • significantly reducing our carbon footprint 

Demolishing the paradigm of the "laundromat," baby!

Because, really, what this is about is creating a living community center - a place where people can hang out, connect with each other, and learn about sustainability. 

We'll have a multi-purpose room that can be used for community groups to meet and hold sustainability workshops. We'll have special events - some just for fun and some for sustainability education. 
The multi-purpose room will also have a corner in it for kids to hang out, when it's not being used for meetings. There will be toys, books, and movies available to keep kids happy while their parents do laundry.
Another thing that will make this so much more than a laundromat is the attached greenhouse, which will also have cafe-style tables and chairs in it where people can hang out and enjoy snacks from the in-house snack bar offered by Taos' very popular Wired? Cafe. 

But let's not forget about the laundry itself! 

Besides offering self-service laundry, we're also going to have a wash & fold service with optional pickup and delivery, allowing people who lack time and/or transportation to get their laundry done in a way they can feel good about.

We're going to operate the machines on a token system instead of quarters, and tokens will be available for sale at the counter as well as from a change machine. What this means is that customers can use debit or credit cards if they don't have cash. 

Another benefit to this system is that we'll offer tokens in exchange for volunteer hours in the community garden.

Beyond Laundry is going to be so awesome that 


And the picture gets even bigger

This enterprise has turned into so much more than what I originally envisioned. I have been fortunate to connect with local partners, as well as an international team focused on bringing projects like this to developing countries, where people often have no sanitary way to wash clothes. 

When I first started revisiting my business plan back in the spring, it serendipitously came to my attention that a social entrepreneurship class, offered online by Copenhagen Business School on Coursera, was about to start. So I signed right up and am so glad I did, because it's been life-changing in more ways than one. For one thing, that's how I connected with my global partners, Arun and Santi (who you can read about below).

Working with this course and the team formed from it opened up new horizons for the plan. The result is that our long term goals include opening multiple community laundry centers in the US, and using at least 10% of our profits to work with NGOs that address water issues in developing countries. In this way, we can partner to create sustainable, healthy laundry systems around the world. Pretty incredible, right?

You can read more about our global projects on our website.

Meet the team


Alima Fairchild will be our Community Garden Manager. She has many years of experience organizing and working in community gardens, and with community organization in general. Her most recent work is with the Head Waters Food Security Project based in Mora, New Mexico.

Arun Gopalakrishnan, MBA, lives in Dallas, TX, and will coordinate our franchising process in the US and assist with our global projects. He has over 20 years of industry experience in the retail and energy sectors, with expertise in software testing and business analysis. Arun was born in India, and lived in several cities there. He received his Bachelor's degree in Chemical Engineering, then came to the United States and obtained his Master’s Degree from UT Dallas.  

Santi Lisana, MBA, lives in Jakarta, Indonesia, and will spearhead a non-profit student laundry center at a university there. Not only will students be able to wash their laundry at the center, but it will also serve as a demonstration site/classroom for students to learn about the green technologies Beyond Laundry uses. It will also be an incubator for students wanting to build a business using these technologies.

JonnaLynn Mandelbaum, PhD, MPH retired to Taos after a long and fruitful career in international and public health, and is serving as an advisor for both our local and global projects.
And me, of course:

Susan Carpenter Sims, MA   I've been an entrepreneur since 1991, when I started my first writing & editing business. I've also co-created and managed 501(c)(3)s and other non-profit organizations, as well as planned and managed a variety of projects and events related to sustainability and other community interests. I've been a college English instructor since 2002, and currently teach at UNM-Taos.  
The challenges before us

Financial

The biggest challenge is cost. If all we were doing is opening a standard laundromat, it would still cost more to start up than an average small business. (Some commercial washing machines cost as much as a car!) Because we're doing everything as sustainably as possible, the costs at the outset are even higher. 

However, using solar power, rainwater harvesting, and greywater recycling also means that our utility bills, normally by far the highest overhead costs for a laundry business, will be drastically lowered. 

Also, as a single mother, I can't boast a high net worth or a hefty nest egg. However, what I do have is a clear vision, great team, excellent business plan, and heaps of resourcefulness, commitment, and perseverance. 

We're talking to potential investors to work with us on our next steps after the land purchase, and we already have one confirmed. We feel confident that the environmental and social impacts of our project, as well as the potential for profit and growth, will continue to attract the funding we need as we go along. 

Systems design

Designing what we're calling the "Rainwash System": catching rain off our roof; getting it to the washers; then sending some of the greywater out to the greenhouse, garden, and orchard; and running the rest of it through a purification system to make it safe and clean to reuse in the washers - well, that's a bit of a challenge too! 

Luckily, we have many wonderful resources here in Taos to help us. We're currently applying for a grant to get technical assistance for this from one of the national labs in this state, through the New Mexico Small Business Assistance Program. However, even if we don't get that grant, we can still scale down our plans a bit and set up these systems incrementally, as we have the funds. 

We're in it for the long haul!

Thanks for reading all the way through, and we have just one more little favor to ask

Will you help us get the word out? Whether you're able to donate a little, a lot, or not at all, if you're inspired by what we're doing, please consider sharing this campaign through your social networks. 
Every little bit helps, and we truly value your support. Also, we'd love it if you let us know your thoughts in the comments, or shoot an email to susan@beyondlaundry.org! 
If you want to read more about how the vision for Beyond Laundry came to be, I blogged about that here: Beyond "Sustainability," Beyond Laundry
Stay tuned for updates and you can subscribe to our newsletter at beyondlaundry.org.

We're in it for the long haul!
    Thanks for reading all the way through, and we have just one more little favor to ask
Will you help us get the word out? Whether you're able to donate a little, a lot, or not at all, if you're inspired by what we're doing, please consider sharing this campaign through your social networks. 
Every little bit helps, and we truly value your support. Also, we'd love it if you let us know your thoughts in the comments, or shoot an email to susan@beyondlaundry.org! 
If you want to read more about how the vision for Beyond Laundry came to be, I blogged about that here: Beyond "Sustainability," Beyond Laundry

Stay tuned for updates and you can subscribe to our newsletter at beyondlaundry.org.

story:
Short Summary

AlcoCups are single serve specialty drink pods:

  • No new machine needed.
  • Make Margaritas, Irish Coffee, and Spiked Tea (just a couple examples of what's possible)
  • Help me revolutionize the alcohol industry just like Keurig revolutionized the coffee industry.

It is hard to make small items at production, and that's why we need funding! We need economies of scale to make this a reality. 

What We Need & What You Get

What we will need:

  • A pod production and sealing factory line. 
  • Liquor Distributor 
  • Given it's alcohol - your contribution will get you a voucher for a 21 year old to pick up  pods at a liquor store.
  • You get to tell people that you helped start the alcohol revolution! 

Risks & Challenges

  • Alcohol is a controlled substance - so I'm going to have to investigate liquor laws before selling. I'm reaching out to lawyer friends now. 
  • I've met with a K-Cup producer and know what it takes to make these pods.
  • People will try to infringe on my patent. That is why I will need a solid patent. 
  • Maybe Keurig will buy or partner with me. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you know a liquor lawyer - please reach out to help me. 
  • Please share with friends, college students, and let's face it, really anyone over 21!
  • Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/AlcoCup/

story:
*** CAMPAIGN CLOSED *** PERKS SHIPPED ***

latest deliveries estimated in May

!!! OUR BIGGEST THANKS TO ALL BACKERS !!!


Like every other smart tool or device, EveryGrip does the thinking for you. Its patented retractable steel rods are made to self-adjust and closely fit the head of the bolt.


 

Thanks to its versatility, it did not take long for EveryGrip to gain recognition from well known international crowdfunding groups, communities and social networks.


EveryGrip is one of the most universal tools in the world, as it can easily readjust itself in a fraction of a second and grab virtually any bolt, nut or hook.


House, machinery, training equipment, furniture and lots of other day to day fixings can be easily handled with EveryGrip.


No matter if rusty or damaged, Everygrip works with virtually all types of bolts, nuts and hooks.



The possible uses of EveryGrip are literally unlimited. Whatever the job is, EveryGrip is going to be your number one assistant!



Forget searching for a right wrench, and spoil yourself with this toolbox fitting in your pocket.



Choose your favorite power drill, handle or ratchet  and use it in your usual working style.


Resulting from extensive testing by hobbyists and repair-shops, now EveryGrip is even more durable and easy to use. Especially when used in combination with ergonomic ratchets and handles carefully picked, tested and customized by our team.


Don’t wait, ORDER NOW and SHARE this super-campaign!


STRETCH GOAL!

*** Once we reach our funding goal of this campaign, benefits from the economies of scale will kick in and we will be able not only to enrich our current product packages with extras to our current backers, but also to fund further development of a yet unseen even more universal tool based on the same working principle suitable for PZ/TX/PH screws (e.g. regular wood screw).

story:
What Does The Smart Home Security Solution do?

The solution provides an easy way to relieve your burden of protecting your families online activities. Our Solution provides effective protection for yourself, your children and all the devices that you connect to the internet by providing secure wifi networks that block known malicious sites on the network level. 

 

Who is the Smart Home Security Solution for?

The Smart Home Solution is designed to be used by everyone. Our basic philosophy is that the effectiveness of our protection and carefree everyday use is the true value, and that most people are better served not being offered endless features and customization opportunities.  If you are looking for to play with a lot of features and technical customizations, Smart Home Security Solution might not be for you.

 

How does it work?

The Smart Home Security Solution works on a very basic principle.  The box that is delivered to you broadcasts three different WIFI nets, (also known as SSIDs), each with a custom profile for a different intended use:

  • Adult/Open net: A WIFI with our security filtering solution against ransomware and other threats, but no further restrictions
  • Children's net: A separate WIFI for your kids, where material unsuitable for children, like porn, is blocked; Youtube is restricted to the safe version; and the WIFI is switched off at bed time.
  • IOT net: Another separate WIFI for all your Smart Home devices. On this net everything is blocked except the legitimate sites that the devices require. When connecting your devices to this net they are isolated from the open net and from intruders who will be unable get to them.

This simple principle makes everyday use very easy. All you have to do to control security is to connect to the correct SSID.  This way you can safely let your children and their guests use your WIFI, you hand out  only the password for the children's SSID. 

 

How to install Smart Home Solution in your home

Installing the Smart Home Security Box is very easy. Plug the box into one of the LAN ports in your existing router, connect it to power and you're done. The three WIFI SSID's will be there for you.

How to keep your solution up to date

Guess What? You do not have to do anything.

There are no concerns about updates, and no mainteanance. The system is maintained remotely, and is updated by us if required. Filtering is always in real time, catching all the newest threats.

 

What is the risk? Is this going to work?

We are building this project on a very solid basis. We already use the hardware for this project for our current product, and it has performed wonderfully. It has good wifi range and we have had no complaints. This image shows some of our current stock and our reputable supplier can supply up to 100.000 pcs. a month.

Our engineers have extensive experience in firmware programming and in implementing the communications link to our cloud systems from our previous products; and have a clear vision and understanding of what has to be done.

We therefore feel very confident that we will be able to deliver on our promises, as we have done in the past.

 

Who we are

BSafe2 is a small venture that started back in 2011 because of our outrage. Having seen the content being delivered online to our children, we decided to act. From scratch we built a very sophisticated filtering algorithm to weed out offensive material. 

From the humble beginning of protecting our own children, our product has grown into a unique security solution providing solid basic protection against various form of malware for those people who, like most, are not technically savy.

 

Why we need your help

We want to take our product to the next level. The functionality described above will immensely improve the defences ordinary peoples have against one of the largest emerging threats online: It aims at protecting all new smart home gadgets from intruders.

We have a solid base and we have the ideas, as well as the skills to execute them, but we need to fund the work that needs to be done.

Your funding contribution will provide for down to earth expenses, the 100.000$ will pay for:

  • Firmware development & testing
  • Buying serverpower
  • Testing

Join our efforts and be part of this promising idea!

 

You can support us in many ways!

Buy one of our perks, and be part of our venture and mission.

We appreciate all and any help! If you do not have the funds or a need for the perks, help anyway! Make som noise for us, share the Campaign with people who could benefit. We are thankful for any help you can give, and will send our transcendental love to you for any action or thought in support of the project.

FAQ

How does this device differ from traditional antivirus solutions?

While the Smart Home Security Solution shares some functionalities with antivirus programs, it also differs distinctly by being applied at network level, thereby protecting all devices as opposed to being solutions for individual computers etc. In this way the solution is a good supplement to antivirus solutions.

How is my data privacy protected?

The solution will send the webadresses (URL's) to our algorithms to perform the service. BSafe2 can see these URL's but not the actual data being exchanged. BSafe2 does not share these data with any 3rd party or government in a form where individual IP addresses can be identified. BSafe2 complies with the EU Dataprotection directives (GDPR).

Will the solution work in my country?

Yes, the solution will work in any country, we will however only provide powerplugs for EU (220 v) or US (110v), and you will have to find an appropriate converter if you reside in another region.

Does the solution slow down my network?

The solution sends every new web request to our servers for verification. The return time for this transaction is typically 10 ms, depending on where you are physically located compared to our server. This is hardly noticaable for humans.

story:
A big thank you to all the backers who helped the first 1:1 prototype of Living Shelter to be exhibited at the Architecture Venice Biennale 2016!

Following this great success, we are re-engineering some features of the prototype to enhance the performance. As part of the process, the Indiegogo campaign PART 2 is now live to help us to fund the production of ergonomic and light weight 3D-printed furniture. Find out more on the following link: https://igg.me/at/living-shelter-3dprintedfurni...

THANK YOU for all your support and generosity to change the future of communities in need.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


TIME TO TAKE ACTION

42.9% of the natural disasters happening on Earth are located in the Asia Pacific region.

As world citizens and professional architects and engineers based in Singapore, we felt the urge to support the populations affected by these catastrophes. We decided to use our skills to create a shelter solution designed specifically for the climate, geography, and cultural habits of Southeast Asia.


LIVING SHELTER: A SMART TYPE OF HOUSING

The Living Shelter is an affordable collapsible capsule, easy to ship and assemble in any kind of tropical environment.

Inspired by the typical Southeast Asia ‘kampung’ house, the Living Shelter is designed with openings that ensure natural ventilation. The engineering system provides sturdiness and adaptability to hot and humid weather conditions.


MORE THAN JUST A SHELTER

Living Shelter is responding to the emergency and transitional phases. Moreover all components and system can be easily dismantled and reused separately in an entire new building on a more durable term.

The Living Shelter offers not only privacy and security, but also basic needs such as electricity, water and furniture. It includes a water bag for water collection, a built-in solar panel on the roof to charge phone and provide light, and built-in foldable furniture such as bed, hammocks, shelves, plus portable furniture. All conveniently packed in a flat pack.

By fulfilling the basic needs of dwelling, this ergonomic, safe and durable shelter would effectively ease the burden of the affected populations during the disaster relief process.


DESIGN AND ENGINEERING SYSTEMS

Our team of designers and engineers created custom-made folding mechanism to ensure that the overall structure works correctly with no need of any sort of tools. We are also exploring new technology such as 3D-printed and light-weight composite materials for the furniture within the shelter, to increase stability without adding extra weight.

The Living Shelter is currently being patented in Singapore for its overall innovative design and engineering as well as special features in technical mechanism.


MAJOR MILESTONE

With the 2016 theme Reporting from the Front, we are thrilled to announce that Alejandro Aravena — Pritzker Prize 2016 and Director of the Biennale — endorsed Living Shelter as an official participant of the 15th edition of the Biennale de Architettura in Venice. Global Art Affairs Foundation, a non-profit organization, will host the Living Shelter at Palazzo Mora from May to November 2016 during the exhibition Time – Space – Existence.

http://www.archdaily.com/785600/venice-biennale-2016-collateral-events-announced. Scroll down to the last collateral event Time – Space – Existence.


The 1:1 Living Shelter prototype will be exhibited during the Architecture Biennale 2016, where more than 200,000 visitors can experiment the capsule. In addition to that, a panel will inform the general public about Southeast Asia’s needs. It will also demonstrate the shelter’s various configurations, and how it can be easily adapted to meet the specific needs of different communities.

This major international event in Architecture is the ideal platform to launch Living Shelter and to approach NGOs and investors. The project is ready to bring its innovative solution in the disaster relief market and start to help the communities in need.


INSTITUTIONAL SUPPORT

Design Singapore Council is giving a great support to the Living Shelter for its attendance at the Architectural Biennale. Expenses for prototyping and rental of the exhibition space are partially funded, thanks to the MAA grant.


OUR GOAL

Even with the great support of our sponsor, Living Shelter requires additional funding. Every dollar counts to bring the prototype to the Biennale.

Since the beginning we are investing in the project by allocating the team of designers and engineers involved in the development of the project. Our attendance to the Biennale is also self-funded.

We’re asking US$40,000 for:
  • Prototype material such as custom-made mould and aluminium structure extrusion, envelop panels, solar panels, special accessories and mechanisms, water bag, 3D printed portable furniture
  • Prototype workmanship. A team of workers will assemble the prototype under our instructions
  • Ship the prototype to Venice Biennale by air freight
  • The remaining rent the space at the Biennale
  • Cover the fees of Communication & Marketing Agency including generating collaterals


WHAT DO YOU GET IN RETURN FOR HELPING US LAUNCH

Through contributing Living Shelter campaign, you can take pride in knowing that you’ve directly served the communities in need.

Help us out with any amount and get online recognition.

Go one step beyond, you will be able to provide a testimonial to communicate with the end users. This will be a part of the instruction manual, included in the Living Shelter pack.

With further contribution, more than 200,000 visitors at the Architectural Biennale will acknowledge your generosity.

Uniquely designed goodies are available:

  • A thank you origami cut-out card of the Living Shelter to assemble yourself
  • Special postcards featuring the project
  • A tote bag to show your sponsorship as contributor of the project
  • A 3D printed model keychain
  • A 3D printed model miniature replica

Get a chance for an individual invitation to a special lecture given in Venice by the creators of the project in autumn 2016 hosted by the Global Art Affairs Foundation. Tickets flights and accommodation will be at your own accord.

Perks can be redeemed right after the launch of the Biennale in early June.


SHARE TO HELP

Simply by clicking the share button, you can make a big difference!

Just follow us and spread the word about this awesome project to your friends. Meanwhile, we’ll continue to update you on our latest progress via the Facebook page (@LivingShelter).

https://www.facebook.com/Living-Shelter-855235037955574/


WHAT’S NEXT FOR THE PROTOTYPE AFTER THE VENICE BIENNALE?

After the end of the Biennale, the prototype will be coming back to Singapore to be part of a great series of events to bring awareness to the public through exhibition, talks and workshops.

The prototype will then be donated to a public Foundation or NGO in Southeast Asia to serve its purpose of housing people in need.


Lastly, THANK YOU for all your support and generosity to change the future of communities in need through supporting Living Shelter’s exposure during the Architectural Venice Biennale 2016.

story:
WHO IS

157+173 designers is a design studio, specialized in product design and architecture.

The studio formed in 2009 and since is active with international projects.

 

 

 

WHAT IS woo(l)den fishbone* carpet

FIshbone* is a carpet made of wool & wood. 

It is the first prototype of the project called Wool(d)en carpets, which are carpets designed with the use of wool and wood and inspired by familiar floor patterns.

It is designed to stand in-between a woolen carpet and a wooden floor.

Fishbone* design is based on the parquet floor pattern.

 

 

 

 

LIFESTYLE

Fishbone* is perfect for any type of flooring.

...And it’s got a great style, to fit with all environments. 

It combines a soft woolen feel with the sense of a solid wooden floor, in one product !

 

 

 

ADVANTAGES & BENEFITS 

- contemporary design

- good workability

- only sustainable resources used

- 100% natural

- local industry support while making

- good potential with more patterns to come

 

 

100% NATURAL 

FIshbone* carpet is 100% natural product.

All resources used are sustainable and they are not mixed with any other substances during manufacturing.

Woolen parts are manufactured by natural wool collected from sheep, without harming the animals.

Wooden parts are manufactured by natural maple wood, collected on selected authorized areas, without harming the forest.

 

 

 

 

PROPERTIES 

- excellent insulation, especially helpful on cold cement or tile floors.

- unique sense on feet when walking.

- warm sense & unique character on space.

- comfortable to walk on, & perfect to relax on with your friends.

 

 

 

PUBLICITY & ACCEPTANCE

fishbone* was firstly introduced as an early prototype in 2015 Paris Design Week.

Despite is has never been officially released as a product, it received very flattering comments and it was published into numerous press, magazines and blogs, while it even made it on the Wall Street Journal, next to very popular brands.

 

 

 

TECHNICAL

BASE LAYER: stone white felt sheet 12mm & planted magnets

IN-BETWEEN LAYER : cotton ribbons and crochetes

TOP LAYER : grey felt sheet 0,6mm, cnc cut & wooden pieces

 

DIMENSIONS : 2,45 x 1,05 m 

THICKNESS : 18 -20 mm

 

 

HOW IT IS MADE

On all steps during manufacturing, local experts are associated with the project.

In this way, we support the local industry and local resources, and we have best control over the process.

 

WOOL

During spring, sheep are sheared in the farm!

Wool is collected and sent to the factory, where it  gets washed, processed through the knitting machine, and finally compressed with steam and hot water, until a dense, thick sheet of wool is produced.

 

Woolen sheets are cut very precisely into shape, with the help of a cnc knife router.

 

 

WOOD

Rough planks of maple wood are trimmed, sharpened, cut into the desirable shape, and engraved on their back side and finished with a soft eco matt varnish.

 

 

 

FINISH & SET UP

All parts are put together in our workshop.

Magnets are installed into the lower layer of wool and covered with cotton ribbons, and underneath each piece of wood too, so wooden pieces can be removable but not allowed to lift up, when stepping on them.

Finally, the two layers of wool are glued together with natural latex glue, and wooden pieces are set into place.

 

 

 

 

CHALLENGES AND PROCESS

fishbone* carpet, had several difficulties through its almost 12 months of ( on&off ) project development and many different design solutions were proposed, until the first successful sample. 

Our cat Miou, surely behaved it strongly, so we were able to understand that the wool had to be more dense, to remain soft but not to wear out.

Knives we designed for the felt cuts, were difficult to handle and time-wise ineffective. We ended up using the cnc router. 

Wooden parts, were firstly attached on the felt layer by using velcro, but made them highly unstable, until magnets were introduced as the best solution.

 

 

 

FURTHER POTENTIAL & MORE PATTERNS

We designed wool(d)en carpets to share what we believe is a progress in carpets and flooring in general. 

Fishbone* is the main pattern we worked on, while our main goal is to be able to expand the WOO(L)DEN PROJECT with more patterns.

Several patterns have been studied so far, and are yet to come in a carpet format.

Thus the project can become a more complete and competitive proposal !

 

 

 

 

MAINTENANCE / CLEANING

Fishbone* carpet can be vacuum cleaned. 

Small stains can be cleaned with a wet absorbing cloth. 

Wooden pieces are removable for easy cleaning underneath them.

Wooden pieces can be cleaned with a wet cloth.

Naturally, felt may make small knots after extensive use, but it can be good as new, with a gentle shave with normal scissors. 

Steam ironing can also be performed occasionally, to refresh the look of the felt !

 

 

 

RAISED FUNDS WILL HELP US

 

1. PRODUCE A SMALL NUMBER OF *FISHBONE CARPETS FOR PROMOTIONAL REASONS.

2. COVER PARTICIPATION FEES FOR MAJOR INTERNATIONAL DESIGN EXHIBITION.

3. DEVELOP AND PRODUCE NEW PROTOTYPES OF MORE WOO(L)DEN PATTERNS.

& also

4. COVER EXPENSES FOR WOO(L)DEN GIFTS & PACKAGING & SHIPPING.

5. ATTRIBUTE INDIEGOGO & PAYPAL COMMISSION

 

 

 

WHAT YOU GET / GIFTS

Made from the same materials and style, we additionally designed "woo(l)den gifts", a whole family of related products of the fishbone carpet, for the bakers who support our project !

 

These are:

- a traditional sheep's bell & a shepherd's crook, as a reminder of the fishbone carpet origin.

- a case for leaving your phone while charging.

-a pair of slippers. 

-an iPad & iPad mini case.

-a cat house.

-a backpack.

 

 

CREDITS 

We would like to thank the following people for their valuable contribution, while making this project.

Kostantinos Hatzhiagapoglou, at VIOKETS, for providing us with the felt material, and helping producing the first fishbone prototype.

Petros & Vasilis Delitzakis, for manufacturing the wooden parts of the carpet.

Mrs Athina, for her help and good company on the making of the woo(l)den gifts.

Markos Galonis, for cutting a sample on the cnc machine in his lab.

Jertef, for taking all photographs of the fishbone carpet and the woo(l)den gifts.

Marika Sunday, for helping designing woo(l)den gifts and their packaging during her internship in our studio,

Karolos Gakidis, for helping recording the soundtrack and the voice over of this campaign.

Stratos for helping with the camera, while filming ourselves in our studio.

Miou, our cat, for treating fishbone carpet in her own very style, which helped us understand the felt's properties and weakness points.

 

Video direction, filming and editing by 157+173 designers.

Original soundtrack  by 157+173designers.

Additional soundtrack by Babis Papadopoulos.

 

 

THANKS !

Big thanks to everyone who supports this project.

Even if you cannot back it, you can still help by sharing it on social media and help it grow large !

All  the names of all who backed our project, will be posted on our social media, to let the world know that you helped this project come to life !

Spread the word !

 

babis & christina

157+173 designers

story:
Even if does not reach campaign goal, all products will be sent to supporters.



Stay in touch with us;
visit our website!


Today, your router is running 7x24 for only one thing. What if it can do more? What if it can behave as a computer? MULTI is the answer. Now your router is a multifunctional smart device. It is a new generation router. It only replaces the old one. And you can easily make your smart ideas. 
For software you can install, internal Virtual Machine is working. You can develop internet of things, install Apps, play media, adding storage to the router. 

You can use it like any computer. You can catch or analyze of traffic. 
All this features; changes your router to a computer.


  • MULTI is working with Open Source software and hardware.
  • It has a very powerful hardware, and you can use it as a computer.
  • Security applications are installed and optimized.
  • You can use the advanced features that come with installed MultiWrt.
  • MultiWrt; Open source router converts a super device.






The MULTI features that make it different from other routers :


Cyber Security & Network Features;

  • Automatic Dns Leak Security (Dnscrypt)
  • DDoS attack protection (free CDN from MULTI)
  • IDS/IPS configurations (via Snort)
  • Routing (iproute2, Quagga, BIRD, Babel)
  • Port Knocking (via Knockd)
  • Active queue management (AQM) 
  • Traffic shaping (via Wshaper)
  • Quality of Service (QoS) 
  • Mesh networking (through BATMAN, OLSR and IEEE 802.11s)
  • Extensible realtime network monitoring and statistics (via RRDtool, Collectd, Nagios, Munin lite, Zabbix)
  • VPN Routing & Hopping (via GRE, OpenVPN, Pseudowire)
  • Load balancing for use with multiple ISPs (using Source-Specific routing)
  • Domain Name System (DNS) and DHCP (via Dnsmasq, MaraDNS)
  • Stateful firewall, NAT and port forwarding (with Netfilter, PeerGuardian)
  • Dynamic DNS services
  • Spam & Virus Filtering (ClamAV)
  • Content Filtering (Dans Guardian)
  • Dynamically-configured port forwarding protocols UPnP and NAT-PMP
  • Wireless Distribution System (WDS)
  • Wireless security (Packet injection, e.g. Airpwn, lorcon, e.a.)
  • Wireless functionality (Access point / Repeater / Bridge)
  • Captive Portal Hotspot (via WifiDog)
  • IPv6 transitioning technologies (6rd, 6to4, 6in4, ds-lite, lw4o6, map-e)
  • Compliance with NSA cyber security standards (SIMP)
  • and many more...


Server Features;

  • NAS Server (You can add 2.5 inch HDD/SSD)
  • NginX (High Performans Load Balancer & Web Server)
  • MySQL Database Server (You can easily install PostgreSQL or SQLite)
  • Mail Server (xMailServer) & OpenSSL
  • FTP Server (ProFTPd)
  • Personal Cloud Server (Owncloud, With Sata HDD/SSD)


Software That Can Be Installed;

  • LUXENTO (Smart Home software)
  • OpenHAB (another Smart Home software)
  • TOR Router
  • OpenELEC or XBMC (Entertainment Center)
  • Multi-Room Music Player 
  • And more projects that can be run with MULTI : MultiHack



MultiVPN

MultiVPN gives you peace of mind knowing that you can securely browse the internet anywhere, on any of your devices. No need to worry about protecting your data on public Wi-Fi networks or shielding hackers from stealing your most valuable information.



We send MultiWrt together with permanently usage license and it has lifelong automatic update packet. For the first buying you can use MultiVPN free for two years. After two years, if you want standard MultiVPN you need to pay 50 USD for a year.

9+ Locations Worldwide For Online Freedom

Use the internet and browse websites as if you were in another country. We maintain an extensive global server network – over 12+ servers (176+ IP) in 9+ countries – with cutting-edge hardware, allowing our users maximum speed and stability. Moreover, we constantly optimize our 100% in-house managed network to provide you with the smoothest experience possible, no matter where you are.


LUXENTO Smart Home Project work through MULTI, it developed by our team. Yes, you do not read wrong; You can use your router as well as smart home hub. LUXENTO can manage all smart devices of well known brands of the world. It makes an access from distance to your home or it can make your scenario. Furthermore it makes emergency security solutions for home, accidents such as fire, robbery, flood from the taps. You can download the files and samples of the project from our website.


  You can view the demo.


These brands and more components, can be controlled by LUXENTO.



This diagram can give you ideas.



MultiHACK

If you use the device by hacking, there is no limit that you can do with MULTI. You can make a Home Entertainment System, Drone Controller or Personel Linux/Android Computer systems.  
You can look for the other samples from our website.


A brief overview of the MULTI's Board.


MULTI Router’s hardware (BPI R1) is a very advanced PI computer. You can run any PI application using the pin connections on the MULTI Router Board.



Hardware Specifications





New Box Design

Design prepared for the plastic product box. Initial production will be in pearl white color.


The prototypes printed with 3d printers.

 

Timeline 



Fqa



What kind of warranty do you provide?

We provide a one-year limited warranty.

Where can I use my MULTI?
Home, Office, Industrial Plants, Educational Institutions, Municipalities and everywhere.

Can I get a refund?

Please read Indiegogo's policy here.

How much is shipping?

Worldwide is $9.

(Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries)

What’s in the box?

1x MULTI Device (with 8 Gb SDHC) , 1x Power Supply, 2x 5db Antenna, 1x Expansion Set (if you buy it)

Is there a cooler on the processor?

Yes, aluminium heat sink is mounted on processor.

Can I just buy your software?

Yes, Our software package is, ARM and INTEL based was prepared in two versions. If you get ARM version, you can use with BPI R1 or a similar board. Or if you get INTEL version, you can use with any INTEL based router board (or virtual machine on your pc).

Hardware Specifications

Timeline

story:
SMART shopping HANDLE

Will change your shopping habits FOREVER!

Lowers the pressure on your fingers by 75%.

*

REWARDS:

Let's Get it Going:  6 + extra 6   = 12 Handles


 Let's Make it Happen:  6 + extra 4   = 10 Handles

*

Who Needs It Daily..?

EVERYONE : YOURSELF, your SPOUSE, your FAMILY & FRIENDS! The SMART shopping HANDLE will help everyone carry their shopping bags from the mall, grocery stores & pharmacies with comfort. 

 *

What Kind Of Bags Is It Good For..?

ANY TYPE : Reusable and disposable bags made of different materials; (plastic, cloth, paper, etc.)

*

How can the SMART shopping HANDLE help me..?

HERE'S HOW : It binds all your bags together & reduces the pressure on your fingers by 75%. Now you can carry your shopping bags with ease while WALKING & when taking the BUS or METRO.

Loading & Unloading the TRUNK of your car becomes a breeze & even spills are prevented since the SMART shopping HANDLE binds all your bags together.

Extra uses: easily carry paint cans, buckets, heavy boxes, etc.

*

Our Experience

For the last 30 years, we have introduced to the world several well-known inventions and the SMART shopping HANDLE is geared to be one of the best! 

*

Moral Commitment

Made of 100% American and Canadian materials, the SMART shopping HANDLE is produced in Canada to save North American jobs.  

As part of our commitment to the community, we are proud to provide opportunities for people with special needs at equal remuneration for packaging, packing and handling.

*

World Patent & Protection

For design, idea, concept and method of production in plastic and/or any alternative materials. Designed by TTH, made from special 100% recyclable plastic with H Memory that keeps the SMART shopping HANDLE functional and in shape for very long.

*

Special Thanks for the music to Kevin MacLeod (title: Carefree)

story:
Keeps your house intact​

What to do with the wash-waters? Many of us work far too hard when cleaning the floor; we have to drag the water into a small drain or collect it painstakingly back to the bucket, even seeing them rust out the rails between the living room and the balcony. We all have our methods, however all of them are far too damaging.

While dragging the dirty water to the bathroom, water sinks into the furniture door tracks, causing all sorts of damages while lingering effects may even cause the sealing of the bath to weaken. When leaning to get the bucket you expose yourself to unhealthy movement routines that cause back-pains – of course, all of that discounting the mess of the dirty water, building up in the corners.

Instead of the hardship and mess, you can pick up your Passer and place it on your rails, close the glass-doors, pass the water over the rails and outside to the standard drainage without any damage. Finished cleaning? Pick Passer up from the rails, wash it in the bath and store it until next time. Passer virtually takes up no space at all, easily hangs on walls with the regular cleaning appliances.

About myself

My Name is Levana Nisim and I'm the inventor and Founder of Passer magic.

For the past 3 years I have dedicated my life to turn Passer magic from a great idea into reality.

My journey  was full of challenges for a woman with no technical background. From finding the solution to the designing of the product, to move on to the development of the prototype and to test the product and finally continue to production. 

I payed the best R&D Company for the job and have been with them every step of the way to make sure that the final product will provide the solution to the problem and finally, after a long journey, I'm here and ready with the perfect product in a category that was made especially for this. Along the way of the development we discovered that we were on to something totally new and i took another big decision in order to protect the product and went for patent registration in the biggest continents of the world, such as USA and Europe.

For as long as I can remember, I was cleaning the floors of the house because I love clean shining floors in my home.

Me and my girlfriend spoke many times about the remaining dirty water problem after washing the floor and we knew that the shortest way to throw the remaining dirty water was via the terrace or balcony door, but we also  knew that it was totally impractical, each time we tried to be clever, we found ourselves spending more time cleaning  and drying the door tracks, so the long road to the bathroom sewer hole was truly the only solution, or to just collect it with the floor cloth, which is no treat :-)

Passer Magic make it easy and almost fun to clean the floor, it's a must for any house!  and it provides a bridge for many different obstacles for the dirty water, It's the only solution out there and this is my story. 

Levana Nisim

story:
Versione in Italiano (English version below)

Siamo Moli-sani animati dalla voglia di far scoprire la nostra Regione promuovendo le produzioni locali, incoraggiando un turismo consapevole e creando connessioni con tutte quelle persone che hanno voglia di conoscere e condividere. 

Vogliamo portare il Molise a casa vostra e Voi a casa nostra, se vorrete.

La nostra favola è ambientata in uno dei luoghi più affascinanti d’Italia, poco conosciuto e poco industrializzato, caratterizzato da tradizioni vive e autentiche. E’ il posto che conosciamo meglio perché è dove siamo nati e cresciuti.

Vogliamo condividere con Voi il nostro Tesoro: questa piccola regione, fatta di castelli, chiese, opere d’arte, borghi unici, paesaggi mozzafiato e persone autentiche. La nostra idea è di racchiuderne la parte migliore in un box, che parla anch’esso del Molise, e spedirlo a casa vostra per farvi conoscere ed assaporare quello che vi aspetta. Il viaggio in Molise che abbiamo pensato per Voi sarà più che autentico: alla scoperta di tesori nascosti, bellezze uniche e sapori inconfondibili; inoltre vi guideremo con laboratori alla scoperta della cucina tradizionale e gusti locali.

Il Vostro contributo è fondamentale ed il nostro impatto sul territorio sarà forte perché incoraggiamo produzioni locali e rispettose del territorio, ecoturismo per un viaggio consapevole e sostenibile; vi invitiamo inoltre ad invitarci i vostri ricordi perché vogliamo costruire un archivio per preservare questo immenso patrimonio per le generazioni future. Raccontarci anche la vostra storia, perché siamo curiosi e vogliamo creare connessioni vere e sincere (connections@moliseinabox.it).


La campagna di crowdfunding

L’obiettivo della campagna di crowdfunding è la cifra di 10.000 euro. Il 50% di questa cifra è direttamente destinato alle aziende con le quali collaboriamo, quindi un’impronta diretta sull’economia locale. La rimanente parte sarà destinata all’avvio della società, alle spese di stampa dei pacchi ed alle spese generali e logistiche. Se la nostra campagna raggiungerà 30.000 € contiamo di aprire un punto di accoglienza turistica permanente, lungo il tratturo Lucera-Castel di Sangro, e spazio di co-working dove svolgere le nostre attività.

Le ricompense che abbiamo previsto sono assolutamente uniche; i prodotti provengono da piccole aziende locali che potrete visitare quando verrete a trovarci.

Contado del Molise: Semola rimacinata (1 Kg, ideale per cavatelli - includiamo la ricetta), Preparato per "spaghettata" biologico, Pomodori verdi in olio extra vergine, Confettura extra mela e cannella, Salsa di pomodoro biologica, Nettare di albicocca, Chips di mela essiccata, La panella (dolce tipico da Torella del Sannio con farina di mais, 100gr)

Saepinum: Bianco moscato secco DOC, Miele con tartufo bianco (40gr), Taglietelle al tartufo bianco, Olio extra vergine di oliva al peperoncino, Zucchine secche in olio extra vergine di oliva, Pomodorini in salsa bio, Nettare di rosa canina,  Preparato per "spaghettata" bio, Confettura extra di fichi bio, Chips di mela essiccata, La panella (dolce tipico da Torella del Sannio con farina di mais, 500gr)

Bovianum Vetus: Tintilia Rosso del Molise DOP, Miele con tartufo bianco (120gr), Tagliatelle al tartufo bianco, Funghi porcini essiccati, Olio extra vergine di oliva, Pomodori pelati bio, Tartufo a fette, Ragù di cinghiale, Salsa tradizionale con pomodoro di Montagano, Carciofi grigliati in olio extra vergine di oliva, Topinambur sott'aceto, Confettura extra di fragole di bosco, Nettare di rosa canina, Succo e polpa di percoca, Succo di melo cotogno, preparati per "spaghettata" "arrosto" e "soffritto",  Chips di mela essiccata, La panella (dolce tipico da Torella del Sannio con farina di mais, 750gr)

Il viaggio in Molise (http://www.moliseinabox.it/molise-tours/) è altrettanto autentico a partire dalla colazione, a casa nostra, e da laboratori di cucina dove scoprirete la vera tradizione molisana.

Se non riusciremo a raggiungere l’obiettivo prefissato potremo comunque assicurare le nostre ricompense ma in tal caso il margine non sarà tale da permetterci di sviluppare la nostra attività.

Il nostro impatto sul territorio

Aiutiamo le aziende locali a crescere ed è per questo che il vostro contributo farà la differenza. Inoltre visitare il Molise fornirà ulteriori benefici all’economia locale. In ultimo le connessioni che vogliamo creare ci aiuteranno a custodire un grande archivio dei ricordi che consegneremo alle generazioni future.

La nostra sfida

I rischi sono insiti in ogni attività ed abbiamo lo spirito giusto per affrontarli al meglio. Con il progredire della campagna contiamo di aggiungere nuove persone e nuove competenze al nostro team; ci prepariamo per affrontare le sfide che si presentano all’orizzonte con il massimo delle nostre forze. Il vostro supporto farà la differenza e vi ringraziamo per questo.

Vi invitiamo a sostenerci anche solamente condividendo questa campagna con amici e parenti; grazie a voi riusciremo a creare un qualcosa di autentico ed unico.

Permetteteci di concludere dicendo che siamo orgogliosi della nostra Regione, della nostra terra, e faremo di tutto per proteggerla e per farvi innamorare, venire a conoscerla o farvi ritorno.
La nostra è una rete di piccoli produttori, villaggi minuscoli e persone autentiche. Veniamo dalla terra, la rispettiamo, siamo orgogliosi della nostra storia; apriamo a voi le nostre case, vi guidiamo alla scoperta di sapori dimenticati e posti incantati. Grazie!


English version


We are a group of enthusiastic friends from Molise with a deep love for our Region and a passion for all the treasures it has to offer.

We aim to promote local economy and to encourage environmentally friendly tourism, creating connections among all those people who, like us, are willing to discover and share.

We would love to bring a bit of Molise into your home – and to bring you into ours!

Our story is set in one of the most charming spots of Italy, maybe less well-known and not very industrialized but kept alive by authentic and passionate traditions.

This is the place we know better than anywhere else, the place we call home.

Now we want to share this gem with you: a small region with a big heart, filled with ancient castles and beautiful churches, artistic masterpieces and breathtaking landscapes, unique hamlets and genuine people.

Our idea is to enclose the best of our region in a box and send it to you, giving you a hint of what you could taste and feel in Molise.

The journey we plan for you will then be a truly authentic experience that you'll carry forever in your heart: you will explore a unique land, discover its treasures and beauty, accompanied by the most intense flavours of our traditional cuisine thanks to dedicated workshops.

Your contribution is essential to help us make a difference for our region.
We support local businesses operating with low impact on the territory and we promote ecotourism as a sustainable and conscious action in favour of the environment.

We are all about contact and sharing, so please send us your memories if you know our Region; we will build an archive to keep these memories alive through time, and to preserve them for the new generations.

Share your memories with us, but also your story: we'd love to get to know you, your home and your corner of the world! Let's build true and honest connections, together. (connections@moliseinabox.it).

Our crowdfunding campaign

Our goal is to collect 10.000 €.

We will leave a positive footprint on the community as 50% of this amount is destined for local businesses that are supplying us with their products. Another percentage will be invested in marketing and promotional material, and the remaining amount is to cover general logistic expenses. This will allow us to start our own business.

If we manage to reach 30.000 € we will open a tourist information point in our village, Castropignano, along with a co-working space where we could carry out our activities, for example a cooking school.

The rewards for you will be truly unique: all the products are from small local businesses that you'll be able to visit on your journey here.

Contado del Molise: Semola rimacinata (1 Kg, ideal for hanmade pasta - perhaps we will send the recipe), Organic "spaghettata" (dried erbs), Green tomatoes in extravirgin olive oil, Apple and cinnamon jam, Organic tomato sauce, Apricot nectar, Mela chips (dried apples) , La panella (traditional cake from Torella del Sannio made with corn flour, 100gr)

Saepinum: Honey with white truffle (40gr), White truffles tagliatelle, Moscato dry white DOC, Peperoncino extra virgin olive oil, Dried courgettes in organic extra virgin olive oil, Organic cherry tomatoes in tomato sauce, Rosehip nectar,  Organic "spaghettata" , Mela chips (dried apples), Organic figs jam, La panella (traditional cake from Torella del Sannio made with corn flour, 500gr)

Bovianum Vetus: Honey with white truffle (120gr), White truffle tagliatelle, Dried Porcini mushrooms, Extravirgin olive oil, Tintilia red DOP, Organic peeled tomatoes, Sliced black truffles, Wild boar sauce, Traditional "salsa" with Montagano tomatoes, Grilled artichoke in extra virgin olive oil, Pickled Jerusalem artichoke, Wild strawberries jam, Rosehip nectar, Organic "percoche" juice and pulp, Quince juice,  Organic "spaghettata" "arrosto" and "soffritto"( 3 different mix for pasta, roast and fry),  Mela chips (dried apples), La panella (traditional cake from Torella del Sannio made with corn flour, 750gr)

The journey itself is equally unique in all the aspects (http://www.moliseinabox.it/molise-tours/), even the breakfast, which will be offered to you in the warmth of our own homes. 

Our desire to build connections is authentic, we want to protect and promote our rich heritage and share it with the future generations.

Should we not reach our goals, we will still be able to send the rewards but there won't be any margin for us to develop our business.

Our impact on the territory

We help local businesses to grow, and your contribution can make a difference. Visiting Molise is also a big part of it, as it will have an even stronger impact on local economy. We also aim to create a memory archive in order to preserve our heritage for the new generations.

Our challenge

Every enterprise implies a risk, but we believe we have the right spirit to take the challenge – and succeed. As the campaign makes progress we will add new people and new skills to our team, we won't stop if faced with obstacles and will do our best to overcome them.

Your support is crucial in this.

Thank you for contributing and helping us creating something unique, even if it's just by sharing this campaign with your friends – small gestures can sometimes do big things.

We are proud of our Region, we honour our land and will do our best to protect it. Visit it once and you'll fall in love! Our roots are in the soil and we respect it, also by proudly sharing it with you. We'd love to guide you on an unforgettable journey among forgotten flavours and enchanted places. Thank you for your support!
