story:
What is a Wax Seal?
 


 

Although the art of letter writing is a traditional practice, this does not mean that we must dress Shakespearean and write in sonnet form. The same can be said for the art of wax sealing.

Wax Seals were traditionally used to authenticate official documents, but they now serve as a popular gift for designers, stationery lovers and anyone wishing to add a personal touch to their branding projects or written correspondence.

There are many uses for the Wax Seal such as for packaging, sealing liquor bottles, wedding planning or even just as a charming addition to your tool kit, home office and stationery collection.

 

The ALUMA Solves a Common Problem
 


 

There are occasions during Wax Sealing that you wish you had more than one design at your disposal. Wax Seal aficionados will rejoice at the idea of being able to switch between their favourite wax seal designs without the need for an additional stamp handle.
 

 

Development Process
 


 

Designing the ALUMA has been a labor intensive process involving more than 1,000+ hours of research, brainstorming and development. We have gone from initial sketches on the backs of napkins to CAD modelling, 3D rendering and working prototypes.
 


 

The brief that we set ourselves for this project was simply to create a new, modern stamp with a unique mechanical system which allowed different engraved designs to be easily interchangeable. After months of iterations we have arrived at our current solution which is a first-of-its-kind magnetic fixture. We are really pleased with how the initial prototypes have turned out and we are excited for you to experience just how quick and easy it is to switch between your favourite engraved designs.

 

A Detailed Look at the ALUMA
 


 

The design of the ALUMA is fairly minimal in appearance when viewed from the side. You could be forgiven for thinking that it is made up of just two parts, i.e, the head and the handle. Broadly speaking yes, but technically it is made up of five major components that all come together to form the finished product. 
 


 

Both the body and the head are machined from solid pieces of aluminium. There are three additional pieces which make up the entire magnetic housing. We have made a conscious effort to engineer the ALUMA in a way that allows all of the inner workings and mechanisms to remain completely concealed whilst maintaining the overall aesthetic of the product.
 


 

Magnet: Strong, rare-earth Neodymium magnet.

The assembly method for the ALUMA has been taken into careful consideration to ensure that all parts can withstand the force of continual impact from the magnetic fitting.

 

What's Included?
 

Each ALUMA wax seal pledge will come with a free melting kit so that you can start sealing your own envelopes right out of the box!

The melting kit consists of 1 x Melting Spoon, 1 x Tealight Candle and 10 x Wax Pellets.

One ALUMA branded wax pellet is enough to seal a single envelope (1:1).

 

How does Custom Engraving work?


If you are not proficient at designing your own seal then we also have a selection of ready-made template designs to choose from.

 

About Us
 

 

Stamptitude is a family-owned business founded in 2013 by a husband & wife team. Our headquarters are in Hong Kong and our products are manufactured approx. 50km north of the border in Mainland China. We are transparent about the fact that our products are Made in China and we are proud to have the necessary facilities to do all our own assembly, packing and custom engraving on-site in our 1300 square feet studio. We have shipped products to over 100+ countries worldwide and have worked with major corporate clients including Disney, Dior and The Grammys.

 

Why INDIEGOGO?

We launched the ALUMA on Kickstarter 6 months ago and had always intended to launch a follow-up campaign. However, having received such an overwhelming amount of support we decided to hang back until we had successfully fulfilled the Kickstarter rewards. Now that we are ready to start offering pre-orders we are launching an exclusive campaign here on INDIEGOGO for anybody who wishes to get their hands on the ALUMA before they go to retail.

 

First batch of ALUMA's being shipped out (April 2018)

 

A backer-submitted photo of #ALUMAinthewild. Courtesy of @kaycalligraphy

 

Some of the comments posted to our Kickstarter page :)

 

 

Our Trusted Reviews

story:
The Gist

Clayton InterGalactic in an IT Infrastructure Startup where we are building long-term solutions to change how data is collected, protected and sold. We are a growing community of experts in our fields who understand the value we bring and respect and appreciate the value others contribute.

Here are a few of the folks helping make the magic happen:

We believe the time has come to act from an Abundance of Courage and change how data is protected, collected, and sold. At Clayton InterGalactic, we believe that people should own their own data. We believe that individuals are better stewards of their data than big corporations. We believe that people should not have to sacrifice privacy for convenience. We believe that people should be paid for their data (especially when that data is being sold by corporations for huge profits).

We are tired of the anger and frustration we, and others, feel every day because of  the lack of control of our own data. Big Tech has proven over and over that they cannot be trusted with our data. 

We knew we had to do something about it. So, we are building the foundations to empower people to take back control of their data. Our tools (hardware and software) help people to:

  • Create and manage digital identity.
  • Control their own data - seriously own their encryption keys and protect their data behind their own encryption.
  • Build virtual communities based on trust - creating interconnected trusted networks => "The Web of Trust"
  • Determine who to sell data to, for how much, and for how long.

To facilitate this digital independence, we are building a line of devices - the Presidio Device Line.

We have working prototypes for these, but there is still some work to get to production ready prototypes. That is where you come in - we are inviting you to collaborate with us.

 

The Collaboration

We are excited about bringing our solutions to market and genuinely believe these solutions will contribute to making the world a better place.  We need your help. We need to understand how different people, communities, and businesses wand to use the devices and what they expect from the Web of Trust.

Specifically, we want a minimum of:

Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.

  • 1 Presidio Alaina Partner to validate features, functionality, and design preferably in a small business setting, or someone who uses lots of storage space (musicians, DJs, movie makers...).
  • 3 Presidio Ben Partners to test prototypes and validate that we really do have the galaxy's fastest VPN (gamers, video conferencers, home learners...).
  • 2 Presidio Julia Partners to help make sure we've got the right level of functionality and value in this entry-level device.
  • 10 Will-n-Meena Partners to test and provide feedback on our software only (cloud) solutions.

Please consider joining us on this adventure.

For your contributions (at hardware device levels), you will receive a production prototype candidate, and potentially upgrades to hardware (if needed to finalize production prototypes).

Software and hardware solution level contributors will receive software updates including final production release.

Moreover, you will be part of the Clayton InterGalactic Community and receive Partner updates. Most importantly, you will be acknowledged and appreciated (at least by the Clayton InterGalactic Community) for contributing to making devices that really work and genuinely deliver value.

As a thank you to our contributors at the hardware and software solution levels, we will send you a really cool 32 GB credit card-sized flash drive. This may be used to send you initial credentials or ISOs but will be yours to keep and cherish.

Maybe for a stretch goal, we can add Abundance of Courage Coffee mugs ...no, promises for stretch goals.

 

The Why

Each person on our team has numerous ‘why I gotta’ reasons:

  • “My mom told me she is afraid her credit card info gets exposed to criminals every time she pays for something online. She told me to do something about it.”

  • “Big tech needs to be held accountable. They do not own my data, but they sell it. How can that be okay?”
  • “My family and I are good, decent people but that doesn’t mean the government, or anyone else, should have access to our personal files, photos of the kids.”
  •  “I don’t trust Facebook, Amazon, or any of the big social media sites to protect our photos and personal information.”
  • “It is crazy hard to get my photos back from Facebook – I should be able to just download them all.”
  • “We keep trying to find tools that already do this. Nothing we have tried works the way we need it too. We are going to have to build it ourselves.”
  • “I don’t want my kids to grow up always being treated like a commodity.”

  • “I am so tired of Facebook telling me what to think and feel. Why won’t Facebook just let me see my feed with most recent first? I’m disappointed because I’m pretty sure I know why”
  • "Siri hates me. Alexa keeps trying to sell me stuff I do not want or need. Google Maps routes me past stores that pay Google Maps even if it is a slower, less-direct route. These are not behaviors of a good personal assistant. Why can’t I have a personal assistant that acts in my interests? Are we going to have to build this?”
  • and so on…

Mama said so, we are watching out for our kids… families… friends… people who cannot do it without our help. All powerful motivators.

We asked ourselves, “Can we do it?” Unsurprisingly, the answer was, “Yes!!” Then, we asked, “Should we do it?”  We unanimously answered with a “Yes!!”

We answered “Yes!!” because of all our ‘why I gotta’ do it reasons. We answered “Yes!!” because we see a path to a better world. We answered “Yes!!” because it is the right thing to do.

The “should we” question is not a one-time question. We ask it over-and-over. Our conviction only grows. Our list of ‘why I gotta’ reasons keeps growing too. So, Clayton InterGalactic is acting from an Abundance of Courage to empower people to control their data. We are building devices and creating an un-platform where people can create their own trusted communities.

Short-term, our Presidio Device Line – which includes 2 devices with the Galaxy’s fastest VPN – and our cloud-based solutions, provide tools to create secure digital identities as well as serve as entry points to the web of trust.

Long-term, we are leading the thought-change that will bring a new era of collaboration to companies and their customers.

 

The Risks

We are doing everything we can to set up ourselves and our contributors for overwhelming success. 

With all crowd-funding, there is the risk that people just won't deliver. Maybe the realities of manufacturing don't align with their initial dreams. Maybe they just were not set up to deliver a working product. We have already mitigated this risk:

  • We know our product works - we want help, feedback and insights from Partners to finalize our production prototypes. We may do another Indiegogo campaign when we have our production prototypes ready. 
  • Everyone on our team is really good at what they do - we've all been on high-pressure, mission-critical projects and we've all put great products into production. 
  • Our funding goal represents the cost of hardware for our minimum targets. For this campaign, we are looking to break even on hardware - the rest is figured into our research and product development costs.

A very prominent risk is there may be more initial demand for the Clayton InterGalactic Presidio product line than we have anticipated. Our mitigation plan is multi-faceted:

  • Cap Indiegogo “Perks” so we do not exceed our known assembly capacity.
  • Allow for pre-orders on our website with clearly identified delivery targets.
  • Accelerate our employee on-boarding aligned to projections for sales.
  • Increase investment targets to ensure we have necessary capital to keep up with demand.

There is the corollary risk of adoption and sales rates may be below projections. If this risk occurs, we will:

  • Partner with people who do contribute even if we don't reach our minimum targets - that is why we have a flexible goal.
  • Continue to seek out partners through our extended network.

 

More Magic

Contributing to a Concept Phase Campaign is certainly not for everyone. . We would love to keep in touch with you. 

Other ways to help:

  • Share our campaign with others - Indiegogo has some handy-dandy share tools!
  • Make a small contribution without a Perk.
  • Please follow our campaign if you are interested in what we are doing - it gives us a way to keep in touch.
  • Stay safe during these troubling times.
  • Act from an Abundance of Courage for that is what leads to great things.

story:
Are you a comfortable side sleeper just because you are in the right posture? Dreamery pillow can help side sleeper even with earphones on. It is fluffy on your face and elastically supporting your shoulders. This is comfortable not only for side sleepers but any position sleepers.

 

 

According to a study by a sleep research institute, more than 65% of adults have a sleep habit of sleeping on their side.

“you will sleep well in correct position!” Is it really comfortable to sleep on your side just because you lie down correctly? 

Let's find out why Dreamery Pillow is comfortable and hygienic from the three perspectives of structure/material/convenience.

 

<Structure>

 

Comfortable ears will get the side sleepers restfully asleep.

The ear (outer ear) is made of cartilage and nerve cells, so you feel pain from stimulation or pressure. The pressure on the ears due to the weight of the head during sleep naturally interferes with sleep. In the case of Dreamery Pillow, the ear is placed on the part where the egg is placed on the screen below.

 

The ears are placed on the upper part marked by the red line in the picture below, and the 3D sewing technique is used below without fillings but elastic net support at the bottom has enough space for the ears to be comfortably stored, so your ears are not pressed against the weight of your head, making them comfortable.

 

The area where the ear is in direct contact is given an aesthetic design and function with a high strength elastic spandex patch.

Now there is nothing compressing your ears. Even with wireless earphones, you can sleep while listening to calm music or white noise.

 

Comfortable shoulders will get the side sleepers to relax.

The face has a cozy feeling because the silk-like texture and soft cotton are in contact.

In the lower part, it is a structure of double filling material that provides a stable and firm support so that the shoulders are not stiff. When jumping from a high place, the primary shock absorption is the foot, the second shock absorption is the principle of bending the knee. The shoulder is comfortable, but the right posture of 13-14cm (5.1-5.5 inch) is maintained so that sleeping on the side is comfortable.

 

Natural movement will get you to sleep comfortably.

 

According to a study by one sleep research institute, although it varies from person to person, it is said that you move your body 30 to 60 times during sleep. If you force your head to be fixed for reasons such as a cervical pillow, it will interfere with sleep, right?

 

Natural sleeping posture change

 

Design and materials that allow easy switching between any sleeping positions.

It does not restrain the body and allows easy switching of the natural sleeping position to give you quality sleeping.

 

Of course, it is comfortable to sleep on your back. 

The (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) naturally maintains the shape of the neck curvature, which is different from the typical cotton. The most comfortable height of the pillow for sleeping on the back position varies from person to person, but it is generally said that 6-8cm (2.4-3.1 inch) is the most comfortable height. The memory pad that distributes body pressure evenly and the elastic net support at the bottom maintain a height about 7 cm (2.8 inch).

 

<Material>

 

Applied material science to avoid harmful substances such as bacteria, mites, and house dust.

 

Choosing the pillow fillings and the outer fabric was an important and critical part of this project. There are many pillows made of various materials, but when you have to choose a pillow, there are so many imitations that it is impossible to distinguish by just changing the label, and it is not easy to choose.

 

Cotton pillows are not stable, granular absorbent pillows decrease in volume while using, and expensive pillows are suspicious of internal hygiene.

The filling material has problems such as hardening, bacteria, and discoloration, and it has the disadvantage that it cannot be washed in a machine entirely.

So, We want to introduce you to the materials that Dreamery Pillow has been working hard on and testing for a long time.

The three core materials are (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) as the upper filling material, the elastic net supporter as the lower filling material, and microfiber fabric outer surface.

 

(memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber)

100% cotton filling material of DACRON from INVISTA, a global company started in 1959, was used.

The left pillow is the DACRON (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) used pillow, and the right is high quality polyester cotton used pillow.

The advantage of DACRON (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) is as shown in the demonstration picture above and the test results below.

“The feeling of fitting is similar to or better than the memory foam”

This (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) turns hypoallergenic fibers into active ingredients.

The biggest advantage of DACRON memory cotton is that it can be washed entirely in a machine even though it is cotton.

Compared to some expensive functional products that are sealed in a cover and difficult to see inside, it is safe to wash off the contamination with a washing machine and to use a high-temperature dryer.

(The elastic net support at the bottom cannot be used with a high-temperature dryer. Please refer to “How to wash” instruction below.)

 

• Elastic net support

As a result of measuring the residual amount of 26 hazardous chemicals by the SGS inspection agency, all of them were undetected, and it is a hygienic material that is protected from any microorganisms.

 

 

Household pollution is easily removed just by washing showerhead water with a general detergent.

 

With an air permeability of more than 80%, this material has long-lasting elasticity and excellent resilience to elasticity.

The very fine thread used to make the 45g microfiber fabric per square meter physically blocks the entry of harmful substances once more.

The silky touch induces a pleasant sleep and DRI-FIT processing was performed to quickly absorb moisture in the human body and discharge out of the pillow.

The rough surface of the elastic net support is 5mm (0.2 inch) thick without obstructing ventilation and gives you a nice cushion.

It is resistant to friction with other bedding and expresses it as a functional pillow by design.

 

<Convenience>

 

Wash to your mood

HOW TO WASH

Open the lower zipper, take out the elastic net support, and close the lower zipper again.

Put the pillow body in the enclosed laundry net and put it in the washing machine.

Run the washing machine in a mild washing course setting with lukewarm water temperature and mild detergent. You can wash the elastic net support separately as like the previous instruction above. Do not wash with colored laundry. After the pillow is completely dry, tap it with a stick, etc. to bring back the lumps of cotton. The pillow body can be used as a heat dryer, but the elastic net support please follow the instruction above to avoid shape deformation.

CAUTION

Immediately after receiving the pillow, wash it once and use it to eliminate water stains due to the nature of the microfiber fabric.

 

Flexible to adjust to desirable pillow heights.

 

Open the lower zipper and insert the pillow support. While inner pillow cover pushing it to the right attach the Velcro patch and the auxiliary support Velcro patch together.

 

Height adjustment is not recommended when sleeping on your back position. In particular, it is not recommended for those with blood pressure or medical condition so please contact and discuss with your doctor for the best recommendation.

As mentioned earlier, it is set to approximately 2.8 inch (7 Cm)in height, which many people are comfortable with. (If you wish to adjust it higher, you can open the lower zipper and put a towel, etc., but sleeping posture is a habit. A good habit helps a healthy sleep life.)

 

 

 

Practical dedicated laundry net configuration

 

pillow body + Elastic mesh support + Secondary Support + Laundry net

 

 

This project's logistics plan has passed thorough a 7-point review, and Floship certifies that we have an efficient and reliable logistics plan to deliver this good from the factory to you, the customers.
story_txt: Are you a comfortable side sleeper just because you are in the right posture? Dreamery pillow can help side sleeper even with earphones on. It is fluffy on your face and elastically supporting your shoulders. This is comfortable not only for side sleepers but any position sleepers.  According to a study by a sleep research institute, more than 65% of adults have a sleep habit of sleeping on their side.“you will sleep well in correct position!” Is it really comfortable to sleep on your side just because you lie down correctly? Let's find out why Dreamery Pillow is comfortable and hygienic from the three perspectives of structure/material/convenience. <Structure> Comfortable ears will get the side sleepers restfully asleep.The ear (outer ear) is made of cartilage and nerve cells, so you feel pain from stimulation or pressure. The pressure on the ears due to the weight of the head during sleep naturally interferes with sleep. In the case of Dreamery Pillow, the ear is placed on the part where the egg is placed on the screen below. The ears are placed on the upper part marked by the red line in the picture below, and the 3D sewing technique is used below without fillings but elastic net support at the bottom has enough space for the ears to be comfortably stored, so your ears are not pressed against the weight of your head, making them comfortable. The area where the ear is in direct contact is given an aesthetic design and function with a high strength elastic spandex patch.Now there is nothing compressing your ears. Even with wireless earphones, you can sleep while listening to calm music or white noise. Comfortable shoulders will get the side sleepers to relax.The face has a cozy feeling because the silk-like texture and soft cotton are in contact.In the lower part, it is a structure of double filling material that provides a stable and firm support so that the shoulders are not stiff. When jumping from a high place, the primary shock absorption is the foot, the second shock absorption is the principle of bending the knee. The shoulder is comfortable, but the right posture of 13-14cm (5.1-5.5 inch) is maintained so that sleeping on the side is comfortable. Natural movement will get you to sleep comfortably. According to a study by one sleep research institute, although it varies from person to person, it is said that you move your body 30 to 60 times during sleep. If you force your head to be fixed for reasons such as a cervical pillow, it will interfere with sleep, right? Natural sleeping posture change Design and materials that allow easy switching between any sleeping positions.It does not restrain the body and allows easy switching of the natural sleeping position to give you quality sleeping. Of course, it is comfortable to sleep on your back. The (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) naturally maintains the shape of the neck curvature, which is different from the typical cotton. The most comfortable height of the pillow for sleeping on the back position varies from person to person, but it is generally said that 6-8cm (2.4-3.1 inch) is the most comfortable height. The memory pad that distributes body pressure evenly and the elastic net support at the bottom maintain a height about 7 cm (2.8 inch). <Material> Applied material science to avoid harmful substances such as bacteria, mites, and house dust. Choosing the pillow fillings and the outer fabric was an important and critical part of this project. There are many pillows made of various materials, but when you have to choose a pillow, there are so many imitations that it is impossible to distinguish by just changing the label, and it is not easy to choose. Cotton pillows are not stable, granular absorbent pillows decrease in volume while using, and expensive pillows are suspicious of internal hygiene.The filling material has problems such as hardening, bacteria, and discoloration, and it has the disadvantage that it cannot be washed in a machine entirely.So, We want to introduce you to the materials that Dreamery Pillow has been working hard on and testing for a long time.The three core materials are (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) as the upper filling material, the elastic net supporter as the lower filling material, and microfiber fabric outer surface. (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber)100% cotton filling material of DACRON from INVISTA, a global company started in 1959, was used.The left pillow is the DACRON (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) used pillow, and the right is high quality polyester cotton used pillow.The advantage of DACRON (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) is as shown in the demonstration picture above and the test results below.“The feeling of fitting is similar to or better than the memory foam”This (memory cotton / Memorelle Fiber) turns hypoallergenic fibers into active ingredients.The biggest advantage of DACRON memory cotton is that it can be washed entirely in a machine even though it is cotton.Compared to some expensive functional products that are sealed in a cover and difficult to see inside, it is safe to wash off the contamination with a washing machine and to use a high-temperature dryer.(The elastic net support at the bottom cannot be used with a high-temperature dryer. Please refer to “How to wash” instruction below.) • Elastic net supportAs a result of measuring the residual amount of 26 hazardous chemicals by the SGS inspection agency, all of them were undetected, and it is a hygienic material that is protected from any microorganisms.  Household pollution is easily removed just by washing showerhead water with a general detergent. With an air permeability of more than 80%, this material has long-lasting elasticity and excellent resilience to elasticity.The very fine thread used to make the 45g microfiber fabric per square meter physically blocks the entry of harmful substances once more.The silky touch induces a pleasant sleep and DRI-FIT processing was performed to quickly absorb moisture in the human body and discharge out of the pillow.The rough surface of the elastic net support is 5mm (0.2 inch) thick without obstructing ventilation and gives you a nice cushion.It is resistant to friction with other bedding and expresses it as a functional pillow by design. <Convenience> Wash to your moodHOW TO WASHOpen the lower zipper, take out the elastic net support, and close the lower zipper again.Put the pillow body in the enclosed laundry net and put it in the washing machine.Run the washing machine in a mild washing course setting with lukewarm water temperature and mild detergent. You can wash the elastic net support separately as like the previous instruction above. Do not wash with colored laundry. After the pillow is completely dry, tap it with a stick, etc. to bring back the lumps of cotton. The pillow body can be used as a heat dryer, but the elastic net support please follow the instruction above to avoid shape deformation.CAUTIONImmediately after receiving the pillow, wash it once and use it to eliminate water stains due to the nature of the microfiber fabric. Flexible to adjust to desirable pillow heights. Open the lower zipper and insert the pillow support. While inner pillow cover pushing it to the right attach the Velcro patch and the auxiliary support Velcro patch together. Height adjustment is not recommended when sleeping on your back position. In particular, it is not recommended for those with blood pressure or medical condition so please contact and discuss with your doctor for the best recommendation.As mentioned earlier, it is set to approximately 2.8 inch (7 Cm)in height, which many people are comfortable with. (If you wish to adjust it higher, you can open the lower zipper and put a towel, etc., but sleeping posture is a habit. A good habit helps a healthy sleep life.)   Practical dedicated laundry net configuration pillow body + Elastic mesh support + Secondary Support + Laundry net  This project's logistics plan has passed thorough a 7-point review, and Floship certifies that we have an efficient and reliable logistics plan to deliver this good from the factory to you, the customers.

story:
Story

What is Rigavit Pro ?

In our previous launch we successfully delivered you thousands of our plant watering system Rigavit. Since then we have been able to take the original Rigavit a big step forward!

Inspired by your feedback's, we wanted to give you a better improved product. Our team has worked hard to incorporate several new features that will help your plants stay healthy, flourish and bloom while you are away or simply too busy.  Keeping your plants healthy doesn’t have to be complicated.

With the moisture and environment sensors, you will be able to control the optimal level of humidity so your plants have the consistent soil conditions they need to grow healthy and happy.

The new edition gives you remote control through Wifi, Choice between different energy sources, and many more features, all in this incredibly small convenient device.

 

How It Works ?

To Water Your Plants

  • Get it out of the box.
  • Insert 2 AAA batteries or just plug Usb  Cable.
  • Place Inlet and Outlet Hoses
  • Bury Moisture Sensor to Soil.
  • Press Button on Top Once To Start Keeping Your Plants at %60 Humidity Level.
  • Or If you have an iOS or Android device download our app from store, Connect to Device and Customize, Monitor, Use from wherever you are.
 

Main Unit

Wifi

Rigavit Pro has a Wifi, You can Control, Monitor device or devices from everywhere. 

Moisture Sensor

Rigavit Pro's soil moisture sensors gives you the option to adjust the timing of watering according to your plant's needs, rather than at fixed time intervals. The sensor can also be buried in the soil if you want to monitor moisture close to the roots. 

Rigavit Pro moisture sensor is detachable, you can use it or not.

If you don't want to use it you can still use Rigavit Pro to watering your plants at selected intervals from App. or You can use it a normal pump for air and water.

Light, Temp, Humidity Sensors

For more serious indoor gardeners who want to track their plants' health more closely, Rigavit Pro has 3 more sensors

Nozzle

To improve watering efficiency, Rigavit’s Bendable Nozzle is also included in the box.

For better coverage it is bendable and has 14 angled outputs.

Power Sources

Usb

If you don't want to use batteries you can only power it with a standard Micro Usb charger either plugged to charger or power bank.  

Battery

You can also use it with 2 AAA Alkaline or Rechargeable Batteries.

Solar Energy

If you are using Rechargeable AAA batteries Solar Panel will always charge it. Solar panel turns 360 degrees, and detachable if you don't want to use it.

Input Output Pins

For the tech enthusiasts, It has 2 I/O pins which can be configured through app as Input, Output, TTL TX, ADC (Analog Digital Converter). It has unlimited use possibilities .

Other Possible Uses of I/O Pins

  • Turn On/Off Lights or Plugs from Remote.
  • Start Watering with an external signal.
  • Connect to an Arduino
  • Use it as Remote Sensor for logging and sending data.

Watch our video to learn more!

OTA

Based on the creative use examples we saw from our customers, we’re excited to add different modes to get more value from Rigavit Pro. Whether it be sucking air instead of pumping water or feeding your hydrophonic deep water culture system. Rigavit Pro is capable of so much more! Anytime we add new features or make improvements, you can update your device with OTA (On The Air). Look for an update button on your app and these new features will be available to you in seconds!

Sound Alert

It also has an audible beeper function we received too much emails about it from you.  Alerts you when Water Bottle is empty or or batteries are draining ... Can be disabled or enabled from App. 

Water Supply

Rigavit works with all plastic, glass water bottles or any other water containers. All you need is to choice right size depending on your absence and plant's water need.

Pots

Can be used with any shaped, sized pots.

Benefits

  • Very Easy and Safe to Use
  • No need to ask anyone to water your plants
  • No need to worry about your flowers anymore
  • Your plants are always well cared
  • Gives a comfort feeling
  • You earn extra free time
  • Your absence for months won't be a problem
  • You can forget if you water them or not, Rigavit Pro won't
  • Avoids extreme watering if two person are unaware of each other.
  • It always checks your soil moisture and waters when needed.
  • You can Control, Monitor or Activate Pump from Remote.
  • ...

Simple & Safe

  • Indoor Home and/or Office use
  • Works with USB or 2 AAA battery and Solar Energy
  • Uses standard water bottles as water supply
  • Fits to all kind of pots (circular, rectangular, square)
  • With 1 device and 1 bottle you could water up to 3 plants.
  • Could be used with or without nozzle
  • Bendable nozzle ensures you to water necessary area on pot.
  • White, Green, Black colors.
  • Status Led

What is inside Rigavit Pro Box

  • 1 x Rigavit Pro Device
  • 1 x Bendable Silicone Nozzle
  • 1 x Nozzle Holder
  • 1 mt Hose
  • User's Manual
  • No Batteries

Shipping Photos

Why Are We Crowdfunding ?

In order to reach our goal to give you an affordable price, we have to produce more units to optimize our unit costs. For this we need your support!

story:
This smart, fun, and interactive ball will keep your pet happy all-day. It’s the perfect buddy for your furry family! Let them play with a ball that plays with them while you’re away at work or shopping. No more boredom or separation anxiety! 

100% automatic and self-moving, the Luerpci Ball lets your cute friends play all day even when you’re not home!

When your pets get bored of Luerpci, just click a button and it’ll spring into action on its own to double the fun! Control the ball remotely to play with your pets!

Make separation anxiety a thing of the past! The Smart Companionship Mode provides 30 min. of play for your fuzzy family followed by 10 minutes of rest to get them ready for round 2!

Thanks to its exterior food-grade TPE your pets will be harmless and safe to play with! With a 90mm size, it can’t be swallowed and is made environmentally friendly, anti-fall, and non-toxic materials.

With the unique design of the hard inner shell and soft exterior TPE, you’ll never worry about your pets’ puncturing the ball. 

Light Up Your Pets’ day 

 

From dark rooms to sunny days, there are so many ways to keep your furry little ones entertained with Luerpci’s 5 different light-up options!

Choose from Red, Blue, Green, rotating between all 3, or have all 3 flashings!

Control In Your Palm With A Remote Controller

 

Change the colours and make the Luerpci jump or run with the press of a button to make it the most interesting toy in your kitty or puppers life (except for you, of course)!

It’s Not Just A Toy. It’s Your Pets Favourite Toy.

Luerpci is easy and safe to clean in the sink or tub.

With drop resistance overshadowing other toys, you can row it around like a regular ball! The TPE material will protect to fall on the floor.

Find the right colour for your ball! And unlike other toys, you can replace or fix it on your own.

The Fun Never Stops with our 1000mAh battery life! Enjoy 6 hours of play! 

The transparent shell lets light shine through, doubling the fun your pets will have!

Find Your Pets Favourite Color! 

Notes: Before Switching interactions (No.2 button) or switching led colors  (No.3 button), the No.1 button must be pressed first and your remote to be unlocked.

 How was LUERPCI born?

Timeline

Specs

  • Smart Companionship Mode: 30 minutes of play + 10 minutes of rest
  •  Interactive Mode: Runs, jumps, & changing direction
  •  5 Different Light-Up Options: Red, Blue, Green, rotate between all 3 or have all 3 flashing
  •  Ball Diameter: 90MM
  •  Wireless Remote: The optimal control range of the remote control is 5M. The remote control uses a round dry battery, which can be installed and replaced by yourself. The battery life is 1 year.
  •  Product Material: TPE and ABS (Environmental friendly, anti-fall,  non-toxic and harmless)
  •  Built-In Large-Capacity Battery: 1000mAh (6-hour run-time)
  •  Recharging Time: 1.5 hour
  •  Charging Convenience: Type-C charging, 5V input. Compatible with a power bank, laptop, and power socket.
  •  Waterproof: IPX6 waterproof rating
  •  Drop Resistance: 
  •  Weight: 198g

The Team Behind Luerpci

HUIJA INTERNATIONAL (HK) LIMITED is located in beautiful Hong Kong. Spanning 1,500 square meters and with more than one thousand staff, we focus mainly on product development, production, and sales as a fully integrated industrial company. Our experienced R&D team has over 1,000 patents, copious medals, and has achieved numerous awards.

Our company has focused on designing and manufacturing pet related smart electronic gadgets and accessories. The focus of Huija is to establish itself as the leading and premier brand for smart pet products. We aim to solve real-world problems faced by parents of pets and their furry families through the IoT (Internet of Things). Luerpci is our self-developed product, which has powerful and exciting features, making it the first electronic and interactive pet toy.

We’re VERY passionate about improving the lives of our pets. We really want to work on something that makes pets happier and healthier and gives us new ways to interact with our pets.

story:
Overworked? Can’t relax? Lacking the sleep you need? The Melange robe was developed by textile experts and wellness-obsessed visionaries to help improve your daily routine.

Melange is a premium-grade robe that harnesses the power of Celliant® technology to help improve your body’s ability to regulate your temperature, keeping you more comfortable while you’re relaxing.

The robe is engineered using Celliant’s proprietary blend of minerals that naturally cycle energy back into your body in the form of infrared energy. 

Infrared is well known within the medical community, where it has been used to modulate sleep, protect against stress, and ease joint stiffness. However, there has never been an easy way to incorporate IR into everyday life. To that end, we put it in a unique form that is accessible to everyone.

 

 Melange is the very first robe of its kind to made with Celliant Technology, and that gives it a ton of amazing properties. The scientific benefits of using this technology has been measurably proven to: 

 

 

 

It has never more difficult to turn your mind off, relax, and recharge. That's why we created the Melange Robe.

 

60% of the energy we consume is lost thanks to escaping body heat. The Celliant fibers absorb that energy and redirect it back into your body in the form of infrared energy.

The minerals used in every fiber were selected for their thermo-reactive ability to effectively convert body heat into infrared energy. This triggers vasodilation in the capillary bed and makes more oxygen available to your cells — resulting in more fuel for your body.

Cycling more fuel through your body helps improve blood flow and increases tissue oxygenation by an average of 7%. This is what gives our robe its transformative properties.

We’ve designed the Melange Robe using our innovative Linkweave. This is what makes it visually unique while providing the ultimate in comfort and durability. The weave is comprised of 70% premium cotton and 30% Celliant fibres.

Because the Melange Robe is crafted from a combination of high-quality natural and synthetic materials, it’s guaranteed to stay fresh for longer. And when it comes to washing, the fibres are produced using a special infusion process to ensure the Celliant technology never washes out nor breaks down.

 

 

 

We know your anatomy is unique, which is why we have engineered the Melange Robe to meet your personal needs. This isn’t a robe for everyone. It is a robe for you.

 

To ensure you get the optimal size we are offering 4 different size variations. Choose your preference using the charts below (size and colour will be chosen after the campaign ends).

 

 

 Melange is a home goods company dedicated to naturally improving physical and mental wellbeing through research-driven science.

Over the past 12 months, we pored over medical research and studies about the effects infrared and Celliant technology have on daily life.

From there, we set out to take this science and technology to make a product that could help everyone. After many rounds of trial and error, we’ve arrived at a prototype that people love.

Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver this transformative product to your door.

More on our team:

Melange is made up of a small dedicated team with over 20 years of combined experience in the textile industry. John will be managing operations, brand development, and backer relations. Greg will focus on logistics and supply chain management. Krista & Tristan's focus will be on marketing strategies and content creation.

This project would not have been possible without the support of the Wilfrid Laurier Launchpad incubator and the entire Schlegel Team - Laura A., Brandon VD., Sam H., and Rachel B. Thank you!

After many rounds of trial and error, we’ve arrived at a prototype that people love.Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver this transformative product to your door.More on our team:Melange is made up of a small dedicated team with over 20 years of combined experience in the textile industry. John will be managing operations, brand development, and backer relations. Greg will focus on logistics and supply chain management. Krista & Tristan's focus will be on marketing strategies and content creation.This project would not have been possible without the support of the Wilfrid Laurier Launchpad incubator and the entire Schlegel Team - Laura A., Brandon VD., Sam H., and Rachel B. Thank you! This project is promoted by Jellop , the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.    https://superbackers.co/starthere

story:
Hello everyone!

I am an independent perfumer who has lived in France for the last 4 years. During this time, I have been laying all the groundwork for the launch of a new collection of perfumes. 

This campaign is:

To support the launch of this new collection of four bright and sunny fragrances,  featuring fragrant native Mediterranean plants and flowers, called the Blue Collection.

 All of the perfumes have been conceived and developed in the tiny 1000 Flowers atelier in the centre of the French perfume city of Grasse.

Orange Flowers and White Chocolate anyone??

Orange Flower Ganache

Fresh white Neroli blossoms married with
White Chocolate reminiscent of the gourmand
softness of the petals. Balanced with  green leaves
and the zest of Petitgrain and Bergamot.

(See perks page to preorder this fragrance...)


The Story

We will be working directly with highly respected French producers of essential oils and absolutes, as well as with lesser known artisan distillers, for the amazing fragrant oils and absolutes that will be used in these fragrances. Some are wild plants, and some are certified organic, but most importantly, they come from around the Mediterranean and they are infused with the beauty and warmth of the region.  Wild herbs, wild honey, ripe summer fruit, roses, orange blossoms, and conifers... these will all be included in the 4 creations.  Each will tell a part of the story of life in the Mediterranean, from the forests to the beach.

The Perfume Studio

The 1000 Flowers studio is in the centre of the old city of Grasse, a few steps from the cathedral, and just across a narrow little street from an old mansion that has a walled garden. Every Spring, the orange trees in that garden are in full bloom, and the blossoms perfume the whole street.  The scent is so intoxicating, that I have often imagined how to capture it and to translate it into a perfume. So this year, I began to write the formula, and this fragrance has led to the full collection represented by the colour blue. 

Why is Blue such a big part of this story? 

The Mediterranean region has a beautiful bright and sunny climate and the sky is often an amazing deep azure blue that is reflected in the intense blue of the sea. This blue has a way of saturating you with its beauty. In-between the blue sky and the blue sea there are native fragrant herbs and flowers as well as trees that flourish.

In the collection, the colour blue will be transmitted visually via the bottles: they’ll be cobalt blue glass and the labels will be bright and colourful, reminiscent of traditional Mediterranean tiles.  

(Please scroll down to see descriptions of each fragrance in The Blue Collection).

        
                                          


What is Needed...

 We are confirming last minute quotes for the supply chain of bottles, pumps (non-crimped of course to stay true to our ethic of a reusable or refillable flacon), custom-made outer packaging, certified organic non-wheat alcohol base, label printing, and of course the raw materials for the perfumes themselves.   But some of these things are costly, and this is where preorders for the collection will make it happen. This is where you play a crucial role!


Costs for this project:


  • The natural raw materials:   We will be utilizing precious and rare naturals in the formulations, such as French grown Iris butter, and organic Rose from Morocco.  These are rare and production is limited.  Other materials that the collection will feature are:  organic Rose centifolia hydrosol from Grasse, wild Carrot seed from Corsica, wild French black Pine, wild Mediterranean herbs, wild Spanish Labdanum and other fragrant materials produced by a respected French company, such as organic bourbon Ylang ylang, and wild Beeswax absolute.     We have some very highly respected companies on-board ready to provide these precious extracts.
  • Custom made boxes from England. (Very high quality 100% recycled materials.)
  • Bottles. The collection will be available in 2 sizes- 100ml cobalt blue glass bottles, and 10ml purse size, spray mini. Both are refillable.
  • The bright colourful labels. The design work is done, but for the printing we will be using a small Grasse company who does very high quality work. We would like to capture the texture and vibrancy of the hand-painted ceramic tiles from regions around the Mediterranean, and the company we will work with has the capability to create this effect. 

The Timeline

The production strategy is to have the collection ready to ship in the second week of December.  For this reason,  depending on where you live, it is possible that you may not receive your perfumes before the 25th of December, but we will keep you informed of exact shipping dates.

The Impact

1000 Flowers is an artisan company and by getting involved,  you will be supporting the launch of a sunny, conscientious, and unique collection of fragrances.  This way you will have exclusive access to these perfumes before they are commercially available, and you will be part of a true story
that has been distilled under a perfect blue sky.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


THE BLUE COLLECTION Perfumes

Orange Blossom Ganache
Fresh white Neroli blossoms married with
White Chocolate reminiscent of the gourmand
softness of the petals. Balanced with  green leaves
and the zest of Petitgrain and Bergamot.
(feminine fragrance)

Honey Mango Rose
A fragrance inspired by beach life on the Cote d'Azur.
The sweetness of ripe summer fruit and honeybees,
of suntan oil and Roses in full bloom.
(feminine fragrance)

Pink Pepper Wood

Fresh notes of Pink Pepper and Mediterranean herbs,
layered with French Black Pine, Cypress, and deep rich woods
of Vetiver and Cedar, with the dry spicy warmth of Saffron
and  Spanish Labdanum. 

(A more masculine fragrance but appreciated by women too.)

Wild Carrot Iris
A  powdery Iris fragrance supported by the cool sweetness of Carrot seed.
With French Pallida Iris butter and Iris Germanica from Morocco,
supported with French Carrot seed absolute, and Wild Carrot oil from
Corsica, balanced with Sandalwood, and Cedar shavings.
(masculine/feminine)


(Check the Update section for photos as the design work advances).

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign!  Send it to people you know who might be interested in perfumery or the Mediterranean region.  Share on facebook, twitter, etc.  Also please contact us directly if you have any questions.

A huge big thank you for being part of this project! xoxo,

~Jessica Buchanan

story:
Introducing the Nutra - A Beautiful and Modernize Humidifier and Aroma Diffuser. We have put a lot of effort in creating one of the best looking and advance humidifier up to date. Each year, millions suffer from cracking and irritated skin resulted from the cold and harsh weather. At time, it becomes unbearable and we are forced to use alternative solutions such as continuous application of lotions or use humidifier that hard to clean, accumulate bacteria and not appealing to look at it or display in your home. 

With beautiful design in mind, we reinvented how the humidifier should look. We make it simple and elegant that you're proud to display in your home and serve as the central talking point during group gathering. Our product is designed to give you the relaxing feeling you get by just sit back, relax and enjoy your day. With the added ultrasonic aroma diffuser, the Nutra allows you to use all type of oil fragrances with Nutra that will help transform your living space into relaxation oasis with a soothing and therapeutic atmosphere. It also come with a built-in ionizer, which produce "negative ions' to help lift your mood and reduce stress; maximizing the effects and benefits of the Nutra. The mesmerizing, multicolor LED ring will add beautiful and colorful effect to your decor as well as serving as a pleasant night light for you and your family. 

We already developed our first production-ready prototype. We need your help to push into mass production. We have identified our manufacturer and can immediately start production once we receive the funding. After various focus group and extensive market research, we've identified that the "misty black" will be the first color variation for the Nutra and we hope to develop other variation in the near future. Our vision is to make the world a little bit less stressful and people to slow down and enjoy life. Thank you for helping us with your generous contributions and believing in our product!

Current Design with LED lights, clock, timer and alarm setting in high quality ABS plastic with mosaic base design!

story:
Presented by Double Bravo Enterprises, LLC.

 

The bedside caddy you can't live without.

  1. Have you ever not been able to find your phone in the middle of the night?
  2. Have you ever spilled your drink on or near your phone?
  3. Wish there was an easy way to de-clutter your nightstand or do you wish you could get rid of that end table altogether and have more space?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, this product is what you need!

A better way to bedside organization.

Don't be tricked by other bedside caddies that don't work or are over designed. The Tuck-In Nightstand has everything you need and nothing you don't.

It is perfect for:

  • College dorms
  • Small Apartments/Tiny Homes
  • Nursing homes
  • Kid's room (especially bunk beds)
  • And many other situations!

Don't let this happen to you.

Charging your cell phone in bed can be disastrous.  By using a Tuck-In Nightstand, you can save yourself from a dangerous situation. It keeps your phone in arms reach but lets that phone stay cool when charging.

 

 

Design:

With its patent-pending design, Tuck-In nightstand is ready to help. All you need to do is "tuck" it in between your mattress and box spring or bed frame and it does the rest. (It also works on most couches.)

 

*Actual performance may be determined by the type of furniture you are using. Also, it may not be compatible with some types of bed frames. Please take a moment to review your unique situation before ordering.

  • Made from a durable, recyclable material. It won't crack under pressure so it is portable and it's dishwasher safe so you can stay clean.
  • Oversized cup holder can hold some of the largest cups, bottles, or cans.
  • Phone holder can accommodate the largest cell phones on the market with a case.
  •  Charging port allows you to charge your phone while it sits by you. When you are ready to go, your charging cable is held in place buy crimping it into the 'V' in the side.  (see computer rendition below) No more messy cords laying on the ground.

 

-This photo is the prototype we used in the video and pictures. The actual product will be slightly different.

Colors

The Tuck-In Nightstand will be available in a wide variety of colors including a Glow in the Dark model! Please specify which color you would like at checkout.

But what about America?

All Tuck-In nightstands will be manufactured in the United States of America. Thank you for your support.

Why Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is the perfect platform for our company. The tooling for the Tuck-In Nightstand is currently being made and we will begin manufacturing by the end of April. We are looking to secure presales for this product to fund the first production run. You can help us out a lot by showing your support! Even if we don't make our goal, the project is still moving forward so you will still get the reward you signed up for. Its a win-win.

All rewards are discounted from the retail price. So check them out now. For international customers this product may not be available in your country after this promotion ends.

Be a part of something bigger.

The Tuck-In Nightstand is our first project here at Double Bravo Enterprises but it won't be our last. We are very interested in perusing other projects with a goal to be environmentally sustainable corporation and making the world a better place to live. We feel this project is the first step to helping people live a more economical lifestyle. With your support now we know this product will be a success and Double Bravo Enterprises will move on to greater things. Thank you for your help.

Risks & Challenges.

Risks and challenges for this campaign are now only limited to the manufacturing and shipping process. We are working closely with a well established manufacturer that is local, not overseas. Any issues that arise can be dealt with swiftly. Also, all shipments will have tracking numbers and will be insured in case of any unforeseen mailing mishaps.

Timeline

Help us get the word out!

Like and follow us on Facebook: facebook.com/tuckinnightstand

Visit our website: www.tuckinnightstand.com

Contact us:

Double Bravo Enterprises, LLC   P.O. Box 271, Stratford CT, 06615

info@tuckinnightstand.com

or message us through indiegogo

story:
Why Do We Need ElimiFly?

Mosquitoes are the deadliest insects in the world. They are vectors for transmitting dangerous diseases such as Zika, Malaria, Dengue Fever, Yellow Fever, Chikungunya, Encephalitis and the West Nile Virus. They kill millions of people each year. The most vulnerable people are children, pregnant women, and the elderly. No other bite kills more humans or makes more of us sick than pesky mosquitoes.

 

The solution is the ElimiFly. This device effectively captures mosquitoes and helps control their population wherever the device is placed, preventing bites and the transmission of these terrible diseases to you and your family.

The ElimiFly mosquito trap is effective, quiet, simple to use, and eco-friendly. It requires only 5 watts of energy (different plug options available for out of country backers) and uses a biodegradable, non-toxic attractant, made with FDA-approved ingredients, to lure mosquitoes. This attractant lures mosquitoes into the ElimiFly’s fan. The fan then pulls them into a deadly trap. Once in the trap, there is no way for the mosquitoes to escape, and they die.

UV light traps have been proven ineffective. Repellents, creams, and candles keep mosquitoes away for only a few hours. The ElimiFly’s attractant provides a long-lasting, highly effective solution by replicating our natural secretions and cleverly luring mosquitoes into the trap. Furthermore, the ElimiFly is designed to only attract mosquitos. Very few butterflies, moths, and bees die, unlike UV traps.

How the funds will be used

The funds will be used to purchase the different components needed to assemble the ElimiFly, including injection molds, attractant ingredients and packaging, fans, USB power supplies, final product packaging, and distribution. We have obtained price quotes for all of the different components required to assemble the ElimiFly.  Manufacturing and assembly companies are standing by, ready to produce it. 

Help us manufacture in the U.S. !

If this Indiegogo campaign is successful, we will manufacture the ElimiFly in the U.S. Help us reach our goal and spread the word so we can get the funds to make it right here. We really want to make this product in the U.S. With your help, we can. 

What's in the ElimiFly Starter Kit?

The following will be included with the purchase of the ElimiFly Starter Kit:  

  • The ElimiFly Trap.
  • A month's supply of attractant (*3 months, 6 months or a year supply available for purchase.)
  • USB Power Supply.
  • Free US shipping.

 

Specifications

Size: The ElimiFly measures 9" x 6" x 5-1/4".

Coverage: 1 acre.

 Power consumption: 5 VDC, 5 Watts. 

The Attractant

ElimiFly's most powerful attractant was designed to attract mosquitoes, especially the so called tiger-mosquito responsible for Zika; it takes advantage of the generation of CO2 by metabolizing sugar. The addition of natural fragrances increases its potency, all put together in an easy to use delivery container. Our attractant has a pleasant smell and can be used inside the house.

Other sources of Attractants:

There are various sources of attractant that can be used with the ElimiFly. These include the following:

  • You can use Octenol that can be bought online.  Just place inside the trap, it works, but does not attract tiger mosquitos effectively.
  • Use a piece of clothing that has sweat on it. Recently used sweaty socks work the best. Just place a couple inside the trap and that will do the job. Your socks might get soiled with mosquitos, and you might have to toss them. 
  • Make your own, mixing sugar with activated yeast and water. Make sure it is activated yeast, otherwise it won't work. This option is more difficult to handle. Spillages are common, but it works. 

After a successful campaign, we can't wait to see all the mosquitoes you eliminate! You'll be able to connect with ElimiFly on social media and share your pictures with us. Help spread the word about ElimiFly!

Solar Power and Other Options

  • You could use a 5-volt lithium cell phone battery charger for locations where power is hard to reach (not included with ElimiFly purchase).
    • A 1,000 mAh will last approx 2.5 hrs.
    • In the picture below, the light blue battery is 4,000 mAh and will last approx 10 hrs. 
    • The black one is 16,750 mAh and will last approx 42 hrs.

​    

  • A solar panel can be used for locations where there is no electrical power, using the micro USB connection (available now; see our perks options).

​

Solar Panel approx 12" x 6" with micro USB connector.

  • We are currently considering producing multiple sizes and an ultra-portable mini ElimiFly. Let us know what you think!

 

 

Timeline

Help us by spreading the word! and sharing the ElimiFly in Facebook, and twitter please use the icons to the right of the video. Otherwise, please copy and paste the link below:

https://igg.me/at/Elimifly

 

 

In the Press

The ElimiFly’s attractant provides a long-lasting, highly effective solution by replicating our natural secretions and cleverly luring mosquitoes into the trap. Furthermore, the ElimiFly is designed to only attract mosquitos. Very few butterflies, moths, and bees die, unlike UV traps.How the funds will be usedThe funds will be used to purchase the different components needed to assemble the ElimiFly, including injection molds, attractant ingredients and packaging, fans, USB power supplies, final product packaging, and distribution. We have obtained price quotes for all of the different components required to assemble the ElimiFly.  Manufacturing and assembly companies are standing by, ready to produce it. Help us manufacture in the U.S. !If this Indiegogo campaign is successful, we will manufacture the ElimiFly in the U.S. Help us reach our goal and spread the word so we can get the funds to make it right here. We really want to make this product in the U.S. With your help, we can. What's in the ElimiFly Starter Kit?The following will be included with the purchase of the ElimiFly Starter Kit:  
The ElimiFly Trap.
A month's supply of attractant (*3 months, 6 months or a year supply available for purchase.)
USB Power Supply.
Free US shipping.
 SpecificationsSize: The ElimiFly measures 9" x 6" x 5-1/4".Coverage: 1 acre. Power consumption: 5 VDC, 5 Watts. The AttractantElimiFly's most powerful attractant was designed to attract mosquitoes, especially the so called tiger-mosquito responsible for Zika; it takes advantage of the generation of CO2 by metabolizing sugar. The addition of natural fragrances increases its potency, all put together in an easy to use delivery container. Our attractant has a pleasant smell and can be used inside the house.Other sources of Attractants:There are various sources of attractant that can be used with the ElimiFly. These include the following:
You can use Octenol that can be bought online.  Just place inside the trap, it works, but does not attract tiger mosquitos effectively.
Use a piece of clothing that has sweat on it. Recently used sweaty socks work the best. Just place a couple inside the trap and that will do the job. Your socks might get soiled with mosquitos, and you might have to toss them. 
Make your own, mixing sugar with activated yeast and water. Make sure it is activated yeast, otherwise it won't work. This option is more difficult to handle. Spillages are common, but it works. 
After a successful campaign, we can't wait to see all the mosquitoes you eliminate! You'll be able to connect with ElimiFly on social media and share your pictures with us. Help spread the word about ElimiFly!Solar Power and Other OptionsYou could use a 5-volt lithium cell phone battery charger for locations where power is hard to reach (not included with ElimiFly purchase).
A 1,000 mAh will last approx 2.5 hrs.
In the picture below, the light blue battery is 4,000 mAh and will last approx 10 hrs. 
The black one is 16,750 mAh and will last approx 42 hrs.

​    A solar panel can be used for locations where there is no electrical power, using the micro USB connection (available now; see our perks options).​Solar Panel approx 12" x 6" with micro USB connector.We are currently considering producing multiple sizes and an ultra-portable mini ElimiFly. Let us know what you think!  TimelineHelp us by spreading the word! and sharing the ElimiFly in Facebook, and twitter please use the icons to the right of the video. Otherwise, please copy and paste the link below:https://igg.me/at/Elimifly  In the Press

story:
Our Features

Craftsmanship

LUMAELITE is a perfect match for Macs

the same design concept as Apple - CMF design (Colour, Material and Finishes) 

the same material - aircraft grade aluminum alloy

the same technology as Apple - Computer Numerical Control (CNC) to build our circular lamp base.

An axis of rotation - CD pattern - exquisite craftsmanship

Functionality

U.S. EISA 2007 (Energy Independence and Security Act)

Catering for various requirements of different customer groups (e.g. businessmen, fashion designers and writers)

Four modes - Reading, Study, Relaxing and Sleep  

Four Brightness levels: 25%, 50%, 75% and 100%  

Default brightness of modes:

Reading: 75%  Study: 100%  Relaxing: 75%  Sleep: 25%

Turning on/ shutting down the lamp, switching modes and adjusting the brightness by touching relevant buttons   

Turning on or shutting down Timer for 60 mins by touching (investigation results indicate that an hour is the maximum time a person can concentrate continuously without a break)

Memory: In case of on battery, every time when the lamp is turned on, the mode and the brightness remain the same as that before switching off.  

Removable head 

- with built in 1600maH*3.7V Polymer Lithium-Ion Battery

- As detachable head torch

- Patent: with gilding metal terminals 

- LED: ENERGY STAR Certified Light Bulbs 

- CRI: eye protection - side emitting LED 

 

- three levels of brightness for three application circumstances: collars & book room to find something, put beside Mac in office

- charge automatically while connecting to the main body (colours of battery indicating light: full battery - green; charging - red)

- disconnecting to the main body - colours battery indicating light : less 30% - green; 0% - red (after flashing for 5 seconds, shut down automatically)

- Highest level of Brightness  ≥  1.5 hrs;

- Medium level of Brightness ≥ 2.5hrs;

- Lowest level of Brightness ≥ 3.5 hrs

Outputs: Fast Chargers with intelligent recognition, overcurrent protection, short-circuit protection

2 USB 2.0 Ports (5V/ 0~2.4A) 

1 Type-C 3.1 Ports (5V/0~3.0A): Reversible USB Plug with built-in transformer at the bottom of the lamp base

Customer experience

Rotatable lamp handle  & the angel and the length of the lamp handle

USB and Type-C ports have been designed and put in the right - electronics tend to be put in the right side of the desk lamp

Application Circumstances:

 

Design Process

  

Product Specifications 

 

Perks

 

Our Principle and Inspiration for LUMAELITE

BESTEK has mainly engaged in the production and sales of electronics. Our principle is to be innovative, environmentally-friendly, rational, detail-orientated, practical, minimalist, concise and classic. We concentrate our attention on product innovation as well as better product design with attempts to provide as good customer experience as possible.

Before we decide to design and manufacture LUMAELITE - a full-metal table lamp, we have investigated the top 100 table lamps in Japan, Europe and America and we find the majority of lamps are made from plastic and the metal ones are still uncommon. This finding encourages us to develop a different one and it is our today’s full-metal desk lamp - LUMAELITE.

 

Timeline

Production & Delivery

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
We can't do this without you. Thank you.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q1: It says that LUMAELITE is perfect for Macs. Can it be also used on any desk?

A1: The answer is yes and the USB and Type-C ports can be used on any devices, even Windows PC.

story:
OUR STORY:

We are Lindsey & Kyle. Two friends, with one passion: to light up the lives of others one LED System at a time.

Thirteen years ago, Kyle was in a terrible accident and broke his neck. Over the years, he has faced more obstacles than I could ever begin to imagine let alone understand or explain. Yet, he has always persevered. Fall 2015, two friends sat down to dinner and realized that by combining their strengths, they could both follow their dreams: thus, ChairGLO was born.

We are committed to improving the lives of our customers, our friends, which is why we build products to improve our users’ safety, social experiences, and nighttime adventures.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET:

We need your support to increase our manufacturing levels to over 100 systems in order to decrease costs to new and future customers. In return, you get the perk of choosing to help us give the gift of light or lighting up your next adventure with a personal ChairGLO LED Lighting System of your own. Each system has all of the product features and attributes listed below.

THE IMPACT:

Our goal of $15,000, will not only allow us to provide the wheelchair community with a safer, cooler, and more affordable lighting system but it will also allow us to donate ChairGLO systems to children at Shriner’s Hospital and to veterans via the Wounded Warrior Project. The donated systems will be hand delivered at no cost to them or their families as a “Thank You” to these organizations and veterans for all they have done and continue to do for us.

Like most “best friend” stories, ours began as kids over 15 years ago. As a freshman, Kyle was in a terrible ATV accident and broke his neck. We didn't know if he would make it, but with the support of friends, family, and Shriner's Hospital for Children, Kyle is not only alive but thriving. Thanks to Shriner's generous surgical donation, Kyle was able to use his hands to design and build ChairGLO’s first prototypes helping make himself and other wheelchair users safer at night. Additionally, a lot of our family and friends are veterans. Without their sacrifices, none of us would be here which is why we are including the Wounded Warriors Project in our campaign, as well.

RISK & CHALLENGES:

We are constantly working to raise the bar on our services. As such, we have been reaching out to backup manufacturers and suppliers to make sure we will be able to meet potential demand. However, there is a risk that all systems will not be able to shipped before Christmas. In order to prevent this from happening, we will be placing orders with suppliers mid-campaign. If this small-round is successful, we plan to use the lessons learned and market research from this campaign to launch our second round of funding next year.

This experience has taught us more than either of our MBA’s ever could have taught us: Passion is the fire that will fuel any successful endeavor. Like most entrepreneurs we get tired, but then we remember the smiling faces of the 32 people, veterans, children, and parents who we are fortunate enought to call our customers. It is in those moments of exhaustion that we think of their faces and the faces of our friends who are no longer with us, who are no longer able to wake up to another day. We love what we do and are passionate about ChairGLO’s success because it allows us to help people, plain and simple.

We can’t promise that we won’t encounter problems. However, we can promise to always persevere and to fulfill this goal and our obligations to you, our friends.

OTHER  WAYS YOU CAN HELP

No funds, NO PROBLEM! If you’re unable to donate, please send a personal message to 2-3 people you know who might be willing and able to contribute and share it on social media using Indiegogo’s easy share tools! With each new person we connect with, we get that much closer to accomplishing our goal. Thank you in advance for your time, support, and help sharing our story!

 

Product Features:

-1meter of LED Lighting

-Rechargeable Battery (Less than 6hrs to 100% charged)

-10+ hours of battery life

- Case dimensions: Length/width 3.900” L x 2.200" W (99.06mm x 55.88mm)

- SMD 5050 LED Strips (3 LED diodes in one housing)

- Total weight: 7.2oz

- 60 LEDs/Meter or 864 lumens/meter

- Bluetooth capability

-Android/iPhone capable app

 

Product Attributes:

-Designed for both Manual & Power Wheelchairs

-Easy to Install

-User Friendly

-Extremely Bright

-Low Profile

-Portable/Travels Internationally

-Exchangeable between multiple devices

-Lightweight

-Excellent Icebreaker/Conversation Starter

-LEDs dance to music from your phone or the DJ playing your favorite tunes
