story:
As a prominent interior designer, Amber was upset with the money, time, and material wasted in the traditional paint sampling process. Paint manufacturers provide free paint swatches, but they are not truly accurate to the final paint color or texture because they are not actually produced with paint. This left Amber and other designers with the hindering task of painting blank sample boards (or the wall directly) with sample-sized quantities of paint. The process is messy and takes time away from what she and other designers need to be doing.

Most people do not dispose of excess paint in the correct way. Leftover sample paint is often washed down the sink or thrown out, leading to a huge and unseen environmental impact.

 

 

We talked with thousands of interior designers, weighing ideals with practical applications, as we honed our final solution. We will ship oversized, hand-painted, adhesive-backed sample decals within 24 hours. The decals have the same effect as paint on a wall surface. They provide the kind of color accuracy and texture that was only before achieved through purchasing sample paint and doing all the work in-house. The samples will be available for the same price as traditional sample paint. And unlike current sampling options, they are available in a full range of sheens. Best of all, the decals eliminate environmental waste created by surplus sample paint, which is rarely disposed of in the correct way.

Make faster design decisions without dealing with the hassle of paint. Simply peel and stick to view real paint on the wall.

 

 

Unlike traditional paint swatches which are merely dyed to mimic color, our decals are hand painted with the specific paint color from each company. Two coats are applied with rollers for color accuracy and texture that is as good as it gets.

 

 

 

Experiment in a variety of locations. The low-tack, non-damaging adhesive is specially formulated for interior wall surfaces and can be repositioned many times. They can even wrap around corners to show contrast between walls.

 

 

The decals are offered in two sizes and six finishes to fit the individual requirements of each job. We offer the only way to sample different sheens without buying a full sized quantity of paint. The 12″ x 12″ fits in small spaces and is easily transported. The 24″ x 24″ is over 6 times the size of the largest paint swatches on the market.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We will start by offering our decals in paint lines from Sherwin Williams, Benjamin Moore, and Dunn Edwards. Before we launch our online store, we will produce a beginning inventory of the top 25% of colors offered by each company, including any specific requests we get from our backers (you).

At the end of this campaign, we will reach out to all of our backers to collect specific color requests. We estimate that it will take 30 days from the start of production to build out our introductory inventory. We will maintain inventory levels of those colors from that point on. We plan to build out a full inventory of every color offered by each manufacturer as we grow. We will also offer additional paint lines later down the road.

 

 

We can’t wait to begin production, but we need your help! Setting up a space equipped for production, warehousing, and fulfillment isn’t cheap. We then need to purchase the materials to produce an inventory of nearly 25,000 decals. All of the logistics are planned out, our warehouse space has been located, and everything is in place to make this happen, but we need an extra financial push to get the ball rolling.

Every dollar pledged to this campaign will go directly to the setup and production of our initial inventory. In return, you'll receive up to 50% off or even free decals for life! Either way, you will receive more than what you put in. You will also get priority to ensure your color choices are stocked from day one.

Check out the rewards below and then choose one on the right sidebar. Pick out something nice!

All pledges grant color choice priority (except for the Weekend Warrior tier). If you back us, we will try to have your personal color choices  stocked from day one. You can only choose one reward. Choose wisely!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Is the color 100% accurate?

We use the exact paint provided by each manufacturer and quality check all the paint we receive against their paint swatches to prevent mixing errors. However, there is always the possibility of slight variation between the decal and the final color due to potential paint mixing errors at your local paint store. It’s important to always check that the color mixed in store is correct and fully matches the color on the decal. Paint stores can do this for you by drying a small amount of paint on a mixing stick or the can itself to ensure color accuracy before leaving the store.

 

What sizes are available?

We currently offer two sizes: 12” x 12” and 24” x 24″

 

How is this different from the free swatches provided by paint manufacturers?

The difference between this and the free swatches provided by the manufacturers is the size, flexible material, adhesive backing, color accuracy, texture, and finish options. Paint swatches (even the large ones) are “printed” using a dyed lacquer of close resembling color, which is why they always look a little different than the final painted result and why many designers opt to paint sample boards or the wall surface directly. We apply two coats of real paint to the decals, so they have the same advantages that the paint itself has. We use the specific paint from each paint line that we carry. We also offer our decals in six different finishes: Flat, Velvet, Eggshell, Satin, Semi-Gloss, and Gloss.. You can’t get paint swatches or sample paint in different finishes!

 

Are different finish options available?

Yes! We will offer our decals in each of the sheen options available in each paint line, including: Flat, Velvet, Eggshell, Satin, Semi-Gloss, and Gloss.

Will the adhesive on the decal damage the wall surface?
We use a low tack, water-based adhesive that is specifically designed for interior wall surfaces. The decal is easily removed without any damage. However, if the wall has been recently painted and not allowed the time to properly cure, damage is possible. A general rule of thumb is that if masking tape won’t damage the wall, the decal won’t either.

 

What paint lines do you carry?

We will start by offering paint lines from Sherwin Williams, Benjamin Moore, and Dunn Edwards. We will stock the top 25% of colors from each company, including any specific color requests we receive from our backers. We plan on building out a full inventory of all colors offered by the manufacturers we carry as we grow. We will also offer additional paint lines in the future.

What is the turnaround time and shipping cost?
We ship out all orders within 24 hours and often the same day if an order is placed before a certain time. Shipping cost and time varies according to the destination location and the shipping option selected.
 

Are there any bubbles in the decal after application?

There usually are a few bubbles in the decal after it is applied to the wall surface, but they are easily smoothed out.


Can the decals be trimmed?

The decals are easily trimmed with ordinary scissors.
 

Are the decals reusable?

The decals are easily repositionable many times but we see these as single-project use. It is difficult to get the decal back onto the release paper for storage and later reuse. It’s possible, but tricky. You can always leave the decals on their backings if you want to reuse them in other projects without reordering.
 

Can the decals be repainted?

The decals can certainly be repainted if you choose to do so.
 

Can the decals be recycled?

Recycling requirements vary from location to location.  You will need to check with your local recycling center to see if they accept painted plastic materials. We are looking into the possibility of partnering with a recycling center to make the process easier for those who wish to recycle but do not have access to a facility.
 

Where are you located?

Our warehouse facility will be located in Chattanooga, Tennessee.

Paint swatches (even the large ones) are “printed” using a dyed lacquer of close resembling color, which is why they always look a little different than the final painted result and why many designers opt to paint sample boards or the wall surface directly. We apply two coats of real paint to the decals, so they have the same advantages that the paint itself has. We use the specific paint from each paint line that we carry. We also offer our decals in six different finishes: Flat, Velvet, Eggshell, Satin, Semi-Gloss, and Gloss.. You can’t get paint swatches or sample paint in different finishes! Are different finish options available?Yes! We will offer our decals in each of the sheen options available in each paint line, including: Flat, Velvet, Eggshell, Satin, Semi-Gloss, and Gloss.Will the adhesive on the decal damage the wall surface?We use a low tack, water-based adhesive that is specifically designed for interior wall surfaces. The decal is easily removed without any damage. However, if the wall has been recently painted and not allowed the time to properly cure, damage is possible. A general rule of thumb is that if masking tape won’t damage the wall, the decal won’t either. What paint lines do you carry?We will start by offering paint lines from Sherwin Williams, Benjamin Moore, and Dunn Edwards. We will stock the top 25% of colors from each company, including any specific color requests we receive from our backers. We plan on building out a full inventory of all colors offered by the manufacturers we carry as we grow. We will also offer additional paint lines in the future.What is the turnaround time and shipping cost?We ship out all orders within 24 hours and often the same day if an order is placed before a certain time. Shipping cost and time varies according to the destination location and the shipping option selected. Are there any bubbles in the decal after application?There usually are a few bubbles in the decal after it is applied to the wall surface, but they are easily smoothed out.Can the decals be trimmed?The decals are easily trimmed with ordinary scissors. Are the decals reusable?The decals are easily repositionable many times but we see these as single-project use. It is difficult to get the decal back onto the release paper for storage and later reuse. It’s possible, but tricky. You can always leave the decals on their backings if you want to reuse them in other projects without reordering. Can the decals be repainted?The decals can certainly be repainted if you choose to do so. Can the decals be recycled?Recycling requirements vary from location to location.  You will need to check with your local recycling center to see if they accept painted plastic materials. We are looking into the possibility of partnering with a recycling center to make the process easier for those who wish to recycle but do not have access to a facility. Where are you located?Our warehouse facility will be located in Chattanooga, Tennessee.

story:
How many home monitoring camera do you need for your home security ?

5 cameras for 5 rooms ?

4 cameras for 4 rooms ?

At least 2 cameras ?

You need no fixed camera , but just one movable ROBOT I6!

What is I6 ?

I6 gives you a full view of each coners of your home wherever and whenever you are--with inbuilt camera&Wi-Fi, phone connectivity, remote App control, real time video, snapshot, motion detection. 
Security and cleaning are two major issues to be solved in daily life. we want to make home life safer, closer, and easier . I6 not only protects your home, connects to your home, but also cleans your home.

With time schedule, auto-rechage, seven cleaning paths, anti-drop, anti- blocking, dual-mode anti-scratching system, I6 is ideal for vacuuming. sweeping, and mopping.

Wherever you are with a smartphone or a tablet, I6 ’s camera will show you any event in your home. Via I6's APP, you can view video and take pictures.

You can control I6 to work via infrared remoter or pressing the keys on the cover. But this is not enough. We realise controlling I6 no limit of distance and time.At any time, as long as internet is available (Wi-Fi/4G/3G), you can remote control the I6 to move to any corners, to show you any event in your home. At the same time, I6 cleans your home.


Safeguarding your family. If all your family is on vacation, just activate the I6 to look around each corner of your house. You can turn on smart motion detection when you leave home for a few days. Wherever you are, I6 tells you what’s happening at home via a streamlined phone app. You’ll receive an instant notification if something out of the ordinary happens, and you can also use the app to connect with I6 remotely to see what is going on. At the same, you can record a video or take a picture accoordingly.

What's more, I6 is a great way to connect to your home . I6 helps you keep movable eye on your child or pet. You can see, hear, and attract them in case they do something naughty or you just miss them.

Share the video or pictures to sicial medie via I6' s APP.


I6 automatically clean and return to a beautiful, clean home. By solving the time-consuming household chore of cleaning, I6 save you time and makes your life easier and more relaxing.

Supported by quad Core MCU 4.0 system, I6 have seven clean paths. For a house sized 2200ft² /200m², I6 can clean efficiently at least 95% area of the house. It is very smart.

I6 has a pioneering dual-mode anti-scratching system. It has 15 sets of front-contact sensors, 2 times more sensitive than common cleaning robots. The TPU sensing film, which is only found on I6, protects both your furniture and I6 itself.

I6 is capable of working continuously for 120 minutes without recharging. When recharging is needed, I6 will automatically find and dock at the charging station.


With rolling wheels, I6 can climb a slope of 15 degrees. It can automatically measure speed, surpass obstacles, return in case of blocking. 

I6 is capable of vacumming across different flooring materials, even slight height change in flooring like between rooms from hardwood to ceramic.


Quad Core MCU 4.0 system

Besides dust absorbing and sweeping, a large mop can be installed in the robot to make sure the floor is cleaner and the process more convenient. So you do not need to two robots, one for vacuuming&sweeping task, other one for mopping.

Solve the three big cleaning problems

  • Cleaning under sofas and beds
  • Wonderful performance when cleaning coners
  • No more worry about pet hairs

What is the standard delivery ?

1* Main unit I6
1* Charging dock with adapter
1* Infrared remoter
1* Bristle brush
2* Side brush
1*Cleaning Tool
1* Filter
2* Clean mopping cloths
1* User manual
1* Warranty card

 

Gold/black

Transformers style 

Founded in 2013, the JISIWEI intelligent technology company plays a leading role in smart cloud robot cleaners. On the basis of years of staff experience in robots and the Internet, JISIWEI has succeeded in researching and developing the I6 Robot Cleaner supported by Cloud. With a combination of Internet technology creation and a robot industry supply chain, JISIWEI will make a series of products for house cleaning and related service platforms.

Why do we need your support?

We want to make life easier, liberate our mind and protect our family members. 7 years ago, we started to explore the housing robots field. By solving the time-consuming household chore of cleaning and safeguarding your house, we are participants in life and creators of happiness. By making the main function increasingly perfect, we want to make housing robots popular quickly. In order to be number one, we never cease to revolutionize the traditional sweepers which are now equipped with an eye (network camera), brain (Wi-Fi) and soul(cloud transmission by APP controlling of smartphone).

Cleaning and safety are two major issues to be solved in daily life. When you are away from home, the moment you see pictures about your robot’s cleaning, laughing babies, your pets at home and other family members, you are happy. We hope we can find numerous people like you to join us for the whole process so that we can get your feedback and suggestions. This will encourage us to make our products perfect, and to speed up the upgrading of our products. We hope to share our achievements and joy with everyone.  

Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING 
Our team is staffed with experienced professionals in the sourcing and hardware manufacturing industries. Their expertise and proximity to the factory should be able to mitigate any of the manufacturing issues that may arise. The estimated delivery date is within 4 weeks after the end of our campaign.

INTERNATIONAL LOGISTICS 
We're working with highly experienced logistics partners to help us mitigate any of the issues that may arise with shipping. If shipping issues come up, their expert knowledge will help us navigate through difficulties and help us get I6 into your hands.

FQA

1, Is the app for both Android and Apple ?

 Yes, both of them

2, Are the remote APP control only available in WIFI?

Available in WIFI,4G and 3G.  WIFI is the most stable way.

3, How many phone can control a I6 in the same time ?

2 phones can connect with I6 in the same time at most, but only one device can control a I6 in the same time.

4, How many I6 one device can control in the same time?

One phone can connect 3 I6 in the same time, but can operate only one  I6 in the same time.

5, What is the definition of I6’s camera?

 The definition of I6’s is 1080P 

6, What is the working life of the battery ?

More than 2 years.

7, Where can I download the APP ?

You can download the APP at Apple store, Google play Store, or our website. It is free.

8, Is the APP control the only way to control I6?

You can control I6 via APP, infrared controller, and button on the machine.

9, What is the warranty ?

I6 comes with a 12 months limited warranty

story:
Your BudHub is the ALL-IN-ONE Solution for an Active Lifestyle! Smell-Proof, Water-Proof it Holds up to 8 Grams of Your Favorite BUD. A Compact, Ergonomic Design that Fits Comfortably in Your Hand. It’s the New Marijuana Accessory Designed for Life’s Adventure. Includes a One-Hitter + Cleaning Cane.

Website: https://www.YourBudHub.Com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yourbudhub
Instagram: https://instagram.com/yourbudhub/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YourBudHub

According to a recent Gallup poll (August 2013), 38% of the United States population has tried marijuana.  Contrary to how the media portrays people who smoke marijuana, the reality is that most lead an active lifestyle….some very active – not defined by media stereotypes. 

Your BUDHUB was designed for those medicinal marijuana smokers who lead an active lifestyle and require a Smell-Proof carrying case to transport their favorite smoke along with a one-hitter and cleaning poker (included).  If you boat, fish, camp, hike, bike, snowmobile, kayak, canoe or enjoy any outdoor activity, Your BUDHUB will become your must have accessory.

Made in the U.S.A., Your BUDHUB (Patent Pending) is designed to hold a bat, poker and up to 8 grams of your cleaned bud in an air tight/water proof case.  The double tube design seals tightly with a snap on cap that keeps your favorite smoke fresh and protected from moisture – even if you fall in the water!  Best yet…it FLOATS!

The purposeful taper of the double tubes fits ergonomically into your clenched fist with a natural feel as you firmly grasp Your BUDHUB in use.  Your small finger wraps perfectly around the long, thin tube that stores the one-hitter bat & the cleaning poker shaft.

Simple to use: Pop open the lid, pull out the cleaning cane and insert it into the 1 hitter, apply slight pressure to the 1-hitter and you can lift it out of the tube.  Grab the edge of the bat when it appears and now grasp Your BUDHUB tightly in your fist as you push the bat into the marijuana chamber with a twisting motion to fill the bats chamber.  Simply snap the lid shut when you’re done.

Compact in size at approximately 3 1/2“tall X 2” wide X 1 ¼”thick, Your BUDHUB easily fits into the pocket of your jeans, coat, purse, tackle box, glove box or backpack.  Since its smell-proof, regardless of how pungent the aroma, it goes undetected when you have it with you.  The food grade polymer is a heavy duty .0093 thick - - designed to withstand the rigors of an active lifestyle.  Available in four colors: smoky gray, blue, red and green.  Each translucent color allows you to see through the textured tube and check on the product level inside.

CHARTER FUNDING ANGELS NEEDED!

Join the movement to #BANTHEBAGGY OR retire that bulky, smelly and expensive Dug Out. Join the Your BUDHUB REVOLUTION and support our product launch!  You can support us for as little as $12…includes USA delivery! 

PLEASE LOOK AT THE MANY SPECIAL PERKS WE’VE ASSEMBLED AND HELP

US LAUNCH THIS GREAT NEW PRODUCT!

THE ORIGINS:

I’ve always been a serial entrepreneur my entire adult life.  In the mid 1990’s, a buddy of mine and I developed several patented products for the do-it-yourself marketplace.  Over a four year period of time I built the sales side of the business with big box retailers and then sold my interest to my partner.

With the recent changes in attitude towards medical marijuana and the movement of many states to fast track recreational use, the marketplace is now open to more forward thinking. 

While perusing various websites searching accessories, I noticed that there were no good answers for carrying a one-hitter + poker and the marijuana.  The closest thing was a Dug Out.  I had owned one of those 20 years past and remembered that it always smelled and I eventually lost the lid.  Most of my friends who smoke carry a zip lock baggy and a one hitter.  With the pungent aroma of the new marijuana – you can smell it from 6 feet away.

Your BUDHUB came to me like a light switch flipping to “ON”.  I found nothing in the marketplace that was designed to carry a one-hitter bat, poker and have room for the product – all kept in a smell-proof container – yet be compact and durable. 

It started as a rough sketch of my idea, thorough research and filing a utility patent before I started working with a plastics engineer by the name of Lon Weber of Iowa Mold & Engineering [www.iowamold.com], he created a CAD drawing of my initial design.  I then produced a 3D printed piece to evaluate the design.  Several design changes and 3D printed pieces later, we arrived on the final design of Your BUDHUB. 

I then turned it over to Lon and his team to produce the steel mold for the injection molding process. They made the process painless.

SO WHAT ARE THE CHANCES OF YOUR BUDHUB BEING PRODUCED AND DELIVERED TO YOU?

100%  NO-RISK GUARANTEE!

The mold is now completed and I have produced an initial inventory run of each of the 4 colors available. If you become a supporter, Your BUDHUB will be shipped via the USPS upon confirmation of your contribution.  You will not have to wait for the campaign to be over to receive Your BUDHUB!  We want it in your hands as soon as possible.

We are confident in the quality of our product and that's why we offer a         90 DAY - NO QUESTIONS ASKED GUARANTEE!  If within the first 90 days of you owning Your BUDHUB, if the living hinge breaks, your dog chews it up into multiple pieces or you back over it with your truck by accident, I'll replace it for FREE.   Just gather up the pieces and send the "dead" BUDHUB back to me PREPAID with a copy of your receipt and I'll ship you a replacement BUDHUB to you PREPAID.  Just contact customerservice@yourbudhub.com.  

WHY INDIEGOGO? This creation was an effort of collaboration with a few of my close friends and kids.  It didn’t happen overnight and took 18 months from concept to execution.  In our multiple discussions over those many months, we thought what better way to launch a product into the marketplace?  This crowd funding platform has brought many great products to the marketplace and it would add an element of fun to the whole process. 

The money we raise will be used to help advertise Your BUDHUB and spread the word about this great product.

So here we are.  Please TELL YOUR FRIENDS to drive more eyes to our product launch!  THANK YOU!!

story:
What is the AC Companion?

What if you could find a process to achieve energy conservation without sacrifice, forfeiture of standard of living, or an adverse economic impact?

This is now possible through the introduction of an innovative device called the AC Companion.

Unlike similar and more expensive units that claim increased energy efficiency, the AC Companion can be retrofitted to ANY residential, commercial, or industrial HVAC system.  With our patented unit, a minimum energy savings of 35% will be achieved with an even greater reduction in operating costs.

As of 2013, electricity represented 55% of the energy used by commercial properties.  Energy costs are projected to rise significantly in the coming years.  As a result, both homeowners and commercial properties are looking for new ways to cut costs and reduce their energy consumption.

Renewable energy such as solar, wind, biomass, and hydropower, are becoming ever more popular.  Some of the drawbacks of these types of energy include economic feasibility, limitations on production capacity, geographical location, high cost, and limited benefits.

Our goal is to provide cutting-edge technological advancements in the efficiency of refrigeration systems, facilitating a reduction in the carbon footprint through innovative green energy methods resulting in significant energy and cost savings to the consumer.

As we mentioned earlier, the AC Companion can be retrofitted to any HVAC system.  Based on the setup and configuration of your system, as well as your local energy tier pricing designation, the AC Companion could potentially  reduce your out of pocket costs by 50% or more!

Some of the benefits of using the AC Companion include:

  • Minimal Up-Front Costs
  • Potential Tax Benefits & Rebates
  • Energy Cost Savings
  • A Possible One Year Return On Investment For Residential Installs
  • For Commercial & Industrial Installations, The Return Could Be Even Sooner
  • Decrease In Stress On Your Current System
  • Reduction In System Maintenance
  • Increase Of Your System's Life Cycle


The Impact

What could the AC Companion do for your community?  If your local school system was able to save money on energy costs, that could potentially mean more money for education, teachers, books, sports, and after school programs.  If your local supermarket saved money on their energy costs, those cost savings could make their way to the consumer with cheaper products on the shelves.  If your employer saved money on their operating costs, this could result in raises and higher wages.


How does it work?

To keep it simple, the AC Companion creates an artificial environment for your system.  It tricks the AC unit into thinking it's cooler outside than it actually is.  This allows your existing AC unit to work more efficiently and with a lot less stress on your system.  

Similar to a battery, the AC Companion utilizes an ice vessel to store it's energy.  The ice vessel will vary in size depending on your cooling needs, but will be small enough and light enough to rest near or on top of your residence or building.  During the day, the energy from the ice vessel is transferred by your refrigerant through your existing system.  

In some cases, the ice vessel may last for several days, but eventually it will need recharging.  The system can be programmed to recharge itself during off peak hours, or during a time when the temperature outside is more conducive for creating ice.  The recharging time will vary on the size of the ice vessel, but in most cases, it will take 15 - 30 minutes and only use the amount of energy required to run a standard light bulb.  

What We Need

Currently, we are in our Beta test phase.  We have been working with a handful of local businesses and one city entity who have expressed interest in being one of the first to be outfitted with the AC Companion.  These businesses are being set up at a minimal cost so that we may continue to collect real world data.

We are seeking funds to help us secure office space and a warehouse facility so that we can begin shipping parts to be assembled and continue our testing.  Our staff is currently limited, and everyone thus far is donating their time and energy into growing this adventure.  

At AC Companion we are working diligently to bring this unit to market for the betterment of society as a whole. 

We know through our validated testing that this AC Companion will reduce energy consumption and save communities (potentially) millions of dollars.  Not to mention that with this reduction in energy consumption this unit will reduce the need for communities to implement brown outs to save stress on the energy grid.  Without the need for brown outs, every person (fixed income or not) will be able to stay cool in the heat of the summer at a reasonable cost, thus reducing and potentially eliminating the chance for loss of life nationwide.

However, as it stands now, this technology is unheard of.  Therefore the cost to produce one of these units has become prohibitive. Yes, we as a society have priced ourselves out of potential lifesaving and financial saving measures.  It truly has become all about the almighty dollar. Thus, this has truly become a two part process for us at AC Companion at this point in time.

Part one brings us to you, the society we are working to better.  We are in need of these funds so that we can build these exclusive parts ourselves, and purchase those parts that are available to buy, in such quantity that we can ensure the savings we need to pass on to you, the consumer.

The second part of this is that we have intentionally stayed away from main stream funding because we strongly believe (from those we have spoken to) that the powers that be will attempt to shelf this unit to protect their investment, rather than to protect the consumer and the lives of those who are so harshly affected by the summertime heat.


We will keep you updated on our progress so stay tuned........

What is the AC Companion?
 What if you could find a process to achieve energy conservation without sacrifice, forfeiture of standard of living, or an adverse economic impact?
This is now possible through the introduction of an innovative device called the AC Companion.
Unlike similar and more expensive units that claim increased energy efficiency, the AC Companion can be retrofitted to ANY residential, commercial, or industrial HVAC system.  With our patented unit, a minimum energy savings of 35% will be achieved with an even greater reduction in operating costs.

As of 2013, electricity represented 55% of the energy used by commercial properties.  Energy costs are projected to rise significantly in the coming years.  As a result, both homeowners and commercial properties are looking for new ways to cut costs and reduce their energy consumption.
Renewable energy such as solar, wind, biomass, and hydropower, are becoming ever more popular.  Some of the drawbacks of these types of energy include economic feasibility, limitations on production capacity, geographical location, high cost, and limited benefits.
Our goal is to provide cutting-edge technological advancements in the efficiency of refrigeration systems, facilitating a reduction in the carbon footprint through innovative green energy methods resulting in significant energy and cost savings to the consumer.
As we mentioned earlier, the AC Companion can be retrofitted to any HVAC system.  Based on the setup and configuration of your system, as well as your local energy tier pricing designation, the AC Companion could potentially  reduce your out of pocket costs by 50% or more!
Some of the benefits of using the AC Companion include:


Minimal Up-Front Costs
Potential Tax Benefits & Rebates
Energy Cost Savings
A Possible One Year Return On Investment For Residential Installs
For Commercial & Industrial Installations, The Return Could Be Even Sooner
Decrease In Stress On Your Current System
Reduction In System Maintenance
Increase Of Your System's Life Cycle

story:
Hi, Indiegogo!

My name is Elchin Panakhov.

Im Founder of vaarz.

Our base team consists of 3 persons, and we are cousins.

This is the first campaign which we are created on Indiegogo.

What is the vaarz?
Beautiful, Realistic, Floating

vaarz is the First  Night Lamp similar to the Earth's only natural satellite Moon.
The surface is covered in craters, pits and scars like in real Moon of volcanic rocks to give more realistic view.

At first we wanted to make a night lamp, simply like on the moon, hanging on celling.Mission was not difficult, but we would like to offer you something more exciting and difficult.Then my brother suggested adding levitating feature.From that whole project has changed, began to appear and other ideas for the implementation of the project vaarz.

The task was complicated, but it was very interesting.

Just imagine, we are so enthusiastic that they wanted to make a miniature MOON..But it almost happened, was the difficulty in a realistic reflection of light from the surface of a sphere.

But with this we have consulted. There are rocks, reflecting the light as close as the moon's surface.

One such rock is pumice.


Stay One step closer to the Moon, decorate your home interior with vaarz.

About the Moon

-Facts:
-the Moon was probably made 4.5 billion years ago when a large object hit the Earth and blasted out rocks that came together to orbit round the Earth.  They eventually melted together, cooled down and became the Moon.  For another 500 million years pieces of rock kept striking aginst the surface of the Moon.

-You can see the surface of the Moon by using a pair of binoculars or a small telescope.  The Moon’s surface shows the damage caused by these large pieces of rock hitting it billions of years ago.  The surface is covered in craters, pits and scars.

-From the Earth we can only see one side of the Moon; the other side is always turned away from us.  Photographs from space show a similar scarred surface on the other side.

-The Moon is much smaller than the Earth, with a diameter of 2159 miles, or 3476 kilometres.  It is airless, waterless and lifeless.

-The Earth has a much greater surface than the Moon and was also hit by  debris (the rocks from explosions and collisions) but over time the damage has disappeared.  The wind and rain in the Earth’s atmosphere has helped to erode the pits and craters.

-The Moon has no atmosphere and so we can still see the damage caused billions of years ago.

Gallery:


Design:

 We realy did modern, elegant and perfect design!
 With complicating nature and any room design.

Pumice:

Pumice is a type of rock formed from the rapid cooling of volcanic lava that contains huge amounts of gas and steam.   The gas and steam get ‘frozen’ into the cooled lava forming a lava froth.  Under a microscope, pumice can be seen to be a frothy volcanic glass.
-French astronomer Leo found that moonlight is quite similar to the light of the sun reflected from the volcanic ash. And we know that the moonlight - it is the light of the sun reflected by the surface of the moon.

Roughly the same reflective properties has pumice, rock light color similar to glass. Reflected light from the pumice similar to lunar.


Technical proter./Main Characteristics: 

-Bump Surface

-Nature Sounds

-Floating

-Rotating

-Night / Day Sensor

Descriptions:

Floating distance: 25-30mm

Base size: 30x 30 x1sm

Floating object: Moon

Using inductive power system

User Manual: English



Materials:

 Desk materials -Glass.

 "Moon" materials ( Surface ) -Volcano Rock, plastic.

 
DIMENSIONS:

 Diameter of vaarz Moon- 21 sm. Real diameter of the Moon is 2159 miles.

 Plate height-30 sm

 Plate width-30 sm


Color (Editions) Variations:
- White and Black Edition

| For investors exclusive 24k Gold Edition.

   by Contributing 50 000$ :

   5% from each sale on permanent basis.
   You also will get exclusive 24k Gold edition of vaarz.

   for other questions and offers stay in touch:

   investor@vaarz.com


Customization:

Besides the main light of bulb "MoonGlow" , vaarz has other several colors of Mini Led Bulb.

T-Shirt:

3 reason for why Contrubute to our campaign 45$ :

1) You will get this awesome T-Shirt.

2) We need your support.

3) You are Amazing!

*add 5$ for shipping

Mobile case:

-What about mobile case? By contributing us 30$, you will get awesome mobile case!

*Please add 5$ for shipping


Give the "Moon", dear to you man:

Perfect gift for Her:

Only 259$

*25$ shipping cost

***EXCLUSIVELY ON INDIEGOGO

WE CAN ADD LOGO, SIGN OR INITIALS ON THE RIGHT CORNER OF the vaarz's PLATE WITH YOUR REQUEST!


Letter from the Moon!

We will send to email, letter with Thanks for any contribution!


Achievements:

20 000$-Alarm clock and clock

45 000$-Moon Phases light effect


Save Energy with vaarz:


Risks and challenges

No Risks! 

Even if we do not reach the required amount,

We will deliver the vaarz to all who pre-order.

Delivery time, approximately, July  (26.07.2015)

We would like to note that the final version may differ slightly

We try to make every effort In order to distinguish not there, and if they are, with better quality.


What if I forgot to pay for International shipping?

No problem. Click the "Contribute Now" button at the top of the page and manually enter the International shipping amount. It will be added to your pledge amount. Just make sure to enter the same personal information you provided with your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.


Shipping:

-Price for standart vaarz 

 White Edition-259$ (Include your Sign, Logo or initials service)

 Black Edition-259$ (Include your Sign, Logo or initials service)

-For Special:

 Love Edition-259$ (Include your Sign, Logo or initials service)

 *Shipping cost 25$


Site:

     http://www.vaarz.com
